resources.string: I've got some C4 for the job right here.
That's the keycard! Now, grab it and let's head back!
Come on! Get him in!
No-one's seen you. Keep it that way. Now, the gate.
That's the plane. Get the loot inside, then give it some fuel.
The sewer entrance is near Jimbos, that auto chop shop. Keep your heads down.
He is balding and wears a black suit. You probably scared him off, so look around the offices or in the corridors!
Two minutes. Learn to drive, asshole.
Is this the right place? Mooooove!
Nice work! The fourth wave was beaten back!
Was that a vial breaking? Don't touch the blood!
You gotta get the keycard in the Oval Office!
Why don't I hear the sound of sawing coming through my headphones?
I count... two guys.
Snipers again! Take 'em out!
OK, get ready, here I come!
Did you really think you could capture me?
Fucking hell, you threw it in the water!?
You need to stop that firewall.
Argh, they pulled the power for the scanner!
That's it, guys. The AA gun has been disabled. But there's still one more.
Time to fly, friends.
So hydrochloric acid was the same thing... huh, you learn something new every day.
You're in, but the alarm was triggered. Lock it down before it goes off, and we can keep this caper on track.
The pick-up truck is here, you can throw the bags out the window if you wanna make a easy escape.
A neighbor saw you. She called 911.
I'll pack this into files and get ready to stream it up to the press.
Here come the cops! Come to fuck up Christmas. Hold them off, and make sure those elf bastards don't slacken off.
SWATs incoming from the lumber mill, keep them away!
That was it. Niiice.
The vault is protected by a laser gate, but no matter. You know what to do. Watch its sequence and time your run through.
Now you got to find a way inside.
Keep the damn Murkies away from the weapon.
Put a gas can on the paintings, guys. Then shoot it.
Too much action here. I'll have the guys build the cage at the bridge.
OK, now drive. Go, go, go!
C'mon guys, get that liquid nitrogen.
Dear friends, we're going to New York for a quick bank job.
Hmm, the key must need a higher access level for the armory. You'll have to recode it.
Almost there!
Guys, safe to come out yet? I swallowed a cockroach.
That's them! Now, get them back to Hoxton.
Mitchell's by the pool. Introduce yourselves.
Time is up, friends. You need to redo the hack.
Chop chop. The feds will be here any moment.
Sweet baby Jesus protect me...
We got the address - problem is we did not get any intel. This means we are coming in hard and with no info on what to expect. Time is ticking - let's get up the mountains and steal this engine.
Yeah, I'm there in just a minute.
You need to let the chem work on the door.
The wheelman had to run, too hot. He's relocating.
Yeah, straight ahead there is your own private vault. We're gonna stack that up.
We're going to need that code. Rummage 'round a bit and see of you can find any clues. Maybe try one of the workstations? But stay quiet, friends.
There you go, the gun is primed and ready. Hit the fire button. And maybe don't look directly at it when it goes!
Same procedure as always.
Guys, get that drill on the gate. Hurry!
You're looking for three cameras.
It's a shame you can't take those explosives and use them on Buluc. Make his head explode like in that Scanner movie! Oh, well. Make him suffer in some other way instead!
The gas should be gone in a minute.
Oooh, it's been a long time since Vlad did a good old-fashioned revenge taking. That piece of shit Buluc is going to wish he was born in Switzerland!$NL;
Loads of cash! Bag it up boys!
Yeah, well. Tell him his ass is on the line if he isn't available for the regular time-lock check in.
Ah, the weather could have been better for sure, but nevermind. Just get inside.
The boxes are rigged with C4! Defuse them quick!
Kepe piling 'em up. Make a nice bonfire.
That card should get you entry to one of the train railcars.
We already got the code. Enter it and get into the armory.
I got to dash out in two minutes!
Sweet! That's the one. Fusion power in full swing. Thanks guys. Now get out of there.
Finally! Now you just gotta go inside the vault.
You see that bridge? I'm dropping the cage over there.
Don't ask me where I got that thumb. Now verify identification from the security consoles. Shouldn't be a problem.
Keeping my foot off the gas. Make sure you guys keep the road safe and clear.
Looks like someone called the cops! Guys, protect Charon!
Nice, bring the money to the van.
Keep an eye on the heat guys don't want cops here too soon. Avoid cameras and guards. Take any extra jewels they have if you can. We leave with the same van we came in.
Keep the cops away from the routers!
Ernesto Sosa never saw it coming. With him dead, the Sosa's Miami operations lie in ruins. My point has been made.
Hurry up Goddamnit!
I got it. I didn't fuck up! I didn't fuck up.
Great. Now go blast that obstruction. It's your way out.
Just go over to the switch and pick the difficulty.
Not only did you boost a crapload of cash, this caper wiped millions off Benevolent's share price. Great work!
Grab the oh-shit handles!

Woah, the Commissar has a lot of coke here, but he's employing scorched earth tactics like a true Russian. In other words: He's flushing the product and if you don't get there fast, you miss out on a whole lot of extra income!
The routine has been interrupted, get it restarted, yeah?
One of these is the truck carrying the voting machines to Washington. When you think you know which one it is, get the tracker on it and we can move on.
OK, drill's done. Get into the basement.
No bullets with Garrett's name on them tonight, OK friends?
Just maritime regulations and shipping forecasts. Keep looking.
Gang, the cops have the city locked down. Fighting through is the only option, so we need you on the ground. That means the truck is going to stay with you.
Why aren't you leaving?
...this is not my area of expertise.
Alright you chops, time to act nice and casual. Take off your masks and walk calmly out of there.
You need to patch me into those boxes, friends!
You need to move to the skylight.
You got 'em! Now get back to Operations!
It's a blank. Keep searching.
Let's finish this the old-fashioned way, yeah? Put a hacking connector on the boxes so I can patch in.
You better be bringing the box, yeah?
A nice quiet day in L.A.
Bile can't get in close unless you clear the area of cops!
Bring the key to our friend!
That's it, the hidden train yard. Use this opportunity to scout the area. The place is heavily guarded by Murkies and cameras, so we can't afford to make any mistakes.
That corridor isn't short, is it. Built to take a couple nukes, it was.
Hello again, guys. This is...uh, Ghost Rider. Expect me in...
Find some, and pour it in.
Get all the loot onto the zipline.
Ah thank you. And may I say, you two are the finest dressed nurses in the whole hospital.
Fantastic! The vault should be exposed now. Time to crack 'em open.
Old Locke thinks the vault is behind those doors...
Don't let them turn the power off again!
Come on, chums. No dawdling. Light that flare for me!
Find a good formula yet, friends?
The coppers have taken the winch offline!
Get the valve open again, crew!
Prying that open felt really good. Now check what's underground!
The best part is, if we actually manage to pull this off, we can talk about it all we want!
Look for clues in Garrett's investigation, yeah?
It's the Hondurans! They fucking followed us! Shit!
You're in civilian mode. No guns, no masks - invisible to security. When you're ready, find your gear. Micho the janitor left it in a guitar case somewhere.
That was easy. Nice work. Unfortunately Hector just told me the FBI has nabbed the remaining Mendoza and are escorting them to the airport in a convoy. Which means we don't have much time.
Bah, surveillance didn't show that. Well, you gotta get through it.
Well, what have we here. Only the Maretto's cargo manifest. Now we know which containers may hold loot. Good find.
Alright, do you see the house? Get inside and find the server room. We need to hack into the security system to get to the lab.
I don't think we have a choice. We have to spin that wheel!
Did you find it yet? Have you checked the upper floor?
...Almost there!
Got to move that ship. I have an idea. If you can hack the ship control terminal and keep the fuzz off it, should be able to guide it remotely.
Just one more bag.
Ok! Just protect the winches now while they're working.
Go to the skylight with the box.
Got something on the way for you that's going to be a kakspul of trouble for that vault!
The owner is nuts about security. Escape van will be near the dropoff.
Start collecting extra loot if you want to friends, it's time to get you out of there, yeah?
Nicely done. Now how about we plug it into a laptop?
You gotta get the lights back on quickly.
That's it! Downloading. Give it a moment.
How is it going with the key tag?
Get the briefcase! The thermite will burn right through that gate.
That's it, yeah? Pick it up and keep moving.
You still gotta hack into those access points.
House is beyond those trees, see? Sneak right up.
Watch out, more snipers!
Damn! The timelock has jammed. Your ECM jammers must be interfering with it! Wait for it to resume.
It's soda, caustic soda.
After you!
Keep an eye out for Garrett, yeah? He must be on his way back by now.
Hey! Come back!
The Commissar is holed up somewhere around Georgetown. Find a clue. Something to do with Georgetown.

He's going to drop off the pieces for a skyhook. You gotta bolt together an aluminum cage, load it and then send up a cable on a balloon. Plane flies right over, grabs the cable and - whoosh! - off it goes.
Find keycards, gang. Check the buildings.
The safe, friends. Use the print.
Remind me again why we're doing this?
Chopper will be back for the rest of you. Use the time well - look around for the product. Vlad said it's stashed in packages.
You need to actually use the keycard, you know?
Looks like we are doing this loud, gents! The panic room's locked down so we do this the hard way. Bile will get us a thermal lance. Hang on.
He's headed up. Look for the stairways up.
That's the alarm. MPD response channels just went crazy. OK, no matter. Keep hacking those machines.
Son, you have exactly two minutes to put them here on this phone, or I'm sending every goddamn available uniform right now.
You have demonstrated that the Sosa Cartel does not own the Caribbean. With sufficient emphasis, I believe.
Just a minute. I have to open the door!
Bain said it could happen but I didn't believe him. Good thing I got you out of Washington, eh?
I'm going to clear off for a while. Good hunting.
You can use those keycards in the control rooms. Just swipe 'em, open the dock.
The front is shut tight. Take a walk around. Find another way in.
Gha, find the breaker and get the juice flowing again!
A superb execution. Quiet and discreet. But Gensec won't be able to hide what happened here. Nice work!
I'm fired up about this one, gang. Chavez will have no idea what hit him.
You got most of it and most of it is better than none of it. Hector will be happy with how you handled yourself. Got to get to the boat now!
Safeties off!
All right. Let's get it over to where we need it. Find the crane controls.
The keycard we need is in the Oval Office, so get inside.
Hell of a good move to use the tunnels - they'll be off-balance.
Everybody fucking shooting at me... Bullshit...
Damn, no sign of the comm frequency. My guess is it'll be at the control room across the dock.
Kerels stopped the device. Get back and rearm it!
Ah, bravo! We're fueled and ready to go. Please, make your way aboard and let us get out of here. This was a fine day.
Great! Now that he's safe, I'm sending a helicopter to pick him up. Stay with him.
Hey boss, I got a sealed letter for you here. Says for your eyes only.
Nice friends. More crystal gold!
What are you waiting for? Go into the Oval Office!
Come on friends, get him moving.
You did good. Better than I thought you would, to be honest. We got what we came for, and I bet we can get a good payday from that gold you stole. Should be more than enough to get you started again.
You'll need to overheat the secondary servers. Turning off the flow of coolant should do it.
Time's up. I'm dispatching a team and notifying the police.
SWATS are hitting ground floor. Right staircase.
Find the goods. I'm sure you'll know it when you see it!
OK you're in, good. Now you need at least four paintings, the good ones have red stickers - those are the ones our art lover intends to buy.
What are you blaming me for? This wasn't my idea!
Chestnuts roasting on an open fire, Jack Frost snorting up his nose...
The house is right across and through the woods. Leg it.
...You gotta find the security boxes that control the doors and run a bypass on them.

We're using a magnetic crane to drop a little present in the path of the Gensec convoy - a steel container of professional badasses. Hit the trucks, and get the loot to the getaway. These docks have a rich history of heistery, gentlemen - do it proud.
You'll close this out quicker if you use the car to move the goats.
Fanny's!
All's quiet still. Good work. Stay hidden while the Moretta docks.
Okay, I'm trying to hack the security system now...
Guys, the first batch is unloaded - I'm coming back for more!
Hurry up and take all you can!
We're going for a roof pick-up. Start shifting those bags to the top of the bank and put the cage together.
That's the last one. My advice? Get far away, as fast as you can!.
More dwankies coming soon. You gotta get out of there!
The Murky's nest egg is cash money, so start looking. It could be anywhere around there.
Good. That ate right through. Now get inside!
Right, that's part one yeah? Time to add the next compound.
Looking at this site... Says acid is used in this step... We got muriatic, right?
Time to fly, friends. Get onboard that dinges, quickly!
You need to get the elevator going again. Restore the power.
Turn on the power again to get the code!
He'll be coming in at dock 9.
Great. Now the second card in the other panel, and the Moretta will be free.
Hang in there Bain, we're here to get you.
OK. So you need a key and a code. Well, at least we know what you need to look for.
Okay! Now go find a gas can. Shoot it to set the paintings on fire.
I don't think he'll last much longer.
Now stop any pursuit. Blow that gas!
*loudly sings Ride of the Valkyries by Wagner*
Ah crap! Security locked the containers when the alarm was triggered. Looks like we're drilling.
I need all of you in the boat, as soon as possible, thank you very fucking much.
All right, get those fireworks onto the terrace.
Right, this is the place. Get to the traincar and look for your contact. They said they'd meet you there. So far it all looks good. Just trade the paintings and get out fast. Keep it rolling.
Those snipers wont leave you alone anytime soon. One of you should keep an eye on those roofs at all times!
Some pretty sweet snatch and grab back there. I bet they're going to invest in better security measures, or close. Not our problem.
Let's see what goodies they have!
There might be janitors and other civvies in the building, so take extra care.
Okay. Now hold them off til the thermite finishes.
That guy could've slipped us past the retinal scanner but not anymore. Ah well. Time for the back-up.
Almost open. Remember, you deal with the radars, and I will prepare the helicopter.
Outstanding, gang! I wish all trips to the bank ended so happily.
Commissar is throwing everything he has left! Even his damned gunship! Keep your distance!
Authorities are trying to boost my bird. But injured civs don't pay so well. I'll be with you in 2.
Use that ladder to climb onto the wagons.
That's one hell-of-a explosion team! Grab the goods!
Keep looking in the sanctum rooms!
Half the fucking police force is on our ass!
Stay low! Snipers have got you pinned!
I can see seven paintings.
That's the first batch. Find the rest. Keep looking.
Almost there... almost there...
Still waiting on that phone hookup.
If he gives you any trouble, break some fingers.
Drop them, crew!
Why would Gensec have a truck out there?
You need to find a way in there, somehow.
They should be safe, but... any of you feel like little teeth feeding on your bone marrow?
So what kind of shit are we going to find in this place?
Keep it clear until it's done.
Remember, stay low, stay dark. And stay quiet. Here we go.
The pilot can't circle around there forever, get that smoke out!
I'm hearing over the comms that they've set up a sniper ambush ahead. Watch your heads!
What the fuck did you guys steal!?
Get inside the store and take the clerk hostage, so we can make a trade with the cops.
Oh, shiny! Whoever looted this liked the finer stuff.
Nice haul! This will bring in a nice chunk of change. Good job!
Just like St Nazaire!
Come on, get that vault open.

Robbery time. Get the thermal drill stashed in the parking lot. Then it's up to you. I don't know what we're gonna get here but remember: keep the civilians in check, don't let 'em use alarms or phones. See you at the safe house.
.. or take a little more.
Secure the loot bags in the motorboat you arrived in.
That's the left panel. Now search for the other keycard. Get the other panel activated.
Patching in Vlad...
The laptop should be near the house, maybe in one of the smaller buildings?
Guys, it feels like something's in the air... Money!
No need to stay any longer, friends. If you're ready, go for extraction.
Fuck! I don't wanna die today!
OK, we're doing it loud! The panic room is locked down, so I'm sending you a thermal lance. Stand by.
Look - those doors aren't going to hold up when they start shooting.
They've stopped the crane, get it moving again.
You need to activate the crane.
We need something to help light this up!
The display cases are now disconnected from the alarm. If you want to grab some extra souvenirs, now is the time.
Looks like we found our man!
There might be more chemicals in the trucks.
Guys, switchboards just lit up. Guess that's the alarm.
Good. Now, try lock picking that door.
Collect the cage bags. You need to assemble it in the street.
Throw the BFD's switch! Let the show begin!
There's a card reader by the security bars. Open it up.
Woah! Bulldozer in the truck! Take him out! I guess they were expecting trouble.
You need to use the saws for our plan to work. Two on the second floor and two on the fourth floor. Get going.
This shit really what we want to be talking about?
I can't stay for long!
Good going. Only one more color-number set to go.
Nearly got it.
Guys... Guys... Guys. We were supposed to get info... Not just cash. Hector's going to skin me alive.
Right, the fuel tank is full, the blades are spinning and the cargo is secure. Time to get out of here. Gentlemen, please join me aboard!
Don't screw this up. The code's...
You gotta hang on a bit, chopper is coming.
...I'm sure. I'm pretty sure.
Come on, guys, hustle it. You need to move fast to pull this off.
Could be a while. Was it left at the Union or....?
No need to stay, get out of there.
Gotta get that winch running again, gang.
We're looking for a Gensec security door - the security room is in there.
The keys are in the storage room. Grab 'em!
The train is rapidly approaching the cop barricade. I give you a maximum of two minutes to secure the loot and get out.
Yeah I know the way! I was planning to escape myself!
Alright. I need you to do one more errand before you bug out. Get to the security room and grab the footage from the cameras. Just in case they got anything incriminating.
To get past Garrett's code lock, you'll have to disable a few security boxes in the area.
That's the last one! Have a look inside!
Might be a good idea to look outside.
Exit is just ahead. You guys need to get out of that gear pronto. The cops will be able to track that stench.
Okay, so we're gonna need a heart for this baby. An engine. That's what I mean. I think they store them inside the clubhouse.
I'm coming in four...
Ok, you have to go to the Jewelry store.
Damn, the cops are bringing everything they have to get you, and you're gonna be surrounded if you don't leave now. Hurry up and escape via the canal route. Now!
Get the power to the server back on!
You need to pick up the pace. Get that bag to Mr. Blonde.
That's half the required paintings, you need to get the rest before we can roll out.
The getaway plane is probably still in one of the hangars.
Here they come! Prepare to beat them back!
This leads all the way to the beach, crew!
Truck's ready?
Seven bucks! All right!
There you go. Now take a look inside the vault room, yeah?
And big fiery explosions?
From what we know, Buluc keeps to himself a lot, when not holding court, so you'll probably find him in his office. See if you can find it.
Okay. Mask up when you're ready.
See that drive thru window at the side of the bank? There's a manhole there to the sewers. Get down there.
Look outside the Jade Room, looks like a laptop.
Kind of a busy day friends, we have that big white building to take care of, so don't dally.
I told you guys to be ready!
Ok gang, you know what we're here for. Go!
There's a slot for the keycard. My guess is just put it in and see what happens...
Nice. Now get it back to the loot drop.
Right, Vlad. Right.$NL;
I've come up with a plan B, just find those routers!
The car we're after is in the front, gang!
Hate to see you guys cooped up like that, but we snagged four trucks. Get out there, and get at them!
You still need to get the managers keycard. Find him!
Gentlemen, the C4 is on the roof.
Blerrie, can't get to the chopper unless you extend the walkway. Find the control room and get it done!
Good, now take hose to fuel pump.
Get inside the bank now, friends!
Bile can't land until you get those guns down.
Come on, recode that key tag.
All broken and smoking this one. Get me a fresh one from the lab.
Enough destruction and this client will rethink his whole stance on protection money. Dirty job but you like getting dirty, right?
Excellent! Now get back, because things are about to blow.
Get the water hose running.
Clean up the square and streets around the bank.
You know, there may be a better way in than going through the gate.
The scan has been completed.Well done, gang.
Throw in another gear, will ya? That pile of coke is getting smaller at an alarming pace!
Aw, that's a civilian casualty! Be careful!
The chopper's coming to the lumber yard - be ready!
You've seen this vault type before, not too long ago. Some nitriogen would crack it, but we'll have to get in some other way.
That was easy! Now go find our friend!
All right, gang, up ahead is Chavez' crib.
Now put the car in the container, get out and we can close this caper.
Stick a blocker on the keypad to stop the code cycle.
Ok, the pilot just confirmed that he's landed his passenger safely! You can go home, guys!
Murkys will try to interrupt my hack! Stop them!
That's it. That's it! You're almost here, come on!
This system is built to be simple. All you got to do is choose a vault and press a button. Easy, yeah? For sure.
Mr Blonde can't escape unless you create that diversion guys!
I'm there in four...
You wankers ever think we'd get this far?
Ach, now you've got to drill through the door instead.
Stay on your toes. This's gonna be tense.
Is everything alright over there?
Aah christ in a handbag, are you two cops?
That's the first fan. Temperature's rising. Jam more fans to speed things up.
Got it. Doors should be open.
Well, our explosives guy delivered. Two transports have stopped. Get to work!
Ah, the elevator is broken! How inconvenient! Listen - since I can't get up, I need you to search for something important that they took from me. It's a metal briefcase. I must have it back!
Now light up those tires. Get the gas on them. That'll deal with the chopper.
Remember to help Charon out of here!
Bliksem, the place is rigged! Get out of there if you can't disarm it!
The traitor will be in the panic room, so you have to find it. Then we can work on getting it open.
I have access. While you're waiting for me, grab the C4 from the van and get it planted in the street.
Remember, that key tag needs recoding.
Connecting now. Better pray this is the right one.
You saved the mechanic just in time. Now help him off the chair and make him assemble the bike.
Now let's see what happens!
Ok, now you need a keycard. Find Ralph Garnet and take it from him. He should be around there somewhere.
Only one vault can be opened at a time. Further, only certain vaults have loot within them. How that is determined is up to you, but I have confidence in your ability.
Ach! That's a Franz JÃ¤ger Mark II.
Can't stand around there all day. Get to it.
Mendozas are headed for the airport. Bring that briefcase. I bet we can figure out something to do with it.
Start fuel transfer with pump.
All right! Thermite's done. Now get down there.
Great, that's him! Get him out of there and to the top of the tower!
You need to find Garrett's office.
Done! We're through with loading up. Gimme, gimme, gimme, gimme...
Thanks! My wrists hurt like hell!
Find those electrical boxes yet?
I don't... know...
Pilot dropped the supplies. Get them into the house.
What are you blaming me for? This wasn't my idea!
Use the key to open the red door.
Friends, get some thermite on that vault door, yeah?
You have approximately two minutes before the train reaches the barricade. You hear me? Two minutes.
OK, you're in! I've sent a security clearance request. You need to approve it.
They have no clue you are there. Now get out of there.
Don't worry, it's just for safety.
The server room is locked down. We can't get in there now!
That's a blerrie strong door, too tough for the drill. Better check the armory for something to open it with.
Don't cry, Bain. It's all fine. Buyer pays big for them. They're very far away.

That is a good amount of loot, friends. Enough to make this worthwhile. Still, if you feel like you still got a little lead in your pencil and wanted to fuck Murkywater a little longer... you can get more.
Oh! I almost forgot! I need one more... special ingredient. Yeah, that's right. The mechanic needs a coke from the vending machine. Chop chop, pretty please.
I fucking hate war movies.
They're on to us like a fucking sticker!
Keep the cops busy and the drill will be through in no time.
I said it's time to go!
Goddammit, you just missed the getaway.
Good show! Time to break the man out! Find the cell block.
You've got Murkys coming!
Can't let them all away...
Clues to the right computer are in the office. Come on, hustle!
I lost the pigs guys, thanks! See you in a bit. And bring me a burger!
That's half of 'em.
We're just getting started!
OK, that's one bag down! We need at least three more.
Find the server room.
Chopper is down. Get the loot in, and get out!
Fly you fools!
Then we just need to go in to get the gold.
Hey! I'm not leaving without MY car!
Ooh, nice bit of hardware, that! Going to be useful for sure!
Check the area all around the safe.
Guys, I will try to get you an escape plan and find out what the bloody blazes is going on, yeah? The warehouse should still be safe for a quick breather.
Hang in there, Bain old friend. Not going to lose you now.
Quite the view, huh? Well, I've got something else to show you. Get to the control booth.
A crowbar. Good find. Always useful.
Put in the flash drive and get started.
All right. Now let's shift that loot before they realise what's happened.
The first bag! Bellissimo! Now, close to the vaults you will find a tall vertical shaft with cables. Attach the bags to the cables, and they will be lifted to me.
Whoah, that is some crash!
Okay, now get those bags into the truck and we can call this one.
Remember, you're looking for keycards. Check the buildings.
No way out the front. Quick! Get into the container. You're leaving with the loot. Don't think about the drop, okay?
The kerel boss will have the files on his computer.
Remember that the EMP bomb is two parts and I don't have to remind you we need both.
Look at all these nice things. Must have done a lot of public service in his career.
Okay, give me a minute or two. I'll disable this AA gun.
I can't get supplies to you- they would just get suspicious and shoot me down, so have a look around while I think of something.
You shitheads will never get in here! I'll make you dead!
Ah! There it is! Now, please, out of the airlock and into the inner complex!
This is the senator's apartment. Nice neighborhood, high security though. He's already got the paintings hung, so our cameras are online and transmitting.
Get a zipline up if you want. It'd be great for moving the bags.
You know the Romanovs, eh?
That will do! Start getting them out and into the truck!
The hack routine needs to be rebooted, yeah?
Alright, restart the computer and we'll be back online again.
The wheelman's going to be there in one minute with the escape van.
Out! Out of the bus now!
All right. The so-called toyshop. Just ahead.
Any luck with finding the armory?
Great. Now get to the zip-line and you're job is done.
There we go, wonderful! Now get inside the vault.
You can move out of the PEOC now!
'Course I brought it. Cabots don't hire morons.
Groot, friends. We got what we need. Make more if you want or leave!
Open those Murkywater containers. If anything has illegal loot, it will be them.
You need to turn off those valves at the bottom of the server rack.
The boat is coming in at dock 7.
You can use the modified drill I sent with you to get through.
Getting access...
You need to patch me in so I can open those doors.
An active ECM jammer will make it harder to access the server room. So use them with caution.
Just get out of there!
Did you check the whole place? Check the whole place!
The roof? Are you fucking nuts, Sensei? I'm not doing that.
Ach, another security failsafe. You're going to need to drill yourselves out.
Found those keys yet?
What do you see? This place is bone dry. Nevermind, we did what we came for, so just get out of there.
See that nice big hole? Drive through it, and hit the gas!
Every 10 minutes, the vault gets a new code. Stick a blocker unit on the keypad to stop it.
Search around for a ladder. You'll need it for the wagons.
Shit, gas, gas!!! Get out! Move it!
Okay, with that mess taken care of, it's time to find the server room.
Guys! The power! Keep it on!
Damn it! They've turned of the power to the server! Get it back up!
Okay, our friend will know the way out, right? You just have to watch out for the guards.
Alright, I found video of him doing the deal... It is insane. He sure is a show-off.
No time for a tortilla break, yeah?
If you don't have a door, you make one. Time to use the blowtorch.
Nice, yeah? That torch is going to be useful later!
Get rid of those biker keks!
Shit, the mercenaries stopped the EMP charge! It's beginning to discharge!
Get that to a safe place and we can start up another braai.
Looks like the alarm is already off. Get the door open.
Get everyone into the train.
You should find evidence related to Hoxton's case in the Evidence Room. Get searching.
Those things need to be put onboard the plane.
First, grab some ephedrine tablets and throw 'em in the mixer.
Okay. So. Ephedrine will start the alchemy. Get some tablets in the mixer.
Don't forget about those safe deposit boxes folks, can be good stuff in there.
Intruders! Fire!
Surveillance shows metal detectors all around the entrance, so you gotta find a way past them.
Did any of you grab that second can? Extra thermite means extra heat which means less time.
Alright, we will probably need every little bit of cash after this and my stash of emergency krugerrand was confiscated by Interpol, so go find that saw, yeah?
Now use the security cameras and try to locate Bain's cell.
You'll need to get to Buluc's secret meeting room to find the way into his personal office.
Good. I'm sending a chopper to collect him. Keep him safe. He's so wasted I doubt he'd feel the bullets.
That's it! Doing a background check now. Hold on.
Stay focused! Keep moving up! They're wasting coke like they were trained for this!
Jesus... how the fuck did I get involved in this bullshit...
Nononono! Shit! I'm going down!
How are you doing tracking down those two keycards?
It's behind that security door.
Keep going, keep trashing!
Okay, now wait for the pilot.
Put the explosives on the door.
So long you fucker!
You gotta use a drill on the door.
Get going friends, no time to waste. Open those doors.
I think that is the armor of Oda Nabunaga. This is serious loot, gang. Load up!
You can expect the security to be very tight, cameras and everything.
Use the saw and cut through the roof, then drag his ass out!
Alright, I'm in, hold on...
Guys, you need to find a blowtorch otherwise we're screwed.
Listen up, the code is...
Great! We're in!
The cops are using the ladders. Watch them!
My sensors are picking up another panel on the top floor - get to it if you've had enough and want to leave.
Keep looking for that cell block!
The Murkys have got AA defenses set up and I can't get through to pick you up while they are active!
Some weird shit happening on this job.
Get the lance working on the door. Burn through to that snitch!
That's how the pros do it! Chalk it up. Payday Gang one, Armadillo corp zero.
Excellent, you found a keycard. Now, head back to the train and open that sucker.
Great, money coming down.
What the hell guys? This confirms the setup!
Chopper's here!
It was messy but you got the job done. Good job!
Streetlight is down. Grab the goat!
Perfect, I knew you could be trusted, Alex.
Access approved.
You need to get inside the building.
Great job. Now get in the car and let's end this. Or hang around and really clean the joint.
Bag of cash, great. But let's pay off that asshole first. Yellow wall by the auto-repair shop. Don't worry, we'll find and deal with him later.
Hold up guys! The vault is wired!
Hurry and turn the power back on. Chop chop!
You need to find a way into the control room, yeah?
If you find a laptop at the computer station, I could use it to help you.
We got a fucking police caravan on our ass!
Ok, now get the keycard from the auctioneer. Quietly.
OK, doctors - bring your MIT skills. Figure out which one is the correct fusion engine. Go!
Never going to get in that vault without the Beast. Set it up!
That's all three digits for the code. Head to the vault, let's see if they work.
Of all the vaults, you had to open an empty one! Try again, friends.
SWATS are coming in from the north!
They spotted you! Kerels are on the way soon!
Great. Now find something else to steal. We need to make it look like a simple robbery.
This is one of the vault codes. Remember it. We're going to be needing it before we close this caper.
Set the zip-line up on the roof, then haul ass to the crane.
Sure I saw this place in a movie. Hope the walls don't spit poison darts.
Hey gang, you got trouble comin' by helicopter.
Both drills done. Excellent.
Okay, friends, let us now move the lootbags to the helicopter. Do not dawdle now!
We need to get inside the lumber mill. Why not see if you could use the anti-air gun we hacked earlier and redirect its position? Might be worth a shot.
That's the stuff. Keep going!
What, are you mind readers? Yes, I do want that briefcase. How did you know?
Get the mechanic to start working on Rust's bike. Just do as he says and get him what he needs.
Shit on a stick, here they come!
Hurry up you chops, get into that tunnel.
Oh check this out. I recognize some of this. Our old loot.
They deployed a gun turret! Stay low!
Hey, hold the door!
There's something wrong with the drill. You gotta repair it.
Wait a blerrie minute!
Have a look at the card reader by the security bars. Get it open, yeah?
That was the last components, now mix it all together.... carefully
OK, keep hidden from the neighbours view people. Let's not have anyone call the boys in blue.
Alright, I got it! The storage room is now unlocked. Go get the car keys.
That's the hatch! I've got an idea for it. Bile is going to be Santa, and since you're such good boys and girls...
Guys, take him to the retinal scanner and force him to use it!
The escape vehicle is leaving in seven minutes.
Hit the elevator button.
Neighbors must've heard gunshots. Police signals just went nuts.
That's the first console. Now the second.
When you feel ready, make your escape!
OK, I count 5 paintings.
Roof, alright I got it.
OK, time to burn some money.
That was intense, gang. Locke already sent over our share. Still uneasy about him, but let's see where things go with this guy.
There is no time to waste, get the code and open the vault.
Chopper's not leaving without you.
If you're planning on sticking around for extra loot, that crowbar will do the trick.
Hope that cable holds. Wait, did I add the weight of the safes...?
Vlad's very keen on talking to you on this one.
Ernesto is always paranoid, so once you start making that call you better finish it. Treat it like a pager
Get back to the van, clowns. Time to haul ass out of this clusterfuck.
This branch bank is ready for the taking. Let's do this.
Just let them go quietly.
Get that back to the drop.
The van's outside. Get stowing that loot!
There's your ride out. Once you've got all the loot secured, you gotta get it refueled.
Whose shooting?! Someone must've heard that.
Don't let the guy lag behind!
They're opening the building left and right!
That's the front and the upstairs dark as far as cameras are concerned. Cameras in the vault area run on a seperate circuit though.
There we go. Now you just got to send it out of there.
Now check the screen for the code, then go and open the vault.
Hey, was that the vault? Can't argue with your sense of style.
Clear the street!
Gensec on the scene. You've bloodied their noses before, prepare to do it again.
They probably keep the keys near the cars. Have a look around.
Do not forget. Take out those radars. I'll get the chopper ready.
Has that tricky bastard vanished?
That's a tunnel entrance if ever I've seen one.
Whooooooo! Yeah, man. Yeah! Whoooooooooo!
The cops stopped the bridge. Use the controls to keep it turning!
Look around for a ladder. I'm sure that with energy properly applied to a search you will profit. For sure.
That's the alarm, hurry inside so we can get that server.
Ach, the pump again. Donnerse thing needs more gas.
Head inside the room and go through with the drug deal.
That's the damn alarm! Time to shift to plan B, folks.
The entire compound heard that blast.
I'm sure you've seen all the tasty loot in the vault. Stash it in the chopper if you can stay a little longer.
Use the crane to bring back the crate.
Get the flash drive and leave. And, Dallas, don't let them see you on the way out.
Oh, there's a lot of firepower here! The guys will assemble the cage at the bridge.
All doors have keys. If you want to do this quietly, find the keys.
You what?
You gotta get through that door.
Great, you found some evidence! Analyze it in the lab. Let's see if there's any trace of the traitor's DNA on it.
Go ahead and burn it. I know, it's sad...
Since this got messy, we've gotta do some clean up. Find the security room and grab the camera footage. They might have caught something we don't want them to.
Come on guys! Move to the next building.
Only one left.
Check his papers, notes and computers. Anything for a hint on what is correct here.
That door is too thick, the drill won't be enough. Maybe the armory has the cure.
The weapons will need fresh batteries.
OK, now get into the vault room.
Great! Now, hit that button, drop the bollards and get out of there!
Get to the bio-lab.
That worked better than I anticipated. You didn't do anything to it, by any chance?
Sweet that is some good old loot...
This is Captain Rogers at Precinct 8. Gensec have raised a concern, regarding some suspicious activity. I'm sending officers over, just as a precaution.
Couldn't be helped my friends. Just business, you understand yeah?
What the hell. They're deploying tripmines in the parking lot! Deal with it before they close it off.
Good, good. Keep bringing them. Be gentle with my little babushkas.
Get into the office, friends.
That was the last ingredient, time to combine them all. Steady now...
Chopper is on the way.
Okay, the bridge is turning back. Damn, it's slow! Just hold off the cops!
That's gonna be worth a fortune! Great job!
We've got this under control and you're just going to make the entire job go to kak if you mess with my guys.
Keep controlling that room people.
It's a roach motel - only the roaches are Russian mobsters. No matter. Get in there and put them down.
Wow... well. Wait! ... Buluc's safe.... it has all his contacts and dealings. Good to have if you can crack it open!
The ship is almost there, gang. Be ready.
Six
That's the elevator. Let's go, people! You got military units gathering in the parking lot!
Good! But it will be a long minute!
I'm done with the first box.
I would do it from here if I could, dear friends, but I can't. So please open the fucking cargo doors.
There should be a laptop somewhere near the house. Plug the USB stick into it.
There we go, off like a prom dress, I'm still working on the paintings.
Great, that's everything, now get out of there!
This is the boat. I see the lights, I'm on my way.
Cops cut the signal. Get it back up!
Buluc's not going to kill himself. Probably. So go open that door.
You should probably stash that extra loot somewhere safe, so you can take it with you when you leave, yeah?
We microwave everything so it is as hot and fresh as you can possibly want.
We don't need him to talk, just to hack.
Find a ladder. Then you can climb the wagons.
Wish we had a better idea of exactly what we're looking for.
19 bags left!
Ah! There it is, but hold up a second. Those tiles are pressure sensitive - stay off of 'em. You can use that circuit box to make a safe path across.
Holy... that was close! These Russians really don't want anyone to crash their party.
Nice of them to leave the place wide open for us.
I know there's lots of fun stuff in here friends, but you need to aim that cannon!
Friends, we need to do a bit of an unusual bank robbery, yeah?
Damn, I'm sure some nosy curtain twitcher heard that!
Don't break his jaw.
Don't get stuck anywhere, keep moving up! It'll be worth it, but it's wasting away quickly!
Gensec are showing their unbreakable vault at the arena. We're going to use the Alesso concert to prove them wrong.
That's the end of McKendrick's re-election dreams - you're true kingmakers, guys! The Payday Gang giveth and it taketh away.
Use that terminal - I want access to their systems.
The boat will be at dock 9 soon, get ready!
Use the codex to decipher the correct order of symbols for the door.
Eight
He was a boring poe. Thank you.
Thank you! Thanks so fucking much!
No one has heard you yet, keep going!
We still need more C4 on the fourth floor, gang.
It's supposed to be muriatic acid!
Second. Keep going.
Got to be a saw here somewhere. Check the timber logs.
That crash probably woke the dead, yeah? Hurry up and get inside that bank.
That was a long bekakin' tunnel. Stay quiet and get to it, friends.
You got some! Not half bad!
Nice going, taking out the cameras.
What sort of world do we live in where a rat bastard like that makes demands on honest, upstanding badasses like you. But better do as he asks.
Find anything useful nearby to use on the crate?
Clear the pickup zone from cops or I won't be able to pick you up.
You gotta get into the office.
I'm coming in one minute...
Just a little longer.
OK, just one more to go.
There we go. Is he moving?
Better you guys than me, yeah?
My guess would be the crowbars are inside the warehouse.
You see that muscle car? That's Gaddafi's 1965 original Longfellow. It's your ride now.
I got something to show you, boss. You'll want to see it for yourself.
Watch out gang! BFD overheats if you don't give her enough water. Get it from the bathroom.
Found anything yet?
What the fuck did you guys steal!?
That's it. Hack that terminal.
They cut the power! Get it back up!
Find those transports.
Up to the roof and away from the building to the left. Alex has the chopper coming in.
Good, now use the cameras inside to locate which cell Bain is in.
Get that body over to the scanner.
Benevolent Bank. A Neoclassical beauty. But business calls. We're going to need some codes, so get to their servers.
Tickets for Alesso's show were swapping hands for $400! Whatever happens tonight, someone is getting rich.
Find anything yet for those chains?
Chopper is on its way. Stay put.
Now you have to get inside the auctioneer's office and get the code. He should be carrying the keycard to it on his person.
You'll hate me for this, but only until you're dead. Nothing personal!
That should get it on.
Let's load that cage up, gang. The pilot has a tight schedule.
Get those transports opened up!
That's it, gang. Only the fourth floor left.
Okay, think the bridge is looking good for a drop point.
Woah-woah-woah-woah!
Come on, bring the key!
You guys are Godlike. Keep it coming.
Hey guys, what's your status?
Check the stands in the shelves.
You got the first stash. Keep looking!
All right, I'm here. Now get the goats in!
Vlad, smashing malls is one thing. Stealing tiaras is one thing. But nukes!?
Check all the cases, maybe it's there.
No-no-no-no-no!
The entrance to the PEOC is close to the library. Make your way there, friends.
Damn it. Local channels just lit up! Expect company.
Now use the keycards on the dock gates. Let the Moretta out.
There's valves that control the sprinklers, turn them on!
Argh... You old fart. I'll kill him first.
Get another key!
Ach, I've got some bad news. They're shutting down the air space! You gotta get out of there ASAP!
My intel didn't specify exactly where the entrance to the PEOC is. See if you can find something. Turn the room upside down if you have to.
Ok, go pick up the C4 and then plant it right above the panic room.
So, here's the thing. It's out here with me... in my car.
Hold on, fellas. Just finding the files for ya.
Got your money's worth out of that vehicle, yeah? Time to go have a look inside the bank. Make it quick, friends.
Locke wants us to cut through to the security room. Find it, gang, then approve the sequence
OK, gang, good. Now hold on.
That's it for the mobsters, gang. If they're not all dead, they're running. Either serves our purpose.
It's hitting the fan! Time for the backup plan.
No need to catspaw about now. Get inside!
What are you doing? That's not how you do crowd control!
You're in civvie mode. Your guns and masks are stashed somewhere. Until you get them, you're invisible to security.
Right gate activated. Now find another keycard, and let's get the other gate open.
Get the artifact onto the chopper!
Tonight, we go down in rock and roll history, gang.
You're doing great. Keep everything nice and quiet.
Quiet now, friends.
Don't leave Charon behind!
Good job, gang, now we need the explosives from Bile. Give me a moment. "Bile, it's time. How soon can you drop off the C4?"
We got to go, people!
See if you can find anything of interest while waiting for the drill to finish.
They interrupted the hacking device. You need to reboot it!
This is the Right Control Room for the Dock Gate. Use the Keycard here.
Grab it, grab it now!
Those shutters will not be able to withstand thermite. Get some on there!
Ah, There are my precious things! Hurry, Hurry, take them!
Okay, I got this one disabled, but there's still one more to go!
And that's the second keycard. Nice job!
That was the wrong computer. Try another one. Maybe there's a way to figure out which terminal we need.
Almost there... Almost there.
You see that fence? Cut it open and get inside.
Hide the meth nearby and then let's cook another round.
(human beat-boxing) Answer. (human beat-boxing) The. (human beat-boxing) the Intercom.
This server has secrets, recordings, data that can change the world. And all my saved games. Yeah, for sure.
Outstanding work! All four trucks are stopped and ready. Make it rain, guys!
Damn, their system didn't allow us to see who the DNA belongs to. Still, we have a sample of the traitor's DNA, I'm sure we can put it to good use. Now get back to Hoxton.
(drolly) Good job, fuckface. Great fucking job.
He really does a good kerel impersonation. Just keep following him.
Ah, fuck me with a firestick. Fucking pallet broke and we got fucking bundles of cash scattered around like an old whore's knickers. Find them and bag them.
Find the lever friends.
Crap, there goes the alarm. Get the phone next time, damn it.
Damn it, this one seems to be malfunctioning! I'm sending the chopper back to pick up another one.
One part collected. Get it to the mechanic.
They're sending reinforcements.
Recon the bank. My guy dropped a thermal lance somewhere on the premises... Around the back of the bank, find it.
Hey, is everything alright over there?
Damn! They drove through Wilson's wall.
I need your help to get through. Log on to one of the other computers.
Yes! Great work. Now stick the C4 into the hole in the safe
OK, it's drilled all the way through the safe.
Wait. I have his cell number. Let me call him, try and distract him. Get ready to fill his glass.
That's great. Now protect them.
A zipline will get you done a lot faster!
Find any food, yet?
I'm coming in at dock seven!
Have you searched through the whole train yard?
Vault's breached! Now, let's see what Benevolent has.
Extra zero on this transfer! But no code. Try another.
Keep sharp, gentleman. The warehouse will be tougher, but the rewards worth it.
I can't get the gate open if you don't cover me!
Use your guns! Put him in the ocean to drown!
This is the warehouse. You can bet the better loot is right here.
I hear they make a lot of meth here. I don't want to put ideas in your head, but if you want to make a little extra money...
Find the blue bottle and spike it.
Great, we got our quarry. Make sure the chop stays secure.
Put all the loot you find somewhere close, so you can collect it later, yeah?
Hey, where you going? Back in the car!
OK guys I want this to be a homerun. First get the thermal drill from the parking lot. Then head in to hit the vault. Watch for guards and cameras.
Hurry friends, get that storage unit open!
I can see a laptop in one of the cameras.
Hot shit, there's a fire up there. You in the booth! Deal with it!
Make sure no one notices the hacking...
Get ready to jump out and shout "boo!", gang.
The deposit boxes are a bit of a lottery, but I know there is a lot of cash here. Find it, and bag it.
Fokenwil, that saw's gotta be around there somewhere.
Thanks. I hated that poes. Kept stealing my shampoo.
Time to go. No time for lock-picking, just shoot off the door handle.
Okay, now you gotta use the first card in the security room, and then you gotta be quick to swipe the second on the panel by the vault door.
Did you search everywhere?
Guys, you need to get out of there so the cops will follow you.
13 to go!
Make shure no SWATs get in to the lab. Keep them away at all costs!
Right, let's get you home.
The Tin Boy box has got to be in one of those toy piles!
Personel contracts and expenses. Useless. Keep checking.
I'm heading off to unload these - but I'm coming back, hold on!
Shush! What's that sound... Hmm, seems, nah seems OK.
Stick two drills on that vault door, ASAP.
Quickly now. Get inside those doors.
Ready or not, here I come!
I've never SEEN so much money go to waste! Get the last of it, come on!
Christ, we got cops!
Good call, now we have to see about getting you past the security gate to the vault.
I've got bad fucking news, guys!
We can get the ammo out, but only when the turret pieces are safely gathered in. Hide that ammo for now.
Hey guys, I can't do anything until you find those routers!
Connecting... This might take a minute.
You're makin' a disaster here! Straighten your shit, motherfuckers!
Excellent! Now get outta there! Grab your car from the truck!
I pay top dollar for any of my coke you can get in the helicopter. Top dollar!
Gate's are open. Great. Time to move the ship. I knew that comm frequency you found earlier would come in useful. Now just find a radio, and let me do the rest.
Dust is thick. Hard to see shit. I'm one minute out.
... time to get ready!
Oh, looks like they've got a nice weapons lab! They've got one of the cases in an adjacent storage room, so get over there, yeah?
Another guard up ahead. Stay in the shadows.
Alright, let's do the other thing then. Play it loud, friends.
Okay, stay low everybody. Detonating in four, three, two, cover...
Alright, I'd say it's time to get blastin'. Put your masks on!
Get him the car key so you can get out of there!
How it got up there is a mystery.
Can't do anything until those drills are working.

Bain left me instructions just in case something went wrong. I've double-checked and the warehouse meeting spot still looks quiet, for the time being. Hole up there while I try to find out what's going on.
Come on, what's fucking wrong with you. Those bundles can't have gone too far.
The code should have a one at the beginning.
... I'm going as fast as I can!
That chute there can transport the loot to the lobby. Might speed things up.
OK, get into that tunnel. Time for a visit to Mexico.
That was crazy! That just blew the dust of the shelves even where I'm sitting!
Bag and secure. You know the routine.
Plant that C4 around the glass dome.
Is there a problem over there?
Find the bags for the cage, and get them to the parking lot.
There's a bunch of rooms in the maintenance tunnels. Check all of them.
Add some more paintings. A few more.
You know how this goes. Eyes peeled for security. Civvies need to be controlled. And keycards are always useful.
Damn, there's the alarm. They're on to us. Get the saw ready.
Keep those kerels occupied until the escape vehicle arrives, yeah?
The evidence lockup should be on the second floor.
All right! Find the garden hose!
She's moving. But not fast. This will take some time. Stay hidden, guys. Lie low. Or, if you want, look around for extra loot.
Arriving in one minute...
Over here, please.
Everything a child of the 1980s dreams of. Including the nightmares, yeah?
Jesus, there's too many cops on the scene! I can't get close enough, so you need to deal with it.
It's somewhere on the ground floor!
You have impressed me, Dallas. Two years hasn't slowed you down a bit. Now, get out there!
Dammit! The plane missed the cable. Alright. Still time for another pass. Stand by.
Time to get into that office. Stay low.
You got metal security doors blocking the storage room. I can unlock them remotely if you hack their control boxes.
Vlad's fury is like a... like a... like a big fucking nuke drops on your head.
Come on. Just stick the thermal paste on the grate and burn through. It's not hard.
Thank you, my friends. I will not forget this day.
That safe path won't last forever, gang. Make sure you make the most of it. You can create it again, though.
Can't get out of there on an empty tank. Fuel the plane!
There's something at the Murkywater warehouse, down by the river. Something I would like.
So far so good. Don't screw it up!
OK, that's all we need.
Blerrie, wrong code! Now you gotta wait until it resets!
The code should be on the screen. Get it, and go open the vault.
Nicely done, friends! A job well done. We probably even emptied the Mayor's personal bank account this time!
That scythe should be useful
Smoke? The wheel stopped on smoke?
Yeah, the safe is here.
Looks like we've got a jewelry store that could use a little lightening. Call me.
Keep an eye out for the chopper.
Maybe if I hack into the system and get it to ping the right workstation. Keep looking.
See if you can find something related to Garrett's wife.
Keep looking for that code, friends.
Guys, you're not on a date. Quit strolling and get hustling. Move it!
The balloon needs to be sent up. Do it when you're ready to get the money out.
OK guys, search the place. I know the address is there somewhere.
That offshore account is your exit fund. When you skip town you'll be glad you put it right there.
I'll count down the time.
BFD is a greedy girl. Needs a lot of power. Hook her up to two sockets. You can find them inside the casino. And keep the cops off.
Let me see, one, two. Yes, all here! Now, please use the cables to join me up here.
That's 30 seconds till the van leaves.
One down!
Find a way to sneak into his apartment, steal the gold and plant incriminating evidence against him. Then leave undetected.
Here's the ladder. You can use it to get on top of the wagons.
OK, it's done. Go have a look at the patient.
Come on, you need to hustle it!
Ah we're made. We go to plan B! Lock it down and get the stuff done.
Ah, we should have sneaked this. Tons of gold in this deal.
An FBI connection of mine has rigged the place with spy cameras and has set up surveillance drones outside. You can control them from the gadget on the roof.
Cover is blown friends!
...I... think.
I'm betting the keys are locked away somewhere. Find the storage.
Not long now friends. Train will be there in half a minute.
Keep an eye on the sprinklers, we don't want the kerels to set them off!
We're going to be done soon - I hope.
We are doing good - keep away from the guards.
Woah, didn't take long for the SWAT's to show up. Must've been en route.
Okay guys, keep it together. Get him.
Throw those cases into the helicopter before getting in.
There has to be a way to destroy the evidence here in the station!
Shit! Bikers are on your case.
Let's go! Let's go! We can all fit in the elevator.
