Another crate to crack open. Get to it, yeah?
SWATS are swarming below the roofs - you guys are completely surrounded.
Ok, it's done! That was hard but I managed to open some of the shutters on the house.
No code? Maybe look a little more.
There's your ride. Once you've got all the loot secured, you gotta get it refueled.
C'mon, gang! Get the bags, and assemble the winch.
Just dash through and head downstairs to the garage!
You're looking for the manager. Mid 40's, balding, black suit. Soulless, heartless, greedy...you know the type.
Oh shit, it's the cops! Let's get out of here!
Pilot is down! Get him back on his feet.
That store looks like a good spot to search. Drill the door, gang!
I can't do any more until you find that keycard.
Tap into the security boxes.
OK we got the address - he lives in a high security villa, up in the mountains, real secluded, luxurious area. We will be going in blind with no intel. Arm yourself and let's go.
You can bounce now, or you can stay and give the Golden Grin a thorough cleaning.
The cops are on our tail!
Outstanding! That's all the goats! Now time to hit the road, gang!
Nicely done, friends. That's what we're looking for.
We're working in the lab, late tonight, letting your eyes behold an eerie sight. Get cooking on the table, bubble and boil.And keep the cops from bringin', trouble and toil.
I should've know... there's another switchbox. You've got to rewire that one too.
Damn, what is this place?
A backup gate has been activated, use a drill to open it up!
I would prefer it if you just left before anything goes wrong, but I understand if you wanna go back to get more of the loot.
Chopper is on its way with another lance.
Can you move up to a higher point? It's hard to get in close where you are now.
Might be a good place to look.
The second keycard. Great work.
Thermite's done. Water's on its way. When the chopper arrives, you need to connect it to the vault.
Ok, the doors are open. Get inside.
I'm thinkin' that both number and color are important.
Almost there, just wait for the drill to finish.
Guys, you need to find that wagon - the one with the vault.
4 paintings, not much, but we'll take it.
New contact on Crime.net, guys. Got a shady politician with ambition. We call him The Elephant for now. Look him up.

Yeah. That didn't really go according to plan, did it? But we still got the job done and I'm gonna unload the merchandise right away. As soon as we get our payday, I'm cutting ties with the idiot that got us this job. Need to find out what the hell happened and who those mercs were. Got a feeling this job is gonna come back from the dead to haunt us.
I just heard that the police will make a second opening in Wilson's house!
I know you want to put a bullet in his face, but you got to stay focused, yeah?
The wheel stopped on smoke!
The whiteboard guys, find it, yeah?
The chopper will be there soon!
Looks like the vault in the blueprint you found.
Might as well call the elevator. One more sample and you can get out of there!
Are you guys insane? Leave that bag!
Okay, the EMP has been secured, which is what we came for. But there is still time to head back and get additional loot if you feel up for it.
You did it, you got a ton of money and got a lot of attention. And Gensec deserve to suffer publicly.
30 thousand dollars...
If the Dentist is up there, he's getting his teeth kicked in.
Get to that locker room and put those scrubs on.
Three digits. Outstanding! Now head to the vault and try them out.
They bought it. Keep working.
It's going to be great... He will be there soon.
The Oval Office is right there. Hurry, yeah?
Excellent! With the BCI tech in safe possession, you have time to get more of the loot if you want to make some good money.
... but get more if you can!
What an awful noise.
...that gold would make a nice bonus. Bring some with you if you can friends, but remember why we're here.
Ok, that's the one, there he is! Let him out, yeah?
Hey, you can shoot coppers later. Get that door cracked.
Going to leave this one at the silo!
Ah, good. Butcher has send help. Untie me now please.
Was that a coke-filled present falling from a tree? Christmas really is the time of miracles.
Just saw another civilian stroll into the street. Deal with them.
We're running low on spending money, so if you find anything else worth taking...
That's the time lock done. Try and keep the sneak going. Now, the vault has a three step clearance control. The first I've already taken care of. Just head there and use the fingerprint scanner.
Tricky business. Gensec started mandating everyone wear 'em.
Fuck! I don't wanna die today!
You need to find a way around the metal detectors at the entrance.
OK, we need to get through that door. Maybe we can use that big dinges in the room to blast through. See if you can point it right, yeah?
Pick up the phone or they'll know something is off.
... I'll be back in a minute!
Straight through the roof. BOOM!
The code begins with a five, according to my source.
Someone pick up the phone. I'll talk to them.
The copy machine over there has a stash of equipment *if* this caper goes loud.
Punch in the code.
This would be easier if the city wasn't a ruin. Just hold on.

We have a stolen ambulance all ready to set up a roadblock, and a Gensec convoy en-route from Dulles. It's an old trick, but a classic. Get whatever's in the trucks to your escape driver. We're deep in Indian country here, gentlemen, so expect a fast response from D.C.'s finest.
Blerrie, there is a firewall blocking me on the network. Check the other computers and see if you can disable it.
The bank manager wears a black suit. Balding. He looks like the kind of creep who spends all day on his phone.
Bad news, friends. I can't come and get you while they have active air defences online. You gotta go and deactivate them!
Watch for the helicopter. We're taking this stuff to the sky.
Wait! I forgot about the briefcase... There should be a briefcase somewhere in the laboratory. You need to get it before you leave. Don't mind what's in it, just do it.
Next, old Locke needs to put a nice little computer virus into the system.
So destroying his art collection didn't hurt enough. Let's try something else then.
What a fucking waste of quality coke!
The ghosts of a thousand years of heisters are watching you, and wishing they were here. Keep it flowing.
Great! We are back on track!
Running low on ingredients? If you want to stay and cook a little more, there's a supply drop waiting in the wings for you... Just signal the helicopter. Or you can bail now. Your choice.
Now that you got your hands on some thermite, we can easily melt the bars on the gate.
Find anything with Garrett's wife?
He put it inside his shirt.
Security box up head. Keep your eyes peeled.
I'd rather not piss off the cartel.
Great work, now let's see that glittering carbon.
There we go, friends. Now get inside and see if you can find the dinges we can here for. It's probably in a safe.
Now let it do it's thing, and remember to keep the cops off it.
Good job friends, now just hoist it out of there.
Snipers! You gotta take 'em out!
Just follow the prisoner and he'll show you the way out of here!
Now get him to the server room!
Great. Now the last step. Find the managers code. It should be on his computer.
Get out there and clear the square, yeah?
Damn. They locked the containers when the alarm went off. Break through!
What now? A bluescreen? Ach!
While you're at it, see if you can find anything in those stores that's worth some cash.
Open ears. The safes are in the trucks. I need every single one to come out. Safely. Now, close ears. Get safes.
Now we're breaking even. Very good!
Ahhh, I can smell the wealth from here! Load the bags!
Get that C4 on the pumps at the station. Then stand back. Way back.
Bring those trees down!
There's a helicopter standing by to get you out. But as soon as you call it, things are going to get loud fast. So pick your moment.
You need to complete the formula, prepare the next ingredient.
Good, now take the saw off.
That'll do for Gage, but you can stay for more.
Right by the Jade Room, looks like a computer.
Absolutely, sir, not a problem. Would you like all of that in 20's?
Niiiice. There we go.
OK, we're almost done!
Good job, friends. One less secret occult mystery box for Murky. Take it and get cracking on the next, yeah?
Have you found the server room?
It's open! Search through the deposit boxes!
They're just trying to prove they have imaginations.
Just hang tight, my groovy ghoulies. Almost there.
Don't let the kerels get to the hacking device!
He bombed a school. Good riddance.
Good job. Now get it to the pick-up.
I've got an idea about what we can use those for later!
Do pekla! Finally, Butcher send help. You untie me please!
I can't pull you out of there until you've got through that floor, friends.
With this hard drive I should be able to override their security and get the vault open.
OK money secured. Vlad will be buying the vodka I'm pretty sure and the police are gonna need some...
The storage room is your target. That's where we'll find the keys.
Maybe if I send in a screwdriver by courier?
That looks like it might be the server room. Better save it for after you find the cash. Remember where it is.
Open your eyes and find the EMP. Come on.
It took two hundred years, but the Benevolent Bank has finally been robbed. Outstanding work!
It's high time to find those three laptops.
You've got to bring him the right car key!
The trucks are somewhere near. Keep an eye out for Vlad's couriers too. Don't drop them!
No explosives. Next container!
Crowbars are probably inside the warehouse. Check it.
Ok, destroy things. What should we go for...
No time to stop and party, find those routers ASAP!
OK, thats enough. Get the recording and lets get out of here.
Alright, that's the jewelery store. Get me the required amount and be ready for anything!
Great! I'm in.
Ok it's the toy store - Tin Boy!
Hurry now, get that dinges some power.
The blueprints indicate the vault is behind those doors.
One moment please.
Hurry and get the drill working again!
There's gotta be juice around there somewhere.
That's it, gang. Now get back to the trains and get your hands on the EMP bomb.
Check the safe!
Now bail out of there!
The garage is right below that Investment vault. It's where you need to plant the explosives.
Grab Dentists' loot. That's what we came for.
So, that's it, yeah? Alright, friends. You need to cut the correct wires in the cable boxes to break the lock.
This won't take long. Don't let anyone borrow the keys to the truck.
Good find. But you'll need more C4. Keep searching.
And if you want, we can even make you toast.
Holy shit! Looks like they've electrified the vault!
We need more C4 on the fourth floor and the roof.
Ok friends, this one has been a long time in the pot. Time for some payback, yeah?
Guys, guys?! Are you still there?
You got to get that stuff in the plane.
Ok, the concert is finished. Get those masks off, and blend in with the crowd. You should be able to walk right back out the front door. The van will be waiting for you.
...the object in the floor is our main priority, but it's a shame to leave all that pretty gold here. Bring some with you if you can, yeah?
You're gonna get that Croatian ship out of the dock and berth. Gonna try and keep the volume low.
Okay, we got a free lunch here. These guys are printing money in the basement. We're going to relieve them of their plates. If we sell it to the right party we're good for millions!
No getting through that donnerse here. There's a scaffolding outside. See if you can find weak spot on the second floor, yeah?
Alright, look's like it's working again. Great.
The pilot is on his way. He's going to pick up the cage from the roof. Get it ready.
Like a glove!
Open! Time to release the jailbird!
Shit is getting real, guys!
Great! Add a few more, we want a proper blaze.
The cops have this place surrounded. We're going to have to "gracefully improvise".
Try another one!
Can't unlock the doors until you patch in properly.
Time to go!
Is time to leave, comrades! All aboard!
You've got to keep at least 7 bags!
While we wait for that, and if you've got the stones, get to the roof and get the zip-line set up.
Need the power back, guys.
...If you find a keycard, opening one up would be pretty easy
Money secured, the police got a taste of what we can do and Vlad will definitely be spinning that to his advantage. Nice.
That's the door! Get inside!
That's the alarm. Alright, weapons hot! Don't worry about the Moretta. She's moving and is gonna keep moving.
Get a saw on that streetlight. It's the only way to bring the goat down.
Somethin' about this job ain't right. Just... something...
That's it friends, hurry back and get through the gate, yeah?
Uhhh...no, that didn't work. Try another one.
Stay alive. Bile will drop the lance soon.
The first drill's finished.
The stuff must be in the safe. Open it!
An associate of Gage's will help getting some of the loot out. Just toss it to him.
Great. Now toss it up onto BFD.
And that is how you do it! Text book execution, gang! Congratulations!
The water isn't pumping, gang!
They are climbing into the building!
You should burn through the shutters with the Thermite you found, yeah?
More C4. Not quite enough. Find the last batch. Keep searching.
Vlad, you know... I encountered a Russian wolverine once...
Power's down. Look for the circuit box and get it back on.
How much did you win? Can we all retire?
...You got about a minute until the kerels get there. Keep those civvis under control, yeah?
Gang, this isn't a place to do sightseeing. Get up there, come on, shift it!
Their databases are partitioned across two servers. Downloading the first one now.
Kill the rat!
And now we wait. The Commissar can't hold up in there forever.
Watch the bags!
Damn it, they're burning it!
Can't do anything until you hook me up.
The drill has been shut down! Get it working again!
You gotta get that winch assembled.
So, here's the thing. My car died, but I managed to haul away some diamonds. Stashed 'em in a nearby storage unit.
Five.
Here it comes. Room...
They're blocking the road. Damn. Is there still room for the plane?
It's a security keycard for the railcars. That should speed things up.
BFD needs cooling. Refill the tank with water Hurry!
Jesus H-Goddamn-Christ that took long!
Holy shit, what is the delay. Burn the grate away with the thermal paste!
Fuckin' Locke, always gotta spoil the fun.
The choppers ready. Get moving!
They locked the door. Use your head.
I sure would be pissed off if that was my ride.
In case you felt like taking some nice things with you, there's a guy standing by if you send it out with a zipline.
Alright to repeat: Taxman is IRS, making a shady deal with some big corporation. He's selling them a server some with vital data.
This is a nice house. Would look better with some of Vlad's furniture.
OK now, the intel I got indicated that there might be thermite stored around there somewhere, so start looking. Once you find it, put it on the barrier.
The drill is in the area. Get it, and get it to work on that vault.
Come on. Climb aboard! Well fucking done, my friends!
You got two options: Sneak by him or take him down.
Stay alive till I get back for more!
Staircase's blocked. Gotta be another way up.
So what? You thought it was a good idea to just leave them there? Alright gang, go get 'em.
Nice, it's full!
Now! Drop them!
Next is to find a way into the actual mansion.
Damn. It's locked. Hmmm. Alright. The manager's still there. Take him as hostage. See if he has any information about the lock.
There's the control terminal. Hack it!
Dropped the cargo. Hope you guys use it well.
Tear gas incoming! Stay clear and wait for it to die down.
This Payday Gang Cabot brought in... we sure this isn't their mess?
Okay, you got the stuff. That's the important thing. Time to bring it all to the helicopter. Get a move on, Bile's waiting.
Shit this is top science stuff - use those brains - any color code, chemicals or such can be a clue.
No, that's not it. Blerrie! Try again when it resets.
No worries, friends. I'll get Bain. Just keep those Murkys away from us, yeah?
Check in the back too.
Still waiting on the guest list, guys. Get to reception and download it.
OK, the wall behind the shrine is concealing an entrance, but you'll need to crack it open with some nice explosives!
Heads up, the cops are deploying on a nearby rooftop!
Find some tools to cut those chains!
Helicopter inbound. Aw no, they will see Alex! Hide!
Dr Fantastic! You guys sure are smart. We got the right engine and you are rich. Now make it out of there! Chopper is incoming.
Ok guys, attach the next one.
We screw 'em over, snatch both Taxman and the server. With those, we'll make a $25,000,000 hack. Alex, crane ready?
Switch the power back on.
There's thugs all around the building, gang. Take 'em out!
Go recode that key tag, friends.
There are the pardons! Go get them!
You're wasting time! Repair BFD, get her working and let's finish this caper.
We need to see the server before we go.
He said something about "not trusting banks" or whatever.
Uh... Yeah... Their radios aren't working. Sunspot activity.
SWATS are going for the ground floor, left staircase.
Interesting security. OK, the panic room can only be accessed from outside by a code and two keycards. Look for them.
Alright, anyway... Let's find the Commissar in his penthouse and kill him. That bastard's gonna pay.
I'm off in 30!
This one's coming down at the bridge.
One of you needs to grab the lance.
We count eight paintings. Good job.
The vault's not going to open itself...
OK we beat on this sorry mall enough for one day. Well done. Vlad has proven his point and I think we need to lay low for a bit after this.
The railway bridge! They are coming in from the railway bridge, keep them away.
Hola?
Caustic chloride. Says it is liquid form... Wait a minute... Should be soda, right ?
Crap. This was supposed to be a milk run.
Nope, that's not it!
Start moving the cash bags to the cage. That's how we get it out.
Guys, the maintenance tunnels could have what we're looking for.
...caustic soda?
Only an ECM jammer's going to get that door open...Otherwise you need another way around.
Acid. Muriatic acid.
Yeah I know the way.
Just about ready.
Great. Now bring that footage back here, and we can wrap this up.
You're cleared to leave, if you're done taking things.
Christ, look at this place!
How you like these wheels? Hop in!
Didn't you hear the man, gang? He needs a gas tank and exhaust pipes from the workshop. Get over there and deliver.
Get that keycard, friends. Kill the bodyguard if you have to.
You'll have to get into those boxes manually. Patch me in!
Try and get by him unnoticed. Take your time.
That's it. I'm ready to lift this baby out of here.
Perfect, I can do this. Beginning hacking.
Outstanding! That's the vault code. Once we're in the Security Center, we can open the vault with it.
Great job, people. The Mendozas are out of business and their liquidity is riding shotgun in our chopper. Sweet.
Gang, hurry with the parachutes. Don't get off course.
Get to the computer so we can code the tag for access.
You're in the lair of the beast now, gang. Better loot, but bigger risk.
Right console. And the left.
Great. Now get the keys to Hox. Decrypting the servers will help pinpoint the traitor.
Might be dangerous, but you gotta get to the bio-lab friends.
Can one of you please, when time permits, swipe the keycard in the lock?
Remember gang, we need Garrett to keep breathing... for now.
Ok, go, go go! Get out of there!
Careful. That's the door. It has got an alarm. We need to disable this first.
They knew we were comin'. Gimme a second here...
You're not going to have a look behind the doors?
Oh, and there are probably rival Russian mobsters here. I know, Vlad is not being forthcoming with me either.
Light 'em up. They will ping back up.
Boat's ready for you.
Might want to look in the fitness center. I saw something glowing there.
Try the light fixtures. Maybe there's something there.
Mobster eliminated. Keep going.
The getaway just left without you. Sorry guys, you're gonna be spending some time behind bars.
Display case alarms are off now. Get your Dr. Jones on, fellas, and grab some antiquities. I know a guy who can fence this stuff. Trust me.
Good job! Now reactivate BFD!
Ah! I said take it easy! Feds woke up! Find the server room and get out!
Alright. Give it a moment - let the gas dissapate.
Even with all the conspiracy theories you've ever heard or been told, who would ever believe this one?
If you wanna leave, there's an escape panel on the top floor. Check it out if you wanna call it quits.
The gang that stole the Diamond. Outstanding, gang!
Shit, the timelock has paused. Must be your ECM jammer that's making it go ape! Better holster those jammers.
Don't worry about it.
Great job! I'm sending the boat, keep looting!
It was loud and got attention. Excellent work. Tough for Gensec though. Their new design is a joke.
Golden Grin, or bust!
Get that winch secure!
Florida cops don't mess around. They want to make a good first impression.
That's our van coming back. Get ready, he is coming in!
Can't do much more in here, I've almost gone through all the intel. We're gonna have to piece this all together back at the safe house. When we nail that traitor, the bastard is goin' to die.
15 grand guys.
Good. Now lead him to the panic room and see his looks into the retinal scanner.
Two more!
Ok, I'm in! Stand by. This shouldn't take me long.
Yes sir, we'll help you with that right away.
Now get into the chopper!
You're going into the hornet's nest. So don't kick the damn thing, huh.
All right. I'm coming in. You see a big black fucking chopper, that's me. Unless we're talking about what's hidden in your mums knicker drawer.
Everything except the tiara is for us!

Straightforward job, this one. A bunch of thugs are running a little operation. Got a bunch of "elves" cutting coke that Vlad wants. Deal with the thugs, and then get the elves producing. Shouting at them should do it. Get as much coke as Vlad needs, and we're done.
Now that you got the keycard lets move on.
Feels like old times, huh?
Get ready!
You gotta crack that door open, friends.
OK, thermite's through. A chopper is bringing the water. Connect it when it arrives.
Ach! The Murkys have gone bossies!
Not going to get in that way, friends. Go outside and find a back door to crack open with a saw.
Can't take care of this until the square is clear.
I have a van waiting, but it can't get through until the area is clear.
Need a refill. Be back shortly.
Now you have to get inside the auctioneer's office and get the code. He should be carrying the keycard to it on his person, so go get it!
Cover me! They're tearing me to pieces!
Let's see... Place the keycard in the panel and activate that switch. Hope we're not in for a big suprise...
I've found the target's location. Go hunt, my friends!
I'm at the pick-up!
Hey! The cops are gonna stop the train further down the tracks, so you need to get the BCI tech and get the hell out of there!
I wasn't really surprised by Rust's betrayal, you know? He was always an old and greedy fuck. But blood needs to be paid with blood, and you made a big-ass mistake by coming here.
Now you just have to find a way into his office.
It should be muriatic acid!
Oh, no... now we're going to be here until tomorrow, for sure.
Hmm, nothing. I suppose it would have been too easy for us to find our prize here. It's probably still locked in the evidence room.
Don't forget: we're looking for voting machines. My money is on them being in shipping crates scattered about.
Now just mix it all together. Steady... careful now...
Where is that wine? Find it!
That's the stuff. Get it to the van.
It's been ages since I was there last. They've changed a lot of things.
In unstable times like these, gold's all you can really depend on. So who wants to go stabilize our economic future? The Harvest & Trustee bank vault awaits.
OK, we need to clean the joint out. Eight bags ought to do it. Don't go easy on them!
That's a nice, full load. Sit tight, gang - Bile will be back.
You need to deal with the power box to use the ladder!
We need to take that radar out of action. The missiles from the anti-air gun should do the work. See if you can use it.

Kerels are going to go bossies when they see what we are after, and will be coming after us in droves, so keep your eyes peeled and take them down fast. The longer you can keep them at bay, the more desperate they'll get and give us a bigger load of cash, yeah?
...have a look in the dumpers at the construction site outside, yeah?
I love banks. The smell of all that money.
OK, that's our minimum. Grab more if you want, or get out of there.
You're not going to tempt that goat down with nice words and treats. Saw the streetlight!
That's a beautiful car. Shame. But it's part of the job.
I have to leave in two minutes!
OK, get into that tunnel. Time for a visit to Mexico.
OK, your pick-up is ready. It can carry as much ammo as you can get to it, if you want a bonus. Up to you.
You gotta find the laptop if you want to get the money.
Get a flare going so Bile can find you!
Get that bastard!
Hey, hold the door!
Everything working again.
Keep the water flowing, gang. Just a little more. Then just rig it, and let hydrodynamics do its job.
The fucking Hondurans found us! How did they follow us?!
All right! Signal the blimp. And do it Vegas style. Find some fireworks and light them up.
That's it. Let them piss their pants while we do our thing at the bank.
Nice haul! This will bring in a nice chunk of change. Good job!
OK, now how about those laptops?
Chopper's got to leave soon. Hustle if you want to be on it, but it'll be back soon!
More C4. Almost there. Keep looking.
Good. Let the bastards squirm in fear while we take care of the bank.
Where the fuck is RaÃºl? You were supposed to find him! I have 50 guests coming tonight and you pull this shit you fucking whore! I will send you back to fucking San Dimas!
Still don't know you're there. Look for the keycards.
Garrett's going to have a fun time explaining that one for sure. Now get that box secured and get out before the kerels arrive.
Great, I'm in. Keep watching those hostages.
You can finish this when you want, but grab as much as you can.
Awesome you got them all - I think.
Don't forget the box, friends.
Damn. Should have told him the code was kiss your own ass. Get ready.
Ah... OK guys, we got a small refuling need for the chopper. He is dry. You guys gotta stay put for about 10 - 15 minutes.
That's as far as I can take it. Look around for something that might narrow down his location.

All safely down? Great. Locate the crash site, and see if the pilot's still alive. If he is, you need to get him to a safe place. I'll get a chopper out to pick him up ASAP. A plane doesn't crash out here without causing attention, so you can expect company. Work fast.
You've defeated the tenth wave of cops!
That crowbar will be useful with all these shipping crates.
The wheel stopped on drills. Do you guys know what that means?
Never get tired of seeing gold bullion getting bagged.
Go! Go! Go! Just run!
The vault, gang. It has the deposit boxes, and they have the money.
There's a power box nearby, see if you can't take out those detectors.
That plane must have dropped of the guns for Mendoza. Hurry up guys!
Fix up BFD and let's finish this. Come on, crew, we're so close.
Stop screwing around, guys! Now you gotta grind through metal doors for ages.
You got snipers around there!
The machine's done. Keep going. The Elephant wants to make sure his man wins big.
We can't screw this one up friends. We gotta get it done, proper.
Friends, it's probably best to go in through the back door with a saw, yeah?
To set it up we'll need some diesel fuel, fertilizer, wire and a timer. Look around if there's anything like that around there.
There's a lot of stuff in here! I guess you'll know what you're looking for when you see it.
Almost there. Target in sight. Over.
You gotta get back to the skylight.
Chopper is on the way! ETA 2 minutes.
I'm coming in.
We've got a chance to make this the greatest political comeback this town has seen since Nixon. Get in there, clowns.
These people don't give up! Let's show them, shall we?
Now, we need to set the trap. More gasoline in container 12.
Blerrie! You'll have to go through the back door with a saw, yeah?
OK, now get to the Oval Office in the West Wing. Find the access point.
You can go get more C4 outside if you need it, yeah?
OK, I have access. There's two Gensec alarm boxes we need to disable, I'll mark them for you.
What are you waiting for? Get through that gate!
Bring that beast down, gang.
There is old saying in Ukraine. Revenge is a dish best eaten by sharks.
Ah! That noise! Another package fell, I think, yes?
Remember to grab the C4. That is your way through the door.
Fuck this shit man.
Damn it to hell! What is wrong with a traditional security door that you can drill? Looks like you're gonna need the actual lead scientist for hand print authorization. Find him.

I can last a year in here, you pig-fucks!
Get moving! Get past the cops and rendezvous with Eddie!

Blowing the walling will wreck the ballot machines. Accident, right? We're just doing an honest bank heist.
And if I could get you to sign here, here, here... here, and here. And sign here.
Ooh, nice bit of hardware, that! Going to be useful for sure.
I've got a helicopter to pick you up. I got someone familiar, so you can use your frequent flyer points.
Light a flare to signal Bile. We need a big damn drill to get down there, which first needs a winch. He'll bring the parts for it.

Go to the armory and find something that opens doors!
So you reached the top? Have the prisoner buckle up and then release the balloon. The plane will be coming in soon.

Great you got the gas. Might need more though.

Try another combination of symbols and order, yeah?

I need all y'all assholes on point tonight! Especially you up in the booth.

Worth checking in the Amber Room for a PC.
Give me 30 seconds and I will drop that EMP.
Welcome back! See, you didn't even have to answer the phone, I'm keeping my eyes on you as usual!
And... Done! Ship's moving. Sit tight guys, this will take some time! Try not to get killed.
Get the prisoner, don't leave him behind!
The drill won't break that door. You should try the armory and see if there's anything you can use.
I got an Inside Man there. They'll help us get through to the gates leading to the vault. Patching them through now.

Get inside the vault, gang. See what's inside!
Guys rappelling from that chopper to the roof. Get at them!
You can't leave without finding that safe.
I'm sending a chopper in for you guys to unload the loot. It's close by, shouldn't take too long. Stay tight.
It's too hot for the van driver. He's bugging out. Don't worry, though. Got a chopper gassed and ready for you.
OK, for the retinal scanner we need the FBI boss. Find him and take him hostage!
Twitch is arriving with the van to pick you up. He'll wait by the upper bridge side.
It doesn't look good, guys - it doesn't look good!
Ice that rat bastard!
Find the bank manager, then tie him down and you'll get the keycard.
We're wasting time here! Get that winch going again!
Lekker! That's the spot. Cut through the top layer with a saw, yeah?
The cops know the snipers wont be able to finsh this. They're prepairing to send in the troops!

You still have to take the boxes from the conveyor.
Don't smash the glass or the alarm will go off. Use a glass-cutter.

Doors. You can try these out too. Keep in mind that there are lots of ways to get one open. In our line of work, closing doors is pointless - opening 'em is what matters.
That's done it, but you don't have much time before the system restarts, so get back to the gate!
All right. Now bunker down, gang. Hold them off until we burn through.
Welcome to Mexico amigos. Try not to make a ruckus.

Great guys! No one keeps you out!
Screws don't usually unscrew themselves. You gotta help.
Thank you for your call. Roberts appreciates the chance to talk to you.
Guys, I need you in the construction yard. It's the only way out.
I'm calling in a helicopter to pick you up!
There's several rooms in the maintenance tunnels. Have you checked all of them?
Careful!
This is it. Bust your way in. Don't care how you do it, just do it!
OK, friends. Let's do this. Make your way into the bank.
You need to get Santa up the tree so he can fly out with it!
Power is back, great. Now don't stop.

Put the ticket in the gate. Let's finish this.

The sooner you get to the wine cellar, the sooner we can get this done.
Don't get lazy, gang. Search the whole train yard if needed.
Find the room that controls those bollards. Gotta be here somewhere. Check the doors.
Well, you got a decent amount. Just about covers the gas money. Maybe next time we can push it further.

Hello.

The vault, guys. ASAP.

We need a code to open the armory. Three digits. Colour coded. They're somewhere in the Grin. Get searching!

Really!? Hurry the fuck up!
Friends, you got to tell me what all the fuss is with those fish tacos. Sounds pretty awful if you ask me. Maybe if it were shark fins...
I think we might need to spin another wheel. Find it.
This is like candy for Duke, yeah? But we just need what's inside. Those symbols are probably the key to opening it. Look around for clues.

So much value in such a small space.
Huh.... that door is code locked.

Time to get you all out of there.

You need to restart the device.
Have you found it yet? They probably kept it somewhere safe.

Lots of people and cars blocking access to the bank. Clear out the area so the escape van can get through.

Good, you are inside. Now, locate the server room.

City of Angeles. Looks like the quake made a few more...

Almost there. Final protocol - the managers code. Check his computer.

My asshole brother-in-law, that useless sack of ball-skin, has crashed his plane. He hit something and ... We can't let the cops pick him up. Normally I wouldn't give two shakes of my pisser for that drunken asshole. I'd let him rot there, but, you know... Family. Track that old soak down and get him out. I'll pay a nice Christmas bonus for any of his packages too.
That's the ordnance, but it's not the turret. Get it out if you can, but keep looking.
Hurry now, get to the canteen!
Dammit! They yanked the hose. Get there, get it back on.

Welcome to the labyrinth, motherfuckers.

There should be a mechanism or button to open the safe somewhere. See if you can find it.

The office has a special lock system. It uses a spoken pass phrase. But I had a special cocaine package smuggled in through a drugs deal. It has a hidden microphone recorder in it. Find this package.

Okay, listen up. This one's tricky. I need to take apart a bike and get some special shit. This means you need to take me to the garage so I can work my magic.

You're doing great. Keep smashing!
This is where the staff work. Offices, IT, security and so on.
Check the wine cellar!
OK, let's get that gate! Give it some heat, chop chop.

Shit!
I get back to ship alone. Will contact you with instructions.

Ag man, the pump stopped. Maybe it needs more juice?
Aaaand it's done! Looks just like new... goodbye, darling... I'll miss ya... I love you.
Hurry up and get back to the chopper so we can secure the BCI tech.
There's the alarm. Camera feeds are down. Drill the vaults till you find the turret.
There's two pallets found. Now the third. Come on, beautiful friends. Keep looking.
Good work! Get back to the cooking. Use the time between waves to find more ingredients.
I felt that one here! Now, inside, keep fighting.
Great, now get into the vault.
Oh, that's a lot of hardware. Have a look at the vault!
Woop!
OK, while we wait for the money to burn you can open up some of those deposit boxes, what ever we find in there is ours.
Hey clowns, the safe - drill it!
Hurry up, friends.
Alright, the chopper is on its way.
Let me get the chopper pilot patched in!
Did you find the evidence storage yet?
Keep an eye on those sprinklers!
You would have thought someone like the Dentist could afford a better kept prison to torture people in...
Water tanks are empty. Refill them in the bathrooms. Hey, I never promised you glamour.
Help him get that door open!
That's the managers digit. Serves him right for leaving it lying around.
This will work as a frame - won't be fantastic, but we will get paid. Let's get you out!
Vault with simultaneous two card reader. Probably 10 second time lock. They must be hiding something tasty.
They're right on top of me people, can't fucking hold out much longer!
Ok, now make your way to the vault, yeah?
Time is precious comrads. Get those anti-airs down.
Yeah, it ain't candy.
Folks! This is gonna cost us but I've arranged an escape chopper - a few minutes!
The crane has been stopped. You need to restart it!
Looks like he's chained to the spot. You need to find some tools!
So good to talk to you, sir.
There's your ride out of here.
Thermite is our best way into the vault. We've done this before.
Come on, gang, I can't detonate the explosives as long as you are close.
You can move out of the PEOC now.
The batch is done, friends.
Get out onto the lawn! You're almost out of time!
Now we're talking.
You gotta restart the override on that box.
Don't worry Locky, Vlad will be quiet as mouse drinking Sputniks!
Alright, I'm on my way!
That's a strange looking dinges, yeah? Put in on a zipline, chop chop!
Look at that! Now stay and make sure it all burns!
All right, that's all I need to keep DC partying! But there's always Baltimore, Harrisburg, Philly. You keep making, I'll keep buying and we'll keep the East Coast dancing, yes? Or you can leave.
Here's your mask area. Pretty self-explanatory.
Good. That's the first. Now find the second.
Time to leave this clusterfuck behind us! Get out of there, NOW!
Get to the construction yard! Hurry!
You need fresh power cells.
There's no doubt they have the pardons locked inside.
Watch out - there's more of them down there!
All right. Container 61 is where you need to stash the gold. It's out in the yard.
I don't like it... Let's get this over with as soon as we can, get the paintings on the table.
Alright... OK, we need at least four paintings, remember, the ones with red stickers.
Don't stray too long though, friends. I'm seeing a lot of chatter in Murkywater channels. Looks like they're tracking us.
That's the keycard we needed. Get back to the train and open the door.
I watch man eat human shit in Attica. He look just like you. Wait, can it be..?
Great, Set off the flare so the chopper can land!
This car doesn't have a door, so you'll have to use a blowtorch to make one.
Damnit, that's the alarm. Stay frosty and get ready!
And...
Taylor's computer should be nearby.
Okay, looks like they have two linked locks on this. Find the other lock and get a breaker on it too.
Remember, find those laptops.
Let's get out of here. After you, please...
Wait a second...
850 horse power of pure sexy badass.
Get the bags to the van!
Stop dossing, yeah? Into the office!
Good! But it will be a long minute!
Perfect, all you got to do now is disconnect the keypad on Garrett's door.
Damn it! Those oil barrels are in the way. See if you can release the straps, and do it quickly.
The info they have will be in a briefcase or something like that. Make the trade and have them hand over the info to you. These guys are scum so keep your eyes open.
Used dinars. Hard to trace. Perfect.
Can you take the snipers out?!
Nice. But try and keep those tossers off the power, yeah?
Merry christmas, my friends! I need you to help me with a little Christmas miracle.
There we go. Hmm... it says there's physical evidence on our friend around here as well...
I'll try another spot where it's less hot. Follow me.
You still gotta find that USB stick. Check around the West Wing if you haven't already.
There are the safes. How beautiful they are. You will need transport to get them out safely. Look around.
... hang in there!
The code begins with an eight, according to my source.
We need to catch up with the Mendozas before they jet out of this country.
What's taking so long!?
Jesus, he's wasted. Stay with him. He's in no shape to defend himself.
You're breaking up... Can you hear me ok?
We're not leaving this place without some loot. Ernesto has floor safe where he keeps his stuff. Use the winches you picked up earlier, hook them up to the floor.
Crisp and neatly stacked. Don't be shy, gang. Go get it!
Okay, time for...honesty. The coke is packed in...goats. Yes, goats. And they've escaped. Haha, tricky goats, huh?! Find them!
We're stealing stranger and stranger things, yeah? Hook it onto a zipline.
Suck in those guts guys, let's make a good impression. Go meet the gang.
Crew, get drilling the gate. Hustle it!
The code begins with a zero, according to my source.
Hurry up! Get him into the chopper so we can get out of here!
There you go. That's gonna get you through.
Go through that door right there. Twitch is waiting!
There's the balloon. Hey, you see it, guy?
Ach, they've upgraded from the plans Vlad gave us. Maybe you can find a manual or schematic somewhere around there.
I have a nice spot, just for those loot bags... right here.
OK, start up the computer again and let's pick up where we got interrupted.
McKendrick sure has a lot of influential supporters up there. They're expecting to cash in if he wins, I'm sure.
I need covering fire to get the gate open!
Intel tells us the EMP bomb will be two parts, and that's what we're here for. But with that said; if you see an opportunity to grab other valuable loot you should do it.
You're going to need two key cards to get in there. How many have you found?
Ah, that's it friends. A nice little Payday, though I think we could have gotten more!
Old Locke knows what to do with those suits.
You did it. Got a couple of Russian oil playboys that'll pay over the odds for these wheels. Nicely done!
Great job, I'm connected.
Remember to protect the hacking device!
Secure the bags on the plaform where you came in.
Look out, the room is booby-trapped! Disarm or get out!
They're deploying SWATs on the roof!
Why're you still searching containers? You got the bomb!
I have root. There's two Gensec alarm boxes we need to disable, get to them and cut the wire.
What are you waiting for? Get on the ship!
Guys, the vault - find it! Check the Murkywater containers.
Alright, now let's get out of here. Leave the PEOC!
I guess we better do what the little hood rat bastard says. It's tough to be a criminal in a town as rotten as this.
We gotta clear the bollards. I mean you. And by you I mean hey assholes.
OK, maybe tiara is somewhere nearby. Gotta be in the building.
...Get to the tech lab, hack into a workstation and see if you can find which shelf the box is in.
Okay, ping our Inside Guy when you're ready to de-mask and get out of there. He'll move the loot, so be sure you secure in the vent what you want to take.
All right, we're gonna need an engine to get this baby going. I'm almost positive I saw them store some inside the clubhouse.
It was a bit of a bumpy ride, but it turned out a-ok. We got the flash drive and the gold as a bonus. It should give you some nice cash to get started again.
Moretta will be moved to Dock 3B... Once you execute all the necessary steps.
Yes?
You need to hack the auctioneer's computer for the code, yeah?
The mainframe... you should get back to it, friends.
You guys OK in there?
Ship's in position! Going to hit it like Blackbeard!
Left!
You need to guard the cannon.
Head towards the opposite side of the building.
They fell for it. Three transports. Crews are on the street, trying to figure out what's happening. Hit them hard!
Bang, that's another explosion!
But look... the keycard.
Get in, save Hector's cooks and get the drugs out of there before anything else goes wrong.
...you will find it in a dumpster out by the construction site, friends.
We got those little pastry balls with the chocolate and cream.
Keep it moving in there.
Chopper's nearly there. Just hold on!
We don't need BFD breaking down on us, crew. Make sure she has plenty of coolant. Get water from the bathroom.
Come on guys, move those bags!
That wasn't the right cell.
Cops are here! Brace yourselves!
Keep an eye out for Murkys while I'm doing this.
That reinforced door has a date with your saw.
Perhaps sir has a sweet tooth? How would you like enough cake to choke a camel?
Woah, wait til everyone is in the car!
Get those stones to Mr. Blonde.
Great. You can safely grab the goat now!
Thats it! Now let's get it to work on that vault.
Keep listening. Listen for...
Hey, the escape chopper is here. If you feel lucky you can go get the rest of the bags - otherwise get out!
Don't let the workers see you or they might blow the whole deal.
Try another key!
About two minutes.
No cash and no info. I'd call this one a miss. Hector's going to be very unhappy unless you guys pull my ass out of the fire. I know it's a lot to ask.
One more time: sneak in, watch for cameras, guards and any other alarms. Go in fast but careful. Don't get sloppy.
50 grand, woah, is there anything left?
Good work. That cage is how we move the money out. Start loading it.
Unless you're taking more things, it's time to leave.
Head for the roof right away!
Anyway, find the paintings marked as sold and take them. We need at least four to be safe.
Where's he off to? The laundry room? Follow him, you chops!
One minute, one minute people! Shut these guys down! Pick-up's almost here!
Get hacking into one of those terminals, yeah?
The adress is in the wrong district - try another code.
The VR set is virtually not here. Or should that be actually? I don't know - which is it?
Ach! Someone stopped the pump. Get it going again!
That's it, yeah. Now go find that laptop and hack into it.
Get to one of the other computers and help.
There's a thermal drill nearby. Go get it.
You heard Vlad. Get those bags into the chimney.
The warehouse is where you're most likely to find a crowbar.
Hello? Make it fast, I'm busy.
OK, we're off. Tiara goes to Vlad and he'll get the revenge he wanted. I'm glad we could accommodate him. See you at the safe house.
Hey guys.. uuh... it seems we can't get into Sosa's office this way. It's on a separate system.
Ah, look. See what that button does, yeah? Maybe the whole place will self destruct? Probably not.
Get that keycard in the panel, quick
All his sins burned to ashes! Now let's find our friend, he should be in the cell block.
OK. Nice tech! It appears the panic room door is controlled with a code and a retinal scanner.
My old acquaintance in the FBI that owed me a favor has doctored a laptop for you to use. She said she would mark which one on a whiteboard. See if you can find it, yeah?
You know the drill, gang. Let's cook a little meth.
Ohhhh shhhheeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeiiiiiiiiit. Out-fuckin'-standin'!
These guys can drive!
Throw the bag on the table.
Relight the fire! Come on!
We got cops all over. Drop the beat, guys.
I was able to get some seismic readings of the area from a local monitoring station. Some areas around the house indicate lots of hidden passages.
Ahhh, the safes. My precious little. Bring them safely out. Find a transport.
Great. That loot will satisfy our arrangement... however, if you wanted to carry on... I am just saying... hmmmm?
Okay, we're gonna need a fancy seat for Rust's fancy ass, don't we? There's an old bunker in the backyard. Get in there and you'll find what we need.
If you put down your guns now, I will be merciful, and only cut off your fingers and toes.
Now make your way to the West Wing and find the Oval Office!
You've got to keep at least 4 bags!
SWAT, SWAT on the balcony!
Roger. One moment please. Today's code is 8394. Please remember it next time. This is very sensitive information.
Crap, you just lost a vial.
Obvious, but the front door is probably not the best move. There's bound to be better entrances.
You heard the man. Bile will deliver the C4 to the rooftop in a couple of minutes.
Good, now set up the connection again.
Check the back!
Okay, what comes after that...
We almost tasted that cigar!
Keep going guys.
... hope you guys are prepared!
They're inside!
Friends, I'm still trying to sort this. Hang in there.
There's a zip-line set up there. It's for getting loot out, nice and quiet and unseen. Lot of valuable stuff in there that you can tie on it.

Every little bit helps, but the rocks in cases are most important.
Find the desk of "A. Valentine".
Look at that room go! We god damn did it!
Have a look around for a ladder, if you want to get up on that roof. And you want to get up on that roof, I assure you.
Pick up the thermite. That's our way into the vault.
Can't get out of there on an empty tank. Fuel the plane!
Whoops! Take care, my friends. I am not finished with you.
Okay, there's a marked closet. Get working on the lock.
Hi. I just saw a show, and the bank got robbed, and I want to move my money to a bank that doesn't get robbed.
Where the fuck am I? I see... Storage units?
Ah, blerrie. They've got those new ultra-fine detectors installed. Got to take a different approach.
Gang? I'm not sure you can hear me, but you know what you're supposed to do: enter the laboratory via the hatchet.
We need that plane!
Keep checking the shipping crates for machines. Once you find them, start the hacking.
Alright, connect me again.
Chopper is back guys!
You'll need to find the right key here.
Cops incoming. I suggest you head down and take them heads-on by the front entrance. That way you can stop them before they flood the building.
OK, our pardons are locked in the vault. Have a closer look.
Dig in somewhere good!
Watch the entrances, friends!
Listen closely. Every single one of those safes needs to be recovered. You can't let me down on.
Hey, there's no room for more!
OK, let it work. There's a police counterstrike on the way. Keep them off it.

I'm shutting this down. Make sure you're with the driver when he bails, or it's a long walk home.
Any second now!
Get ready for the fourth wave!
Find the prison trucks.
The other party is now a minute away.
The guards inside will probably have pagers. You should be careful.
Move quick. Guards will notice that open door.

Everyone feeling good, yes? Anyone with, I don't know, skin peeling away and showing bone?

I have to leave!
Those chains - you'll need some tool to get him out of there!
Blerrie, what a noise! Time to leave!
OK, the vault's got the gold.
Two keycards. They'll be there somewhere, I know it. Keep looking.
Come on, no need to be nervous. Out of the airlock, friends!

You need to kill those cannons. Reactivate the shutdown!
You need to get to the cell blocks, right away.
Still need more power cells.

When building a custom bike, it's all about the details, baby. And what's more bad-ass than a chrome fucking skull? Am I right or am I right? I saw a special made one inside the clubhouse. Get it for me.
You gotta take out those bikers!
OK, your getaway is standing by. Bail now, or use it to clear out the ammo. Your call.
Good. Now open the red door.
Use the zipline to secure the loot.
You can either find more loot or get on the chopper!
Be afraid... Be very afraid.
Dentist tells me they have C4 in the armory there. Get there, and get it.
You're making less sense than usual, yeah?$NL;
What are you waiting for? Set up the bomb.
Ok, the first step is to find the head of security - he'll have a USB stick with access codes for the house. He always wears a green jacket.
Cage delivered!
Okay, that's him at the barbecue.
There goes the alarm!
They don't suspect a thing. This is great.
Time to make a run for it!
Make sure you don't raise the alarm though.
Chrome skull? Whatever, just do as the mechanic says. Go to the clubhouse and use the blowtorch he gave you.
Got an idea. I got his phone number. I'll call him and distract him. You be ready to top up his glass.
Roberts Bank is happy to help you, sir.
Everyone likes to check on their money, right?
Armor of a Shogun. Nabunaga. Thought lost for centuries, but... here it is. Get the pieces bagged.
Then find that money, torch it, and for god's sake record it with the camera I gave you.
Take the cooler with you!
Remember - the explosion may have scattered the loot across the floor.
Come on, you need to restart the drill!
Alarm is active. They know you're there now.
We should have brought bigger guns, lads.
Those safe deposit boxes might contain a nice bonus. Why not have a look while you're waiting? Titan doors though, so you can't just cut them open.
OK folks, my inside man stashed the thermal lance you're gonna need for the vault around the back. Recon the spot to find it.
Ach, that vault is not going to open easily!
Press the button. You can't miss it.
Now use the first card on the terminal in the security room, then the second on the vault keypanel. You got a brief window, so no lollygagging.
When you're ready, get to the roof and we'll get you clear with the zipline.
The shaggy goat is unhappy with the knives.
You still got your old reflexes, old friend. Quickly, get these bodies out of sight.
Found the USB stick yet? It's gotta be there somewhere.
Quickly now, to the skylight.
OK, we got it! Use the code on the panic room!
What a fucking waste of quality coke!
There she is. The Moretta. No access here, though. Get it to dock 3B.
Alright, the alarm is dead. Good job. You can come and go as you like.
OK, friends. You just get to it and old Locke will have you cooking in no time, for sure!
It's on the fourth floor.
Good. Now search the coke bags.
Locked. Damn it! Alright, stay cool. Find the manager. Take him hostage. I'm sure he can help us get in.
The cops are pissed that you just bagged their snipers. They're getting ready to send in the cavalry!
The code should be on the screen. Get it and go open the vault.
Once you're ready to bounce, find our Insider. She's going to help you slip out of there.
Just a little longer...
Thought you New York guys were all about the bagels, yeah?
Ok guys, time to leave the tower and get out of here. Move along the bridge!
You should see your face! I will see it everyday when it is on my wall.
Blerrie! Murky bastards!
It's opening! Now get inside that vault.
Restart the drill, friends.
What you got there? You know what, I really don't care. Just throw it in the truck and I'll take it with me as I drive off.
Once you get that card from Ralph, his dad's probably gonna disown him.
FBI files... I could stay here all night... Alright I'm on this.
And off we go my friends!
I still require one of you poes to swipe the card.
C'mon, you'll get discovered. Go through the computers.
Attach the car to the chopper!
Friends, find the other computer and disable the firewall.
Blerrie, the Kataru have really messed him up.
Excellent, that's a part in the bag. Bring it back to the mechanic.
The owner of this store will have a month of insurance paperwork to do. Nice take boys, back to the house.
Come on friends, make your way out!
Moretta's comm frequency will be on one of the computers. Check them out.
...what's the worst that could happen, eh?
Come on, let's see what you got.
I can't believe this shit!
Start with putting all the paintings on the table in the train car. I'll contact you when you are done.
He's inside this apartment. Get it open.
Everybody get that!? Three minutes to go till he gets here. Keep them off the coke until then!
C'mon guys, find me those security boxes. Check the walls.
Someone pressed the alarm button.
Twitch is coming to the side alley.
Thank you. I'm impressed that you showed up so quickly. I'm in your debt.
Gang, the C4 is in the van. Get it, and plant it.
What are you doing leading him around? Just hit him in the head with a maracas or something and he will talk.
The lights are showing your path across the room. You see? Each light corresponds to a tile. Stay on the right tiles!
It's the cops! They're following us!
OK, 3 more then we can get out of here.
You can use a shape charge if you have one. It's faster than the drill, someone might hear it though.
Now, the vault is located down in the Security Center. You have to get down and through there to reach it.
Remember we will need at least four bags of meth.
Alright, that's the van. Get the bags to it!
Plant the C4 and enjoy the moment.
Yes! This is the one. I'm sending the helicopter to pick you up! Hang tight!
We're looking good... Looking good.
Take that tarp off there, yeah?
Since it's the season of giving, here's a little something for you.
Found those laptops yet?
No one fucks with Vlad's family except Vlad. They will know, after tonight!
Get those doors open! The switch is right there!
Our guy has a taste for Jaegerheister. Find the green bottle, spike it and serve it.
That's it, that's it. Go. Go!
Still waiting for that drill.
If anyone finds out what really happened to Elvis, let me know!
There might be grates in the sewer, so I left you a little present - some thermal paste. Aren't I nice to you?
Looks like he was hard for the kerels to handle. We'll need to cut him loose.
Leave it with me. I can certainly help you with that.
You got in and out without attracting notice to yourselves. Gensec won't be able to discreetly sweep this under the rug. Great work, gang.
You know what to do. Signal the chopper, and we'll drop off more ingredients. Or bail. Your choice.
All right, I'm here. Now cover me.
Start searching for that Murkywater nest egg, shaped like a lot of cocaine.
Look on the walls for the router boxes.
He obviously didn't care enough about those paintings. You need to find something else.
Stand by - sending it in by chopper.
Guys listen carefully. Once you start making the call, you can't hang up. He will most likely sound the alarm, he is a paranoid one after all.
Are they gone yet? Is it safe to come out?
The Velvet Room. Search it for a PC ASAP.
Guys, I can't stay much longer!
Wow, this boat is expensive. This Powell guy's got money.
Now get that door open. Time to reveal the rat.
Look for the name "Taylor" on the desk.
All this waiting is fucking killing me!
I managed to get one of the employees onto our side. They willing to open the gates leading to the vault. Let me put them through.
Come on friends, saw those units open!
Nice work! The first wave was beaten back!
The employee lounge has a network router. If you patch me in, I can unlock the door.
Let's hope that's what we're looking for.
SWAT are blasting down from the parking lot. Watch it!
Please remember your fucking jobs - the breaching charges need to be attached to all four locks.
Now we're gonna fill the vault door with liquid nitrogen! Mr Blonde?
Hurry up and open the vault with the code.
There's a bit of charm in those old vaults, eh? Back then you didn't need loads of dingeses to get in, just craftsmanship.
Bring the laptop to the AA gun. See if you can hook it up.
It'd be wise to find some cover in that warehouse.
Umm... help me out with this door, guys.
It shares a vent with the Security Center.
I'm under fire! Help!
Keep them off the routers.
I gotta bust out of here in one minute!
Police was hurt and Tasteful is no longer party place. I like your style. Thank you for this and have fun with the money. I think we work together well.
There's a dumpster down there. Gage says you can use it to stash some loot.
You're going to have to fight your way to the end of the plane, get up the stairs and then fight back along. Only way to reach the cargo controls.
This might work. Find a terminal - PC, laptop, whatever - connected to the network there. If I can get into their database, I might just be able to pull some info from a manifest.
I guarantee you, that if you hang up while making the call he will sound the alarm. So make sure the coast is clear before starting it.
Find the prison transports.
Ach, you've gone and set of the detectors!
Hold on...
There's a boat on the lake. A zip-line can get you across.
Almost there guys! I'm trying as fast as I can!
Everyone! In the car! Now!
There we go! Now go grab that artifact and move!
It takes special skills to ninja through a secure warehouse in broad daylight. Great work. Now, let's see if it was worth it.
See if you can find fuel tank and hose somewhere near.
Ah, over there! 1965, 4.7 litre V8. Second best thing made that year, yes?
I fear the main entrance is not an option. They are all over it.
Slow day... should be good for us.
Don't dawdle, crew. Assemble that cage!

Almost there!
That thing has been tampered with. The door might not open while the shrine is missing pieces. Look around and see if you can find them.
Good. The logisitic officers' controls are right in front of you. Operate them. Let the money go.
Keep those idiot kerels away from the servers.
I'm sure glad I ain't wading through that shit. Locate the exit point.
If you don'get moving soon, I think Vlad's going to go bossies!
No alarm on that door now. Get inside.
Find a means to destroy the evidence!
They stopped the drill!
That was a bang! Most satisfying!
Someone called the police!
Ah, good. That's the entrance to the PEOC.
Well, I'm sorry to have to do this, but here's where I clear off. It's nothing personal!
Can't get a response from the terminal? It's that damn good-for-nothing Murkywater OS. See if another terminal works better, yeah?
Ok, let's go. Get in everyone!
OK, you heard the Captain. Find the computer. Enter the GPS coordinates. Let's get her moving.
One last obstacle before the vault. Lasers. Need to shut them down.
... I'll be back in a moment!
Cops are gonna be swarming through here any second! Move fast! Check the wagons for the vault.
You're breaking up... Can you hear me ok?
Blerrie, that's the vault from the blueprints.
All right, listen up. Here's the getaway. Get past the bridge up ahead, and you'll see a truck in a tunnel. That's Twitch. Just park straight up into the truck, and we can close the book on this one.
The evidence room is on the second floor!
You can throw the loot in the yellow waste chute hanging on the side of the construction tower. I'll have someone pick it up later.
Ha! At least you grabbed the money before the bang!
One more sample in the cooler before you can leave.
The cops are gonna find me here!
Hey! Heey! Hey Hey Heeey! Locky!
The roadblock worked and two transports have stopped. Get to work, and get 'em open!
That hard drive will be perfect! Once you plug it in, I should be able to access their system and get the vault open.
Hey, how did you do that so quickly, friends? Old Locke almost feels unnecessary...
Dwankie kerels have filled the place with gas! Wait until it clears before going in.

Gang, ignite the tires. Give that chopper a nice thick smokescreen to worry about!
Let's go blast some doors!
Gonna need to call the Moretta, and for that we need the comm frequencies. Search for it.

Remember to screw that winch down good.
The trace indicates West End. So look for a clue for that - West End.
You get into that computer yet?
Don't forget to wipe out any Russian mobsters you find.

Hey, I got your escape driver coming in by boat. Head over to the small water access area near the river.
Remember you're looking for the server room.
The helicopter is on its way! Just hold on!
Looks like we need a code for that door. Start looking for a way to find it.
You've defeated the ninth wave of cops!
You can't use the keypad. Time to blow the door open!
It might be a good idea to look around before you go loud. Find your best approach.
There's a cop entering the bank. Here's an idea: take care of him.
...muriatic acid?
Bingo. The alarm is disabled. Get that door open.
Alright, the chopper's on the way. He'll be there in a minute.
In! Right, need a few moments to get the lock. While you're waiting, head back out and fetch some C4. Let's get our escape ready.
The Payday Gang! Welcome! Let's teach these guys a lesson, yes?
Five!
Hah... thought for sure you were going to blow up the room with that one, but no worries. Just one more compound to add.
Oh no! It exploded, watch out! Stay out of that fire!
Listen up, if you can get me access to the computer in the surveillance room I'll get it open.
BFD's without power. Reconnect the power sockets.
Great, now get back and get through that door, yeah?
Outstanding work. You guys spend blow through some of that cash. I'll see what I can find on this blueprint.
When a door or window opens, the alarm timer will start. You'll have a limited time to disable it before it goes off.
Superb! Everything is proceeding perfectly. Now, please, everybody into the airlock.
Are you in the library yet?
You've got the keycard, why haven't you opened the door?
Crap. You got merc units surrounding the building. Don't recognise the logo... looks like a... shark?
One of you clowns take that ticket. Easy!
Okay, good. Now, take the hostage to the room in the back.
Amazing! Outstanding! Shit is being lost down here!
They're opening the powerboxes. Make sure they don't cut the power!
Shit, can't access the interview files. Need direct approval from the FBI Director himself. Find his office. See if you can fill in for him.
OK, let's see here. Got an idea for the code. Find the telephone pole connected to the house. We're gonna make an interesting phone call.
That's the alarm guys. Watch out for the cops!
Murky and the kerels are trying to shut down the cannon.
Find the bank manager! Black suit, balding. Tie him down - get the keycard.
Remember: the bank manager. Get his keycard from him.
That door breaker is exactly what we need!
Refueling is done, so take that hose off.
It looks like the whole area is being flooded by cops. Be careful!
The Commissar has a methlab! I know you guys have torched a few labs in the past. Or brew a little magic, if you think got the time and can find a formula.
Damn, and shit. The aircrew are sloppy as kak. Helicopter ain't got no fuel. Hey, can you hook up the fuel line?
Gang, get to the computer. Get those coordinates to the ship.
The pilot is on his way with the bags. Hold the line!
Oh crap, the FBI has Ready Teams in the houses next to the safe house. They're coming for you!
The display cases are smashable.
We bloodied their nose AND got their gold. Great job!
Connect that cable to hatch and the pick-up. Then start the engine. 400 horsepower and one industrial cable should be enough to tear that hatch right off.
Driver's waiting on your signal, gang.
Thank you for your time, sir.
Plant the last C4 on the roof and we should be good to go.
The helicopter is coming for the tree now!
That's probably the server room. Remember where it is.
Finally, the chopper pilot is heading back to get you guys. Sorry for the hold up.
This is one tail I can't lose!
Excellent, guys. It actually feels nice knowing we did something good. But don't get any ideas, we're robbing a bank or something next.
Alright, now let's get out of here. Go back through the airlock!
Stand by, gang. Moretta's almost berthed.
You'll find the code inside the auctioneer's office but to get in, you gotta get the keycard. Find the auctioneer and get it from him.
Be careful around that C4 guys.
You are looking for muriatic acid, caustic soda and hydrogen chloride.
Well I didn't bring it in. I got it out here in my trunk.
We should've fucking switched cars!
Drill has been stopped friends, you gotta restart it.
OK, standard bank hit, only we're going for the gold drop off day. Gotta remain liquid, right?
The company that laid the foundation registered a lot of hollow areas on the manifest. Probably means there are hidden passages in there.
I know it looks like a fortress, but there is a way in. Get to it.
Great job, my friends. Again, you have served me well. Don't worry about the nukes. Enjoy your money.
Using your brain to control a drone? Jesus, I'm getting old. Anyway, this technology is worth a lot of cash, so we need to steal it from these bikers.
Now top up his glass. Soon as he swallows, well, let's say he's going to go loud. Follow him, and get the card for his room.
Could be he's got a coffe cup sitting around there somewhere.
Twitch is waiting for you in the basement. Just a short elevator ride, then we all go for a bite, yeah?
Here we are! See what you can find!
There it is! Now drill that door open!
You know I love safe deposit jobs. And this one sounds sweet...
Coppers incoming everyone, they found you faster that I thought. Take care of them!
The wagons would have had a ladder. Look for it.
Stay focused friends, you've set off the alarm!
Remember guys, we need at least one bag to escape.
Now you gotta clear the runway by opening the gates. The Murkys and Cartel dwankies will go bossies, when they realise what we're doing!
Take those guys in the street out!
Cops are here, hold your ground!
Gang, you see those plates? I don't want to be greedy; or yes I do, actually. Why not stick around just a bit and try that printer out?
I got it? Holy shit, I fucking got it. Ha! Fuck you F.A.A.!!
... additional bags would be nice - but not necessary!
That cannon's not going to fire without some juice.
Look out friends! They have an active weapons turret!
Get another key!
Alex will be seen by that helicopter!
Get those car keys!
Ok guys, I'm here. So we need to wreck these cars, right? Let's drop this sucker in the water. Attach the magnet!
The getaway just left without you.
Okay, it's checking authentication. It might take some time, so keep your eyes on the timer.
We got the pit boss' code. Nice.
Sorry, that wasn't right.
You're all done. Get to the roof and signal the chopper if you're ready to leave!
A fighting retreat back to the van, guys. Let's get out of here.
Get to that pillar - move!

We're going to steal a prototype turret from the Government. Get to the train outside the city, crack it open and get it.
We know the Commissar is around Foggy Bottom. There must be something there that can narrow it down. Maps, files - anything.
There's probably some useful info among these files...
Give him a whack over the head!
That's that sneaky bastard dealt with. Let's finish up fast. He may want more.
Gas, watch out! Wait for it to dissipate!
Get rid of all cops!
Friends, get a saw going through one of the doors on this floor, yeah?
There's a problem with the Beast. Rust said he fixed it! Get some parts and take care of it, yeah?

Great, now get into the vault.
Hurry up and enter the White House!
The safes are loaded but you're not. This makes Vlad sad, and sad Vlad's getting mad!
When you find the code, get back to the keypad and give it a go.

Two minutes!
...I'm 57% sure.
Don't delay, cut him loose!
All right, you're almost on the 22nd. Get going and don't get a nose-bleed up there.
The code should have a three at the beginning.

Press are going to party on this poor guy. Seems the deal went down in public office too!
Yeah I know the way out. I was keeping my eyes open!
Remember, this is a fortified site, expect tough resistance.
Nice work, team - the metal detectors are disabled.
Haul ass to the pyro booth, guys. Top floor.
Okay, let me think... What do we need? Ah, the workshop. Yes. Go to the workshop, you'll find the special tools in some toolboxes.
Grab that ticket at the machine. It'll open the gate.
There's our mark. Go ahead and end him.
You gotta get to Mexico. Hurry.
Domkops! What are they doing?!
OK, now head back to the library. There's a way into the PEOC there, and the keycard will likely come in handy.
Don't screw the pooch again. Go!

Better do what he says.
Buluc is fucking paranoid crazy. Has cameras and microphones in every room, just like you said.
These are the trucks. When you're done searching for clues, get the that GPS on the truck you think is carrying the voting machines to Washington.
... ready up!

I applaud your skills. Punishment came to Ernesto Sosa silently, but with deadly certainty. They will learn to fear The Butcher.
Ouch... let's hope the airbags did their job....
Make sure you protect the pump while it's running!
The thing we're after is in the middle of that floor. Gotta blow a hole in it with some c4 so we can get it out of there, yeah?
About half of it is gone already! Push forward, push upward, you gotta get to that coke!
Cover the doors! Coppers are there!
Arriving in two...
I need a breather. Bain is very heavy, yeah?
Additional snipers are entering the area!
The trucks are here somewhere. Vlad's guys will be too, so watch your fire.
The tech is in our hands! Time to head back to the helicopter! Don't keep Bile waiting.
They're blowing the wall!
Now plant it on the dock gate.

Whew, I'm done. I got what I needed. Take me back to the truck.
Don't throw anymore, it's full. Wait for me to unload these first.

Great, that's enough. Now get in the elevator. You gotta get the hell out of there!
Free every sailor you can.

And stay there, you little shit!
Hilary at Gensec here. Routine check in. Can I have the time lock codes?
Jesus, it looked bad on the news, but...
Don't get distracted, guys. Keep an eye out for... Oooh wait, is that from the First Triumvirate?!

Nicely done, friends. Now, there's a security gate you need to get past before you can reach the vault.
OK, forget about staying low and quiet. Gimme a moment to think of something.
For the sake of a good fuck! You've done this already. Just put paste on the grate!
Jackpot! Rust's info was correct. Now, get through the gate and grab the BCI headset and the software.
Okay, guys, time to hold the fort until Bile returns. Give 'em hell!
Juicy score in the diamond district, people. Ice for everyone.
You! Get a move on!
Great, now see about getting into the building proper.
Great. Poppa Bain will take care of these. Now, return to the key storage room.
Looks like this store is pretty packed with jewels. Everyone getting ready for the holidays I guess. Anyway, I'm looking for at least four bags of jewels.That ought to cover us nicely.

Throw the bags into the barrels!

One minute. Keep your eyes on the skies.
Ok got the callback, everything is clear. Last step. When the timer is done - it's time to cash in.

Go find a blowtorch to cut through that gate so you can reach the blerrie fertilizer!
You know the drill. Watch for guards and cameras. Keep civilians in check. Look around for keycards, and the bank manager - anything that might help.

Another blocker. It's locked down. Get to the main computer in the server room an hack it, yeah?

The scab-faced meth zombies will rue this day.
Another eight and I'm off!
Outstanding! Now, get in the limo and end this. Or grab more loot. Your choice.
There's an unusual lock system for Ernesto Sosa's office, using a spoken pass phrase. But my people have smuggled in a special cocaine package, with a hidden microphone recorder. Find it.
You fuckin' see what they did to Brown?!
Looks like the Commissar has spent a few roubles on those rooms. Smash 'em up! Don't forget to grab any valuables there too.

Good job, Dallas. You still have it in you. Now, throw the loot in the van and let's leave.

Keep the cops off the circuit box. Don't let them shut it down.

When the cage is full, let the balloon up. And watch what happens next.

Go, men - and get me what I want. The night out has just begun!
Look out for snipers!
All C4 in place. Get off of the gate now!

This is it. Commissar's apartment. Get through.
Bile's on his way to you, but he can't land with those trees in the way. Find a saw, and clear a way for him, then mark it with flares.
Those old sewers are a maze. Keep looking for the light, guys. Ignore the stench.

Holy... Have you ever seen anything like it? Get those doors open. Bag it all.

You've found the bomb. No need to keep checking the bomb cases!
It ain't gonna open itself. Use the keycard and code.

Plug the server in and connect the power.
Escape vehicle is leaving in ten minutes.
The boss keeps all the earnings in a safe.

I'll take care of this, just keep watch for Murky chops.
Remember what I said: don't kill the guard. Your nonsense won't trick the Control-Guy again and he'll sound the alarm.
A little free intel from the Dentist - Commissar has a basement safe room. That's where his prize stash will be. And our best chance of tracking that rat. Find it!

Superb. The cash is loaded on pallets, which are secured to the deck. Only the logistics officer can release them, and his controls are up above you - you see? To access them, you must get to the stairs at the front of the aircraft, and then return this way.
They're here.
Start the Beast!
If you hurry outside and clear the square, I've got a little something for you. Time to send in the Beast!
See if you can find the X-ray device we need to get the data. Without it we can't do much.
Be careful around that C4 guys.
And the code is....1138!

Guys! Get to the boat!

He's going for the laundry room. Follow him!
Keep the civilians down!
You heard him. Get the bags onto the ziplines in the shaft. Get them up to Locke.
Into the system. Now just press the button and drop those bollards!

That's one of the external hard drives.
Out, out, out!
Just follow the prisoner's lead, he knows the way!
Then back to the escape van and bang, we're rich! Go with grace.

Looks like we got everything, gang, Your pick-up is on its way.

Nicely done. Leave it to those Overkill dwankies to go over the top with security.
God dammit! Another guy, and this one's watching the server room. I guess you have to take him out as well.

Ok, I'm in. Give me a second.

Alright, you're in. You've got access to the PC of the bloody Director of the fuckin' FB bastard I! Approve the request.
You cleaned the joint out. Now we'll have perfect coverage in the senator's apartment. I'll ensure we get the surveillance equipment in the paintings and set up the trade.
Go to the roof and wait for the "choppa"!
Get hacking those skylight controls and keep the damn cops off.
The plane, friends, the plane!

45 thousand.

Couldn't get a positive ID on who the DNA belongs to, but we got a sample, so that will help. Now, get back to Hoxton.
I know it's not Hollywood glamour, but someone better gets those safes outta there.
That was a fucking great job, friends. It had it all. Excitement, action - like a movie! And best of all, a happy ending.

You have a small army on the - no, wait, you have the Army on its way. The van can't wait. Hustle!

Okay, the alarm has kicked in a secondary lock on the gate - a magnetic seal. You need a terminal to release that. Let me find one.
Your car is here friends! I tried to make sure Vlad's brother-in-law was sober this time, but you know how easy that is, yeah?
Good, you are inside, now, locate the server room.
Niiiiiiice. It's lovely, yeah? Get it going and make sure the kerels don't interfere!
Something happened, seems Matt crashed his car. Keep going and you'll catch up with him!
Keep your eyes open, yes, but especially your ears.

The Elephant briefed you about the Brain-Computer Interface, right? We're after a high-tech headset and a software that allows you to control a drone using your brain. Trust me, I can barely believe it myself. Anyhow, according to Rust, both things are currently being transported on this train.
Good! Get back to the lot, and start some fires!
We might be able to get in by hacking the mainframe and working some of Locke's old magic.
Look for a code that starts with seven.
Aweh! There we go.

Well, it still hasn't exploded, so you can prep the last ingredient.

Great. Now, ready to bail? Just meet our Insider man. She'll show you the way out.
Don't let the federales interrupt the hack.

Good, now hang back while the tanks empty.

The target is spotted. Just need to get you into position and...

Keep an extra eye out for Murkys.
