Vault is opening. Get ready to move!

Now get to the ICU. Find and listen to Dr. Schneider, the patient we're looking for should have blood poisoning and an abnormal heart rate.

Almost there!
I know I'm sounding like a broken record, but don't kill him. You won't be able to trick the Control-Guy again if you try answering the pager.

Good afternoon, ma'am. How can I help you today?
We need to get our hands on the BCI tech, gang. Go forward!
The bags! Remember to watch those money bags!

Great.

OK, the lights in the circuit box corresponds to the tiles. Use them to guide you across. No one can step on a wrong tile or this get's a whole lot messier!
All right now, careful with this. You press the wrong buttons and there's no telling what you might turn into.
...I'm seeing a lot of talk on Murkywater comms, so don't stay long. They might be wanting to join us, and we don't want that, yeah?
That's it! Now make sure you get out of there alive.
Here's an idea. Buluc has a garage full of cars. Maybe you can use one to take out the turret.

Please, leave the charges at the door, my friends.
Hurry! Hurry! To the left!

OK gang, time to find that keycard. Birthday Boy is probably still around, so go find him!
Quickly friends, grab the box.
When the reboot has reached zero it should start the normal timer again.
Bingo! Steel reinforced hatch. I've got an idea. Bile will close on your position. Get ready to fetch your present.

The dropzone will be long gone if you don't hurry. Jump!

Must be that drivers first day. The dumbass stopped for the ambulance! Now it's your turn, gang. Get out there and do your job!
Damn! They must have filled the room with gas the second we entered the lab. Find out where it's dispensed from and shut it off!
That's all we need but feel free to stick around for more.
The Commissar is dug in tight as a tick. This is one of his operations. Wreak havoc. If you can smash this dump up enough, he should give us a call. Then I can trace him.

So the plan is this, drill a hole through the top of the safe, get a garden hose to fill the safe with water and drop some C4 inside. After that you take what's inside the safe and escape. Let's roll.

Get some sentries up.

Speed up!
Halfway there with the painting collection. Now just get the rest and we're home free.
Done. The doors should be open now friends.
Grab those bags, gang, come on!
Gang what's going on? We are not leaving without the briefcase.
Go down to the basement door in the back alley!
There's the thugs. Take 'em down and get to the elves.
I'd appreciate some protection while I work on the door!
A prison? Not my favourite thing...
Quick! Grab the loot.
Was there a radio problem earlier? Need a flare lit, friends, yeah?
Good, now quietly 'persuade' the auctioneer to give you his keycard.
Good. Now get those keys back to Hox.
We're done, now get in there and find those pardons!
Under fire! UNDER FIRE!
Goddamn backstabbers! Make them regret the decision and find the information! Look for safes!
Get ready for the first wave!
LIKE A GLOVE!
Your drill is there. Get it started on that vault.
No time to waste - get through that door!
Not too good breathing that gas, so clear it out, yeah?
That rat must be on the other side of that reinforced door. Our inside man left a batch of C4. Grab it.
Search those boxes. I'm not willing to take any chances on this one.
O kaek, I wasn't counting on that. Never can it be easy.
They say a man must spend time in Purgatory before going to hell.
Hi! Yes, what can I do for you?
There aren't any monsters behind those doors. I promise, yeah?
Move that barrel. Quickly now.
Right, looks like we're going to need the IT guy. Find him, chop chop!
Our Russian friend is somewhere in Shaw, so find a clue for that. Remember, he's in Shaw.
Good job! Throw the coke in the van and get out of there!
That's the first number. Keep looking. Two to go.
Vents! Vents! Check the Vents!
The van won't be able to stay long. You gotta move fast when it arrives!
That reinforced door is heavier than I expected. Must be for the highest level snitches. Alright. Bile's bringing a lance. Stand by.
Hurry up!
Holy shit! Help!
Nice. It's searching the archived emails. Keep the Feds away til it finishes.
The gunship is back. Keep your heads down, gang.
Leave the EMP at the escape area. We don't wanna risk it.
Found that evidence storage room yet?
I have been in the bank one time, a few years ago. The bank manager is an idiot. He keeps his access key in a personal safe, but I don't remember where.
Friends, get that blerrie vehicle out of the way, yeah?
I think they are all dead. Thanks to you, my friends.
Use the zipline to secure the loot.
They pulled the power!
Chopper's on the scene. Get him there. Just pray he doesn't reach for the controls.
Fuck, this is thorough. Whoever is ratting us out... They're close.
Dozer? Hmmm....
OK - looks stable, for now. Add more stuff...
Might want to check out the cafeteria. I can see a PC monitor there.
More cops on the way.
Finally, the saws are done.
Use the saw on that door, get the Captain out!
Move the pieces of the cannon to the pick-up, gang.
What? It stopped on the question marks. That could mean anything.
OK, cops are inbound. First step, look for C4 in the guard room.
Boom! Good! Now, inside. Skop, skiet en boomklim!
You can always rely on the press to swarm on scandal in DC. The weapons deal is the talk of the town. The Elephant and his party are very pleased. Hell of a plan B, folks.
Vlad? What brings you to call me?
Make sure Santa is in the tree before it's airlifted out!
Look for a way to get the code.
Get the Jewelry box!
There's just scraps left now! Even if it's less than I hoped for, it's still extra money, so go for it!
The plane needs juice to fly.
Find that mic recorder, guys.
Your escape helicopter is here. Try and secure the rest, but if you cant I suggest you get the hell out of there!
There's gotta be something behind these shelves.
Put the loot in the Christmas tree!
Welcome back, crew. Now we install the cameras in the pictures, trade them to the senator's guys and get a look on whoever this arms dealer is.
That's the alarm.
Say your prayers and say 'em fast!
Nice and easy. Time for a casual stroll into the bank, yeah?
The alarm. All right. Time for Plan B. No mercy, crew.
They shot the driver! You'll have to continue on foot!
Now burn some rubber!
Hurry up guys, answer the phone!
Now we need those passwords.
Good job. Four bags is good enough to go and do the trade.
Cloakers on the way, sneaky bastards!
The Tiffany Room has more than breakfast it seems. A glowing LCD monitor.
Ok guys, you're in.
There's the briefcase! But you can't drill that gate. See if you can find some thermite.
It will just take a moment, gentlemen. Perhaps use the time to assess your current situation re ammo.
You can finish this now, or you can finish this in style, and empty the place.
The trace is working but I need more time. Get him back on the line. Keep trashing.
Damn, that's a SHIELD! Try and get behind him!
Alright, now throw the bags into the truck. We need at least four bags.
There could be more equipment in the drop outside, friends.
Guys. Answer that intercom when you're ready to bail. Whatever you leave behind, stays behind.
You got the frequency already. Stay focused!
We can try to get him out with an email. Find a compromised computer nearby.
Hold it, hold it - wait til everyone's in the car.
Uh, gang, we have a LOT of firepower rolling your way. You need to get to the van right now!
Make sure you keep the power up.
You probably want to hunker down by the warehouse.
Commissar gets his hands dirty with some nasty stuff, including kidnapping.
You think your Uncle Vlad would leave you there and not have support? Shame on you!
Now do the other one.
I'm back in. *whispers* There is no spoon.
All these dead locos, this is messy!
Public office. Wow, we are in the wrong line of work gentlemen.
Alright, looks like we have... 11... 12 prototypes. See if you can find something around the house that can indicate which is the working one. Then pick it up and get it to me.
Garrett could come back any time, so don't lose track of him.
Find a centrifuge.
Sweet sweet cash! Now bag it!
Gate won't open with you standing on it, genius. Clear the area!
That's 40 thousand, only ten more to go!
Friends, Murkywater operatives are in the area. How did they find us?
This is trouble... I see at least nine guys.
Good, with that guy out of the picture, no more cameras.
Hmm. Looks like one of the boxes we came for is in the archive. No way to get in there on foot, but there's a crane you can use in the central hub area, but you gotta find the right shelf.
Gang, remember: boost the gold out to container 61.
OK friends, get into the vault room by cutting open that teller door with a saw.
OK, there's a clear entrance behind the shrine but we'll need to blow it open.
This is definitely going to make our lives easier when we go in to hit the Democrat's place.
... I'm coming back soon!
Oh no, they sent an attack helicopter!
Look for the armory. Intel says they're holding C4. For "extraordinary cases". Well, this is one of those extraordinary cases.
Slow vaults down there, yeah?
You gotta get the security bars open. Crack open the card reader near it.
Check the trucks for ingredients we can use.
Boris, my driver, will come and pick you guys up.
40 thousand dollars destroyed so far.
Let Bile know you're ready by lighting a flare, yeah!
Power is back! Get back to scanning the test-subjects.
Some nice stuff in those cases. Some knock-offs too. If you're going to snatch it, snatch the real stuff - look for cases with alarms. I'm sure a clever crew like you can figure it out.
He delivered the engine. I'll have my man here inspect it, and if it's the right one we're good to go. So hang tight for a sec.
This district matches with... Hmmm, give me some more time...
...these internet descriptions are iffy at best.
That crate is sealed tight. Maybe there's something you can use nearby to crack it open, yeah?
Ah! Those fucking shit-eating poes are stealing my money. Our money...sorry. Stop them!
Now pick up the drill and the thermite, it's hidden inside the copy machine!
Seriously though, if they got them ray guns, they're coming with me.
Can't believe we're going back to this place.
Son, I'm giving you three minutes to get them to this phone, or I'm booking you for wasting police time.
Guys, get into those cars and find the one with the turret.
Dwankie kerels turned off the power. You gotta get it going again!
Eh, It belonged to old relatives, family heirlooms, you know?
Ah, it's empty! Find another one.
That's The Dentists' loot saved. Bail now, or really show The Grin how we treat Vegas DC-style.
Ten more secs!
Damn it! Looks like we need local access. Most likely one of the staff terminals. Figure out which one. Try 'em all, if you have to.
A great haul, gang. Another top job.
Alright, the parking lot behind the bank is where the pilot is expecting to pick up the cage. Have it ready.
The wheel stopped on... dozer? Be careful guys Im not sure what that means.
Brace for impact!

Excellent. The increased drag will slow the plane and force the pilot to fly lower. As expected. Now, get to the cargo controls. You see them above you? So close, yet so far. The only way to get up there is by the stairs at the front of the plane.
Don't forget the goat in the scaffold.
Nice and quiet! Good job friends!
Take care of the snipers, please!
Keep looking and you'll find it!
Nice, seems the power is back.
Looks like some intel. That'll come in handy.
Check in the employee lunchroom. There's a router there that'll let me unlock the door for you.
OK, now we gotta cut into those boxes the old fashioned way- with a hacking device!
Hey, I'm having trouble with my account on the computer. Do I internet?
You gotta take a look at the security situation, guys.
You get coke into the helicopter, I make you rich. You don't, you make me sad. A sad Vlad... Is bad.
There it is, right ahead. Do your thing, guys, but do it quietly. It goes loud, and I'll have to pull you out fast.
Guys, you still need to secure the EMP at the escape area.
That crowbar will increase our chances of getting additional loot before we leave.
I had a feeling that was the wrong stuff...
The escape van just left. I'll get him to come round for another pass but be ready this time.
Well, if you want your mechandise back you will not interfere with the operation. Old Locke doesn't need any backseat drivers!
I'll keep schtum in here til you're back.
Got an old maat in the FBI who owed me a favor to fix up a laptop for us. Said she would mark it's location on a whiteboard somewhere, so go find it.
There's the ladder, guys. Get up there!
People, I got the pick-up driver right here.
Blerrie, move the van already!
There goes the wall. Now go on in.
The alarm! Stealth is out of the window, gang. But the ship is moving, and she ain't gonna stop now.
Nice. That's the first batch, but we'll need more. Get after the rest.
Alarm boxes identified. Go and disrupt them for me.
What are you waiting for? Pick up the box!
OK, the chopper's coming over the convoy now, we're on a bridge - well done Alex... For once... Hit 'em and finish it. The money's ours no matter what. Get it done.
A beautiful sight, yeah? Never thought I'd be that pleased to see a bunch of papers!
Cops are on their way. Looks like they had a lot of guys in the neighborhood.
You guys all finished? Get down here. Got us a sweet ride!
The bus is all set up to... Well, you worry about sending the signal. Then you'll see.
35 thousand dollars.
We almost had it!

Well done, friends. We pulled the rug from right under Commissioner Garrett and I expect his next few hours won't be very pleasant. Oh, to be there when he goes to his meeting empty-handed, yeah? Bain would be proud. As soon as you get back to the safehouse, Duke should get cracking on examining the Elephant's box. We've got to know how it connects to the one you acquired in Las Vegas, to Bain's grail-dinges and these Kataru chops. Then we plan our next move.
...that's my very best guess.
The cannon is ready, hit that nice shiny button and let's see what it can do!
The Murky resources we're after will be weapons. They could be anywhere so you'll just have to start looking.
Manager's got a black suit, thinning hair. Find him, tie him - that might make him more helpful.
Nice. Now get that evidence to the lab. Any DNA might help us finger this rat.
Uhhh, negative, Broadsword. Roof approach is not good. Over.
Get out! Get the bags before the FBI catches up to us again. I know, they're persistent little bastards, aren't they?
More laser defences. Forget disabling them. Just watch the pattern and be ready to run through.
Guys they are fucking up more intel!
Damn! Someone must have found the body! Take him out before he sounds the alarm!
The EMP is charging again.
I am so glad to hear that!
You gotta blow that door.
Go for it.
It has to be in there somewhere. Check the safes in the back first.
You fellas hit harder than my first wife.
Dear hearts! You see me? Yes, I am here. For sure. I hate to be a bother, but would you mind strapping that lovely money to my helicopter?
You can secure loot through that open window there. Got a guy I trust ready to collect, but only if things are quiet.
Go inside and see if there's a clue to the code anywhere.
That's the guard dealt with. No need to worry about the cameras now.
A police chopper is coming in to drop of sniper on a nearby building.
Damn! The cops have blocked the tracks up ahead, which means you need to be gone before you reach that point. Get the BCI tech and run back to the chopper!
Briefcase with high-temperature thermite paste will be waiting for you here.
Capping that dwankie would feel right good, but we need him alive, so hands off the triggers, yeah?
Goddammit, a laser gate. We've dealt with these before. Just wait for it to flicker off, and then dash through.
First thing to do is find that plane.
You guys ready to become legends?
That's another one.
All right, nice work! Now get to the container. Drop the gas can there.
That's the server room. Get inside and get me connected.
The Beast is at work.
Almost got it. Faster, faster, faster.
Turn on the water again!
Don't just stand around! Get the gate open and secure the BCI tech.
We got a cash situation in this bank. They have missed their delivery to the HQ this week. Don't everyone sigh all at once...
Now there's only one more door between you and the server.
Now use the keycard to get inside the server room. It's on the second floor.
The saw stopped, restart it, yeah?
Okay, trucks are somewhere on this freeway.
Once you're in find the manager's office, find his safe, and clean it out.
God damn it! They locked the containers! Must've been the alarms. Alright, we break through.
Bag those gems.
This is the Storage Room. Check for a keycard. Might be a radio here too.
What happened? Do you read me friends?
OK, that probably does something interesting. Try it.
Like... a glooove...
This is not a good day for Murkywater or the Dentist, yeah?! For sure!
I'm a bit worried our intel on the Murkys is bad.
That laptop had one part of the vault code. There are two more around there somewhere.
Just gotta keep looking until you find the laptop.
Look for Twitch in the alley!
Shoot at the wires to make em snap!
Time to go! Come on!
He was always on the vuvuzela, so my thanks.
Good job. Answer the pager and then hide the body in the dumpster.
Six left!
This tree will fly in the sky. Light a flare on the roof, and Bile will bring in some C4 for you so you can blow the roof open.
There goes the time lock. You're doing great. Try and keep things quiet. Now, the vault has three steps to open it. First is in the bag - just go there and use the fingerprint scanner.
From the crust of the Earth to our bank accounts. Gorgeous.
That's the head of security. Hmm... he's in the garden I think.
Dammit, SWATS have hit the ground floor, coming from the left staircase.
There he is. Locke.
Look for the cell block!
You did it! Now, throw the cocaine in the back and let's head out.
We need to find the Operations Room. That's where we'll find the info we need.
The FBI temp office is across the street. Sneak inside, get me access to their server room and see what other Mendoza info is lying around.
I can't shake 'em!
That's both of the keycards. Alright, get to the vault and get them to work.
This startled the whole town! The cops are locking everything down!
Alright! We stopped the convoy, now get it open and secure the loot!
Just got a message from The Elephant. Your bonus for keeping things clandestine has been dropped off. It's near the escape van.
Hurry now, you gotta follow Bain!
If I can find it, I can show you remotely which workstation you need to access to fix this.
Hope you like being on TV. Buluc records sound and picture in every room in the house. Fucking crazy!
If the van is blocking, move it!
Great. We're connected.
Hang on... oh... they've got additional security blocks here. You gotta find a security switchboard and rewire it.
Go out to the van and pick up the C4. Plant it on the street.
The pick-up truck is gonna be here in a few seconds.
Eleven bags!
Huh. Haven't seen one like that before. Maybe there's a manual in one of the utility closets.
Sending you the lance in the elevator. Get ready for it, guys.
You just triggered the countdown! Find and disable the alarm before it's timer runs out!
Have you taken care of the food yet?
Well, this dump is the perfect place for a rat like the Commissar to hide out.
Still need to disable those security boxes.
If you're done, it's time to go.
Woah, jackpot! We hit 'em good! That truck is out of action. Get to work!
Typical, I'm being locked out of the network. Must be a firewall. See if you can bypass it from another terminal.
Get your thumbs out of your asses and come get me!
You need to get to hacking. Find the server room!
What the hell was that? Did they just blow up another entrance?
It might be worth to check the maintenance tunnels.
See that guitar case over there? That's your gear.
Clock's ticking - just move it along, we don't have all day.
Did you find what we're looking for?
Bain is heading for the roof, try to keep up with him, yeah?
Would you look at that!? We did it, gang. We did it.
About three minutes.
It's all quiet still. Fantastic. Now open the gate.
The hack is almost through...
Good work, now watch 'em overheat. You'll get that system reboot.
Hello? Don't go without me!
Happy birthday. Vault full of freshly loaded safe deposit boxes. Who's in?
You're keeping it quiet. Great. Remember - you need keycards.
Woah, we just lost of whole bucket of lights. Fix the hardware up there.
I love this room. Give your weapons a try in here.
The winch will be there in one minute, friends.
Ok, good. The charging has been restarted.
One of you guys answer the phone and patch me through.
So this means you have to find it. References seem to indicate it's... Connected to a bookshelf. I know, leave it to a politician to be cliche.
You found it! Time to bring some trees down!
Okay, you're good to go. Start the hack.
Look for the lead scientist and get him to the security door.
Be on the lookout if one the saws jam or something. We need to get this done quick.
Great! That's the door open! Only thing left is disabling the lasers.
Our driver has pulled the ambulance over and ran for it. And here comes the target, right on schedule...
Not like this, not like this!
Like... a glove.
Alright. The code. Well, my first thought is that it is probably on someone's email. Find a terminal and get in.
Good. Now keep the cops off of it.
Ok guys. Busting cars I hear. Attach the magnet - this one's going for a swim!
That's the last one for Hector, well done. Up to you boys if you want to get more or pull out.
Now swipe the card on the panel in the other control room. Get that gate open.
Better get moving boys, the longer it takes the more cops are going to show up!
Why isn't that chopper on any flight plans?
Oh, yeah, right, sure. Alright, well, have him check in when he can.
Hook me into the reception computer so that I can see where the doctors are keeping our target.
And boom! They're not using that skywalk.
Ok now, which transport is he in? Saw them all open and find out!
Damn cops are trying to cut power to the router boxes! Stop them!
You're close to the FBI boss. Keep your finger off the trigger, we may need him alive.
Yeah get these fucking chains off man!
They might be onto us, so don't take too long.
Find those fucking bundles, will you? Analysis of trajectory indicates...they must be fucking close!
Friends, hook me up to the mainframe, hurry!
OK, he's refueling now. I've told him to hurry but...
Your instincts are correct my friend. You'll have to take him out.
Almost there, guys!
Is the pickup coming? This is getting pretty hot!
We came, we saw, we kicked their ass!
... you should see me coming any second!
That vault is a thing of beauty, yeah?
Get cracking. Penetrate the fort.
The weapon will not fire until you replace the empty power cells.
SWAT! I knew it was too easy!
The chopper is ready to leave!
The key is not going to work any longer, you gotta use a drill, friends.
We got regular cops and SWATS on the scene.
That's the last closet. Get it open. Keep it quiet.
Get away from the gate! Fast!
Which way does this GPS go? Is Texas north or south? I think I'm on the right street.
Time to get you out of there. Grab whatever loot you can on the way out.
Hey! I'm getting peppered over here! As long as the snipers are breathing, I can't get close enough to make the drop!
Light that flare, gang. Bile needs to drop off the winch.
Someone tried to take a goat. Make special pet, yeah? Like Igor the Serb and his "special" pets. "Special". Get into that apartment and rescue it.
That winch has stopped working. See if you can fix it!
Look for numbers in connection with Crimenet.
Good job, now we need some more on the fourth floor and the roof.
The wheel has decided, looks like we have some more snipers incoming.
Achhh! The paw-paw courier forgot the winch! I'll have to get one to you by train. Keep looking up, yeah?
Great, you found the laptop.
What the hell are you two all dressed up for, is it halloween?
See if you can find some batteries to power it, then set them up, yeah?
Ah! That fucker owed me $20. Ah well.
Hose has been disconnected.
Nicely done. Now we gotta find out where Bain is being held. Make your way to the cell block.
That's the cutter done. Let the money rain down!
Guys, Fedor is waiting over at the lake. It's time to leave.
Pop the flare so we can bring the chopper in.
Haha! That should rustle Garrett's nerves a bit for when he goes to meet the Kataru empty-handed. Now secure the box and get out of there.
Gotta move fast, friends. Murky are going to come down on you hard soon.
Ok, you'll have to open that safe now!
About another three minutes. Over.
Find Sosa's head of security - he'll have a USB stick with security codes. He's a man of habit - always wears a green jacket.
I know that crest! it belonged to the Romanov dynasty, for sure!
Capitol Hill Candy!
I'm here!
No, something is wrong... now you gotta wait until the reaction dies down and start again, yeah?
Hey, it's Mitchell, over at Keel Street. The pipes, you know? The ones you "fixed"? Yeah, they're leaking again!
That seems to be a keycard, we can probably use that later.
The bus blew up! Be careful and stay out of that fire!
Damn, BFD lost power. Damn cops... reconnect the sockets.

I couldn't locate the right truck through the shipping data you uploaded, so we won't be able to intercept those voting machines. However, we can still keep the Elephant sweet. There's a bank next to the polling place. We're going to hit it. Except we're not, not really, 'cos you're real goal is hitting the server with the polling results next door. Hit the bank, open the vault, all that stuff, but remember that the real objective is fucking up that polling place.
They just blew a hole in the wall! Hold them back!
What are you guys doing down there? Look for the light.
It's a beautiful building. Serene. Try and keep it that way.
Got the code. Get back to the vault.
Turn off Garrett's lights, friends.
That's the alarm. No more tip-toeing, gang. It's all about speed and violence now.
Right panel's activated. Now get the other keycard, and let's get the second panel done.
You need to get inside.
Now enter the password.
Brown's computer should be nearby.
Two bags. It's all gravy from here. Don't stop.
Add hydrogen chloride to continue the process!
Crew! Don't lose focus. We're here for cash, and it's there for you.
They put sprinklers on! The fire went out!
Right. He got called in to a meeting with a big account. He's doing a great job.
Garrett is old school... sticks to what he knows. Things like history.
Look for something to do with history.
You got the whole database. Great work. Absolute badasses!
Two ways to go about this, gentlemen. Go loud - you know how to do that. But if you're hoping to raise your game, look for two keycards and unlock the vault. Car trunks are a good place to look.
Can you page Miss Pizakuick? First name Ayneeda?
That's one. Remember the number AND the color.
Keep those Murkys away from us!
You're going to need two key cards to get in there.
Looks like the Feds got a better budget this year. That's a new model K, no way to get in quietly without the code.
Guys, three bags should be enough to do the trade.
The codex will help tell you the proper symbols and in which order they need entering.
Damn, he hung up. Somewhere in the city. Keep breaking.
Damn it! They've spotted you!
Ok gang, looks like we're going after some diamonds.
You've got to find the evidence storage!
Friends, get the chain from the truck and attach it to the teller window!
Something there. Right outside the Glitter Room.
Find those valves. We need the sprinklers working.
... now you're just showing off!
You have to get off the gate before it will open. Health and safety bullshit!
Hold on guys, I'll send some C4...
Look at the crowd. Insane. Right, focus on the job, and let's give them a show.
Fuck, fuck, fuck! There's more of 'em!
It's a good thing you took all the money before the explosion.
Domkops! Get indoors!
This is going to be a profitable run.
Gang, you need to protect the EMP while it charges! Prepare to fight!
Kerels got to the IT guy, get in there and stop them!
Get down to the basement guys!
Nicely done, friends. That's what we're looking for.
Fire's out. And people think all we do is cause chaos!
There's got to be something here that can breach the cell block door!
Those doors. You gotta get them open for sure, because the vault's behind them.
Now use the print to open the safe and get the key.
We need muriatic acid!
What's wrong with you? You have the frequencies!
He's here, throw in the stuff!
You've seen that model before. Hard to break.
There's not much left now... If you just hurry up you might make a few extra grand.
Great. Now crack those trucks open. Let's see what Vlad was shipping.
That was an empty cell. Try again.
Great. There's no shortage of buyers for these military rounds.
The van is right across the street.
All right. More C4. Almost got all we need now. Keep looking.
You got everything. Time to go home.
Looks like stealth is off, get ready for a fight.
OK! We got some real scandal stuff here. He sold government arms to a rogue state - got paid in gold. The Democrats aint gonna like this.
...you'll find it in a trash container by the parking lot, friends.
Ok guys, time to get out. Leave the tower and move along the bridge.
Move the gold onto the truck! The crane can do it.
You'll need something special for that door. Go check the armory!
That's one taken care of. Time to do the next.
Keep your head down and avoid the cameras.
You've got to keep at least 8 bags!
Time to use the keycard you picked up. Have your gun ready and take out anyone on the other side of that door.
Excellent work, gang! Absolutely amazing. But now you need to get out of there before the place collapses.
Gang, the EMP needs to charge up before we can use it. It will take some time.
Get him!
I think you're going to find the vault on the other side of those doors.
Find the manhole out in the parking lot. You're going subterranean.
The wheel stopped. Get ready for another bulldozer guys!
I found something for you to use.
Fuck, this is gonna be tricky... Yeah, you can't do it yourselves. Take me to the garage where I can take a bike apart to collect some special shit for this babe.
Part of Vlad thinks it would be fun just to burn the whole place down, but with my luck, this asshole would just get away.
Oh blerrie hell. We don't have time for this. Fine, take his crappy car then.
If we have time, I'm going to... appreciate... some of the artwork in there!
Ok, hold on for a while.
Make the Commissioner's mood darker than it already is. Ha, Locke is no joker, eh?
You need to use the thermite to get past that security gate.
Get to the chopper!
We've breached the fortress! Get inside!
Restart the drill, yeah?
I can't believe I hired you again, Alex...
That's it. Ahhhhh, almost tempted. To see two suns in the sunset. (sighs) Zavorazhivayushiy.
Watch out friends!
They weren't expecting that! Now, time to find that Russian rat.
I'm losing control!
Now subdue the auctioneer so you can get his keycard.
Don't run away again, little goat.
The mechanic said he needed a gas tank and exhaust pipes from the workshop.
Hear that noise? Some C4 just dropped through the roof. Go pick it up and stick it to the vault.
This area is usually full of spoiled, rich movie stars buying useless junk.
There, friends. I've got access but it will take a bit of time for me to get through.
Almost there guys, forty-five thousand.
You gotta restart the hack!
This is going rather well so far, if old Locke says so himself!
What're you now, fuckin' Milton?
Now keep moving. And as much as you hate this, this is still a real thing. You get discovered you'll trigger the alarm.
Blueprints show a power box on the upper floor. Get to it and cut the power.
Ok, he's off... now follow him through the laundry room!
Good friends, now just add one more ingredient, yeah?
You just gotta turn everything upside-down, friends!
I don't know how the bikers know we're coming but they do. Maybe all that meth they're doing gives them a sixth sense...
I have been in the bank one time, a few years ago. The bank manager is an idiot. He keeps his access key in a personal safe, but I don't actually remember where.
Go, guys. Dont lose the scent!
That won't do, everything is encrypted. We need more codes!
Now keep the kerels away while he does his job!
Just wait and see guys, this is gonna be great.
Get those chains off!
Guys, find something we can use on those bars. Something that doesn't give off too much noise.
OK, you found it. Now, open up that safe.
If guests get in the way, shoot them too.
A keycard, but no damn good right now. Alarm's been sounded. Stay focused on the task.
You'll need some kind of explosive accelerant. Mulching fertilizer, diesel fuel... maybe these people even have some C4 laying around. See what you can dig up.
Oh man, the pilot just went down again. Wake that old wino up!
One more minute, then I got to scram!
Too many bullets flyin' here! Get the hostage to the room in the back.
Shit. Just... shit.
They got Eddie! You'll have to continue on foot.
First thing to do is find that plane. Start by looking in the hangars.
Excellent, gang. Now, just plant some more on the fourth floor and the roof.
They're blowing the doors off the railcars. You're going to be exposed to sniper fire in there, so be careful.
Keycard. Great. You need to use it on the vault, but that's only half of it. Swipe it, and then hunt down the second card.
Docks are right there. Head in. And watch for guards.
The black cat ate its own balls.
Go find the bank manager. We'll need that keycard off him.
Time to make some explosives! Get all the items together so you can arm the device.
OK, friends not much time until the coppers get there. Go have a look inside the bank.
I can't take the snipers out! Help me, yes?
...I'm 72% sure.
There's the C4, gang. Someone grab it.
You gotta help Charon! Clear the street!
The plane has the parking lot locked in for the pick-up. Get that area ready.
Get some fake sentry guns up and running. It'll buy us some time and keep people in place.
Confirmed! I'm coming in at dock seven!
Come on guys, arm the explosives!

The Teuer dealership is one of the few East Coast showrooms that sells Falcogini cars. They just got the hot new model in - the La Troienne. I got some people overseas who are willing to pay big for this little beauty. Get in there, get to the wheels and get them out. Simple, right?
Alright, we got spotted by the cameras. We got to go to plan B.
That's one of the keycards for the vault, but you need another. Keep looking.
You've got to keep at least 6 bags!
The artifact... it's why we're here.
Sending the van your way. Twitch will come from the upper bridge side.
It's a quiet neighborhood. You'll be fine. I'll be right back.
We need to lower those bollards. Find the control room. Gotta be one of these doors.
I don't think this trash can has been emptied since Bush was in power. Bush senior!
Come on come on, we can do better!
Sure there must be loot all over this place. Search the rooms if you fancy a few extra Benjamins.
Ah! Yes. The vault is opening again! Good!
We don't want them stopping us from getting the intel before we get it. Find the safe, it's probably there.
Remember, check the Murkywater shipping containers for the vault.
Remember. Go in, get the tiara, hit the store for more jewels if you feel lucky - the place is loaded. But watch out for guards, cameras, metal detectors.
Follow Bile! Remember to bring the prisoner with you! And keep him alive!
You'll have your winch in about a minute, yeah?
Don't forget Charon's briefcase!
One minute. Hey, move your ass.
Okay, blimp is lowering her to you. BFD. Look at that beauty.
The kerels have stopped the drill!
Guys! The van!
Keep the coppers away from the servers, yeah?
Sorry, is the floor wet? You piss in your panties, little baby?
How about that escape? Is your driver coming?
See if you can find some fertilizer in the cellar. Would be a good place for them to keep it.
Be careful! They have snipers incoming!
Great! He should be back gambling in no time. Wait for him to take a sip, let nature do its thing. When he dashes off to the crapper, follow him and get that card.
...The hook needs to go on the vault, yeah?
Was hoping we'd do this without police for once.
I guess a neighbour saw something. We got cops on the way to check things out.
It's trying to auto-update! Stop it, friends!
...Remember to take the boxes from the conveyor on the loading dock, yeah?
That damn barrier is preventing the drill from coming down. Get to security and open it.
Any loot you want to take back needs to be secured.
The drill is in the copy machine here, but hopefully we won't need it. Just remember, though...if we should.
We need Ralph Garnet's keycard. Find him!
That entrance looks tough. Can you get around it?
Opening the vault needs a three digit code. Each digit is held by a manager, and each is in a computer briefcase. We need that code. Find them.
Hold on until he's in the tree!
You can't let them kill the power, it'll slow everything down!
The gold is inside the safe. No time to waste now. Set up the drill and drill it open.
Two minutes until the customer is on the scene.
Get to the van!
Ok, so maybe blending in isn't our style. Sending the helicopter now!
Locke is gone, that backstabber, but we'll get him for this later. Mark my words.
He's heavier than I thought! Now, let's go!
Good, now locate that laptop and get hacking.
Cops are closing in on the arena. Stay on your toes, this will get hairy.
Not the tree! Stop shooting at it!
Move the van, you chops!
Guys, you better tell my brother-in-law to step on it!
They are cutting off the road! Shit, not sure if the plane is gonna be able to land.
And how much will it cost you? Shall we say... 18 bucks?
Hey! Gang, we can't lift the container while you're inside.
The chopper is coming at the antenna!
I can't wait to see what these shady assholes were hiding on that server.
Vault's opening. Get in there! Bag that cash!
Excellent. Just the fifth floor and the roof left. Get going, guys.
OK guys, get inside and locate the art. We want the paintings with the red stickers on. Look out for guards and cameras.
Another door. Watch the guards and cameras, gang...
When you want Bile to land, set up a flare!
I'll feed you to my rottweilers. Dog food, is what you are.
The code begins with a seven, according to my source.
You're going to have DC's finest crawling up your ass. Cops on the scene.
Get the keycard from the auctioneer.
Get out there and take the AA guns offline!
The gold is inside the safe. Drill it open!
That's a sweet pile of counterfeit cash. Beautiful. Grab it. And if you fancy a little more...
Set out a smoke signal for the pilot to zero in on!
Head back to the skylight where you came in and bring the box.
You got spotted! Keep your eyes open for kerels!
Okay, what's next...
Sorry, friends. Looks like we didn't get you in clean. The place is on alert and locked down.
All right, bridge is turning back. Gonna take a few minutes though. Hold off the cops, gang!
I'm almost there, gang. He's gotta be close to the centre. Could be... Damn, still too vague. Keep going.
It's open... No cash... Hit the deposit boxes...
OK, first you gotta get to the Oval Office in the West Wing.
Now go deal with obstruction to the yard over there. You're getting out that way.
Hit the roof, gang!
Alright, I have an idea. I want you to hack into anything you can find connected down there. If I can get access to their databases, I might be able to find where our truck is headed.
The area isn't too big. You should be able to move around and search all corners of the whole train yard.
Damn it! Plan B, just find that server room!
Keep it under control.
You have 30 seconds to get your ass on that chopper.
Dammit, the cops disabled the hacking device! You need to reboot it!
There you go! Now get those gems!
Two minutes, guys.
Should have been soda.
Get going friends, the place is going to be crawling with kerels soon.
That's all the C4 we need.
Found any new power cells?
Your first job is getting into the depot. Scout the area, check for cameras and guards. Keep it quiet.
Just raise the balloon when you're done, groovers!
Start carrying all the loot out to the car so Mr. Blonde can get away with it.
Ah, blerrie! No time to stay around... just get out of there, friends!
All right, snatch up those winch parts.
Five
Get that gold wrapped up!
Friends, there must be a server room around there. Find it and we can open that gate.
Kerels and Murky are attempting to stop the weapon.
Just 30 seconds to pickup!
Friends, you should pile all your loot somewhere close, so that you can move it later, yeah?
Quickly now, get inside the airlock!
Now, just have a go at those logistics controls. It's a simple job. Even a retarded samango could do it. And sometimes they do, the little shits.
I gotta admit it's been awhile since I broke into a place this loudly. It's gonna be jol!
Get on the helicopter now, time to go!
Remember, don't put on the mask. Case the place first.
Hell, that's a sight! "BFD". Or "Big Funky Drill.".
Ah, I'm sure the airbag will save him.
Got him! Foggy Bottom!
Bain, you're not gonna dies, yeah? You gotta set us straight on this Kataru business!
Alright, get ready! Get me the required amount of bags and I'll meet you at the safe house.
Yep. Yeah. Alright, that checks out. Have a good day.
Guys! Expecting delivery at dock seven!
Chavez has a panic room filled with cash and we're gonna steal the whole room. Yes, you heard me correctly.
If you're low on Doctor Bags, you should consider getting that Infirmary open.
OK, where haven't you looked yet?
Oh blerrie hell. Find the keys to his car then! Let's just hope that pile of junk even starts!
You just keep it up. This is text book stuff.

Ahhh! There's a valuable prototype in that vault. It's in one of the crates, and not in the others. Open them to find it.
We need hydrogen chloride!
We need his phone, his tablet, his laptop and two external hard drives.
That was an epic ass-kicking you just handed out, and you got the whole database. Let's hope I can find what we need to make the blood you spilt worth it.
Not much time people! Get those bags secured before the cops take 'em. The boat pick-up is coming.
Keep defending Hoxton! If things are getting hairy, use cards to override the security barriers.

Three left!
Still no alarms. Now get on the ship.
Find the gear Micho planted somewhere. Look for a guitar case.
Alright. Put the call through. Let me talk to the Feds.
Not getting in that way, yeah? There's scaffolding on the outside. Should be a door on the 2nd floor you can hack through with a saw.
Don't go letting the cops mess with the elves.
Get out of that damn lobby!
Haha, it worked! The guards in security are sleeping like babies. Don't worry about cameras now.
ASIM - Check! We're on a roll!
So, the money is falling, for you. Good. Now, grab yourselves some parachutes and join it. Come on, my little angels.
Nice night for a jol in the desert. Try to stay quiet.
You swept that bus clean of Mendozas. A true Viking funeral in flames with their possessions and all.
Get inside - we need those cooks.
We're short on product so for now I think we're best keeping Hector in the dark. Maybe we can solve the issue another way.
Get those screws off that thing.
Yeah, that's small army of police cars on our fucking tail!
I just saw Ralph, go get him!

Ensure all of the straps are secure. Don't give Locke an excuse to accidentally drop the money.
You're in trouble gang, Locke sold us out. You're going to have to fight your way out of there.
Just sneak through. Head downstairs to the garage.
Find our Insider. She'll show you out.
Great. Now haul it back up to the Operations Room.
We have half of needed fuel.
They tied him down. We'll need to cut him loose.
Yo! Help!
You still gotta hack into those access points.
Nice, just like in one of those old black-and-white movies, yeah?
An old... friend of mine in the FBI owed me a favor, so I got her to set up a laptop for us. She was going to hide its location on a whiteboard somewhere around there.
Time to start looking for that stash of Murky loot. It's drugs we're after.
Good job. More cash is always welcome. Now, run back to the helicopter and get out of there.
Just give me...
Once we party at my Tasteful club - big money, big times. Now we need to make big take from there.
Go on, connect those wires!
Right, now just let it fill up.
If he's not in a cell, he might be in an interrogation room.
That's a nice haul of trick or treat goodies. Come home, gang, let's share it out!

Now grab as much of Vlad's merchandise as you can carry and get it out to the van!
Was afraid of that. We didn't get in clean. The place is going into lockdown.
There's a good chance there's a security camera in there. Keep an eye out.
Cops have messed with the time lock. Restart it.
That terminal will drop the bollards. Hack it.
This job is important. The safes in those trucks, you need to get them out...uh, safely. You hear?
Great. Now get the stuff. As much as you can, but at least a few bags.
Good. We're done with the fourth floor.
We're not going to be stopped by a gate now. Get it open!
Okay, both holes are drilled.
You have to find the whiteboard while we still have time, friends.
The escape will be there in seven minutes.
Ach, you gotta get into that thing somehow. Wasn't really prepared for that.
Out of my way! Hiyaaaaa!

Inside that door you should find the safe.

Get those things onto the plane, chop chop!
Captain Smith, congratulations on your promotion. I'm sure you're grateful.
The police shut of the main water pipe. You gotta get it running again!

Let's get the goats in here.

No time to brew coffee for that pissed old fart. Keep him safe. I'm sending an extraction now.
Alright gentlemen! It's time to get the hell out of there!
There's a garbage truck waiting in the basement garage. Get down there and stash the loot there, quick!
Don't make plans for that cash just yet. Remember we need to get it to the blackmailing asshole first. Don't worry, we'll find him.
Well done gentlemen! Some hard-earned cash!
Get my cocaine!
The vault with the artifact is behind these doors. You gotta get them open, friends.
Outstanding, guys, we're in! Help yourselves, give nothing back. Remember, our goal is the Dentists' loot.
One
Here I come. Hot fucking diggity fellas, you have a lot of pigs headed your way!
As the lady said, get searching these terminals I marked. One of them is bound to have the code we need.
This shouldn't take long, hold your ground.
Forget the alarms, gang, we're nearly done. Grab The Dentist's loot, and get it out of there.
What are you waiting for? Get that keycard into the panel.
This crate needs to be opened with a tool as well.
My brother-in-law crashed his plane in the woods. Get him back here.
It's like talking to a fucking Frenchman. Listen. If you want to use the service ladder in the diner, you need the keycard. Mon dieu!
Helicopter is waiting.
Gang, put those fires out. Don't want to risk him escaping in the chaos.
Guys, it feels like something's in the air... Money!
These Federal Kerels have got more interesting things than donuts and pie lying around- things we could get a pretty penny for to keep us going, so if you see something nice, go ahead and rop it.
You need to shut off the lights, friends.
The wheel stopped on sniper. I'm not sure what that means...
Hook me up to a phone somewhere and I'll see about getting the dear Commissioner out of his office.
Check to make sure you get the right key!
Look like Bain still has some strength, taking out that Murky. You'll need to drill through the door to get his keychain.
What are you waiting for? That switch isn't gonna pull itself.
Can't do anything until you help me through.
They pulled the power, get it back on!
Hector's worried. We're too far away from the coke in this chopper. Once you're on the ground, get the coke, signal the courier and load it onto the pick-up boat.
The van will be there in about two minutes.
Just one more now.
Now move into the office, but stay quiet.
Get that red diamond and this'll be a double payday.
Hey they might be workers but they're not dumb and blind - keep your profile low.
This heist will go down in legend. I'm already writing the wiki entry. It starts with 'Holy crap!'
No, loitering friends. Take them all!
Last gate! Get your tools on it and get it open!
That's perfect. The cage is assembled. Now load it, so we can get the money out of here.
There's the "toyshop" right ahead.
Nicely done, guys. Locke transferred our cut. I don't know about this guy, yet, but let's see how things pan out with him.
No, there's something wrong with this one, heading back to pick up another one...
That's... A lot of money. I guess we're in the meth trade now. We really needed that information, though. Remember? Saddle up and let's get those pricks - with or without the information.
Great, you're in. One more door between us and the server.
All right. Armory uses a three digit code. Look for it in the casino. Numbers and colors. Or you can gamble on guessing.
You need to draw some blood from the patient.
Don't shoot that cop! It's three against one. Intimidate him to work for us instead.
Bain, you chop... don't you dare die...
The vault's not going to open itself...
The domkops are trying to get off cheapsies with that offer, yeah? We can get more if we just don't give up.
Great! Now get it working on those trees!
Good luck on your treasure hunt, guys. And remember, keep it quiet.
Once you're in, find the crates and destroy them or bring them back. You want to do more, be my guest.
OK, listen up, a contact will get you out through a nearby subway station.
My friends! My pleasure!
Keep an eye on that saw until it's done.

OK folks, my inside man stashed the thermal drill you're gonna need for the vault around the back. recon the spot to find it. Make your move on the vault when you're ready. This job, It's gonna be golden.
You let them take the hostage, you chops! It's over, we gotta get you out of there.
Gang, there's a construction yard across the river! Got a truck parked up. Reckon it's our best way out. Sending you C4 now. Protect the safes!
Okay, here it is.
The maintenance tunnels could have what you're looking for. Search it.
There you go, now find that laptop and hack it.
Get it right. Push it!
Don't worry, I've got a driver standing by. He'll come and pick you up. Eddie, get cracking, you need to pick the Payday Gang up!
You still need to bring the drill inside, yeah?
Ah, blerrie. Of course it had to have a keylock. Maybe you can find some way to figure out the code in the clubhouse briefing room. Go have a look, yeah?
Get it open!
Reckon that thermite is half-done. Just keep the pigs away.
That will probably come in handy later.
Well, I'll be damned, you found a blowtorch. Now we can burn our way through the door.
OK, I'm in. I'll get the lab door open in no time.
I can't pick you up with all these cops around here. You need to clear the area.
Okay, lining up on the road. Gonna drop the cage there.
The mainframe. Patch me into it.
You gotta get that blocker placed.
Looks like an entry in the wall behind the shrine, but you'll have to blow open a hole. Time for a home-brew explosive!
30 seconds until the train arrives, friends.

Ah, its stuck. Cant get to it. Shoot the wires!
Take care of that security system or you won't be able to get past.
Okay, but how did it....?
Stop wasting time, yeah? You're risking the job!

One of Gage's guys is in a nearby parking lot. You can toss loot over the wall to him.
Fuuuuuuuuuck!
You gotta go back and search the mainframe again.
The wagons on the train might be loaded. And might have loot. Check 'em out?

Playing it cool. They haven't made you yet.
That was one messed up job.
Half the fucking police force is on our ass!
The Murkies are headed towards you. Lock and load.
Watch your heads, guys. Ass bombs aren't the only thing dropping into here.
Don't let them destroy any intel. Get it all!

A contact of mine has stashed a few body bags nearby if you need more.
Looks ready, now all you gotta do it let it work some dissolving magic on the door, yeah?
Should be something just by the Velvet Room. There's a monitor on.

Great job keeping it quiet everyone. Almost worth shouting from the rooftops.
Ok guys. Get the crane to move the containers as we practiced.
Hurry, get out of the PEOC!
Nice. Now go get that guest list from reception.

You done? Good. Put on your mask now.
I think there's a computer in Sales. Go take a look.
Maybe there's a utility closet or something nearby with a toolbox you can use. Go have a look.

Some more cops have been called in. Be prepared!
Just send the balloon when you're ready, buddies.
Encryption download is complete.
Remember, we are doing this silent. If the alarm goes off we're screwed.
Mitchell's over by the pool.
Ok, here comes the second wave!
Please, everyone into the airlock. The doors are designed so that the inner cannot open until the outer is closed.
Very good, a silent kill. This is what happens to those who cross me.
We got a tail - and they're getting closer!
I'm connected.
Good. Now use the other keycard on the panel in the other control room.
Damn, looks like the only thing that will work now is the master code. Let me see if I can find out who has it.

You need to secure the loot at the positions I've marked.
IRS making shady deals with the big corporations. Niiice, I feel like Robin Hood.

Oh, put some sleeping gas in there too. Don't leave it behind.

Great. Now, grab the loot. Let's finish this caper quiet like.

25 thousand, halfway guys.

Clearance required.

OK, OK, I'm done with the security hack, everything's unlocked.
Wish we had a better idea of exactly what we're looking for.
Come on, jump down into the vault!

Stop messing around and get on board.
Take a look around and see if you can find a clue on how to crack that code. Check the workstations.

I got Vlad on the line.
What sort of noise?

The helicopter is coming. Just hold on a little longer!

Signal the blimp with the fireworks. Let's give the good folks of Vegas a show to remember.

Start hacking, friends.
No need to wait. Get it done, yeah?

It would give me a lot of pleasure to assist you.

Let me remind you. Look for a keycard if you want to get access to the roofs. Kak...

Put in on the floor!

Hmm... not sure where this entrance is exactly, but if you poke around a bit, maybe you can find it.

We got eight!

Gensec are a big security company on the East Coast. Got a great reputation with the banks and politicians, but today we're going to see what we can do about that. Got a tip-off about a convoy coming into the city. We're going after it.

Stick a blocker on the keypad to stop the code cycle.

That wasn't right. You need to try a different combination, yeah?
Leaving in ten!
All right, you're past the point of no return. ... Run! Run! Don't look back!
Reactivate the terminal. Let's get this finished.
Cops shut of the power, go to the box in the street .
Look around the wine cellar for the fertilizer.
Every second counts, gang! Get to that coke while there's still some left!
You cooking pork chop sandwiches? Put out the fire. (quietly in the background) I'm a computer.
And there's the countdown. Now, find the alarm! Disable it before it kicks in.
Watch out, the bags are getting hot!
Get the winch hooked to BFD, gang.
More screws to unscrew.
It's supposed to be muriatic acid!
You might be having a few more kerels coming soon, friends.
...I'm 79% sure.
They're flooding the vault with gas! It never goes smoothly, yeah? You'll have to wait until it's clear.
You know what to do with that!
Now wait for the cell to open.
Was that the cable?
It has to be there, the tiara is there somewhere.
Collect the ticket. Open the gate.
... be ready!
You need to find the right storage unit!
Hold your ground until the helicopter arrives!
Oh. The best room in the safe house. The vault.
I'm going to need some time to do this, yeah?
This floor should have an accessible door... if you use a saw, yeah?
Hey fuckers, I got cops on my ass. I'm hit. What the fuck was that back there?
There goes one of the bags!
We arrived in this piece of junk, but we're gonna leave in style.
I'm not 100% but I think it is hydrogen chloride now. Yep, should be.
That's it, fine work. The escape is ready for you. Unless you want to stick around and clean out the vault. Either way the vehicle's waiting.
And....ta-da!
Got a lot of cops on my payroll. They'll fuck you, and I will walk out a hero.
Cameras will set of the mines, guys! Stay away!
... just chill!
Hang on just a little longer.
SWAT coming in! They were nearby. Wonder if they were already ready to hit him.
Did you check the boxes?
Find the server room. From there we should be able to open the lab door.
This maniacs' lair must be up ahead.
I liked that guy. We'll send his wife a ham. Yeah, for sure.
Pilot is on the scene with the lance. Go get it.
What are you waiting for? Get to the cell blocks!
Bring him to the roof and put him on the chopper. I'll get him to sing.
The forest is dark and spooky tonight, gang. Let's cook a little meth.
You need to find the computer and upload the GPS coordinates to the ship.
No more quiet. Time to rock out!
The CFO thinks he's clever and that he can get away, but I see him.
Explosives are placed. Gensec transports on approach. Almost there...
Damn! Alright, I'm sending the drill. You'll have to open each vault til you find the turret.
Heh, it's almost exactly the same as the other. Well, it's what we came for so take it and keep going.
Good find. This keycard will get you into the railcars.
Remember to go grab the thermal drill.
That's great. Now just hold on and wait for Bile.
Excellent. Now if you would be so kind as to deposit the charges near the door.
Not a cop in sight. That was total control. I'll call Vlad now and tell him the good news.
That codex! Those symbols... that's how we get the Mayan door to open, yeah? Look around for more clues!
Get into the house and see if you can find Hector's cooks.
You going to keep this up all day?
It saddens me to see such beautiful hardware reduced to ruins, but it is a necessary evil. Now, our clean escape is assured!
Get outside, friends! No standing about!
Ok, I've got it. Just need a little while.
There's a computer by the reception. Use it to open me an access point so I can locate the patient.
The inner complex is nothing to be scared of.
We want to get away cleanly so these must be destroyed. I can leave that to you, yes?

Got a line on a recent drop of hard currency. It's tucked away in the vault of a branch of Roberts bank. It's a quiet area. Nothing happens here, so they won't be expecting a hit. Let's punish that complacency.
...I'm 93% sure.
There's the dockyard, right ahead. Get inside. Watch the security though.
Yeah, that's the one we're looking for.
We're gonna fucking crash!
You need to get some explosives onto the gate.
Nice work! Now it's time to get out of there before the place falls over. Let's go!
They're on us like fucking flies on a turd!
Remember Charon, guys! Don't leave him behind!
Tin Boy's got a snow-white soul! Hahaha!
Get those arcane dingeses onto the helicopter!
That's one, find the next!
More snipers! Take 'em out!
Got our seven bucks back, gang. Stretch goals are good.
Look for the office, guys - it's on the second floor.
You need to go to the West Wing, that's where the Oval Office is. Find the access point.
Keep the civilians in check!

Nice work, friends. Those brandy-snifting poshies got what they deserved, yeah? Now let's see what we can do with that artifact. Duke will get to looking at it as soon as you get back to the safehouse. It's probably going to answer a lot of questions.
Good thing you found that blueprint. That's the vault.
Get inside.
Blerrie! Go back and redo the hack.
Garrett's office, yeah?
Next, the vault door. It's accessed by two keycard terminals. Swipe them both ASAP. Got it? Now find two keycards.
Nice! All right, great.
That was very impressive. And you probably saved my life. I owe you one for this.
Nothing I like seeing more than cheap foreign cars going up in smoke.
That's good enough for the roof.
The EMP is heavy and my fuel is limited. I need to drop it soon!
Garrett's not going to be gone forever, so get to finding those boxes.
Too much heat around here. I'm gonna have to fall back.
The enemies fiddled with the drill. Fix it, friends!
Stay with whoever is carrying the server. It's heavy. Don't leave them behind!
What's the delay, see a movie star or somethin'?
Guys, put a gas can on the paintings and shoot it.
When the coast is clear, throw up a flare to let Bile know!
They ain't getting through this way!
OK, good. Now... wait a sec... guys... they're talking about sending in air support! You gotta hurry...!
Get out of there!
Wrong code, the alarm has gone off!
Careful friends... get the drop on them, yeah?
You need to hurry guys.
Sounds a little unhinged. Best do it.
Now get in the bank!
Bain, old chum, here we come! Oh, such mighty poetry.
Go inside.
He's balding, wears a black suit. Most likely busy on his phone. Looks like he's ready to hand out pink slips.
Moretta's at the berth. Time for a hostile boarding. The zip-line could speed things up.
Hurry up, Hurry up, I want to see that my merchandise is OK.
Hit as many stores and glass interiors as you can. If you can snag cash and valuables, opportunistic, you understand.
Ach, I can't get to the helipad. You gotta go and extend the walkway. Find the controls.
I don't know much about fine art, but I know some poe will pay through the arse for that.
OK look around - find the escape van!
Ok, have a breather while I fix this.
Blerrie! They're flooding the vault with toxic gas! Wait until it clears!
Alright he's gone again, so get back in his office, yeah?
I've seen that before... is that... Romanov? The Russian empire?
Damn damn damn!
Balcony - now!
... I'll come back in no-time!
We know the Commissar called us from Georgetown. Look for something related to that place. Georgetown.
Good, it's continuing. Keep an eye out, and keep defending...
Forget about the main entrance. Put on your mask and cut through that fence instead.
Okay, the authorization worked. Get the scanner working now.
They interrupted the hacking! You'll need to restart it!
The code we got works on the armory. Get in there!
Time to blow the gates so you can take off!
Hell, Commissar just sent more coke straight down the pan. Hurry before it's all gone!
Make sure no one else is there.
Carry the coke down to the vault and plant it outside in the pre vault room.
He's coming in at dock 8, in front of the warehouse.
Those stacked crates are due to be shipped out to the Commissar. Check the labels. Get the right one to the code reader, and that should lead us straight to the Commissar.
Alright guys, get that door open! Let's see who's in there.
The van had to leave. He'll be back soon at another location.
Time to go!
He's lying, I'll take care of him myself. Bring him to the chopper on the roof!
Next, we need to gain access to the main vault. It's controlled by two keycard terminals, and each needs activating within seconds of the other. So find two keycards.
You move and it is Igor time for you, asshole.

I'll start by blowin' off the head of this piece of shit mechanic, and after that we're gonna paint this room with your clown-blood as well. And the best part is that there's jack shit you can do about it.
Yes, that is a giant piggy bank. No, I haven't lost my mind.
The mechanic mentioned he saw them store engines inside the clubhouse. Go have a look.
That's the alarm dealt with. Great. Don't worry about doors or windows now.
Those warheads are damned heavy. Use the forklifts to shift them.
You let the kerels fuck you. Fuck 'em back and fix the detonator.
The van is coming back. Get ready!
Another of my packages! Find it.
Thought it would take longer for them to react, but we got cops on the scene.
Can't believe they managed to pull it off. Never really thought Bain could be that vulnerable.
Got it! Maybe I can get my job at Delta back.
Alright, that's all I got room for.
Kerels stopped the hacking routine. You gotta restart it.
I don't like the look of the prizes on that wheel, but I think we have to spin it anyway.
I love this place. Cops don't swing by too often.
Make sure you defend the circuit box that the security room is wired to. Keep the cops from interrupting!
There's a lot of money in the shops, there.
We're going to bring the drill in with a blimp. For the pilot to see your signal, you need to set off a firework display. So look for them!
Now you've got to enter the password.
...unless I've missed something...
Got memories of this place at 4am...
Keep in mind that there might be cleaning personnel and other non-kerels moving about.
Bile's chopper should be here soon.
The gate... you can pull it off with the winch chain if you attach it.
C'mon friends, grab the donnerse and get out of there!
The drill still isn't moving!
The flare is burning nicely. Here I come. If I may crave another boon, would you mind attaching the pallet to the helicopter when I am in position?
All right, all right. I got what we needed. Take me back to the truck so I can finish this up.
Hit it!
Hey, you wouldn't be interested in a little mercenary work, eh? No?
Good, now you just got to kill the keypad.
Alright, that's enough to go now if you want, but if we want more - get me access to the surveillance room so I can see what's on their network.
There's a conveyor chute over there. It can carry the loot to the lobby.
Yeah-yeah-yeah... Run the plan!
Don't stop looking, you kaks. I tell you the pallet is there somewhere.
See if you can find something we can use to hack the vault system.
Man... This place... Find that gold and we can buy one of our own.
Nice, yeah. That torch is going to be useful later.
Our helicopter will be at the train yard any second.
Maybe in there?
Hurry now, get that dwankie to the server room.
Tell me if you are feeling sick. Or if hair fall out. Or balls fall off.
Train is almost there. 30 seconds.
Nice. Security chief's number. He won't be happy to lose this.
The hose has come loose. Reconnect it!
They just disabled your code. There might be another- a master code, but I'll have to find out who has it.
Who.. wha... hey it's the Payday Gang!
Have you located the security gate yet?
We can settle for this...
Another one. Good!
We're good and going, I'm hacking the system through the computer
Okay, listen. Twitch is waiting for you up ahead, just on the other side of the bridge. He's got a truck. Just drive straight up on into it, and this caper is closed.
Found anything flammable yet?
Boom! There's a garbage truck positioned to pick up the bags. DÃ©jÃ vu, I know.
The escape vehicle is leaving in eight minutes.
They're wasting cocaine like Hollywood producers with fresh checks in there! Step on it!
We might be made, so let's hurry up.
Saw that one gun down a village in Uganda. Good man.
You could be discovered any minute if you don't leave. Grab the box and make your way out, friends.
What do you know! A GENSEC armored cash transport! You could loot it if you want to take some cash home from this!
They probably keep the car keys nearby.
You gotta find a way in. Keep looking!
There we go. Get that thing to the van!
If you missed any info, just use the button to play a pre-recorded message.
Right!
Look, my friends, if this is going to work, sometimes you have to do what I say. And I'm saying find those fucking bundles!!
Good work people. Sneaky, message received. The loot's gone, and Vlad will definitely be climbing the guys to fear list.
One of Buluc's personal guards has the keycard for this door. From what I've heard, they're not too bright, so they probably have to keep written track of who has it.
I apologize, gentlemen. I accidently dropped the C4 on the balcony... Sorry.
Get ready for the third wave!
Keep collecting things for Vlad!

On the 22nd floor of the Garnet Group Building, owned by Nathan Garnet, there's a safe with millions worth of diamonds. The building has high-tech security and trigger-happy guards but luckily for us there's a birthday party going on to keep them distracted.
We got company! The Mendozas' probably here.
Would have thought all those weapons would have got you there faster, yeah?
I tell you, Vlad will never like this hacking shit. Seems cowardly. When you want information or to get inside somewhere, you just need a good baseball bat.
They cut the power to the network. You need to get it back on.
There's a lot of commotion in the area around the bank, you should clear it up for the van to be able to reach you.
Have you heard from Mr Pink?
Look like the chops are ready to talk, but we can squeeze them for more cash if you just keep going.
What are you doing? Wait for me to mark them out. We need to cut the right wire.
What are you waiting for, friends?
His penthouse is on the top floor. My guess is he's headed there.
The cops killed the engine! Restart it!
Our rat is holed up tight. To get through the door, you're gonna need the code AND two keycards. Start looking.
Ok, now you need to aim the weapon at the second lock.
That's enough bags to make this worthwhile. Great work.
More snipers!
That's enough for the fifth floor. Good job.
We'll hang all your completed masks right here.
OK people, there's the bank, I don't know what's in there but it's gonna be good...
Job's nearly done, guys. Just one more thing. Get the camera footage from the security room. I wanna make sure they didnt film anything we don't want them to.
Ok the drill is up and running!
There, now time to get inside the auctioneer's office to grab the code.
Chop chop! This is going to be close!
One down, two more to go. Find the other numbers and we get easy access to the vault.
Old Locke's not gonna do it for you. Get in there!
The van's stuck up there! Plant the C4 on the bottom, blow it open.
All right, the code is...
There's the soft underbelly of the Investment vault. Get the cutter to work.

Okay, Dallas. It's been two years since we worked together, and I need to see that you still got what it takes. We'll start with something simple, all right? An acquaintance of mine recently got robbed on a cocaine deal by some low-life mobster. I need to you to break into his night club and see if you can find the stolen cocaine and get it back. Easy, right?
Nice work boys.
The cops are about to raid the Safe House. Grab your weapons!
The cannon can't fire until you get fresh batteries.
I had a contact hide a cooler in the elevator for us. Drop the vials in there!
Look, there's a girl in the window.

There's gotta be more to this dump. The Dentist says the Commissar keeps his best loot in a fortified basement. I'm sure you wanna know what's in there. Search the ground floor rooms. See if you can find anything suspicious.
More corruption for the dwankies!
These mercenaries must have some C4 or something around here that we could use.

You thought this was a rescue mission or what? Nah, it's not gonna play out like that. You fools are gonna witness me kill this piece of shit mechanic first, and then you're gonna join him in the afterlife.
To get to the Commissar, we have to find the Commissar. This motel is one of his operations. Cause as much damage as you can. If he calls, I can track him.
The armory shouldn't be too hard to find.
There must be a door, yeah?
Pick up that keycard, and get to his room.
Great job! These beauties will be tearing up the streets of Eastern Europe in no time.
That's gonna be useful, for sure. Now get back and burn it open.
Ahhh! The vault. I can almost (deep breath) smell the magic!
I got to leave in two minutes!
We're almost finished. Get to the escape, come on!
Great. That's keycard one. We need to find one more.
Okay, let's move it.
Great. Now get that gas on those tires
...screw the bolts into the floor, yeah.
No more need to be quiet! You got trouble coming!
Maybe tear down every last book from the shelves until something turns up?
The stones in cases are top priority, but grab whatever else you can.
Second keycard can't be far. Gotta be nearby. Keep looking.
Okay, now just walk out of there. Carefully...
What are you waiting for? Run back to the helicopter and secure the loot!
Put your mask on.
Keep it together! You can't fall apart now!
This is a new tactic. I'm seeing cops placing tripmines in the parking lot. Don't let them get that shit set up.
Don't let the neighbors see you.
Great, that's the server room, start the computer in there, we need to upload all the files.
Umm... ok, destroy stuff. Got it.
Crew, I'm guessing that that construction yard across the way is your best bet for getting out. They have a truck. Sending you some C4 to bring the wall down now.
Keep going uphill after you reach the overpass.
Three down, just one to go!
The insider sure delivered. Now keep an eye on the drill - it'll surely jam every once in a while.
Not sure it was the server.... could have been something else.
Casino manager has the first briefcase. The Pit Boss has the second. And then the head of security. Need all three for the code.
Alright, that's four.
OK, we're pumping! Let it fill the vault.
Go to the corridor outside the server room!
I can only take two at a time...
Time to get in character, the others are waiting for you.
Wrong key!
Don't let the cops focus on the truck.
Bain's got a little plan - I think all those media choppers are a convenient smokescreen for our escape chopper, don't you?
You're looking for something that can take an armored door down!
You can play it safe and call this a day...
The missing server is probably lying on the desk of some IT monkey. Get down there and find it.
The thermite I gave you will let you get past the mansion walls, and inside.
Alright, I'll be there soon!
Locate Buluc's office. It might be upstairs.
Hurry up you chops, get into that tunnel.
He hid the coke with a VR headset. Find it, it should be in the electronics store.
There he is! Shake that useless sack of shit awake. Davay, blyad! Why is my plane on fire?
Cut that fence and get down to the hangars. The Mendozas are in there.
... you sure are some thorough sons of bitches!
What the hell! Come back here!
Take that bastard out!
First, you need to break into the depot. Try and keep it quiet. If you can't keep it quiet, make it fast.
The van will be coming in near the park.
Once you have something to break them open, get searching the crates.
What's the delay! Get going!
The cops are here to check things out. Take 'em out quietly, and we can still finish this without raising southern hell.
We're going to need to fund some upgrades soon, so feel free to grab more loot.
Come on guys. The Butcher wants this guy dead, but don't forget, the house is full of riches too.
You heard him. The trucks are around here somewhere.
Your Crime.net is updated. There is a heavy duty drug cartel head in town. His name his Hector Moralez. Look him up.
I'm sure the Commissar doesn't have fire and damage insurance on this dump. So go nuts. Trash the rooms, scorch the cars - anything you can do to rile that guy and get him on the line.
You need to set up fake sentry guns.
OK, this is getting too hot. The van is leaving. I'll get you a chopper. Stay cool.
This whole enterprise will be for nothing if you dont get that time lock tick-tocking again.
There's goes the alarm. And our camera feeds with it.
You have to open up that ark-dinges.
You need to find the shipping crates to get to the machines.
There's probably a laptop at the contruction site.
There's The Dentist's whatever. Haul it out of there and we are done with him.
Don't forget the goat in that apartment block.
The escape vehicle is leaving in nine minutes.
Well, that's that. He got a look at me, so I had to... let him go.
Ok, that's the laptop. Good job!
Think the Commissar got this thing from Vlad. Slow Russian junk...
Get into the house and see if you can find Hector's cooks.
Everyone listen up, the pick-up's here now. You're going to need to cross over the walkway, he's on that side.

Great. Now search the docks. You're looking for something that tells you which truck has the voting machines and is headed for Washington. Search containers, computers - anything. When you've figured it out, tag the right truck.
Well, that takes care of Chavez. Pick up the key and get back to the panic room.
Don't hang around, crew. Everyone - into the boat!
The storage room guys. Get in there and get the car keys.
Moretta is in position. Get on deck and look for the explosives. Move!
Get the keys!
Out of there guys, via the platform.
Nice, now old Locke's coming in hot, so be ready!
I confess I was a little worried there. Thank you.
There we go. Adios amigos, fucking cops!$NL;
C'mon guys, find that safe.
Don't fuck up. Hit it!
Keep those civvies stable, yeah?
Wait, what? The lead scientist is dead? Well, the only way we're getting past that door is with the help of his hand...I guess you're gonna have to do some dirty work...
Find the circuit box, crew. You need to hack it to halt the fan.
We're inside. Good. Next, gonna need a couple of keycards. Smart money would be on them being indoors.
Telling the pilot to return with the C4 to bust you through there. Just hang in there.
Grab some sapphires if you have time.
Drills incoming!
That's one hell of a shooter! He got 'em good! Now, let's do our part. Let's get our loot!
OK, power's down. No more shocks. I hope.
You have to keep them away from the hostage.
Cops aren't going to let us walk out with the bank's bail-out money.
Ok, release the balloon!
There, all done! Enter the vault and let's get those pardons.
That's a good amount of bling. But if you want to grab some more, you can.
You need to get inside the police station.
You gotta find that plane.
Time to end this caper! Get to the escape. Follow the blue containers!
Hmm, gonna need my car key.
The metal detectors need to be shut down. You can do that by disabling the power. Look for circuit boxes.
Use a glass-cutter. Don't break the glass!
The broken window gave you away!
Any luck with the evidence room?
We were told there was something important about a shrine. Have a look.
Go find the PC in the Glitter Room, but don't stop to dance.
Wrong wagon. Crap! Keep looking!
One minute till the van leaves.
Those chains will have to come off somehow.
Get the bags to the platform.
Can't get the code without the keycard.
The box, friends.
Damn, the mercenaries got to the EMP and stopped the charging.
Oh, that voice is familiar. Just hope he doesn't crash.
You've got to wait here for the pickup.
All right, I'm gonna need two things: a gas tank and some exhaust pipes. Go into the workshop and find a ceiling lift. That's where they store them. Get it down and bring both to me.
You gotta find those codes. Search through some laptops.
Maybe have a look upstairs.
There's the alarm. No problem. Plan B. Put on a show, gang.
All's still quiet. Keep it that way. Now board the ship.
Aw fuck, they shot Brown in the face!
It's not going to go off if the kerels interrupt it, so keep them away!
There can only be one shitfaced Santa guarded by cops in this mall. I hope.
