Why is no-one getting the C4? Makes no sense to Vlad.
They turned off the electricity, get the juice flowing again, yeah?
So he's a car freak. Well... soon he will be a dead car freak.
To get that tree out, you need to blow the glass roof off the mall. Just light a flare and then wait for Bile, he'll be bringing in some C4.
The shells are tucked away. Nice work, I'm sending your getaway.
That worked like a charm. Well fought and well carried out if you know what I mean. Payday is coming our way, well deserved.
Sawing again? Great.
No code. Try another one.
There they are, just like Bain said. Take them!
Maybe the buildings are your best chance for finding keycards.

Ah, this almost feels like a real war! Did I ever tell you about the time I did a covert mission in the Middle East? Anyway, before we land I gotta tell you some things. You will need to find a security keycard to get into the PEOC. No way we can drill or blow our way into that place. I reckon the best place to start looking will be near the Oval Office!
That manifest you picked up will point us to the right containers.
Don't shoot down the big helicopter that's coming in for the money, okay? That's me. Yeah, for sure.
Run a bypass in the control box!
Wow, that was one hell of an explosion! Cops are on their way now, so drive fast!
Good, now just hang back a bit.
Hook me up again.
That's used bank notes from our 'allies' overseas.
Got it! Downtown!
The underpass is a vulnerable spot for the convoy. Hit it hard.
The ground is full of bodies of those that dare take me on. You will join them!
The containers are ready for you. Get searching.
The drill has been delivered. Find it and get it to those vaults.
Get those restraints off the prisoner!
What a house! You can tell the Sosas are making money. Let's hit this place - quiet or loud, the Butcher doesn't care how as long as you kill the guy.
Maybe you gotta take down all the books, friends?
Amazing! Just climb up onto BFD and we call it a job done. Or stay behind and really pick the place clean.
Go take a look at the vault.
All right, I made the deal. Un-cuff the hostage so we can get our teammate back.
Use those offices as your advantage!
Got connection. Keep working.
Still waiting on that network hook up guys.
Three minutes. Cyclists! I'll cut your throat!
The feds'll do everything they can to stop you from leaving. Get out of there - hurry!
Oh, just the secrets of the universe and the means to end humanity.
Blerrie! The Murkys have AA weapons outside the White House. You gotta take them offline so I can land.
Good job, now get that open.
Take the box and go, friends.
OK, chopper's coming in, get the prototype ready.
That was one hell of a crash. The cops aren't gonna give you a break though, so get on your feet!
The old days were more fun. All you needed was a gun, an axe and maybe a nice drill for kneecaps. Vlad will never understand this hacking shit.
OK, you're out. The gas will clear up - just hang on.
.. or stay, if you're feeling greedy.
A bit OVERKILL but I guess all is fair in love and war. Mostly war, on Vlad's part.
Smack daddy in the middle. Alex dropped good.
Good time for ziplines, maybe.
Good job on not raising the alarm. Keep it up.
The crates, gentlemen? With the strobes?
Wait for him to pass then you can move.
Don't be afraid of the C4. It won't explode. Well, not yet. Vlad is funny..
Great, that's it. Now you can open the door.
Man, if we get out of this one, I never want to see the inside of another office building.
Well done guys.
The code should have a four at the beginning.
Some good old-fashioned explosives should open up the entryway in the wall behind that shrine, yeah?
Go find something to cut those chains!
OK, there's a boat on the way to pick up the bags, people. Go secure them first for the transport.
You've got to restart the hacking asap!
Throw in the engine!
You need to secure all the loot with the zipline.
Damn! Red lights across the board. Forget the keycards, the time lock and the softly-softly crap. It's plan B time.
Jumpin' fuckin' Jesus guys, I'm gonna get creamed.
Get the equipment bags!
You gotta find something we can make it go boom with. C4 would be ideal, many cartels use it. Add some mulching fertilizer and diesel fuel, then you have a nice mixture.
That C4? Pretend it is poor lost baby. Love it, nurture it....then put it on wall and blow it up! Yes.
They would probably want easy access to the tunnel, so check around outside.
Hey, this is Hilary at Gensec. Is Barney there?
You need to ignite a flare to signal the helicopter again.
Alright, I'm going!
Sounds good to me.
Vlad wants us to hit the four stores for cash and other knicknacks. Show him how we roll fast and clean. Easy in and out.
Don't feel bad. He was a bad man, for sure.
You need to find the garage!
There's no way you're hauling those out on your backs. Hold on, I'm going to find you a transport.
They must think we're a bunch of chops with an offer like that. I think we should make them give us more.
Now get that winch put together in the main hall.
Okay, Taxman goes for the server - I think...
Streets are calling with cops, but I got us a sweet ride. Just get down here!
Still having trouble with the gas?
Now decorate the tree with these fine things!
Alright, now you just gotta wait for Bile to arrive. I hope he won't be long.
Exporting encryption keys to external drive. Please stand by.
Now turn on the water!
Alright, looks like some witness testimonies were missing. Going to have to hit the hard copies. Get to the Archives and grab 'em.
Guys, you need to get those pieces to the pick-up.
Ah crap, cops stopped turning the bridge. It needs to be restarted. One of you, get on that!
The crash site is just after the underpass - Hurry!
Dead civilians bring the heat, guys!
That's the wall gone. Looks like a few voting machines ate it too. Now move!
Lasers in front of the vault. Let's shut them down.
Oh, no fuckin' way are we gettin' out of this one lads.
Place the missiles next to the radar and activate them. Easy peasy.
C'mon gang, you gotta get to the lab, find the right shelf.
Don't you just love science? Great team effort. We've retired the engine until... Well until we decide to liberate it ourselves. Enjoy the payday.
You gotta wonder how many people have snuck as far into the White House as you guys, yeah?
Good. Hose is OK. Let's get that pressure back. Start the pump.
There you go friends.
They're sending in Minigun Dozers too!
What are you doing? Follow Bain!
I've seen that equipment pull a two-ton Roadwarrior out of a bog in ten seconds, but that hatch is holding tight.
Time to open the red door.
You got nothing? You guys are killing me!
You need to get that Jewelry box!
Here we go, this should do it.
The Harvest & Trustee bank just got a big gold shipment from South Africa. I think we should make it go away. I can't see they'll miss them much.
Just a minute. I have to open the gate!
That was a superb display of stealth. You guys are made of shadows. The machines are hacked, the votes are flooding in and it is a landslide for The Elephant's man. God bless democracy!
Now get those bags in the containers down on the floor. We'll return and collect them.
The West Wing. It's in the west. You know.
I'm betting it's in their safe.
You'll probably find explosives around there to use.
An offer is on the table, but it's hardly even enough to bribe our dear Mayor! Press them for more, friends.
See anything with historical significance?
Make sure you protect the hacking device while it works!
Fucks sake. Assholes! Fucked it. Shape up, or I'm pullin' you out. By the short and curlies.
Aweh! That's it! Oh, sorry friends... got a bit carried away.
Don't forget the fireworks. Vegas will go up like 1999.
Make sure Charon gets to the van!
The saw has stopped cutting! Blerrie federales!
OK, there's the C4. Help yourself!
Hope you didn't get too toasty. Great job.
Get to the platform.
There it goes. The vault is open. It's all yours, gang.
Perfect friends! Get into the vault room now.
The escape driver is coming in by boat to pick you up. Make sure you are over by the small water access near the river.
Don't let it keep ringing, someone's gonna get suspicious!
I heard you guys up in the booth were good. Don't let me down, y'hear?
Alright! Now get the bag to the cage. Once we have it filled, our guy will fly over and pick it up. Just like James.
Point of no return - this place is getting hot! Get out!
You're right where you're supposed to be, Duke.
I'm almost there, get ready!
Okay, now comes...
Ah, that's a tunnel entrance if I've ever seen one.
Come on, gang - get the water pumping again!
Keep it going in there.
Vaults take just a moment to open. A security measure. Security is important, you know.
Now look for the evidence storage. It should be on the second floor.
Get the elves working on the product. Just holler at them.
Alright... Infiltrate, extract the target and destroy the evidence. Good luck, friends!
Drill, friends! Drill some more.
The stick should be compatible with any laptop around there.
Our All You Can Eat buffet is now open, and I wanted to make sure that you knew.
There you go, that's the keycard we need!
Friends, do you guys ever feel the walls closing in when you're going down in an elevator?
He's almost there. Watch where he drops the bags. Grab them, assemble the cage, and send up the balloon. You're going to like this.
Blerrie! Murkywater operatives are trying to block off the area, keep away from them, yeah?
Dogs! Dogs! All of you, pig asshole dog fuckers! I'll find you. I'll skin you alive.
There you go. If there's nothing else you want to take, get out of there.
The manager's office is your next stop.
One more!
If you need more equipment, go back and check the stash outside, yeah?
Get into the house.
ETA is three minutes.
OK, great. Now get that thing to the vault door.
Snipers! Take 'em out, gang!
That's it? The briefcase? Perfect! Now we can get outta here!

Well done, friends. We got what we came for, but that last... we need to figure out our next move. After you left the warehouse, Murkywater comms went completely dark, off the grid. We hurt the Kataru good, but we don't know how they will retaliate, and Bain would want us to keep going, no matter what happened to him. Duke is going to have his hands full figuring out the next piece of this puzzle and what those boxes are actually good for. Until then, we lay low... plan... and survive.
Now do the other one.
That's as much as we can do here. I saved all the intel on this server. Grab it and let's get out and see if we can make sense of this.
OK people, I've got an alternate escape chopper coming. He'll be here soon!
Keep the cops dropping, and the elves hopping, gang!
Mr. Blonde's boss will be able to sell those stones quicker than me, so get the bag to him, yeah?
I dropped some C4 in a rush, look around for them.
Guys the tiara is probably in a safe or on display somewhere...
There's something electronic and glowing in the Admin Office.
The terminals. You see 'em? You need to check them for the code.
You need to find the code to the vault. Maybe there's something around there that can help. The workstations perhaps? Have a look around but stay quiet.
Crap. You guys seeing this? Something went up there. Pyro team - fix it!
I'm going for a drink. Let me know when you've got the box, yeah?
I can't come and get you if you don't hurry, friends! They've got F35s flying CAP around the White House!
Keep your eyes on the roofs! Got a bad feeling creeping up.
Blerrie paw-paw! The courier forgot the winch! Ok friends, I'll have one coming by train shortly.
It landed on sniper again. Get ready guys
OK, pull over here, and get your masks on.
I just saw the CFO through a camera feed, he's still there, neaby.
Do it, shoot the wires!
I'm at dock nine. Hurry up, will you?
Perfect, now get back to the car and get out of there.
Not long now, friends.
Something happened, I lost the connection. Power problem. Get me running again, yeah?
Drill is done. Time for the Commissar to be done, too.
Hurry up and take the keycard, then make your way back.
There we go. Deceptively simple, yeah? You can get past the electronic lock by cutting the right wires in the cable boxes there.
Get that C4 planted in the Gambling Hall, gang.
This vault's got an Achilles Heel. It's temperature controlled. Jam the vent fans at the back with crowbars. The temperature rises and the failsafe opens the door. Easy.
Almost got it... Almost got it.
Come on friends, you have to open those doors.
You know the deal, grab the loot or escape.
Just one more and you're done!
Yeah, I'm reading sniper teams on the rooftops. Watch yourself.
Keep searching.
Maybe there's a utility closet or something nearby with a toolbox you can use. Go have a look.
It's a beautiful day for a picnic at the park. And an armed robbery.
The manager's hair is thinning. That might narrow your search.
Hey! These terminals likely have the comm frequency for the Moretta. We're gonna need it before long.
OK, no time to waste. The cops are right behind you, get the bags secured.
Almost there, gang. Just some more on the roof and we're good.
Better hang back until the gas is gone unless you really want to risk it.
You got that crazy bastard. Now, get the key from him and return to the panic room.
Get ready for the vault. I'll have the code for you soon.
Time's almost up!
30 seconds till the van leaves.
The hell he have in mind?
This Mr. Blonde doesn't appear too keen on getting those stones himself.
I got it! Oh, wait... No, you said time lock code? For the vault? One second...
Come on, crew. Get in there, grab that loot.
Not sure exactly how many cameras there are.
Another civvie on the scene. Make sure they don't call the cops.
Jesus fucking Christ... That was too close.
What the? Ah fuuu... Containers were locked when the alarm tripped. Drill them!
Have another look around. Maybe Garrett has the code written down.
Will you hurry up! All this coke going to waste, it's breaking my heart!
Those crates are headed out to the Commissar's other dirty dens. Get those labels and check them at that code reader.
Damn, that guy is blocking the stairs. There's only one way to do things now.
Merrrrrrrry Christmas!
Look outside the Tiffany Room. I can see a laptop display in the security feed.
Diesel tank and hose somewhere around dock.
Are you still trying to find a way in?
You can hack the door! Get to it!
Great. Alright. Next step is to find two keycards. Most likely indoors.
Our C4 has been stashed in supply closets marked with a red X. Find them.
Use the print to open the safe.
Answer the Intercom!
I had a feeling that was the wrong ingredient...
Vlad's brother-in-law is back safe and sound, mostly! I suppose we showed those dwankie kerels that you don't mess with Ukrainian gangster-types, yeah?
Swipe Ralph's keycard, then punch in the code.
Three minutes...fucking Prius drivers!
If you don't bring one, you have to find one. A tool, that is.
You must find that lever and pull it.
Good, now let's go. Can't carry him much longer!
What was that room again?
The helicopters are flying away. It's working.
Heli is almost there, have that guy ready.
Watch out, they are deploying SWATs inside a nearby building.
Don't want to get stuck in there with Garrett, so make sure you don't lose him.
Hurry up and look through the rooms!
Ok friends, you're going to like this! A little smash and grab in the dead of winter, yeah?
Let's try a katspoegie of hydrogen chloride.
Look around for the switch. It's got to be there.
No. Uh, just give me a second...
See if there's a door around there.
The stones in cases are top priority, but grab whatever else you can.
There might be more loot on the yacht, but you got what you came for. Your choice.
You guys need to go back to pyro school. What a bunch of horse crap!
I wonder why those are on the side.
Kerels got to the crane, you need to get it going again!
I bet you there are some explosives laying around here. See if you can find any.
Now that's a beautiful hole right there!
Get Vlad's jewelry to the garbage truck!
Yeah-yeah-yeah... Run the plan!
We still need to get that ship to the berth. Ummm... OK, I got it. Hack the ship control terminal. Keep the cops off it.
Almost there.
That box there controls the gate. A few snips, a bit of rewiring... and open sesame!
Keep the feds off that footage, guys. We're nearly done here.
Goddamn kerels are helping Murky! Garrett must have gone deep with these bastards after our little visit.
Ropes still connected.
A pilot of mine has gone down in the woods. Find him, get him back here.
... we can forget about drilling our way through this. It would cause too much noise. Maybe we can find a way to hack it?
Outstanding. We're almost done - now get to the escape. Just stay with the blue containers!
Find the vent, and start pumping the gas. We'll make their security center fuzzy and warm and... *yawns*
Now get our friend out of those restraints!
Five to go!
We need two keycards to open the vault. Keep looking.
Blerrie! Ghaaa, you Russian mendicant!
Great! That's one of the closets!
They've got the vault secured to the last bolt.
Dammit does anyone have an ECM jammer - that's about the only thing that'll crack that door. Othewise you need another route.
I have an idea how we can get the code. Head to the telephone pole connected to the house. Time to make a call.
Next, find a way into the vault area.
If we wanna get Hoxton back, we gotta follow the Dentist's plan. Step one: bust up the motel.
There you go, now you need to get into the actual mansion.
Let the drill get through that gate lock. Protect it!
Good, now get to the vault!
Can I remind you that this chopper is grounded until it is refueled?
I'm on it, lifting in ten.
The plane is full, you can take off the hose.
Listen - I have a request. We need a cleanup operation - some officers ran into unexpected resistance on a routine raid. There were no survivors.
Damnit! Gas! Gas!
I wonder if this is where they keep Amelia Earhart's plane...
Maybe the code has to do with Crimenet?
Where the fuck are you guys? How the hell did they know we were comin'? I'm comin' to the warehouse... got capped.
No need to sneak around any longer. New plan incoming.
Guys! You got one minute!
Find a laptop and plug the USB in. It should be nearby.
Guys, you can't have searched the whole train yard. You must be missing something.
The thermite's done - about time! Now enter the vault!
No time to relax yet.
Throw the loot into the tree!
Place the C4 on the gate!
You gotta get that thing out of there.
C'mon guys, lets change the change!
I put a few replacement bits for the drill in the piggy bank. Fetch 'em.
Go go go!
...I'm 79% sure.
We're not going to get in there without the code. You'll have to find one.
This one is a hit on one of the high-class auto joints in town. The Teuer car dealership.
You got a blowtorch, don't you? Use it on that gate.
That's them. Now scan them in, and fax me a copy. I'll figure out the right vent.

Once again, my friends, you have done me a good service. With Buluc now being shit out by fishes, I think the Coyopas are finished. And the Dentist has no more help in Mexico, so he will be desperate and vulnerable. Whatever job you have coming next should be easier for you. Just don't forget about Vlad, yes? There are a lot of things happening, things that could be dangerous for us in the future. But we will talk more... soon. Cheers and goodbye.
Can't stand around all day. Get to it.
All right! Streetlight is history. Grab the goat!
There you go. Now, plug it into a computer.
I'll get that one! Go get another!
You need to bypass that laser system.
The vault has two security routers protecting it and you need to shut them both down. Easily done if you patch me into them directly. Look for them mounted on the walls.
Keep the civs down, look out for cameras. Scout the place and find the best way to do it without raising the alarm.
You took everything they have! Time to ride off into the sunset, guys!
There's a control terminal for the ship around there. Hack it!
There you go, now find the other one.
We need to get eight bags with us for this one.
Another grate, so just treat it like you did before. Burn through with the thermal paste.
Don't forget the drill, friends.
Cover your ears now....
OK, that's it! Now get that thing open.
I paid the DJ to play some crappy songs he found online, so you'll risk less civilians getting in the line of fire.
One
All right! Bridge is back! Now, into the car and get the hell out of there!
There's a ladder leading to the roof. Over the garage.
The goat is deadly! Kill the electricity first!
We'll go with muriatic acid.
Hi, I'm trying to reach Reilly-Needazheet. First initial "I".
...this is not my forte.
These frequencies will be useful later on. For now, though, stay focused on the job.
Kerels have cut power to the office. You gotta get it back!
People, get those bags into the truck. We need at least four bags.
I'm about to open the vault for you. Stand by.
Light the flare, gang. Pilot is blind without it.
Don't forget to plunder that vault. Haul the loot to the chopper. Always nice to make a little extra money, gentlemen.
Cameras. Everybody hates cameras. I set up a room with a couple variations for you to test your stealth. No shame in failure and also no one shooting at you, which is nice.
Now, the keypanel outside the vault! Hurry!
The chopper is headed for the antenna. Stand by!
Damn, they really saved their big guns for last. And it looks like she had a keycard.
OK, time to get in that vault, chop chop.
They're flushing that coke down like their lives depended on it! Hurry up!
Just two minutes!
Look for something that can breach a heavy door!
Damn, they got the power for the scanner!
There's the chopper! Bile, lower the hose. Gang, get ready.

According to the Dentist, the Russian's shift a fair bit of meth out of this flea pit. Probably have a home brew operation up in one of those rooms. Smashing that up would really piss off the Commissar.
Piles of green! Thats why we're in this business, gang.
Zero!
Good afternoon. My name is Randolph, and I'll be helping you today.
You need to set up the drill at the gate.
You're inside, but the alarm is counting down. Override the lockdown so we can get back on track!
Why are you not at the weapons lab, yet?
Ok, you've cleared the place out! Time to get out of here.
Try another one. See if you get it right this time.
Don't give the cops a damn thing. Just signal Hectors guys with the floodlights in the warehouse and get that coke onto the speedboat. Nothing fancy here.
There you go. Now see if you can find the cell blocks.
I don't know what made Rust stab us in the back, but I really don't give a shit, as I never cared for that silver-haired fucker. But you are a couple of fucking fools for coming here, you hear me?
Tree is leaving - get Santa aboard!
Good job, now get the bags to the van so we can get the hell out of here!
I've got him. Let's get out of this bekakin' place.
Then we can go ahead and get you guys access to the back office, where the vault is.
Guys, I think the cops just shape charged another entrance!
Nothing in here. Keep looking!
Bring as much cash as you can to the van!
The glamorous life of a heister, huh? Find the exit.
Get searching the wagons. You can expect a fast response from the cops. Remember, you're looking for the wagon with the vault!
Restart the winch. And keep the damn cops off it.
Yep, that's the inventors address. Beautiful.
It's hydrogen chloride.
There should be tools lying around here somewhere!
The storage room is blocked off with sturdy metal doors, yeah? If you find and tap me into the security boxes, I can unlock them from here.
Answer the phone and put me through.
There you go. The vault with Vlad's merchandise is behind a security gate.
Now, an eyeball with a pulse is needed for the scanner. Look out for the FBI boss. Make sure he keeps his pulse.
Cops coming up on your west side. Construction site.
The CFO has the master code guys. Find him!
Keep it quiet, gang.
The right computer has to be around there somewhere.
Take a look in the Jade Room for one of the PCs.
Alright, Bile dropped the lance! Grab it so we can keep this show going.
Stand by. Hold your ground. The pilot will drop those bags any second.
Nine!
That's... two. Two guys.
Living on borrowed time, as it were.
Chloride. Hydrogen chloride.
Hook me up. I should be able to get into their system from here.
Alright, now find the control panel to charge the weapon.
Where are those blueprints, gang? Scan 'em, send 'em. You can do it in IT.
If you're feeling ready, go ahead and leave the facility.
We go to our backup plan. Have a look around and see if you match anything to those wire boxes.
You still have to stop the code from changing.
Ah,what!? Guys, you have to be careful with that stuff, I told you!
The White House aids in the current administration aren't known for their tight grasp of security. Wouldn't be surprised if we could find something on one of their laptops.
Let's get that water flowing again!
10 seconds on the clock!
That's bag one. Keep bagging, gang.
Time to prepare the next component.
And there is the final closet.
Right, now hurry and collect all of Vlad's "precious" loot and take it outside, chop chop!
This is gold. It's got all the locations of the hidden cash.
Gangways must be removed and ship defended.
What's takin' so long, Goddamnit?
Now, power up the weapon again.
Every second counts friends.
Get in there folks, bag that cash.
Protect the EMP! The mercenaries will do anything to stop you!
Into the shelter! Move it!
No way to get you more supplies from the chopper. You'll have to make do with whatever you find around there, so look around while I'll try to get you past.
You must come for coffee some time. See my new pets!
Search the Jade Room, I saw a glowing monitor there.
Excellent work. With these paintings in place in the senator's apartment, we'll have plenty of coverage. Like a Trojan Horse, but lots of them.
Grab the box, friends.
I'm going to raise suspicion here!
One, two, buckle my shoe. Yes, it would seem all of the bags are present. Now, please, attach your good selves to the cables and join me.
Holy shit! They've boobytrapped the doors!
Those guns are gone! Keep that fire burning.
Damn, that cheap piece of shitty Russian crap scrambler crashed. Get it going again.
Look at all this fucked up concrete. The fires. The screaming. If anything, I like the place more! Haha!
Get on those terminals, gang. We need the comm frequency.
Don't forget - stow that loot up into one of the vents.
That's one bag!
This is the boat. I see the lights, I'm on my way.
That's the alarm. Screw the keycards - we're blowing the gate. Bile is close by. Drop a signal flare, and he'll drop the C4.
Kiff, now you just gotta make that hole bigger to get into the vault room.
The van will be there in about a minute.
That's it. Now wait for the pilot to signal in.
Looks like a good entry point will be the teller door. Use a saw.
Guys, the briefcases. Check the owners office. Then find the pit boss. And, lastly, check near the guards' locker room.
Throw the bags into the barrels!
Light a flare when you're ready to leave.
But old Locke has a nice little dinges coming for you. Go out and clear the square!

Hector's death left a vacuum in the powder trade. Nature abhors a vacuum. Fucking abhors it! There's muck-fuckers crawling in from everywhere. Bunch of Hondurans are trying to spread. Let's hit them before they can take root. Break up their smuggling ring. Steal their product. What can go wrong?
Hey fellas. This is...uh, Night Wing One. Gimme just...
Very strange, this. One of the boxes is in the bio-lab? That's where you go next then, friends.
OK folks, we're going in and looking for the vault. Cartel or not - it's still a bank, right?
Hurry man, my ass is gonna be grass like if the cops had lawn-mowers!
I miss the old Soviet shoes. Not so many stupid models to choose from!
Payday crew. Vlad. There's a marked pig in that warehouse. It's very important to me. It's for... er... present for mamma. Yes, that's it. Don't let the Feds get it. Grab it for me.
We will make actioning that our top priority. Thank you.
Now listen: The police will have the entire site surrounded any minute. The clock is ticking! Take the canal route, quick!
It's done! Open the labdoor!
There's a juicy bonus waiting for us if you crack that second vault.
What are you doing, you chop?
That's all I got. I'm outta here!
The canteen, friends. Get there now!
Roberts Bank.
Get to West Wing. We need to get you into the Oval Office.
Blerrie, that's the vault from the blueprints.
Get the tag to the computer so we can code it.
It must be where they keep the pardons we are after.
You sure? Better duck down and make sure it's ok.
If you have cards, you can close the barriers. That oughta hold 'em off Hoxton for a while.
I'm impressed Hoxton isn't having a nervous breakdown coming back to this place.
Great, now Mr Blonde brought some liquid nitrogen to help crack that door. Mr Blonde?
That's it... whatever it is! All right, the drop off is a storage room. Take that there and secure it.
OK, people! One more bag - we just need one more bag to satisfy Hector.
OK, here come the bluechip hired henchmen.
Check between the trains too, guys. Don't get sloppy.
Have a look in the trucks for materials.
You'll need to find the car keys. They should be nearby.
Blerrie, they know something is up and are scanning the building for trespassers!
You'll be needing that torch later for sure.
You cut off his hand? That's some dark stuff, but a job is a job. Place it on the scanner and get the door opened.
What the hell are you doin'? Don't leave me!
No worse than being locked in a van with Wolf's ass on semi-automatic. Find the exit.
Only way to get the doors open is by hacking the panel. Find it.
You need to leave, you chops, before all the kerels in Mexico come down on you!
Now grab as much of Vlad's merchandise as you can carry and get it out to the garbage truck!
The wheel has stopped. It says drills. I got no clue.
Get to the wine cellar, chop chop!
Expect cops any second now.
I got those scramblers from Vlad. (mimicking Vlad) Very best Russian tech. That lying fuck.
There. Now just give me a minute.
You gotta protect it for a bit. Shouldn't take too long.
He's heading for the canteen, you gotta follow him!
OK, this is the bank. I advise casing the place, then grab the thermal drill from the back parking lot somewhere. Hit the vault however you want. There's usually a security room so be cautious.
Ach, and they're sending in Cuff Cloakers now.
Find the security panel so we can get that door open.
Don't let the swats interrupt that timer!
The fuck happened back there? No way the cops knew we were there that fast.
Those stairs should take you to Buluc's wine celllar. You can enter the mansion through there.
If it were me, I might hide something important in a lamp or something.
Ok gang, let's give Mr Blonde some help with a distraction. Lure away the cops by getting out through the bazaar by the Jack Rabbit Slim's.
No! I can't take any more, not now!
Could be linked to his wife... a date or something?
You found the exit, but it's not ready yet. You need to go back and secure the cash.
CD interest rate, 50%! But no code. Keep looking.
Get to the roof with the gadgets and bang, we're gold - literally.
The code might be connected to us and Crimenet, in some way?
That computer station should have a laptop laying around. See if you can find one.
That's one card entered, but the vault needs two. Keep looking.
Sure, I got it but what good's it gonna do now?
Maybe we'll find out what happened to Jimmy Hoffa.
Haha, you guys give new meaning to going loud.
Ok, I'm flying this sucker out!
Let's go.
Take care of that food yet?
We got a fucking police caravan on our ass!
There we go, I'm connected. Just... a... feeeeew....
Load it in!
Just get these bollards out of my way!
Ok guys. Let's go in. Quiet or loud, you can kill this guy any way you want.
I can only take four at a time...
Something's fishy here - I think there might be snipers in those windows.
An old fashioned break in. Stay out of sight.
That's enough...
Get to the weapons lab. It connects to a storage room where they're keeping one of the boxes.
There's the coke. Outstanding, guys! Bag as much as you can.
Damn! They killed the lead scientist? I don't know, guys. We still need his hand for authorization...Do what you have to do...
Holy shit, what's going on outside? Oh, it's hot in here.
Alright, the process is on, it's cooking. I have a contact with a specialist through Hector. I will guide you guys through it.
That's why the government doesn't work, friends. A bunch of domkops. Look around for that USB stick, yeah?
Nice, seems the surprise loot was cash. Bag it.
Remember, you gotta find that mic recorder.
Well, logic would suggest he keeps the thing in his office, for sure.
Soda. Caustic soda. I don't think you're supposed to drink it.
You need to charge the gun again to fire.
OK, that's done. We got a pretty good payment this time but we could probably have held out longer.
Slice those trucks open, my friends.
The server with the results should be around here somewhere. Find it and make those votes unusable.
That's one box down, one to go.
OK, Bile is on the roof. Get to him ASAP.
The control will be found overlooking the complex.
Looks like Hector's cooks are dead. We have to make the meth ourselves!
Okay, that's the digits for the armory code. Enter it!
You got in and out without making a sound. Good job, Dallas. I mean it.
It's in position. Let it go!
You'll need to remove those barrels, and you need to do it fast. Just release the straps or something.
Secure all of the loot at the ceiling vent in the closet marked by the Inside Man.
Phone's ringing, time to pick it up and start this trade off.
Gang, you need to take care of those anti-air guns ASAP. Find a way!
Now plant the C4 in the main hall. The vault is right below. Two possible spots to blow. Hope lady luck is with us!
Don't get caught up, get to the coke! They're not fooling around! Oh, my poor heart...
You've got to get Garrett out of there again. Find some food.
Don't hesitate - just jump!
Cameras are now disabled.
Guys! We're done here. Grab your wheels and burn rubber!
You guys sure take an awfully long time.
Jimmy will love it if we get all the data we can, really sticking it to Akan.
Keep moving - get down to the garage!
Well, fuck and shit. Cops shut down the vault's opening. Get it going again, and kill any fucking kerel that goes near it.
Sorry, gang. You need to get more cash before leaving. Hold your breath and head back.
Listen you fucking poes. You're only getting on the roof from the store room ladder, and you're only getting in that with the keycard. Look for it!
Three minutes.
When you're ready to leave, light up a flare and Bile will come get you.
I have a pleasant little farm outside the city. Boris will lead you there. He can remove those packets of coke.
Quit messing around and get out of there.
OK, the Moretta is free to move but we gotta convince the Captain. Find the comm frequencies. I'm betting one of the computers there has it. I'll convince the good Captain to fire up the engines.
Blocked and fortified. You can't blast your way in, but have a look at that R-FID box.
Only 30 seconds left...
People, dock eight!
Ok team, lets get a move on. The Butcher means business here... remember, you've got to kill Ernesto Sosa, and steal the loot.
I count twelve cameras to deal with.
Time to leave, friends! Get into the chopper.
Don't forget any parts of that winch, yeah?
We need some lighting fluid for this braai !
Better haul ass, gang. They're putting everything they have in to this assault.
Great. Now you can mask up again.
There could still be office personnel working, so keep your eyes open, yeah?
You need to prepare the next ingredient.
Step it up, you've got two minutes to get out of there!
Oh, that wasn't the right ingredient after all.
What are you waiting for?
All right, clowns - keep your eyes on the road.
Alright, vault is popped, but watch out for those lasers, they connect directly to the alarm
When you have enough bags, let the balloon go, and stand back.
They seek him here, they seek him there, they seek him every-fucking-where!
The lab we are after should open by hacking their server. Find the server room.
Stop dossing, time to go.
Saddam had his enemies heads served on that platter.
I'm still hoping there's going to be a spaceship buried down there.
Time to use some of Joy's new hacking routines.
Look for alternative ways inside.
All right, you need to get into that slaughterhouse. There's C4 stashed nearby. That should make a way in.
Ok, that's the server room door opened.
Get him talking people. We got root and just need the locks undone.
Maybe have a look in some computers around there. See if anyone has been careless with their security clearance.
It feels like a shame to do it, but Buluc has a couple nice cars in his garage. Rig up one of them to take down the turret.
Hector needs footage to show the world and, well, for our own safety.
The cooler guys, don't leave what we came for!
The emp will give us a way in but it's primary function is to take care of the test subjects for us. If the stories are true, we don't want to take these guys on.
Please go outside and smoke, you can't smoke in here sir... Bunch of crap!
And another one.
Quickly now, get the crane moving.
That gate is not opening without a big drill hole in it.
We are going to need to find a way inside the lumber mill. Maybe we can blow a hole through the wall using the AA gun we hacked?
Open the boxes. Our client demands one bag, but your professional honor demands you take as much as you can.
Caustic soda. Yes, that's it.
OK, friends. Time to leave.
Get to the circuit breaker and get the power back on.
Put two vials in the cooler so you can leave.
Great. Now, please, keep the cops away from the time lock.
Cops cut the power. Get on the street and turn it back on!
Right friends, looks like you're not welcome there any longer. Twitch is inbound. He'll be there soon.
Get the server, without it everything fails!
Now we wait. Remember we get a bag of cash for every painting we throw into the chopper. All we need to do is be patient and lucky.
30 seconds now...
Enter the store and grab a hostage so we can trade back our friend from the cops.
Kiff! Now go and have a look inside, yeah?
The hostage is in danger.
You're breaking up... Can you hear me ok?
Gotta hurry, guys. The Continental just called, you're going to New York on a rescue mission.
Excellent, Alex, knew you were the right man for the job.
Why did I offer to fix the bike...
Bile is on his way with the thermal lance. Won't be long!
Oh man, the vault is already open. Thank you, Mr Manager, for being so accommodating.
Go and pour out the thermite.
Chopper on the scene, but it ain't the feds!
Any luck yet?
Those are the thugs running this little toyshop. They've been naughty boys. Drop 'em, and get inside.
Last chance to secure any loot in the tree!
Maybe something to do with his wife... an anniversary or something?
Now move into that airlock. The PEOC should be beyond it.
Crack that safe, probably something good in it.
Holy!.....they crashed right through Wilson's wall!
Plan B is en route, though. C4 can do the job loudly.
OK, chopper is here - get the engine loaded up.
Our escape chopper is out here, but you will also see a lot of radar equipment. With this, they could follow us anywhere we could fly to.
Hope there's something worthwhile in here.
Don't let the cops interfere with the elves, crew!
They're shooting at me!
That is the first of some fucking sweet loot! Excellent! Now, you will find a large vertical shaft nearby. Send loot up it by cable. I will look after it.
Put it on the floor and burn it!
Balloon is up. Are you seeing it?
Hello my friend.
Keep the cops away so it doesn't stop cutting.
Good. Now, plant the rest on the fourth and the fifth floor.
Looks like one of her coolant tanks is finished. Be gents and fetch that girl a refill. Uh, from the crapper.
OK guys, we've got another job from Vlad. We're gonna rob a nightclub.
Now this qualifies as a score. Clean it out, gang.
We're in a train yard, there should be tools laying around somewhere. See what you can find. A blowtorch would be perfect.
Get up to the roof and light a flare to signal pickup.
OK, hose looks secure. Now let's get that pump pumping again!
That's the last camera in the vault area. Good job.
The mainframe will hold the location of the second box too, so get back in there, friends.
Aaaaand...that's the last elf gone. Sad, but they served their purpose. And we got what we need. Time to leave, friends!
That kak woulda sold his mother for a dollar.
Hey Duke, is this what you thought you'd be doing a year ago?
Center button!
I don't know who you are. But I will find out. You fuck with me, and you find you fuck with the wrong Russian, friend.
We are finally almost finished! Please, join me at the helicopter!
More snipers? These guys mean business!
Guys, get the parachutes, quickly! Don't get too far from the money!
19... 20... 21... All that money and Garnet is too cheap to pay for a faster window washing rig! Ok that's it, 22nd floor and... go.
Friends, you're right on time. The auction hasn't started yet and the guests are still mingling about. Our item should be in a vault in the storage area at the back of the mansion.
See any numbers connected to us?
Spin it, let's see what happens.
Truck's moving. Stay with it!
Great!
Time to go home, friends.
Who has the second thermite can? More thermite means a hotter burn. Basic chemistry.
That's it, the alarm's off. Now get that door open.
Acessing now...
Gang, get into the construction yard! Hurry!
Damn, that's an original Gustoff!
Vault needs a three digit code, and each digit is held by a manager. They hold them in computer briefcases. Gang, find that code.
Ah, just imagine putting a slug right in the middle of old Garrett's gob. But not tonight, friends. Long game and all that, yeah?
The chopper will be there any minute.
Reactivate the computer, gang.
It's going to get real heavy if you stay around too long. Get moving!
I think they'll do a bit more, yeah?
Every year around christmas I get a little nostalgic you know. Old times, old enemies.
That's all the cameras dealt with. The whole bank is blind to us now. Great!
Move gangways and defend ship from attackers!
Our pilot's deploying the lance. And by deploying I mean kicking out of the window.
Gang, lead him to the scanner. Make him use it!
Make like that little mouse in those old cartoons and get moving past the lobby.
Patch me in. I can do some mischief from here.
All right, the cops are inside. Quiet takedowns!
Thats the wrong direction! Or is it? Go East. Always East.
That's it for the time locks. Just get through that last door!
Good, now combine all the components and arm that firecracker.
After this, how about we go to that place Sangres is always talking about for some fish tacos and a show. Twister-something-something it was called...
Second control room. Controls the gate here. Other one is over the way, see?
Alright you chops, that's enough for Vlad. Get out of there when you feel ready.
There's a second can of thermite there. Someone grab it.
Blerrie, turn the place upside down if you gotta. Just find it!
Really, Bile? Gang, the EMP ended up inside the lumber mill instead of outside.Need to get in there now.
Keep moving into the prison.
Loot, loot loot. Nice find. I think this belongs to us.
The code is...
Great. Keep going.
I'm starting to understand why it's so important, yeah?
Now just hold tight and wait for Bile to drop the winch.
Now you just gotta make sure no one gets away and alerts the guards in the ICU.
Keycard, arc cutter and, yes, those are breaching charges. We need to make it look like I am not involved. Collect them.
It needs hydrogen chloride, for sure... OK wait, soda... Yeah, caustic soda!
There it goes. Remember, this isn't a speed boat. Going to take a while. Keep a low profile. Be careful not to trigger the alarm. Or search for extra loot. Your choice, guys.
Go forward and don't stop!
Nicely done! The gate should be open.
Nice! That's the money you sent ahead. OVERKILL thanks you!
Make sure he follows you!
Try and find some tools in a storage room or something!
The Murky's nest egg is cash money, so start looking. It could be anywhere around there.
Keep searching for components.
Go down to the basement door in the back alley!
Argh this damn lobby, you gotta get out of there!
Yeah OK, OK give me a minute yeah? I'll set it up.
Wait for Bile to come back and pick you up along with the loot.
There's one of the closets. Get picking that lock.
Alright, get in there and find the tiara.
Those guns will make smelly swiss cheese out of Bile's chopper. Take them out by hacking the control boxes.
You'll wanna answer the pager before too long.
Attach the wire to the tree!
Chopper's headed out, but stay cool - it'll be back. Look for more loot in the forest. And stay safe.
Twitch is on his way with the van. One minute.
Find that saw! It has to be around here somewhere. Try looking around timber logs.
Vlad? Is that you, you piece of shit?
Good thinking, boards will slow them down.
There are centrifuges all around there. Use them to start validating blood samples.
Great, hihi. He had it coming!
Good afternoon, Director Stevens.
You got all of them? Woo!
You're inside? Good job.
Who doesn't love a secret, am I right? We've got a bank vault full of 'em to look into.
Look for a code that starts with six.
19 bags!
Bastards! Bitches! Fucking... Asshats! I will kill you for this!
Get me hooked up again.
There's a few body bags stashed nearby.
Right, you chops. Let's get you ambling into the bank.
Stop admiring the sights and find those trucks!
Let's just fix this bank and burn the Mendoza money ASAP. We can find you new identities after.
Friends, there's no going through that door, yeah? Get up to the second floor using the scaffolding outside. See if there's a weak area in the floor or something.
Great. Now head to the Insider. She'll be able to open the gates.
Our escape by helicopter is imminent, but we must cover ourselves. Beyond the door Murkywater has an impressive array of radar equipment.
Two minutes. Get off the road, old cunt!
Come on you chops, keep looking.
Make space for the escape van - get those police cars out of the way!
They haven't spotted you yet. Still good.
See if you can find a way to destroy the weapons or bring them to the van.
I've got your escape vehicle coming, but those kerels will give you some hell in the meantime.
Maybe we can get past that scanner if you used a piece of tape to lift the manager's fingerprints off something?
Get back to the control box and shut it down.
They are all over the main entrance. We can't get out that way.
You still need to get that key, and that means finding Chavez.
Who the - damn cops messed with the hack. Restart it!
Now hook up the detonator, friends.
Looks like this gate requires a keycard. Find one guys!
We need the gate code, crew. Get searching those terminals.
Alright, she's berthed! Get up on deck and start searching the containers.
Tick tock, guys! Cops are on the way!
Use your code - defuse the C4!
OK, the first machine is hacked. Keep going.
Come on guys, get to the roof so Bile can pick you up!
You guys are so close. Don't get sloppy now.
I'm 100% it is some caustic soda needed here. Drop some in.
Quickly now, to the weapons lab!
There, now get out and crack that thing open!
Gang. Get that cutter onto the vault floor. Let's slice that thing open.
Hey, we don't have much time! I've got a boat on the way we're going to use as a pick-up. Just hustle ahead of those cops and get the bags secured.
Be there in a few minutes. Stand by.
Ah! I'm shot! They got me, I'm shot!
How's the refueling going?
Get that SWAT van out of the way if it blocks you.
Best of luck, gentlemen.
Good job, clowns. Keep the wheels burning.
Throw more tablets in the mixer if you want to keep cooking, crew. Or light the flare and bail. Up to you!
Mount the drill on the safe in the truck. Hurry!
OK, guys, here they come. Get that crane moving!
Get to Jake's parking and I'll get you out of there.
You need to go recode the key tag.
Alright. The panic room door is controlled with a code and a special key. Just find that code and key. Simple!
Bag those stones and get them to the garden. Get them out with ziplines.
Yesterday, people!
That disabled the metal detectors. Good job.
That's him! Get him to the top of the tower!
Let the drill do it's job. We'll have the Commissar soon enough.
You need to get the bags back to the window-washing rig.
Hahaha that was kiff! Now get going, friends!
Ha! I bet he didn't expect that, for sure!
Come on, restart the hacking!
Find the prisoner first and then you can worry about the cash.
Damn, that was the wrong tile!
Go on forward guys!
Protect the hacking device!
...and hope it works.
What's happening with those drills?
... I'm back in a little while!
Just a minute for the helicopter.
Nothing happened? Must be the wrong one. Keep looking.
You'll stand a good chance if some guys provide cover, while others work on those boxes.
What? That must've been the wrong tile!
All right, the truck is through there. Grab the C4 from the bin and blow that door.
Your first priority is finding your ride out of there. Maybe check the hangars, yeah?
Seven
You'll find the code inside the auctioneer's office but to get in, you gotta get the keycard from him.
God damn!
That's Buluc! Take him out. No need to dally.
Make your way outside and go down into the sewers. You'll need a bit of thermite to cut through the grating, yeah?
OK, OK! Plan B - find the server room. Shit!
Another twelve and we're done!
That dwankie?
You should find a pass phrase there. You'll need it when you call him.
In case you don't have time to drill, use a shape charge if you have one.
You have to press those symbols in the right order.
Putting those radars out of action is our next job, gang. Do it.
The bank shutters can be closed from the security office. They should help you keep the police at bay!
Looks like keys to an airplane or something.
There should be a fence nearby. Cut it open and get inside.
Use the one owned by "Chloe".
These coppers ain't worth a yak's baff.
Be a good little criminal, and press that fucking button!
You cutting though yet?
Ok, gang. We need to find a way into the lumber mill. This might be crazy, but maybe we could use the anti-air gun we hacked earlier? Just redirect its position and blow the wall up?
Zero.
Another power loss! Switch it back on!
You gotta keep the pump running. Protect it!
You're keeping it quiet. Great. Remember - you need the keycard.
Alright! That's the whole database. I should be able to sift this data, maybe find where the right truck's headed. Your work is done guys.
Wouldn't be surprised if Garrett has the code around there somewhere.
Ach! They've started searching the building!
Great, now start up those drills.
The escape will be there in eight minutes.
Ah, fuck you guys. We're doin' this shit.
I think those tunnels will get you into the warehouse folks.
Alarm is off. Smooth. Open the door!
You gotta get that blocker placed.
Don't let any civilians get near the alarms!
They just activated several gun turrets. Stay frosty!
You opened the last truck. Check inside!
Make sure those domkop police don't get near the drill!
Our chopper is coming in, he'll blend in with all the news choppers.
A jewelry store downtown has just stocked up with jewelery. That jewelery could be ours. You up for it?
Grab those parts, heisters.
Get out of that burning steel coffin, gang!
Right, now let me just get this sorted. Won't be a jiffy.
...caustic soda?
Ok, the security gate needs to be opened.
This reminds me of an op I did many years ago, when I was still a laatie, jippoing ABC 80 computers.
Get rid of the cops!
I have an extraction plan. Go to the parking lot.
Great! Plane on approach now..
Got it! I always liked to play with cars as a kid...
That bag's holding a heavy cable. Use it to connect the hatch to the pick-up. Start it up and let's crack open that basement.
Look for the security panel, gang. That's the only way in.
Time to bounce, gang!
...that's my best guess.
You gotta set up the drill!
Boris is on his way. Isn't that right, Boris?
We need more water! Chopper's going to fill her tank. Hold the vault!
The enemy are at the gates, gang.
Through the tunnels and get to the beach, gentlemen!
Uh, I hope I got this right...
We should've switched fucking cars!
This is weird guys. The boards are lighting up like crazy. Something's wrong... I think we have major trouble coming. Damn it, I knew this was shady.
The manufacturers call it a heavy-duty industrial drilling apparatus, but heisters know it as The Beast. Gentlemen, start it up.
I will move to the building next door. Enter across the roof and you can meet me there.
OK people, my guy says this is a good time to hit the bank. Turns out the Harvest & Trustee bank manager should have kept his mouth shut. Anything could be in here.
Jingle their motherfucking bells!
Great. It's working!
Oh, I didn't know we were in a Sci-Fi movie. Well, okay then. You're gonna need to find the lead scientist for some kind of hand print authorization.See where he's hiding.
What the hell is Commissar working in this room?
Look over there. Little cop shits are stealing the money. The fuck is the world coming to! Kill them!
Now, take him to panic room so he can use the retinal scanner. Should work.
Raising security door.
There's a finder's fee for all the evidence you pull out of the safe house. I have to safe guard crime.net and it's contacts.
Come on, gang. Find a blowtorch.
That was the wrong terminal. Keep trying. Look for some clue, clock is ticking and we need to find the right one.
The main lobby.
We are going to need ingredients, so scout the place and see what you can find.
And... yes, that is a satisfactory piece of business! All of the bags! Now, please, attach yourselves to the cables, join me up here and let us meet in person!
The screws, friends. The screws.
Ok, let me see...
You heard the man! You can either steal more things or you get on that bike and ride! Ride like the wind!
Good work, my friends! Can't wait to see how those Murky bastards explain that one.
We came for the ones in cases, but everything else is gravy.
Greed is your guide. If you want it, go get it.
Another guard. Stay hidden.
C'mon, get a drill going on that door.
Hey! Get this gate open!
Detonator is counting down. Keep the kerels away from it. Don't need them cutting it, for sure.
I'll be there in one minute...
OK, cool - might come in handy.
OK folks, so here's what I did: I got you an escape chopper - thank me later - he's on his way!
Enter MercyKill.
Check for the safe guys. Got to be there somewhere.
I'm going to assume muriatic acid.
Everyone knows it's on the ground floor, even the tourists!
Let it rain!
Chopper will come back for you, so while we're waiting, why not get looking for Vlad's packages. Could be a nice little bonus.
Good. Keep the cops off of it.
You are skilled and silent infiltrators. We should work together more often.
He only had a week left on his contract.
Gang, the computer station there could be useful. See if you can find me a laptop or something.
The cops have sent an patrol to investigate. They'll be here soon.
Wrong one, maybe you need to have another look?
Another cop car have arrived to help out. You know how to deal with them.
Good, now hurry up and turn the lights back on or people will get suspicious and sound the alarm.
West Wing should be open to you now.
Snipers! On the roof.
Guys! Use the keycards in the dock control rooms. Get the dock gate open.
Looks like we've hit the jackpot!
What a drill. Let's see if it works as good as it looks. Fire it up.
I count four guys.
We know the call originated in West End. Look for something to give us a precise address. West End.
Mobster down. That should get Commissar's attention.
Back door looks good. Crack it open with a saw, friends.
Now, we have a little jol with the Commissioner. Go find his office, yeah?
The blueprints are in the archives. My guess would be the employee only areas.
Houston, come here. Shh, keep quiet.
Score! I can hear Vlad smiling from here.
Hurry! They're flushing down bag after bag of coke and it looks like they're enjoying it!
You gotta go back and check the mainframe again for the second artifact. Make it fast, yeah?

Alright, now, this is your safe house, this is where you spend your time off duty. It's not much at the moment, but give it some time. I'm working on it. I'll let you do some decorating yourself soon.
The code will be stored on the auctioneer's PC, so get hacking.
Come on friends, it's not going to carry itself, yeah?
I bet those wagons have loot. Check 'em out. Keep an eye open for C4 too.
You got to find Garrett's safe.
These fuckers chained me up! Get this shit off me!
That alarm is bringing in more porky reinforcements. Shut it down, yeah?
That chute there can transport the loot to the back rooms of...
Where did they hide that fucking VR set? In an alternate reality?
That should be all of them. Nice work!
Oh, you know we aren't leaving without some of those weapons. We just need to get them out of here some way...
Ach, that's not good. No way to break that open silently, friends.
Pick-up coming in one minute. Don't let up now!
The way is blocked. You gotta find the controls to the walkway and extend it!
They shot me, but it's only a minor one. Barely hurts.
It's going to be another one of those days, for sure.$NL;
We got four!
We need approval from the security station. I would do it myself, but alas...
Everyone has gotta get on the chopper!
Hang tight! Hang tight! I'm searching for an escape driver right God damn now!
I would really appreciate some help with those snipers!
The C4 is for blowing the gate. Get it placed.
You've defeated the second wave of cops!
It's that fucking Russian. He's behind this. Do your fucking job and end this invasion of my privacy!
Ah, it's stuck. Gonna need to shoot it down.

The Elephant doesn't like losing elections. He wants us to tamper with the voting machines headed to his district. We're going to the docks to put a GPS tracker on the truck carrying the machines. This will allow us to intercept the truck and deal with the machines before the election.
Pour him a drink. Once he takes a sip, the little something we added should... well, he's going to run for the nearest toilet. Follow him. Get his keycard.
Okay, she's drilling down into the vault. You keep her safe.
That's the last piece of the code.
Outstanding crew. The door's opening. All you need to do now is disable those lasers.
Find the railcar with the turret. You might be able to find an access card somewhere to speed things up.
Uh, fuck....reporting a near miss. Coming around again.
Great. Bag that body and get it out of sight before someone sees it.
Great. Now get back to the terminal and restart that download!
Garrett's office is around there somewhere.
See that copy machine? It has the goods should this caper go loud. But let's try and not let them happen, huh?
Now the fun part - steal a car! I'll blast the road - take cover!
The keys should be nearby. See if you can find them.
How's he going to get you out of this?
Those tunnels will lead you into the warehouse.
This is one of the ship Control Rooms. Computers can be used for entering GPS targets. There could also be a keycard or radio here.
That's it. Good! I'm waiting for you.
Almost there, gang. Any second now.
Looks like some codes, that'll come in handy.
Find Garrett's safe, friends.
Acid, guys, acid. Get some and pour it in there.
Good. Now reset the computer and we can continue.
Nice, that should do it for the roof.
Clearly, this guy is fanatical. He even made his place of prayer into a puzzle. Find the missing pieces to that shrine.
Might be a good idea to get that tarp off.
Knock knock! Now let's find the prisoner!
Flush it down the toilet! It will mix with the rest of the kak.
What're you still doing there? Get on the helicopter.
Look for the manager. Balding, black suit. Tie him down and see if he has more information.
I read in the newspaper that sharks almost never kill people. But there you go, eh?
More Murky guards are on the way. Don't think we've been discovered, but be extra careful.
Plan A is out the window, we're gonna have to gamble that the server is there!
We should have used caustic soda!
Come on friends, you have the thermite. Get inside.
OK the escape driver's coming in hot as hell! I think he's going to get shot up if you don't cover him.
Put on the mask and let's get this thing started.
Uh, guys...what's that noise?
Good, we got what we need. Murkywater and the Dentist will be in big trouble once this hits home.
Goddammit - they locked you out! Find a way around!
Ready guys?
Damn it! The alarm! The whole house knows we are coming now!
Watch for anything odd.
Come on, keep looking. Have you checked every roof? I know it's in the area.
Easy now!
There should be two of them.
Nothing. Damn! Are there more around?
...Find a terminal in the mainframe to hack into, see if you can figure out where to go next, yeah?
You have to find that cell block!
Ok, there's nothing left to steal. Get out of there.
We're almost there. Time to patch through to my pilot.
Ok, guys. Chopper is back so get to loading again!
I see SWAT vans rolling into the neighbourhood coming from the east. Dig in!
They heard the drill! The alarm's been triggered!
Use the keycard to get inside the server room. It's on the second floor.
There... that looks useful.
The vault code reshuffles every 10 minutes for extra security. Put a blocker on the keypad to lock the code in place.
Ach, the door is locked. Buluc likes to keep his wine safe. You'll need to find the code to unlock it.
Dammit! The plane snagged the cage but there was no goddamn cash. You guys need to pick it up and haul it out.
Ok, now for overriding the main panel.
Watch out! They are bringing in a sniper team by chopper!
The auctioneer has fled the building! You'll never get the keycard now, so just stick a drill on that door and bore it open.
Here it is! Take the bomb parts to the drop-off point!
Ach, I'm being stopped by a firewall. Get to one of the other computers and see if you can help me through.
Bile is on the way. Hang in there.
Right friends, that's the right place. Go out to the main hub and use the crane.
Right. Now find the comms relay and get access. We can make it look like the call is coming from the house.
Charon? What's up, you ok?
Step into the closet when you're ready.
Watch out for those turrets, guys!
You can dump bodies into the sea through the windows.
I give you these toys and all you want to do is stay in the box. Move it!
When this is over, what say we fucking buy that beach Bain was talking about?
Well, it's a keycard, and pretty damn useless now. Maybe if you'd found it earlier...
That ain't the sweet music of the children of the night.

Almost there. Blerrie, what a job this one is going to be! I managed to dig up a little more intel with help from Joy. To get into the PEOC, you will need one of the special keycards they use. The most likely place to find one will be in the Oval Office.
Stay clear of the guards.
Now get your sombreros on and into that tunnel.
Sanchez, where the fuck is RaÃºl? Someone is shooting up the place.
Looks like Matt's vehicle has crashed. Go check if he's alive!
...hope this website is accurate.
They made you! Do something - quick!
The incoming group has Minigun Dozers!
Come on, we don't have much time, extend the walkway.
The escape vehicle is leaving in six minutes.
If you chops find a guitar case full of guns... just let it be, yeah?
Are you looking for the tiara?
We need caustic soda!
Don't let the cops reach the hacking device! Now you're gonna have to reboot it.
Good start, now get the rest!
As before, gang. Get that cage prepared.
I got you an escape van, just outside the main entrance!
Nothing more to do here. Let's go.
Add caustic soda to continue the process!
That's it for the fifth floor. Excellent.
Cover me while I open the door!
Commissar's gonna be antsy after the motel attack, but he won't be expecting this. Masks on and give the rat what he deserves. Good luck.
Damn! Alright. Expect company, gang!
I think Rust mentioned this room. Maybe there's something useful in there.
Looks like you're going to have to go in through the back door. Use a saw to crack it open, yeah?
A gas tank and exhaust pipes, gang. That's what the mechanic said he needed, and you'll find them in the workshop.
Is it safe to come out yet? Are those loud bangs firecrackers?
Crap! Alright, forget about using the zip-line. Our guy had to run when the cops showed up.
It's getting dangerous here!
You have to steal Tin Boy!
Keep looking for those winch parts, friends.
The walkway controls... find them!
OK, missing some files. Witness testimonies, kept in the Archives. Get me those files!
Get out of there guys!
Ok I'm pulling this shit out of here. You guys keep the cops at bay!
Good job! Now drop off the loot into the vent leading into the basement area.
OK, looks like the the panic room door is controlled with a code and two keycards. Find them.
Expect very tight security here.
Hope he doesn't hit a hill. Keep the cops at bay.
No more Mendozas. You gave them a true Viking funeral, except they're not Vikings. Sad.
Check outside the Velvet Room for a PC.
Burn baby! Now make sure the kerels don't put it out!
Let's free Santa Claus!
We have some excellent lobster tails for you to enjoy.
I'm starting the clock. Look for a safe. If it's not in the safe - don't panic - it's in the building.
All the clues to the puzzle are now in your hands. Use them to solve the puzzle.
According to Rust, these biker keks keep lots of breaching charges around.
Fucking Hector. What makes a man spread his asshole for the feds like that. Ah, fuck it. Great work lads.
Look for something that's good for breaching doors!
Fortune and glory, kid.
Get back to the helicopter and secure the BCI tech!
Hey, everyone! Don't forget the bags!
Don't worry, it will be fine. Ah! Here he comes!
Alright, our dealer is arriving, hold on for a second.
You still have to find the second artifact.
All the extra loot goes into all the pockets. The more, the better!
Although we didn't bring the amount of meth that we promised, we can still go ahead with the deal. But be prepared in case things go south.
Go get the lance, badasses!
You have to restart the hack!
We're not getting through that door without a key... It's time we find this Chavez. He's in charge and should have the key.
We can't go lifting the container while you're inside there. Follow the plan!
You need to reach the wine cellar!
Gang, without something to hack the vault system, we're not getting it open. Keep looking!
Console on the left!
In, but the alarm is counting. Find the lockdown and shut it off before it goes off. Let's try and keep this quiet.
The escape van will be in an alley nearby, get ready to hustle.
Great, keep 'em coming!
Find the elves in the toyshop. You need to shout at them to get them making toys again.
The escape vehicle will be there in ten minutes.
Ok friends, get ready!
Find me his server room. I will scan his stuff for info on the arms deal.
The wheel stopped on smoke, no idea what that means.
You got made.
Hydrogen chloride is what you want!
Vlad's reputation will rise. You guys will get a nice little payday from this.
Three.
Federales are coming in from the roof!
Get back into the mainframe and find the second box's location.
Don't forget about Garrett, yeah? He's not going to be gone long.
Scanning target's location... got it, there he is!
You need to take the box.
Sweet, sweet gold! Great job everyone!
That's one for our client, and one each for you ultimate badasses. But don't stop.
Got it. Doors should be open.
Dallas. That console panel could actually be very useful. Try it out and see if you can find the computer. That would save us some time.
First thing to do is open that hatch to get inside. Once you're in, expect trouble right away.
There you go, better get those stones to Mr Blonde. His boss will be able to move them.
OK, we go loud! That panic room is secure, so you'll need a thermal lance to get through. It's on the way.
Get those bags. They have the pieces of the cage. You need to put it together in the street.
Remember we're after the voting machines. We need to hack them to turn the favor towards McKendrick. Look for them in shipping crates.
Turn the water back on!
Alright. Great. Lets see if he takes the bait...
Now we're gotta go in blind. Do it good!
Take a step back, this is going to cause a ruckus.
I hope they're insured...
... everything else is gravy.
Just wait until it's clear.
That's it, on the table. Pick it up, get out of there and keep it away from the kerels, yeah?
Plug in some new batteries.
The second pallet! Good. But good things come in threes. Like that week all my wives died. Find the third pallet.
Guys, it's fewer bags than we expected, but we can still do the trade and hope they agree to give us the information.
Bain will make the call with the pass phrase.
Alright now, I have access, hold on a sec...
GUYS, wait the vault it's electrified!
Is anyone going to pick up the phone?
Get the key for our friend!
This next part is noisy. Noisy, and dirty and smelly. I can't wait. Let's do this, huh?
I have a man on the way for you. Boris?

OK, friends! We're going to be touching down near the South Portico. There are Murkys everywhere, so be ready. To get into the PEOC you're going to need a keycard and I think we should start looking for one in the West Wing.
Run, heisters, run!
Tick-tock, said the detonator. Keep the kerels away.
The lasers turned off yet?
Remember - the explosive might have thrown the loot across the room.
Get into the van! Get in the van!
Wait a second...
The control room is up there. You see?
You need to get inside the police station.
What are you waiting for, use the thermite!
Get them off me!
Get to the chopper to escape!
For a police station, this is about as tough as they come.
Listen up, we're gonna put these folks into goddamn ecstacy. When I say, you hit the button. All right!
There's the alarm, gentlemen. Start the countdown.
If you turn the ventilation system to full, you should be able to clear out that gas.
Signal the chopper on the roof whenever you're ready.
Well! That's the last bag down the pan. Sorry, gang - no extra income this time around.
He's fucking asleep? Wake him up!
There you go! Almost home free.
Time to get in! Now!
This one's a wash-out. Another one. Quick!
OK, I trust you hear me loud and clear. Alright, we don't have any time to waste, let's just get to it.
That timer on the wall's ticking fast! Get the loot into the vent!
You must reconnect hose, is pumping air!
Bile is going to need some help to find you. Light a flare!
You gotta restart the drill!
They've booby-trapped it!
That's not optimal... but it happened. Go to the balcony!
You need to start drilling.
You still need to bypass security, so find those two routers!
It is foolish to steal from the Continental!
Right guys, if you make your way out by the Jack Rabbit Slim's, the cops will hopefully follow you so that Blonde can get the car out of there.
A couple years ago, some civvie chop got all they way past the Secret Service and stole a pair of knickers from the First Lady. It's true, friends!
That's typical. You should have a look in the clubhouse in case these dwankies have left a way to access the code somewhere. Start with the briefing room.
OK, time to steal some cars.
Come on friends, get cracking with those cameras.
Wait for the helicopter.
Hurry up and get to the West Wing, chop chop!
Now put your sombreros on and get into that tunnel.
The Murky contraband we're after will be money. Could be kept anywhere nearby, so you're just going to have to search for it.
Badasses on deck! Great job stealthing it. Containers are unlocked. Go for it!
Search all boxes you find. I won't risk missing the BCI tech because Rust's information was wrong.
Hey, on the upper floor there's a high-voltage box. Sabotage it and you should be fine to handle the vault.
Trash the entire mall. Either destroy each store individually, or look for something to torch them all.
Second number. Just one more.
Listen up, gang. I'm sending in a boat to pick you up. Look for the small water access near the river.
Two
You need to get to the tech lab and find the right shelf.
You'll need to drill that gate to get the briefcase!
That box controls the gate. A little creativity should get them open.
Boat's standing by to get you out, guys.
Perhaps there was interference on the radio, so let me repeat. Plant the fucking charges on the locks. Please.
If he's going to hide away, we'll have to draw him out. You could start destroying his treasured possessions and see if that does it.
Alright team, this jewelry store has a number of display cases flaunting some medium range gems and gold.
Sounds like a present fell outta the tree, gang. Might be more of Vlad's coke. Find it.
You're across! Now grab that stone!
You not going to have a look behind the doors?
Time for us to go!
No fat copper is going to fall through that floor and make it bigger, friends. You gotta blow it, yeah?
Excellent! Keep that drill going.
Great, now get into that Falcogini. I'll clear the road. Heads down!
No need to sneak about now. Locke has a plan B!
I don't want to be a douche, I really don't, but that coke ain't getting here itself, you know?
Nice work! The seventh wave was beaten back!
Nice! Go through the gate and head to the vault. Find the counting room and pour out the thermite. We're burning down to the vault!
C'mon, friends. Don't take too long. Disable those boxes.
Put the box on the conveyor, friends.
Guys!
Time's wasting. Start getting that vault open now!
All right. Head to reception, find a terminal and download the guest list.
Well, look... I'm going to send some guys over there to check on things.
You should find the chief's office on the upper floor. The evidence should be on his computer.
It would be beautiful if we could do this with you hiding in the airlock, but... alas...
All right! Not a single camera left to watch our shenanigans. Great work.
Just give me a second...
Pilot's gone down. Don't let him pass out. Get him moving!
One down, one to go.
Can't shoot that cannon without batteries.
The cops shut off the power, turn it back on!
Yeah, that's it. Ah fuck! This is beautiful!
Okay, the data is being transferred to the server in the other room. You can either go and get it or stay and scan more bodies. I'm sure Jimmy can find use for it and that means more cash for us.
More coppers coming soon. Blonde needs that bag.
There you go, now make your way further into the facility. And be careful, yeah?

Our client needs a blood sample from a patient being kept in the isolation ward of Mercy Hostpital. You gotta go in there, take out the surveillance, subdue the civilians and get me into the patient database so I can ID the guy. With the low security in this place, it should be a nice, clean job. I'll get you out via the roof when you're done. This job is a little shady, brokered through a third party- got some serious shadow-company military industrial vibes, but worth the risk. The payday is something we're gonna need in the future, plus a nice cash bonus.
Bile's on-site, gang. Start getting the bags to him.
Now, find the encrypted flash drive we came for. It should be in a laptop.
That's 14!
Stick some explosives on the gate and we're good to go.
Ah kak - those poes are bringing in more SWAT turrets, with the express purpose of bringing me down. All right, I can't pick you up in town, but I am prepared for this.
That's it. Stay and grab more of get out. Your call.
Ride, boys and girls, ride!
There's gotta be something volatile around there you can use!
They're dropping off guys on the roof. Get up there and deal with 'em.
OK people, the pick-up drive is here! He's on the street behind you!
It doesn't look good, guys - it doesn't look good!
Alright. Get access to the comms. We're gonna make a call.
Time to skedaddle you chops.
Great, now get down to the garage. Our Inside Man has marked up where you need to plant the c4.
That's 13 bags!
That's great. Thank you.
Great. Our second door!
Awesome! With all those bags, the trade should be smooth.
Paging Dr McCoy... Dr McCoy?
Every now and then, just don't trust me, guys.
Just three minutes.
And don't drop it...
OK, this is a fight - they will destroy the intel!
Yeah, how much money do I got in there? How much?
SWATs just breached the wall!
OK, start the next hack.
Looks like he's running dry. Bring him another with a little extra flavor in it. I'm sure you can find a bottle in one of the bars and spike it.
The job wasn't a total bust. Still, fewer stuffed bags than under Leatherface's stairs!
Collect all of Vlad's "precious" loot and take it to the garbage truck, chop chop!
Probably a good idea to shut off that alarm. There's a button for it somewhere.
Another package hit the ground, clowns. Try and find it.
Fires' out. You did well, gang.
Damn it guys, you've been left for dead by Bile. He's gonna get it later...
Ah shit, this one broke on impact. We got bundles of cash scattered about. You're going to have to find them, bag them and get them back here.
Hit the left and the middle.
Why Switzerland?$NL;
Now we need to code the tag for access. Get it to the computer!
For crying out loud, the pilot has hit the deck again. Wake him up!
You need three colored digits to enter the armory. Or guess.
Better find that computer, friends.
Nice and easy guys. This one is important.
Ok, the flare is lit. Great job guys, now just wait for Bile.
Go into the mall and rough up whatever you see. Keep civilians out if you can - we don't need unnecessary heat.
Once we are outside you will see our escape helicopter, as well as a large array of advanced radar equipment. State of the art. It could track us anywhere west of the Rockies.
Keep searching the motel, guys. There has to be some clue to where the Commissar is.
We have a fine selection of rare meats from Africa. You ever sampled elephant?
We're using the roof as our pick-up spot. Over.
I'm going with caustic soda.
Burning 100 million dollars is a hell of a thing. It makes me feel like a real banker. All in a day's work. See you at the safe house.
You should use your thermite to get inside the mansion walls.
And... Great. Their grid is weakening. Do another.
These are some determined fucking law enforcers!
That's the tablet PC. Perfect.
Now, only one vault can be opened at a time, and not all vaults are containing the loot. I will leave it to you to figure out which is worth opening.
We need a viral concentration of 65% or more.
FBI Ready Teams are on their way! Those bastards were on standby in the nearby houses!
Great, you found it. One of you get up there.
Fucking piece of shit car! Need a hand out here guys!
Now let's rescue our friend. The cell block should be nearby.
The first pallet hit the ground around here somewhere. Find it, mark the position and I'll come and collect it.
You'll have to use the blowtorch to get through this gate. Make it quick.
Try another key!
Hey guys, there's nothing left. Get out of there!
Remember to sneak under the cameras so they won't spot you.
Got it! I got the goats!
