Look out for the gas, friends! Wait until it dissipates!
Find Bain's cell with the cameras.
OK guys, get into the bank and find the vault and drill it open. Make sure no one triggers the alarm or escapes.
That's the first number. Need two more.
You need to take care of those Murkys!
One more time
Damn, they know you're there now for sure.
Give him the earpiece!
Good work. That ammo will fetch a nice price.
Pick that bag up, it's some cash to start you off, get it to the living room.
That's right. C4 each of those dishes.
Ach, the alarm is sounded!
Boom! How's that for a deposit, Benevolent!
Come on, you need to get inside.
There should be uniforms in the locker room, yeah?
Hell yeah, it's open! Get down there!

Dear Friends, we're going back to New York. Theres something buried in the foundation of the old Brooklyn Bank that Bain was after. Could be a way out of this current predicament we're in. While we're there, it might be a good idea to pick up some extra operating cash to keep us going. Replacing all of Bain's equipment isn't going to be cheap I can tell you, and the stuff I've got running as backup isn't going to hold up for long, yeah? At the moment, we're open targets.
He was officer material. Was!
Fuck! That's landmines. Keep off the grass and stay out of the camera view.
That's a strange looking dinges, yeah? Put in on a zipline chop chop!
Ach, it's blocked. Can't use C4 either. Check that R-FID reader!
It's firing! Get outta the way... Now!
Hey guys, it's been.. interesting.
Ok, here comes the eighth wave!
They're crazy! Shooting up the building with missiles! What the hell is this?!
And stay...you grass-chewin', horn-growin', freaky-eyed MOTHERFUCKER!
Open that second vault and you'll get a juicy bonus.
I sent along a new drill for you. It's based on an older model but this one will not jam.
You've got to keep at least 1 bag!
...Maybe someone forgot a keycard or something.
I got to go in a minute!
You came for the ones in cases, but everything else is a bonus.
Perfect! Now, give it a few seconds and we should be done.
Get to the far back and join up with Twitch!
That is the server, gang! 25 million dollars can be ours! Now we need to act.
We can get to know each other over whiskey and cigars later, because I feel that now would be the perfect time for a getaway, yes?
If you get up there fast enough, we'll make a fortune. Come on! Make an effort!
The leak willl be in the basement. See Mitchell about it.
Signal the driver when you're ready to go.
The Murky resources we're after will be money. Could be kept anywhere nearby, so you're just going to have to search for it.
Are you fuckin' havin' a laugh? There's a server missing. The log says it was taken to IT for maintenance. We need that server.
Center. And right!
Bile is on the way with the chopper.
Hey, if you don't find the lead scientist, you're not getting through that door.
Alright guys, we've got a three minute window here. Get moving!
Bile's waiting to ditch the winch. Light the flare for him.
Kerels got to the terminal. You've got to restart the hack.
What kind of animal would do a thing like this? And now we need to chop off his hand...
Go through the hole! Head to the neighboring building!
Go inside and drop the bag on the table so you can count it. I hope everything is there.
Just leave the car in the container and mosey on out. We're nearly done.
There's a lot of stuff coming home. Weapons, ammo and anything that murkier elements can liberate. Check Murkywater's containers.
A sniper is about to set up a position on the opposite side of the highway. Be ready...
Guys, the pilot is circling! Drop the flare!
I could see myself living in a place like this. If it were, you know, less creepy.
Good, is working again.
Whoo! That was crazy.
That did it, friends!
Hurry, friends. The detonator!
No telling where they might be though, you'll have to look around.
Thermite's burned out. You're all clear. Drop in and start bagging.
The gun needs to charge before you can fire it. Look around for a control panel in there.
...caustic soda?
50 percent done.
Get to the library, guys.
Ach, kerels have stopped the drill! Get it up again.
Better get that drill running again!
We're kind of on the clock here. A lotta other things to take care of too, yeah?
You've defeated the fourth wave of cops!
A contact of mine stashed a few body bags nearby just in case.
OK... MAKE SURE BULUC SUFFERS LIKE A MOTHERFUCKER WHEN YOU KILL HIM.$NL;
Plan B time guys, they knew we were comin'.
Hey, you assholes taking some sun? The trucks, remember?!
Don't you worry about him. Worry about yourself instead.
The cops are inside the house. Silent kills, people!
OK I see it! We'll be there soon.
Kerels have stopped the hack!
One high-tech, high-value piece of military badass right there. Drill en-route.
Now get that gasoline on a car and torch it!
Good. The computer is working again without interruption.
Fill it up, and I'll come back for more later!
Head to the pyro booth. Top floor. Hurry!

Every Christmas I set up a little operation - gifts for the children, and "gifts" for the parents, yes? Thing is, supplies are low this year. But! I have found an alternative. A clutch of assholes have an operation near here. Consider it a little toyshop, yes. I need you to get down there, take out the muscle and get the "elves" back to work.
You're breaking up... Can you hear me ok?
Damn! The containers got locked when the alarm was triggered. Gonna have to drill them.
Alright, I'm in. I'll pop that lock for you in a sec. Right now I need you to get back out front, grab the C4 and get it on the street.
Gang, get into the house. Come on, move it!
First router has been hacked.

Hey, assholes. You want me to keep my fingers off 911? Then throw a moneybag over the yellow wall by the auto-repair shop. Do it, now! An' I see one of you motherfuckers try and get a bag across the street, I'm onto the cops.
If you can't find him, make sure to check all floors of the building.
The police is on our back like a fucking pony tail here!
Locke, what are you up to? You better not be messing with my crew.
Two wall-mounted router boxes control the vault security system and each one needs to be hacked separately. Once you're in, I can do the rest and shut down the system from here.
Found that office yet? Maybe look upstairs?
Time to head for the roof where the helicopter will pick you up!
Reception. Okay, we may need it later - note where it is.
Find something that can take down a reinforced door!
Ok last step, let's open her up.
Looks like a good place to check for clues.
Looks like they haven't had time to get the wiring behind the wall. Find the switch.
Remember guys, we need ten bags to escape.
Guards are down. Don't worry about the cameras now.
There's the drop. Snatch it and place it by the lab.
Gang, Gensec truck. Hey, it might be carrying a keycard. You know what to do. Get at them.
Don't worry, I have a backup plan. There's a helicopter incoming.
That's the guard down. Don't have to worry about the cameras anymore.
Here's the second control room. Between the two, we can open the gate.
Next step - open the vault. Find some crowbars inside the warehouse and jam them into the cooling fans at the back. That'll raise the temperature within, and engage the failsafe.
Keep cooking people. Tempo!
Back to work, keep me covered.
Take the coke to the harbor. Signal the boat with the floodlights and he'll come and get it.
Hey, great. You found the keycard ahead of schedule.
Damn! Cops are sending everyone they got. Time to make this a blood diamond. Find security!
Um, my name is, uh... Tony. Why not. I'm calling from Customer Satisfaction here at The Grin.
OK, the first database is downloaded. Looks great but it's not complete. You can haul ass now, or stay and download the whole database. Your call.
Right, there's the access gate. That's an RFID reader. Nice bit of security, that. Have a look.
They're firing at the tires!
Witness me!
You need to add the caustic soda to keep the process going!
Watch it, friends! Those laanie Mexican police are spreading gas in the vent system. It will clear soon, so stay away until it does!
What are you waiting for? Into the docks.
C4 is in place. Just need to press this button and...
Get a keycard and swipe it through the time locks. Check civvies for cards.
Find that uniform yet?
When you return next time I won't be here, but you can always press that button to play a pre-recorded message.

I have been running guns in the Caribbean for a while. It's been very profitable, but some of the old movers in the region don't approve of my presence on the local market. The Bolivian Sosa Cartel specifically. As they could not compete with me on level terms, they decided to attack my operation - sinking one of my ships, stealing my merchandise and killing my operatives. That was very unwise. Now they must pay. You will collect that payment, in blood.
Get the vials into the cooler guys. Both of them. Then you get the hell out.
I think that will work... not that I ever took chemistry, but you can add the next part now.
Got those tanks mounted yet?
Go find those trucks.
You need that keycard, friends.
A nice rubber dinghy. All aboard!
Find the cell block yet?
Superb! Now, just drop the charges near the main door.

The Commissar is apparently all "if I can't have it, neither can anyone else". He's cornered, so he has his men flush a mountain of coke down the toilets! Hurry up and stop them, and the coke is yours!
All right, the numbers for the code are:
I'm not taking any chances with these boxes. Search 'em.
Donnerse! That's what we came for? Grab it and get out of there, yeah?
No alarm was triggered, so you can simply walk into the containers. Outstanding!
Take a nice, long drink, pal.
Pick up the pace, head for the library.
How'd you guys like to stay overnight in the Lincoln bedroom?
Great it is done. Get the keycard.
That's a great place to burn some priceless art.
They'll be digging chunks of cop out of the rubble for weeks!
I need that guest list, guys. Send me those files. IT, internet access, upload. Easy!
I wonder how much trouble the Commissioner will get into for losing the box.
Get to the platorm with the bags!
Ok, you made it so far and the kerels have made an offer. I think we can hold out for more.
OK folks: you go in, breach the vault with the thermal lance, burn the money and remember to film it.
Ugh, How slow is this guy?$NL;
DC now has a jewelry shortage - this is where we come in. Well done team!
There's your chopper. Get the bags in it. Then you can bug out, or stay and find more loot. It's up to you.
You piece of shit San Dimas puta! Where the fuck is Miguel? I told you to get him half an hour ago!
Luckily, old Locke provided you with a modified drill that is strong enough and will not jam.
You heard her. I've done a little homework and marked some terminals that should have the 4-digit code in 'em somewhere.
We're here! I need to get to the server. Drop these feds.
Ready for a nice surprise, courtesy of old Locke?
That keycard is one less thing we need to open the vault.
Get into the store, watch the civilians, watch the cameras and get it done.
Don't worry, no one will hear you back here. But keep it down to be safe...
You took care of the cameras, friends.
Chopper coming in! Roof guys, roof!
Alex... The idiot dropped the ammo... Elsewhere.
Keep looking for a manual or something.
We need to keep this place secret. Don't talk around town about where you are staying.
The comm frequency ain't here. Alright, then check the terminals in the office across the dockyard.
I got the van in the garage, but you need to go through the elevator shaft.
Our patient should have a tattoo on his neck.
Damn it, no comm frequency here. Alright, there's an office across the dock. Check there.
Not far to the Oval Office now. Get in there and find the keycard to the PEOC.
This is the penthouse level. Commissar has to be here.
Rust's bike isn't going to roll without an engine, and the mechanic said to check inside the clubhouse. Get a move on.
Bullseye! That was some flying! Now get out of there.
Gang. Use the radio. Let me speak to our ship.
Now! Tie him down.
That's two!
Ach, I should have paid more attention in chemistry class, yeah? No worries, friends... we'll figure it out as we go.
That's the last one! Perfect!
You better look in the boxes, guys!
Only race cars start without keys.
You can quit searching those cases - you found the bomb!
DNA match: positive.
OK, you guys totally emptied that hangar, time to get out of here.
Seven bags. You guys are fucking Olympic champions.
I hope you got a lot of cameras. It'll make it easier for us to find all the devices.
Get that hose re-attached!
You're looking for keycards. The buildings are your best bet.
Chopper's retreating! Wonder if Gage can get us SAM's.
Commissar has called in the big guns. The very big guns. Stay away from that chopper!
There's a call coming through to the PEOC. Connect me to it.
Gensec have upped their game, that's for sure.
I guess this will be a nice change of pace from D.C. and politics, right?
Great job gentlemen!
You guys are goddamn ghosts. Considerably wealthier ghosts! Well done!
Time to start looking for that stash of Murky loot. It's drugs we're after.
The crowd is heaving tonight. Let's give them a great show.
Okay, I have ingredients on their way. Stand by.
Ok, now shoot him! Shoot the piece of shit!
Over there. The First World Bank. Okay, get out and get to work.
Ride or die - that was their motto. Well done. This intel will help us greatly. Study it closely before we hit the scientists house. Let's go get this fusion engine.
Remember, you're looking for the armory.
Don't forget. Smash the meth into smaller chunks!
What's that? A blueprint?
Everyone, I am very sorry but we have some uninvited guests and I must therefore now end the party for your safety. Please see yourselves home and thank you for coming.
There must be some kind of instruction manual around there.
Remember - the trap, set it off!
They cut the power, get it back up! Fast! The elevator won't move otherwise.
You need to get all the winch parts, friends.
Can't do it, Broadsword. Got a lot of wind shear on that vector. Over.
Alex nailed it. Ammo is right there.
The radar is still operational. Use the explosives and blow it up.
Let it snow, let it snow, let it snow....
Heads up you chops, the dinges is about to go off!
Hustle it. Get to armory in the guards locker room! We need that C4!
Everything's locked down - if you want me to fix it then I need to get into the surveillance room.
OK. Whole database is recovered. No point hanging around - get back to the boat.
OK crew, this place has a ton of display cases. Smash and grab style, fill those loot bags to the brim.
The customer is getting close, standby.
You've got to hack the console! We need to get inside the display cabinet!
Where's my god damn protection?!
You gotta wonder, if the nukes were dropping, would you really want to have to go this far to get to the PEOC?
Don't worry my friends, Vlad has arranged some help!
Scout the place and hit them hard. Get those jewels and keep the civs at bay. Let's get rich!
Use your ECM Jammer and disable it. That will give you the time needed to lockpick the door.
That's 17 bags!
OK, that's the server. Get the scrambler on there.
Now, pop some smoke out there so the pilot knows where to drop the equipment.
OK folks, the pick-up's here. Cross over that walkway - he is on the other side of that street.
Gotta go, friends. Hurry!
OK, OK! I'm on it!
First of all, besides from that starter kit, another package is awaiting you in the back alley.
You need to go to the archaeology room.
Always exit a social gathering with a bit of flair, friends. Now, secure that box and go.
Now, there will be time for longer hellos later, but we should really make our escape now, yes?
You'll need something for cutting those chains!
Ok, so that's how you want to do it? Let's go to plan B!
OK, I got you a new plan but you need to be quick. Mr Blonde, did you bring the freezer juice?
Yes, sir, will do. Thank you!
Get the safes loaded onto that truck!
Ah, that's what we came for. Nice and shiny. Take it and and keep it safe!
Alright, locate the server room, and get inside, there's no point in disabling the alarms now.
Can't drop the equipment until you arrange the smoke!
Ah, kak. The place has gone into lockdown.
What are you doing?
OK, I'm in. Give me a little time.
Nice. That cuts their options. Exploit that.
Take a look around - Vlad's tiara has to be in there somewhere.
The winch! Take the chain and get it on the teller booth!
Good call. If you get it back in one piece, it will fetch a pretty penny, yeah?
We don't have time to load and unload the safes. The chopper's just going to carry the truck. It can do it. You just need to get in!
Don't let them close, gang!
I kind of have a bad feeling about this. Should I have a bad feeling about this?
...I'm 91% sure.
SWAT have sent a heavy truck. They're taking this seriously. Knuckle down.
Right, friends, let's keep our hostage out of trouble and safe, yeah?
We need to track down the guest with the keycard. Probably pumping nickels into the slots.
Kerels have stopped the drill. You gotta restart it.
Brilliant! Set the computer back on.
Bank robbers win!
Great. Now place that C4 and we can start getting out of this place.
Yeah, come on in.
Counter-clockwise friends. That's how you remove a screw. Most of the time.
OK, friends. I've got Twitch standing by to come get you. Let me give him the go-ahead. Hang on for a bit, yeah?
Guys, the EMP will most likely take out our communication when it goes off. But you know what to do, enter the laboratory via the hatch and look for the test subjects.
Yeah, there's a charge on my credit card the wife can't see. I was in Mexico and...
Look in all the sanctum rooms if you haven't found everything you need.
You gotta grab the parts of the winch, crew!
I've got Twitch waiting for you in the basement. Take the elevator, and don't forget the box!
Looks like we hit the spot. Those are the guns we are after.
The second box, friends. Find it in the mainframe.
More enemies! I'd appreciate some help...
An old saying in Ukraine is 150 years for every sin, then you burn forever.
That's a proper jailbreak, my friends!
Power's down! Get that goat!
Okay, patience now, my friends. Each vault has a short timelock. You know, for security.
Get the water hose connected to the safe!
One of you guys pick up the phone!

That truck you assholes tagged wasn't the right one, so we can forget about intercepting those voting machines. We're going to try something else to keep the Elephant sweet. We can trigger a re-election by scrambling the server at the polling place. To avoid suspicion on our sponsor, we'll make it look like collateral damage by robbing the bank next door.
Nicely done, now see about getting access to the vault.
Bain will make the call.
Great, now start the money maker.
The alarm has activated a second feature on the gate - a magnetic seal. Drill can't touch that, so you need to access a terminal to release it.
Well done, friends. Only thing left is to zip it out of there.
Load the bags!
Go check the Velvet Room for a laptop. Just don't stick to the walls.
That shit you pulled with my relative. You're going to regret it.
Typical. Just what we need, yeah?
There's the main gate. Could be watched. Maybe find another way in?
I think there's a PC in the fitness center.
There must a way to get beyond the fence. Check it out.
Try to find something highly flammable to light this up with!
Broadsword calling Danny Boy. Time to drop that skyhook cage. Over.
Good, now keep those dwankies away from the pump!
He bought it. The time has come to kill Mr. Sosa. Give him my regards.
You gotta find that plane.
We're not going in by the main entrance. You see that fence? That's our way in. Put on your mask and cut it open.
I, I don't understand, why don't you just hack the computers?
No cop could have seen this one coming. Perfect. The Russians are going to be pissed and Vlad will OD on vodka. After we get paid.
Nice job, contact resumed.
Nice. That should help. And speaking of help, so would lighting a flare. You get my hint, friends?
Great, you got some. Let's check this later.
What's that? A blueprint?
This is, uh, Craig in the, uh, Customer Satisfaction Department calling.
Pump's done! Vault is full and ready for blasting!
You gotta protect the Beast!
Ok, now make your way to the vault, yeah?
That's it! I can't stay any longer!
Now find a terminal in IT with internet access. Upload that data to me.
If there were more crews like you I think the world would need to store its valuables elsewhere.
A goat in a fan? This day gets weirder. Find the circuit box to halt the fan.
Have you found the garage yet?
Look around for crowbars in the warehouse. Stick them into the vault's fans, and wait for thermodynamics to do the rest.
It's like a needle in a thousand stacks of hay, but you need to find the crate! Get to the tech lab.
Oh, that safe looks like it could hold some etra loot for us. Get it open!
Ten seconds! Move! Move! Move!
Nice! 20!
That's it! Great job, gang.
Watch it guys, it's crumbling!
Any luck with finding the garage?
Grab those bags and get them to the vault. Might be a good idea to take some spares too.
The van has to split. I'm sending Bile in the chopper right now.
Great job, gang. The escape van is ready for you.
SWATS on the roof! Looks like they won't give up that easily!
It's open! Get the stuff out of the deposit boxes!
Hack the door to get it open!
Hell yeah! That was crazy, gang! Now get in there.
Thirty sec, guys! Hurry the hell up!
Only one left now!
He didn't pick up the server.
Bags to the car people.
See if you can find a clue to where the entrance is. They wouldn't make it obvious.
Don't forget those stones, get them to Blonde!
It's the cops! They're following us!
Come on friends, get to the archaeology wing.
They would probably want easy access to the tunnel, so check around outside.
Don't make a fuss though, you'll get discovered.
Christ, a lot of office gossip, but no codes. Next.
There's more of them! If you don't mind - some help please?
Rust's gonna kill me if I miss the sexy details, so I need you to grab a beautiful chrome skull from inside the clubhouse. I don't do things half-assed, and we want the best for this baby.
You can dance, I will give you that. Good work. Get the money here and let's talk with Vlad.
That's one. Get the next!
That's everything, wait for their call.
Watch those sprinklers!
They are all over the main entrance. We can't get out that way.
That gate will take you into the more guarded areas of the bank.
Get the timer going again.
I've got a driver standing by. Eddie, that's your cue, get in there!
Good, now get to a workstation and override it.
There should be another wheel around here somewhere.
Time to start looking for that stash of Murky loot. We're looking for cash, and lots of it.
The Gensec trucks just turned into our guy's sight. Wait for it... Wait for it...
OK, friends, now remove that saw.
The gun is ready to go, mash the fire button and enjoy the show.
Place the missiles by the radar and activate them. That should do the trick.
Welcome back, Director Stevens.
More like we're heisting an HP Lovecraft novel...
Use the blowtorch to open the gate.
It needs hydrogen chloride - for sure.
Three colored numbers. Look for computer briefcases.
Start searching for that Murkywater nest egg. It's in the form of weapons.
Use whatever you got to open that sucker up!
Have you looked upstairs for the office?
Alright. Scanning equipment is in position on the rooftop. Sneak in, take his mobile phone, laptop, hard drives, and tablet pc. Anything technical. Then bring it to the roof.
The van's coming in. Get the bags ready!
Holy shit! They've got mines hooked up to the camera system!
I've never seen shooting like that. Four shots, and four transports are taken out. Make it count.
Turn off the flow of coolant. That should make the secondary servers overheat.
And I believe that about does it, my friends! Now, please ensure that our hard-earned loot is placed on the cables and conveyed up to me.
The FBI is onto us! Guns up! Don't lose that coke!
Guys, I have to pull the chopper out until things cool down.
Fuel receipts, insurance claims. Nothing useful here. Keep checking the terminals.
My accomplice will assist you. He's waiting.
Get the drill going again, friends.
This isn't a war folks, in and out.
Die motherfuckers!
That was crazy guys!
Mercy Hospital, what do you want?
Are you looking for explosive ingredients?
Ok, I'm dialing now. Stay low and wait.
The car keys should be around there.
Maybe if you cut the power nearby, he'll come investigate what's going on, yeah?
Fuck me sideways!
OK, now you gotta get into the control room.
Security looks pretty tight at the front. Maybe look for other ways in.
OK..OK.. Just need to get the server out of its housing and walk it to the van.
Start searching for the Murkywater nest egg we're after. It's in the form of cocaine.
Hmm, the entrance looks secured. I suggest you try to find another way in.
You gotta get inside, quickly.
Snipers are here. We can't stick around!
That's it! They just flushed the final bag down the shitter. Give me a minute, I gotta mentally process what just happened...
This seems fishy but I don't know - get the paintings on the table and keep your spider sense tingling.
Sweet Jesus . . . Why does this happen to me? What did I ever do to upset these shitbags? I was only here to get Rust's bike...
Friends, Vlad here is getting a bit impatient...
Now search the boat, but be careful.
Finally, get him out now!
What's he thinking?
The main gate is the quickest way in, but probably watched. Maybe other ways in?
You got to fetch some gas and torch those cars.
Remember, you'll have to pay for these kinds of "special" favors in the future. My contacts don't work for free.
Nice work! The tenth wave was beaten back!
We could have used that guy. Ah well. Switch to the back up plan.
That's it. Great! Now return it to Hoxton.
Only one minute to go!
Still gotta get your hands on the card.
You should help the Captain, gang. Take that saw and put it to use on the door.
Well, we're not getting the van down any time soon, so blast the doors.
You got one minute til that Captain raises the alarm.
You need to hack this door!
*whistles* There it is. What a beauty.
We're going to make some money now.
And... In! Great. Now keep the connection secure. Going as fast as can.
They're the keys for the doors inside the vault. Good find.
Find the code. Did you check the whole room?
The staircase is blocked off! There must be a way up nearby!
Maybe he put it somewhere really obvious, yeah?
No time to sit around, you gotta go!
The thermite has melted a hole straight into the vault, just as planned. Jump down and grab the cash!
A sniper is moving in to deploy on a rooftop on the other side of the highway. Don't let him stop you.
What a messy situation. Let's get out of here.
OK, he's off.
We need the mechanic's help to put together Rust's bike. Follow his lead.
You gotta get the drill running again!
There he is!
The safe is open. See what was inside!
Chopper coming in.
That's how it's done! Now, grab the stuff!
Two time locks... hmmm. OK, we'll need keycards to bypass them. Security here is too low-level to have those, so focus on the civilian researchers. Pretty sure a few of them are carrying keycards.
Nine
Sounds like the cops are about to bust through to Wilson's house!
Come on, please, join the party inside!
You've defeated the first wave of cops!
Lost power friends, you need to get it back on.
It's rock'n'roll-time!
He's back and already cleaning out my drinks cabinet. Korva. Anyway, you boys did good. You earned this.
Kerels are still going after the weapon.
Mr. big-shot CFO had to go bye-bye. At least he had the priviledge of seeing my face before he went!
The drill has stopped!
Go back into the mainframe and locate the second box, yeah?
Time for a little comeuppance.
You need to find the emergency power lever friends.
Yeah, how much money do I got in there? How much?
Move up to the overpass and keep going uphill.
Okay, see that terminal I marked. Get over there, hack in and let's kill that magnetic seal.
C'mon, move it get into the house.
That sure showed them not to mess with you. Now, grab the coke and return to the van. Time to get out of here.
Nice job, sneaking Vlad's dwankie brother-in-law out of there. Maybe he will stay out of trouble in the future, yeah? (Heh.. not likely...)
Nice, friends. Thank you.
You see the chimney there? That's where Vlad needs those "presents".
Try the locker room for uniforms!
Now just grab that thing and get it out of there. It's what we came for.
The vault's open. Time to see what's inside.
That cannon's not going to fire without some juice.
You managed to unlock the outer panic room door, so the lance shouldn't take as long!
And they still don't know you're there. Keep it that way while the Moretta docks.
There's another guard. Stay out of sight.
The doors should open once the ECM jammer stops.
We need a crowbar, look around.
The trains belonging to Murkywater should be easy to spot. Find them.
OK folks, only way out of there is through those doors.
Go to that pillar! Move!
Ok, that's the last of them. Now we need to make sure no one knows what happened here. I'm gonna make a call, hang on, guys...
Stealing a man's car after killing him is the ultimate insult. I like it!
You did good, Dallas. Now, get to the van and get out of there.
Excellent, you got the explosives. Now, plant them on the radar.
I got access to the vault. Opening shortly...
Get over here, guys.
Almost enough.
Find his server room and get in there.
Hello, friends. You're almost at the drop point I have selected, so, if you would emerge and, as you say, get the party started.
Armory access granted.
See that open window? As long as things stay quiet you can secure loot by tossing it out there. A contact will pick it up for us.
Listen my friends... I've been thinking... that's a very nice Christmas tree. I think I'll take it. I will send the helicopter to pick it up.
The voting results are stored on a nearby server. Find it and scramble that data.
Turn off the valves at the bottom of the server rack.
Hit him!
There, now put that nasty stuff to work on the door.
Answer the Intercom, son!
Look around the West Wing for something strong to use on the barrier!
There should be four prison transports.
You got it. The Diamond. The goddamn Diamond.
Damn, the retinal scanner means we needed the boss alive. Now, we'll have to do it loud.
Hmm, I'm not familiar with that design. Must be very unusual. Have a look in the nearby utility rooms and see of you can find a schematic.

You see all those crates? They're about to get shipped out directly to the Commissar's location. Grab the labels and check them at the reader over there. That should give us Commissar's precise location.
We've got cops on the way, so don't dawdle. Find the C4! Check the guard room.
Damn! You've got to raise the balloon again.
Console on the right!
That's what we're here for, friends. Huh.. same kind of writing that Lindenhurst decrypted...
Coming back for another one. Let's drop this one on the house, ok?
You can only open one vault at a time, and I should make you aware that not all vaults contain loot. How you figure out which to open is your problem.
And don't get too close to the Murkys. You may be wearing their uniforms, but these guys are their top agents and know their own.
OK, I have access...
Guys, you need to get the hell out of there, and you need to do it fast. SWATS are gonna swarm the place and this is your only chance to get out!
Time to split! To the right and down the stairs. Go!
I'll deliver this and then come back for more!
That's it! We got the Commissar's location. Time to haul ass. Those crates gave me an idea...
Ach, kek! I've lost the connection. Turn the power back on, for me.
Ah OK... So, seems to be a bit too many of them here. Fusion Engines that is. Find the correct one.
All right, Bile is en-route. He'll ferry that counterfeit cash away.
Take the box back to the skylight where you came in, yeah?
Gang, don't forget to crack those containers. Drill 'em!
I found something for you to use.
Connect the garden hose to the safe.
You're almost at the gallery. Slip in, avoid cameras, guards, and motion detectors. Security's high because of a bomb threat.
You need to get that hose reconnected, guys. Come on!
Ugh, Why is it taking so long?
That's enough for Vlad, but get more if you feel brave.
Okay. I see the flare. Starting descent.
The shutdown has been aborted. You need to get back to the control box and restart it, friends!
I didn't like that poephol's manners.
Balcony. The C4 is on the balcony. I missed the roof. Sorry 'bout that.
I'm disappointed in you, guys. You can't even defend your own home.
Damn! The time locks are locked down. Keycard's aren't worth crap now. Time to brute force the security panels!
Haul that beautiful gold out to container 61. Hurry!
Activate the sprinklers. You got to put out the fires.
The snipers have me pinned down!
Second half of the database is on the way. Once we have it, I should be able to pinpoint the destination of the truck with the voting machines.
That's not how we do it! Never let them take you. This job is over.
C'mon, you gotta have a good look around for something to use.
We're intercepting Gensec trucks about to unload at the docks.
Looks like they hired a new IT specialist. See if you can find any clues in the manager's office about him, then hack his computer. Once in, I'll get the lock open for you.
Ditch the charges at the door, guys.
Get that tag to the computer. Chop chop.
If you got shares in First World Bank, sell. 'Cos they're about to suffer a hostile takeover. Let's do it.
Can't move forward. What do we do?
Remember where that ladder is, gang. You can access the roof there.
That goat has live current running through it! Disable the power!
Good, that should be the code. Make a note of it.
The truck is coming up. Just hit the gas and drive into it!
Make the tree come alive, with snow!
You'll have to force your way through the bars. Is there anything around there you can use?
Find and deal with the manager, crew. Gotta get that keycard!
I've arranged a false pager for a first-year resident, but first you need to get hold of a patient file.
I would have hid it in the safe too. But I'm a cynical man.
Hurry up you chops. Use the thermite and get inside those walls.
Ok, it's time to go!
Not a single bag?! This is a nightmare!
Come on. Get inside.
Case the place, guys. Find the bank, and find the polling place. Then get them both.
Great work! The vault should be exposed now. You know the drill.
Maybe look for Buluc's body guards' names written on something.
I'll be there in four...
The chopper's here! Watch out for snipers when you're moving the loot!
Now get the cable on both the pick-up and the hatch.
You have ten seconds to get to the van.
Let's get the bags secured ASAP. There's a boat on the way to pick them up.
And people are starting to talk and wonder what the hell is going on.$NL;
Thanks, I'll have my man here inspect it and if it's the right one we're good to go. So hang tight for a second.
Hmm. Maybe there's a better way in than via security.
If you call in the chopper, things are gonna go loud. Don't do it until you're ready.
Move quickly, friends. No time to waste.
The longer you take, the more difficult this is going to become.
Achh! That vehicle has got to be removed!
OK, friends. Time to put some fuel in that plane.
Whose bright idea was it to set up a methlab in an unventilated tin box?
You see the open window there? If thing's ain't loud, you can secure loot through there. Got a contact ready to collect.
Second color and number? Great!
Now, validate that blood sample.
Ok, the plane is coming in soon.
Now load up on C4. You'll need it.
Hurry up! It's just one minute until take off!
A little bird told me the Mendozas are flying in more weapons in preparation for the war with Hector. We go to their airport, find the weapons and take them all or destroy them.
... over-delivering! Way to go! Hector likes that shit!
Just hold on to your horses, friends. The vault will be open any second.
You're reading my mind. We're going to need that gas later.
Those keys will open the doors in the vault. That should help.
The server room is in security lockdown. We can't access it now!
Get those masks on, gang.
You got the data, Mr. Sturr?
Be quick now. It's got two code locks. You need code breakers on both. And stay hidden!
The chopper is one minute away.
The Oval Office is close. The keycard you need to enter the PEOC should be there.
That's nine bags!
Throw the bags into the back of the pick-up truck. He's right below the right window.
You're in the open. Problems will be on the way.
All right, now let the winch do its job.
Look what the badger dragged out of the bushes! Almost thought he wasn't going to show! You car is here, friends!
Get to the escape! HURRY!
You might have to check the upper floor.
A door breaker! Couldn't have wished for anything better!
Great. Now bring on the waterworks!
The Dentist just clued me in - the Commissar likes to keep his best loot in the basement. Look around the ground floor rooms for something that might be an entrance.
Now!
OK, Gensec is approaching. Gun that engine. Move! Move!
YES FRIENDS! Oh, sorry... I'm not used to this sneaking about, yeah?
Let's give Mr Blonde a diversion. Make a break for it over by the Big John's Burger Joint so the cops will follow you and not Mr. Blonde and the loot.
Your next target is the voting machines. I'll bet they're stored in sealed crates. You clowns will need to improvise to open them.
Get a drill onto the safe, gang.
Might want to pick up the pace gang.The keycard and code are all you need.
One!
...Kerels are on route in squad cars, so don't dawdle, and keep those civvies out of your way, yeah?
Now while the time lock counts down, you can get ahead of the action. There's a zip-line on the roof that will need setting up.
Have you looked in the entire sanctum? There's a library, a lounge and even a meeting room. Buluc has thought of everything, yeah?
Come on, go to the computer.
Dwankie chop! I would like to kick his teeth in.
... make sure you're ready!
That's the exit! Just a few more steps to clean clothes and hot baths.
More leather dwankies! Take care of them.
C'mon, grab the dinges!
Security here is tight. We might be able to do this heist silently. But if things go loud, don't worry. I've always got a Plan B.
Are you nuts, Vlad? These are live nukes!
That console panel should control all the cameras in the building. Use it and see if you can locate the computer that way.
Can't be 100%, but I think that's right.
You almost gotta feel sorry for the Commissioner after a night like this. Almost.
Into the mansion! Hustle!
SWATs on the scene... Here we go.
Still waiting on those routers.
I've got your airborne friend Bile coming in to lift you out.
I can see that Ernesto Sosa likes to collect paintings. We'll burn them all, that should make him angry. Gather them in a pile.
The van will be there in a couple of minutes.
...I think so, at least.
Gang, you need to grab the car keys.
Taking a bit of time, isn't it?
There should be clues around to help you figure out the truck. Get Sherlocking. Look for open containers, they might indicate what the trucks are carrying.
The Mayan dinges is probably opened with that codex. Just need to find the right symbols. Have a search nearby and see what you can find.
Well, no fusion, but at least we get to drive gas-guzzling cars a lot longer this way. I love my Firebird as much as the next man.
Come on, find that second truck.
Stand by guys, the chopper has to do a little detour until things calm down.
Well, looks like we have some crafty litte thieves, trying to steal our money. Put them down.
I'm heading off to unload these - but I'm coming back, hold on.
You'll need some kind of tool to cut him loose.
Keep looking! You've got to find that evidence!
Alright, chopper's here. Bring the pilot to it!
Got it! I'm in the system. While I finish this, get out to the van and grab the C4. Plant it in the street.
...bolts need to go into the floor.
OK, time to open the vault...
Really, Bile? I might have expected that from Alex, but not you... Anyhow, gang, go pick up the C4 and plant it around the floors right above the panic room.
What are you waiting for? The vault is open.
Did you find the key tag yet?
This thing has secrets that can topple the government. Wanna see what the President keeps in a folder called "Gentlemen's Interests"? Yeah, you do - for sure!
You heard the man. Let's find those trucks.
There's an override switch in the security office. It closes the bank's shutters. That's gonna help you keep the feds out of the bank.
All right, first things first: set up the saws.
OK, looks like a proper cocktail, now get that stuff on the door and let it work, yeah?
Keep the cops off the circuit breakers if you want to make it!
Don't let them take your money bags!
Ain't no bailin' on this one. We're finishing what Bain started.
Okay, you can only zipline up two at a time. And there's no going back down, friends.
While I'm doing this, you should go ahead and find those three laptops with the code fragments.
It's quiet out there tonight. Keep it that way.
Wasn't this one. Keep going. Vault is here somewhere.
OK. Give me a minute or so.
OK, I'm coming in, get the server ready!
That's the place, but you gotta get into the control room.
Now it's our turn to finish the job and take his place down. See you at the safe house.
You ready for it? I'm dropping the hose.
Good, now we need at least 3 more just like this and you need to get them to the van. It's in the parking lot next to the gallery.
Be quick now!
Chopper's headed for the lumber yard - be there!
Stand by, crew. I got a batch of ingredients on their way.
How's that door coming along?
Park up here. Alright. There it is. Let's do this.
Oh, shit!
A little while longer.
You're gonna go in through the fence, find the guns and bring 'em back here. They're not going down without a fight. If it hits the fan out there - destroy the guns.
Alright, nobody stay underground.
Now, get those trucks opened. Let's get inside them.
Blerrie, they took the hostage out from under your noses! We've messed this one up good!
Excellent, you got in. The EMP parts should be there somewhere. Find it.
C'mon friends, the drill has been stopped!

Gensec have a brand new vault - the Investment Safe. Unbreakable, they say, and they're showcasing it at the arena. The door is made of their new compound - Vivinite. But everything has a soft spot. With a bit of C4 and a new circular cutter, we can steal their cash out right from beneath them.
That's the first machine hacked. Make sure you close up that crate. Don't want anyone getting suspicious.
Before we begin, I've arranged for a few small articles to be left for you. Find the crates with the red strobe.
Keycard to somewhere in on the next location. Sweet.
The Grin's vault can only be opened with a three digit code. This is one of the numbers we'll need to open it. Make a note.
Just missed it. Try again.
Try not killing anyone, but if it has to be done, then hiding the body under the train should be safe.
1600 Penn, maybe we go there for our next big score.
Don't go down while carrying blood samples guys, they're likely to break.
The code is split onto three laptops.
OK the intel is good. It'll help us plan the attack on the big villa that the scientist seems to be hiding in. Let's saddle up and go there.
Keep looking. Pull out the books if you have to.
Something's up with the elevator... Wait... Give me a moment.
That's it. Now we just need some more on the fourth and fifth floor.
Keep going guys, we're still undetected.
You guys need to shut that alarm down. Find the button, yeah?
Are you having problems?
It's finished. You should be able to get through the gate, now.
Right in the bradley, yeah.
Can't find the laptop? Check around the house - the garage maybe?
Now go to the computer so we can code that key tag for access!
Did you find the cell block?
Damn. The panic room has more reinforcment than I expected. State Department didnt cut corners. We're gonna need a thermal lance. I'll call in Bile.
It's a bare bones haul, but it'll do. Better luck next year, crew.
That's the door, but don't open it yet. We need to disable the alarm, hold on a second...
They're dumping that coke like the mean it! Get up there and stop them!
I left a case of thermal paste for you down there. Make sure you grab it.
First stop is the Operations Room. It's the Feds' nerve centre. Should be able to find what we need there.
Now boost that gold to the readied container in the yard. Number 61!
Woah, we lost some loot in that explosion! Well, no time to waste! Look trough the rest of the deposit boxes.
Did I speak in Afrikaans? My apologies! I meant to say "please" "plant" "the" "charges" "on the locks"... you kaks.
Away from the gate! Hustle it!
You guys got lucky. The vault's already open!
We really doin' this? We're really doin' this!
Did you bring the data, Mr. Sturr?
Charon? Are you ok?
Don't miss that chopper now!
60 seconds to target. Over.
Two minutes.
The subway entrance will be open in 30 seconds, just hold on.
Great job - it's got all the info on where the money's hidden.
That's the server room, get inside and hook me up to the computer.
I'll carry Bain to the copper if you just keep those Murky chops off us!
That's the code! Great. Now get it working on that time lock.
Help the citizens of DC to vote right. We need to find the ballot machines in the harbor and intercept them before they get deployed. The machines must swing votes to me!
He's got turrets too! Watch it!
Quickly now, friends. In and out like mousey ghosts, yeah?
Don't shoot the Christmas tree!
Just keep hacking those machines. The more shit we fling at Schwartz, the more will stick.
Too many people in there. Watch the civilians or this will get ugly fast.
They're breaching the wall!
Look out, tear gas!
You need to get the power back up.
OK, that's the Petersson file. They got him isolated in the ICU and you gotta get to him. Time to play doctor, guys.
Remember guys, the payoff on this one is important.
More snipers incoming! Watch out!
Ok, we need to lift this little baby out.
Uh, it was number...
Look around for hose line and tank of diesel.
Deposit boxes! Start breaking them, gang. One bag is minimum, but take as much as you can.
Hey guys - did you see the splash it made?
They shot me, but it's only a minor one. Barely hurts.
Careful guys. If you go down carrying one of those things, you might break it.
Great, guys! Now you can grab some more loot or take the escape, the choice is yours.
Open those doors, friends.
Drill baby, drill!
Even diamond bits break! You're gonna need the spare parts to get it going again.
And now, if you would be so kind, the loot bags to the helicopter? Please?
Be there in under a minute.
Make sure we get the paintings.
Go start the drill!
People will pay fortunes for this ancient Babylonian shit.
Let's fuckin' blow this pop stand.
The gate should be open for you now.
Uh-oh, looks like Commissar's chopper is back for another bite.
Good! Defend your campfire until it's all gone!
Credit applications. Accepted! No codes though. Next one.
That will look great in the safehouse if we can ever make room for it. Take it with you.
That should'a been muriatic acid!
Pick up the C4 and then plant it on the floor right above the panic room.
You are worse than pond scum! I will silence you forever for this!
No... no...there will be no leg-cutting here right now, got that?
Add muriatic acid, to continue the process!
What a great way to start the year. With a mountain of fucking coke to move! Congratulations, dear friends.
Wrong code, friends. Wait until it resets, then have another go.
I lost connection, I need you to get the power back.
It'll just be one one minute.
That's just what I needed!
Can't believe what a domkop he is.
That's the callback, it's seems to have worked. When the timer hits zero - we get rich boys and girls.
...for sure. Or, most likely.
Find some cover!
Thermite's done. We can use water pump nearby to fill the wagons. Connect that hose to the vault.
Can't do much until you get inside.
Come on, crew. Get the safes out. Put your back into it.
Keep bringing goats!
Search the manager's office to see who this new IT guy is. Then locate his computer, and hack it.
Maybe some of those workers have a keycard for the railcars.
Reboot the hack. And keep the cops off it!
The damn scrambler just went down again. Get it fixed!
Don't hold back! Give him a good smack!
Pinky Demon schnapps? Huh. Find it, spike it, serve it.
That terminal is showing which truck is going where. Keep checking. It might help pinpoint our truck.
Almost here. Hurry! You beautiful bastards!
A bit off my game today friends. Missed the software firewall backup. Can you find the correct computer and turn it off?
The piece of shit just crashed again. Reboot the scrambler!
Good work people. That was a hell of a thing to move, but it's the right engine and it's locked up tight. Maybe one day we'll go freelancing and take it back, huh?
Back office! Open the door!
They've got every road out of there blocked. Time to go Vietcong on them. You'll see what I mean.
That's keycard two. Good job, guys!
That's a keycard alright. Take it!
Just one more keycard. Gotta be around here somewhere.
Gensec suffered at your hands today, and doing it loud means the world knows it. This is good.
Go Go Go! Cops will be here any minute!
Soda. Caustic soda.I wouldn't mix a gin and tonic with it, though.
Uh, sorry, this is my first day, what do you need?
That's just... strange, eh?
You gotta get those posh dwankies under control!
Looks like the armory needs a special access level, you'll have to recode the key tag.
Alright. First task: get on the other side of that fence.
Bravo! Now, simply operate the officer's controls. It is a tier-7 job, monkey work, anyone can do it.
Hey, maybe that hatch hides something that can help us locate the Commissar. I got an idea how we can crack it. Bile is bringing you something.
Something to open that door, remember!
You're almost there, gang!
Don't look now, but...
That's the Murky warehouse. All right, get at 'em!
This is a historic day, gang. Haha, you finally cracked the Benevolent.
It's a tiara, keep your eyes open. If it's not in the safe, it could be anywhere.
Great. There it is. Disassemble it and then move the pieces out.
The alarm disabled the time lock. It's a setback but not a fail. There's a maintenance room on the roof. Get there. We should be able to reboot it.
Nice job, gang. Now start getting the goats in.
Vlad is grateful you are doing this job. When this shit is over, and Buluc is dead, we get back to work for real, yes?
Shame to see nice tech blow up like that. But fuck it!
Turn on that water hose!
Shoot the gas can to set it on fire!
So when you have your fill, I need you to drop the bags into this vent here. We'll pick 'em up later.
This is the boat driver.
Quickly now, get the power back on.
Put him down in the chair and get the codes out of him.
That was some damn good sneaking, Dallas. I am impressed.
Your teammate is down! Help him!
Destroy the weapons or get them up to the van. Getting them to the van will get us more cash.
Go put that door breaker to good use!
Console on the right! And the left!
One of the pallets hit the roof of the diner. I bet that had those Yanks shitting in their coffee, yeah. For sure.
The civilians might get ideas. Don't let 'em have 'em. See you at the safe house.
Damn right we are. And if the fucking Dentist shows up, we're finishing him too.
Guys, we got all the money. You should get out of there!
Listen up! The cops are bringing in a lot of people to block the tracks up ahead, so you really need to go. Bring the BCI tech and head back to Bile!
Come on, fingers out of assholes. The vault will be in a Murkywater container.
You need to point the cannon right, yeah?
Make sure no one else is there.
Thats everything, nice doing business with you gentlemen!
Look, I know Vlad is nuts. But he's got a lot of connections and I have a good feeling about him having a line on some big jobs down the line.
The cops cut the power. We need to get it back on.
One more, keep looking.
It's done. Now hit the button, and lower the bollards.
Sweet money, guys! Now make this worth it by grabbing as much loot as you can!
Sure thing, boss. On my way.
Ok, time for the money, guys. We're gonna loot Ernesto's floor safe. Hook those winches up to the floor.
Remember guys, we need five bags to escape.
Yeah, I brought it, so what now?
Nice work! The second wave was beaten back!
Go! Keep moving!
Come on, gang. You've gotta get the crane in position.
Keep a low profile near the workers to be safe.
Let's go with caustic soda. What could go wrong?
Any second now. Does anybody know any jokes?
Time to escape!
Use the manual to find which cable to cut, yeah?
Careful, friends! They've deployed tear gas!
Might be good to see things from the roofs, huh? For sure. Look for a ladder to get up.
This is not your quiet neighborhood police kiosk. Be ready for anything.
Almost there, gang. Get those clown masks on.
That must be FEDS - Taxman is being set up!
...what's the worst that could happen, right?
Make sure the police don't interfere.
Friends, fancy a bit of fun in the desert? There's a Murky facility that needs looting.
There's space between the trains too. It's worth a look.
This was found by our "tomb raider" division. They're great guys. Drink like fucking micks though.
Trustee bank is up ahead. Go in, find the vault, blaze the money, video the whole thing and get out. FBI is on the highest alert so make it quick and clean. Let's do it.
Get to the weapons lab, friends.
Guys, they're throwing everything they have at you. Better make it out, fast!
Yoohoooooo! Send the bags up here, my friends!
The evidence that Hoxton spoke of will be in that lock-up. Look for it. It should be marked out.
I've set up the meeting location. You meet in an abandoned trainyard. Good luck.
Right!
OK, I got to bail!
Those bastards put the fire out!
... real close now!
No time friends, you gotta secure the artifact!
Can you clowns keep the noise down out there? I'm resting in here.
Fucking move it, guys!
Awesome! Let's go!
There's a lovely little prototype in one of those crates, dear friends. Open them to find it.
It's caustic soda.
See if you can cut the lights in his office through a nearby circuit breaker.
Remember to check inside the buildings for the remaining keycard.
Fuck! The cops got roadblocks everywhere! It's like they knew! I'll pick you guys up a bit further ahead!
They fuckin' shot Brown in the face!
... going as fast as I can!
I will send in the necessary ingredients for you. Hold tight.
Winston won't be happy!
How long, depends on how many sins you have done. And your sins, they are many, you fucker.
That drill isn't going to move itself, friends.
WPD's on our tail like a bad date!
There's two cans of thermite there. One of you other guys grab it.
One minute.
I would be very surprised if they didn't have a special safe where the keycard might be.
Guys! Every time the mercenaries mess with the EMP, the charging process decreases! Don't let them touch it!
When you feel ready, go ahead and make your way out.
There we go. Money in a box!
Those shelves look a bit out-of-place. Make sure to search them thoroughly!
Guys, I'm gonna need some help getting out of here with this stuff.
First, see if you can get inside. You might want to try a quiet approach.
So, here's the plan. Get a hose down the hole from up top, and blow a pack of C4 inside the water filled safe. After that, grab the loot and get out of there.
There... that person has the look of someone who spends all day hooking up servers. Get him to open up the lock on the security bars.
Once you're out of there we can talk some more about what's going on. It's gonna get rough I suspect.
Incoming! From the lumber mill! Stay on your toes!
Take care of those lasers, yeah? Chop chop!
Perfect. Now blow the wall and let's get the hell out of here.
I'm doing this. I'm committed. Limo's going bye bye.
Time to move!
The Murkys are going to try and stop the drill, so don't let them!
Better stand clear, friends. This could get messy!
Hey, that's a GENSEC armored transport! If you break it open you could steal some cash too!
You need to go and activate the crane, yeah?
Now we need to get through the vault door. Two keycard terminals need to be activated, within a small window. Find two keycards.
You will see soon enough, my dear Buluc. You will see.
The code has been blocked, so forget about it. Going to need another solution.
Aha, the cargo manifest. A little intel on the containers is always useful. It's still general, but it narrows the field. Nice job!
What do you think guys? It looks pretty good in there. Grab what you can handle!
Could be useful somewhere down the line.
Open the garage doors, friends.
No need to carry that artifact around, just put it on the conveyor.
This place has a formidable vault. Thankfully, I found just the tool for it. Get that bag to the vault.
Hop in the elevator guys, then get your asses to the roof!
Guys, this is R.G.
Now just raise the balloon and let the pilot do the rest.
Great. Now start loading that cage with bags.
I saw a conveyor chute over there. Throw the loot in. It connects to the kitchen of...hang on.
Cars? Uh ok, yeah I can do that. Where is it?
Thermite's done its job. Now hook that water pump up to the vault.
Saw those trucks open and find him!
You've got all you need. Time to mix that cocktail! Get it all together, and arm the bomb.
Alright, that's the door to the server room.
The bikers are apparently storing stuff in an old bunker. The mechanic said you would find a seat for the bike in there.
What is this, some kind of crime scene tv shit?$NL;$NL;$NL;
Maybe if we send him an 'urgent email'? There's another compromised computer near you we can use. Go find it.
Dunno what that is, but we got it. Now, back to the car!
Ah, it's a FBI operation - no way out! They're going to take you down unless you shoot your way out of there!
Great! That's the server, now set up the connection.
Accessing now...
Well look at this! I thought I was never getting out of here. You untie me please?
I can't get a good angle on those snipers! You need to take them out!
Yeah! Thats the sweet sound of success. Get yourselves in the basement and check what's in there.
You can do it faster if you set up a zipline.
Blerrie! All the doors are sealed. You're going to have to find another way into the vault room. Get up to the second floor and look for a weakness in the floor or something, yeah?
Get that guy into the chopper. Come on, go!
Asshole! That's not snow falling. That's my fucking product. My fucking product! Thanks to you!
Find the computer. Send Moretta the GPS data.
Ah, they've gone and messed up your cocktail. You gotta mix up a new one, friends.
Now we wait for the time lock to run down. Did I ever tell you about my grandpa and his heisting days?
There. Now just give me a minute.
Settle down, you chop. They're not going to be cutting off any legs today, yeah?
Time to have your tuxedos pressed, yeah? Let's crash an auction.
Open up the elevator shaft. The van's waiting for you in the garage.
Don't let BFD overheat. Refill that tank with water!
If you want to dump bodies into the sea, you can use the windows.
This is gonna take a while. Make sure to protect the winches while they are working their magic.
OK, great! Get that sack of cash to the van.
No good staying around there. Get going!
Burn it all. Most of it is marked anyway, the feds would be all over us.
There's no juice in the office, friends. You gotta hook it up again!
Look for a code that starts with one.
The cops will get you before you get me. And I will live!
That invoice should point you to the right guard, so you can get the keycard.
50 grand worth of stuff down the drain!
You'll need the FBI boss to get past the retinal scanner. Find him. Lead him there.
The escape helicopter is here folks. If you're feeling greedy you can go get the rest of the bags - otherwise, time to run!
That rug looks wrong. My guess is it's covering a hatch. Well, we'll worry about that later.
You clever bastards, you'll get around them using those tunnels.
Crap, they're fast. Get the power back on!
Now light it up and give it a big push, yeah?
Unless you still want the cops to show up you better be careful around those workers
Don't forget to get the cutter onto the vault, heisters. Slice it open from beneath.
That wasn't it. Got to give it some time to reset, then try again.
Ok, you know which wine we're looking for! Find it!
Double-time it!
Get to the escape car!
Just pull the switch, guys
A second hatch. What's the Commissar hiding in there?
Remember guys, we need seven bags to escape.
Keep an eye out for anything you can hustle out of there. The Murkywater containers are your best bet - get them open.
Cops are still on the boat!
I'm not taking any chances, gang. Search any boxes you see. Worst case scenario is you find other valuables.
See if the manager has left a cup or something lying around.
What? You don't want to get away scot-free? Well, I do, so please hurry up and take all of those pardons!
Dammit! That's the FEDS!
See if that print will get the safe open so you can reach the key.
Tanks on the door ASAP.
Get ready for extraction. Chopper is 4 minutes out.
You now have all parts of the code.
Try caustic soda... Or hydrogen... No no, wait, soda... Go for that. Yeah.
The daily code for the time lock on the vault. Shall I send someone over?
Not to worry friends, I've gotten in touch with Twitch. He's not too far out and will come get you.
Hurry up, guys! The escape vehicle is leaving in five minutes.
Blues are trying to pull the plug on us, make sure they fail!
Do my ears deceive me, or was that the sweet sound of another of Vlad's presents hitting the floor? Look for it!
...my courier hid it in a dumpster on the parking lot outside.
Find some way past the gates without raising any suspicions.
My, that door is a beast. See if the armory has something that can help you break it.
Cops on the way! Let's go!
Vault is open. Start stacking that cash, gang.
The code should have a seven at the beginning.
Damn! It's the alarm. Well, this just got more straightforward. Forget keycards. We're blowing our way through. Light a flare and drop it. Bile will drop you some C4.
OK, now you can take all of Vlad's special loot and bring it out to the van.
You need to prepare the next part of the formula.
Let's hope we can be as successful as last time. Hit it, gang.
Ship is still attacked by cops onboard.
You're doing good, my friends. But that's just the first. Find the second pallet.
Gang, you need to get the truck down. Maybe a little firepower.
The escape van won't be able to get through unless you move those police cars!
That's the lasers shut down! Move on, let's see what's next.
Alarms are off the display cases. You want to snatch some extra goodies, now is the time. Can always shift these artifacts.
Wow! Guys? Are you OK? I told you to be careful!
Time to cut our friend loose!
Find the Jaegerheister and spike it. Green bottle.
C'mon friends, get out of there.
You do realize, thermite is more or less standard equipment for us.
Ok, you're at the top now, right? Have him buckle up in the chair, then release the balloon. The plane will be there any minute now.
The cops opened the entrance gate!
OK. Now let's restart the time lock and see if this worked.
Looks like some codes, that'll come in handy.
Every little bit helps, but the rocks in cases are most important.
Get the hell out before they find you!
Security door de-activated.
There aren't any monsters behind those doors. I promise, yeah?
All right, we got what we came for. You can bail or go back, clean The Grin.
Maybe they'll have aliens.
You have to open up that ark-dinges.
We're in. Alright, keep the cops off it. Might take some time.
Keep those routers safe.
Alright, I'm at the spot!
Don't let the cops near the routers.
The ship by the docks belongs to the Butcher! Locke sold her out too. Give them a hand and maybe they'll give you a ride.
Deploy C4 inside the vault! Then get ready.
Time to deliver the bags!
Your ride is ready friends, get onboard!
You should see Bile at any time now.
Seems like the deal was a gold arms transaction. Made here in DC.
Look at that. The kerels must think we're idiots, making an offer so low. Let's see how far they will go, yeah?
I'm there in two...
The artifact, friends. Get it and go!
That evidence won't burn without some lighting fluid!
Hahaa, cavalry's here!
Hope the radiation isn't getting to you. But, on bright side, maybe you develop super-powers, yes?
Hmm we got a slight problem. Chopper is running out of fuel after all these back and forths. He will be back after refueling. Hold you ground!
Alright! The van should be coming in soon!
Splendid, absolutely splendid! I confirmed the transaction of 25 million.
The code should have a six at the beginning.
Hurry friends, pick up the box.
You got that USB yet? Surely IT will have one.
What are you waiting for, you mendicants?
Hurry now, go find the artifact in the bio-lab.
Great! Now get to the counting room, right above the vault, and get that thermite to work!
Clear skies. I'm coming in.
He should still be alive, right?
Maybe it's right there in plain sight.
It's way out there, behind the parking lot. The door to the unit is pretty thick and I don't have the key. We'll need to cut it open. Should be a saw around here.
Use the zipline to secure the bags.
Excellent. They are blind! Blind as a bat. Though bats are supposed to be blind, and locate prey by echolocation, so that is...
I can see one of the civilians making a run for it!
Gang. You gotta scan and fax over the blueprints. Sure that can be done in IT.
Hello my friend.
Ok get the shoes!
The cops are on our tail!
...and cross your fingers.
No need to stay there longer. Take the box and make for extraction.
Off we go! Get in the car everyone!
Diamonds are forever, but good coke disappears fast. Go get it!
Guys the timer stopped!
Get the loot to the roof, gang. I got a chopper en-route.
OK, this is it. Quick in, get Vlad's tiara. You want more, it's your call.
Reinforcements are incoming.
The cage is ready. When you're ready for the plane, send up that balloon.
Ah hell. Heat is on the way. Guess the cops were watching the place.
The senator loves to collect art - outsider art in particular. Lucky for us, the Capitol Art Gallery is hosting an exhibition this week.
The case files here say that there's some forensic evidence linked to the traitor. Head to the labs and get a closer look.
Come on, we're nearly done!
Look everywhere you need to.. the lounge... library. You get the idea.
That's the door. Now grab the stuff.
Damn it! Someone just tripped the alarm!
An access ladder, with the hatch unlocked. These sloppy assholes deserve to be robbed.
Into the hole, petrolhead!
Are you looking for the second box?
Hold the door!
Perhaps... muriatic acid?
You'll have about seven seconds to take out the cameras before the alarm goes off.
Get to the roof and signal the chopper if you're ready to leave!
You'll never get me! You fucking clowns are DONE!
Hurry up guys, you need to move to the other building.
There's no turning back - get out of this goddamn place!
Did you just break a vial? Don't get that stuff on you!
Come on, you kaks! Strap the money to the chopper so I can take it away!
Apres vous!
Huh, well it's on the outside. Should work anyway right?
Guys, it feels like something's in the air... Money!
Blerrie! First floor is blocked off. Get up to the 2nd by the scaffolding outside. Should be a door you can hack through with a saw.
It will open in a second or two. And then...

Can't see it anywhere, so the box is probably behind that door and you got to get through it. Maybe you can cook up something useful and nasty to eat through it, yeah? Looks like there are some good chems lying around.
See if you can find a way up to the next level. There should be a hatch or something nearby. Murky chops may not be expecting us, but be ready for anything.
Hurry back to the warehouse with those diamonds, friends.
Second transport is open - check inside!
One last thing. You got to open the gates so you can take off. Move fast, cause the Murkys will jump on us if they realize what's going on!
Enter the correct symbols in correct order with the help of the codex and clues you have.
Get ready, guys. Moretta's almost at her berth.
Drill the door, you chops!
Gang, you need to locate that turret.
Go ahead and light it up, Twitch. Hold your ears, friends.
Watch out! It stopped on drills again!
The Commissars' guys've got some hot wheels. How about we make them a little hotter? Look around the gas station, there's gotta be something to burn.
No good dropping vials, guys.
Alright, the process is on, It's cooking. I have a contact with a specialist through Hector. I will guide you guys through it.
Oh, right. Yeah, sure. OK, have him check in when he can.
Hm, yeah it is not caustic soda... Yeah. It should be acid. Yep, sure that is it.
Restart the shutdown, friends.
You gotta use the cameras to find Bain!
Looks like it's working. Will take some time before it's full.

Add hydrogen chloride, to continue the process!

Sweet! The bridge is fixed! Now into the car, people! Time to leave this behind!

Ah, there we go, friends!
