Shoot the gas can!
Remember guys, we need nine bags to escape.
Find Valentine's desk and computer.
How... eh... gotta think of something... how to get inside...
Look at the that view...
What the hell is going on up there, shitwipe?!
Get to the overpass and then keep going up the hill.
Your getaway is ready Get as much ammo as you can, and then get yourselves out.
Alright, I'm in, hold on...
And... off we go!
Almost done. All you gotta do now is get hold of the keycard from Ralph Garnet. Find him and get it.
The cops took one of the bags!
Alright, locate the server room and get inside. There's no point in disabling the alarms now.
In the meantime, see about finding those three laptops with the code snippets.
Chopper is heading back- sorry it took so long.
I know things are hectic and you are very busy, but would you mind getting the detonator onto the charges?
Get into docks. There'll be security, so stay hidden and stay quiet.
Nope. No, that wasn't right...
Bile dropped some explosives close to your landing spot. Find them.
That doesn't sound good! Be ready to fight!
That was a real pleasure, makes me think of the old days. Starting out small, the simple things, right? Good work.
Ten seconds, guys!
The drill should be finished soon. I'm trying to get through to my pilot...
Ok, here comes the tenth wave!
Vlad is probably right about the police being quick on the draw here. Get in and get out fast after you empty that manager's safe. And Wolf, stay off the dance floor.
Great, the scanning is up and running again.
There's the escape! RUN!
Come on, clowns - haul ass out of there!
Hey! Clowns! I really want to go home, okay? So please take me to the garage so I can get the stuff I need. Kinda need you to protect me while I work...
Check other wagons for extra loot. And C4. Look for that too.
Let's salvage what we can. Get the big safe open.
We're here for the plates. They've been printing fortunes over the last months, spending wildly. Blood's in the water and we're the sharks!
Time locks are done. Almost there, gang! Open that last door!
Watch for Cloakers!
Hack the skylight controls to open it. Whatever you do, don't let the fuzz disable it.
OK, get him outta there.
Alright, we're close. Get him to the top of the tower on your right!
One of the packages is in the Jewelry store. Go!
Good, now hurry back to the gate and open it up, yeah?
OK, that looks... right? At least it didn't blow up. Time to mix the next ingredient.
I wonder if McKendrick will ever figure out who did this. In any case, he shouldn't have messed with us.
Absolutely outstanding work! There's going to be heads rolling down the corridors of the Pentagon when this train arrives.
You're not going to let a little thing like a wall stand in your way, are you?
You can probably access the evidence files from the chief's computer. I'll bet it's on the upper floor.
Get to the helicopter so we can get the hell out of here.
Two minutes till escape guys!
They're going to shoot me down if you don't hurry! Fighters incoming!
Okay, new plan: sneak past that one and find the security room. That way we can disable all cameras at once.
I don't think I need to mention what happens if you get found out.
Get that box!
With the speed this train is going, you'll have about two minutes before you reach the barricade. That means two minutes to secure everything and leave!
Our guest loves Ocean's Ten vodka. Find another blue bottle and spike it.
Go on in, see what we got!
Remember to stash that loot in the vents. I got them marked for you.
Clear the pickup zone so Bile can get in there!
Now make a nice little pile on the floor and burn it!
You're through the first truck. Now start cracking boxes and bagging loot. Five bags, so move it, guys!
Why would they put fertilizer behind there? Ach, find a blowtorch or some thing to cut through it with.
Get aboard! That was a fucking excellent job, my friends!
If you want to get out you gotta get to that pillar!
Stop loitering and get over to the vault!
Get to the top of the overpass so Bile can pick you up.
No standing around, yeah? Kerels are on the way.
There has to be a door leading into the mansion.
My wife's brother, that asshole son-of-a-bitch, crashed his plane in the woods just outside the city. I need him and his cargo back here.
Gang, what's the hold up? Get inside the building.
Thankfully, I have a supply of C4 right here.

My dear guests. My sincere apologies, but we appear to have some crashers of the party, of the very unwelcome kind. I must therefore ask you to make your way to the exits, for your own safety of course.
After the truck, gang. Hustle!
Right!
These vaults have one weakness. A failsafe will open the door if the temperature inside gets too high. Look around for crowbars in the warehouse, and jam them into the rear fans.
Find those security boxes, friends.
Gang, you need to find Chavez to get the key. Believe me, you'll know who he is when you see him.
Fuck me, we needed those cooks. I'm going with chloride.
The police is on our back like a fucking pony tail!
Come on! Fill the barrels!
No time to waste, take the artifact. Hurry!
Blerrie, there's probably rats in the walls...
Time to go! Help remove moorings from dock!
SWAT are rolling in from the east. Get ready, gang!
Ok, release!
Oh shiiiiiit!
And what would you like as a side? Uh... sausage patties? We got 'em!
Tread carefully, friends.
The drill needs some attention, friends!
The C4 is right in there. Why does The Grin need C4? God knows.
There's the bank. Pull over. Keep it cool.
You need to find Chloe's computer.
Ok, get to searching for the answer to that code.
Ach, bunch of keks! They shut down the hack so you need to get it started again.
On my way. Four minutes, tops.
They've no clue you're there. Now get to that radio.
Keep an eye out for Garrett. He won't be gone forever.
Is that... a nuclear warhead!? I... don't... look, just grab it. Carefully!
We're gonna need two vials. If one of them fails the test, you gotta get more blood and start again.
You gotta use the thermite on the barrier.
That's the first one, guys. Keep working.
Great! Signal the driver that it's clear.
You found it! Time to drill that door!
Cage is right where I put it. Like fucking 633 Squadron!
The boat won't escape the cops' attention forever. Get there, now!
Why aren't you drilling that door yet?
Done. The doors are open now friends.
The plane will be picking up the cage from the street. Get it ready.
Oh, nothing special. I am just calling to pay my respects.
Ok guys, go across the roof!
The timer is standing still. Get it going again!
Another four and we're done!
You need to check the mainframe again for the next artifact.
Truck's fucked. I'll secure a ride out.
Our friend will show you the way out! Just follow him!
Just try and sneak past him. Don't rush it.
Momma always said it was a big world out there, but this...
Guys, I'm waiting for bags!
Police snipers, damn it! Now we're really in for it!
There's something else alive in here.
There might be more c4 outside in the stash, friends.
Brace for impact!
There! It's just after the underpass!
Let's see if we can shut the security down. Its weak points are the circuit boxes scattered about. If we can hack them, we can power things down without triggering the alarm.
I can only take four at a time, fill it up, and I'll come back for more!f
You need something that can breach that door!
Check the manager's office. Look for the IT guys name. Come on, come on!
Let me see if I can get into their system from here and point you to the right workstation.
Use the C4 to send those radars tumbling, my friends!
That's gas! Get out of there!
Great. Now get that other keycard working on the opposite gate. Hurry!
Nice! We can shift that, make a little extra dollar.
What are you waiting for? Cut the door open!
There should be some more ingredients locked up somewhere.
Come on! Get the time lock going again!
The Office... you know... the oval one...
You need to figure out which key goes with his car. This would really be easier if we could just take any car.
Whoever locked that in there doesn't want it to fall into hands like ours, so why not bring it along?
Use the windows to get rid of any bodies. The sea will swallow them.
Great! Cutter's done! Here comes the sweet loot!
Attach the car to the chopper so we can lift you out!
Damn kerels have cut the power. Get it back up and reactivate the crane.
To business! There are crates near the entrance. Got a little red strobe on. Find them. They have a few little presents within.
You need to get inside the mansion walls. Use the thermite I have supplied you with, yeah?
That noise is pure poison cooking - get the fuck out once you got enough.
Up with the balloon! It needs to go higher!
The pick-up guy is close by, look for the yellow crane.
Come on, just get into the fucking boat. Fuck me, what's wrong with you people?
Okay, take a look around and see if you can find one.
Now make your way back to the car, friends.
Make sure you get the right key next time!
You need to get to the front!
Let's get out of here. After you, please...
Lost the signal, restart it gang!
Today's code is 559732. Sorry it took so long.
I'll be there in one minute.
That's what we need for Hector, if you want to get the rest, that is up to you!
I wonder what happened to Mr Pink?
Now, the next thing is to get past the security gate so you can access the vault.
I've found a terminal. Get to it, hack in and we lower that magnetic seal.
The alarm has been activated and it's ticking down. Take care of it before it reaches 0!
You got to take me out! They're killing me!
Hey! The chopper pilot is here! Go go go!
Set up the detonator.
Yep, it's smoke again!
We have a zip-line that can help you get loot out of there, nice and quiet. Make sure you use it.
Alright, got it. Here we go
Shutters are down. Only way out is the entrance.
At least seven more!
Locke never forgets anything!
The thermite, friends! Get it onto the barrier.
What the hell, guys! You weren't supposed to kill them now! Wick wanted them alive so he could teach them a lesson... Let's hope he will be content with the thought of them dead.
What... that must be my police scanner, the cops are nowhere near.
Bring the key to our man!
Finish this once and for all!
The Butcher's explosives are in one of these containers.
He can't be chop enough to put it on a post-it, could he?
BFD needs power - lots of it! Hook her up to a couple of sockets. They're located inside the casino. Don't let them get disconnected.
Luckily, we were ready for this. Rust told me these Overkill dwankies keep loads of explosives around, so all you gotta do is find some.
Two minutes. Hey, fuckface!
Right, now find a way into the mansion.
That surprised 'em. Now find the Commissar.
That red ladder will let you get onto the roof.
Those poes fucked the detonator, mans. Fix it!
Thermite is done. Burned right through that nicely, yeah? Now get going with the winch.
Guys! Use the keycard in the dock control room. Get the dock gate open.
That's the turret recovered. The driver will be back for the ammo.
Reboot the shutdown sequence.
Watch out. Snipers are setting up in the area!
That truck has our gold. Get after it!
So you got nine of the paintings? That's awesome.
He bought it. Fix his leaks.
You need to distract the cops. Shoot up the store, then get out of there.
Are you looking for the IT dwankie?
Now I need to install some software to scramble the system.
Be careful with the cooking, gentlemen.
It's supposed to be hydrogen chloride!
Sorry friends, but it's time for me to leave, but I've left a surprise for you.
Jump down into the hole that the thermite melted through!
Well, no turning back now! That was a hell of a bang! Get into that truck and do your part of the job!

To bypass the security system and get into the vault, patch the devices you have directly into the two control boxes, they should be around there somewhere. Then I'll hack in remotely and do the rest.
Yeah, yeah, we got what we came for.
All right, that's the last of the C4. Get down to the garage. Our Inside Man has marked the spot you need to blow.
No snoozing, friends. Garrett could be heading back at any time.
You gotta hold the fort for two minutes until the plane makes the pickup.
Is it all there? Nice - get what's yours.
Don't let that gate stop you. I want those boxes searched.
That's all the goats secured. Now get in your car and high tail it out of there.
That's perfect. The cage is assembled.
Damn kerels have cut the emergency power lever and stopped the charge. Find it and pull it back, yeah?
It worked! Great job everyone.
Twitch's truck is ahead. Just drive straight up into the back!
He should be running out of oxygen soon.
Use the keycard you picked up to open the door. But, be ready to quickly take out anyone inside.
Just picked up a call to a cop patrol. They've been asked to make sure everything's okay. They're on their way.
Did you know I did a tour of the White House once? Blerrie awful furniture, yeah?
Keep the civilians away from the alarms.
Don't throw in any more, it's full! Wait for me to unload these first.
Okay. Do I have everything? Crowbar, zipties, lube. All ready! Gloves on for some really dirty work.
You know, they might actually...
Get to cover!
I think we will come out of this alive after all! Of course, I never doubted it!
Hook me up to that phone, yeah?
Boring conversation anyway. Gang, we're going to have company!
Look, do I need to tell you everything. Use the thermal paste to burn through the grate.
Here I am, assholes! Over here! Now, over there! Ha, made you look!
We have SWAT on the adjacent roofs. Dig them out.
You'll probably find a PC in the PR office.
You'll see a bit of thermal paste down there. Just in case those sewers have any obstructions, you know.

Yeah, yeah, don't give me that look. I'm not dumb enough to think you just came here to save my life. I know Rust too, remember? And I know he really wants his baby back. Well, you're gonna have to get me the parts if that's gonna happen.
Ok. Got him. Name, social security number, name of his dog... Find him. Check the screen in IT. Oh, and he's a slot machine addict, Might be a good place to start looking.
Now, get to finding that tunnel. The entrance should be fairly accessible.
I'm moving out.
Bile can't get you until you light a flare for him.
And there goes the escape driver. Keep going. I'll figure something out.
Don't forget the goat in the streetlight. Saw it to bring him down.
Bringing west coast safes to my east coast players!
We can't make it work without fertilizer.
There's got to be lot's of good stuff we can use or sell around here, so keep your eyes peeled for anything that might be good to take along.
... take a look outside in the portable toilet at the construction site.
Uhh.. Must be my police scanner. I'll shut it down. The police are miles away.
If we succeed with this, we'll have the whole criminal underworld talking about it forever. Ladies and gentlemen, this is how you make history.
I am watching you, you fucking dickfaces. Eat my shit!
That was a bit of bloody business, but sometimes it gets like that. Still, job done. Great work!
Confirmed!
If you kill his guards, you will get to him.
First, get the drill onto the safe, make a little hole. Then we need to fill the safe with water. The garden hose will do.
Now get inside that vault, yeah?
Grab the raw materials and get them in the house.
If you find the server room, we can probably bypass the lock.
One minute and we're through!
Find that tunnel, friends. They've probably got it hidden, but it shouldn't be too hard to locate.
I bet these cops don't believe in Santa Claus. But I do! And he's a fucking pain in the ass!
Looks like the mobsters are digging in in the rooms. Get in there and wipe every crew member you see. Safeties off.
A saw should make quick work of this barrier. See if you can find one.
You can't have Commissar!
You have to replace the batteries with fresh ones.
And... got it! Storage room is open. Get the keys.
You have to reconnect the power to the crane system!
Wait!
It's time. Put on the masks and let's do this.
Looks like we've hit the jackpot! Bag it up!
Don't forget the server!
Ah, good. Fuel is moving.
I'm sending in my brother-in-law. He'll drop a skyhook cage. If he can avoid crashing.
Looks like every cop is headed your way! You're not driving out. Light a flare, and we'll get you an air extraction.
We are after the server. Stay out of view guys. Cameras and guards.
Don't stay around longer than you have to... just take it and get out, yeah?
Don't mess up or get seen now. Almost there...
The EMP has been dropped. Head over just outside the lumber mill and pick it up.
The safes are way too heavy to carry, and those trucks are screwed. Gonna need another transport. I'll find something - hang tight.
Get cracking now!
Is the drill up again?
He saw you! Deal with it!
What a messy situation. Let's get out of here.
Ninja's in socks tiptoeing on thick carpet make more noise than you. Expertly done!
Hurry friends, get the artifact!
All right, with that taken care of it's time to find the server room.
That's the coke, gang. I knew you would do it! Now bag it.
Sorry...slight miscalculation. I'm going to come around and try again.
Hack the ship control terminal!
Your first job is getting beyond the perimeter.
Try that print on the safe and see if it works, yeah? Then get the key.
Come on! Fill the barrels!
I'm sending the helicopter, keep bagging the stuff!
If you can get through this quietly, you should be able to just melt away with the crowd.
Damn, looks like the cops had been staking the place. Move it!
Might be a good to at least get some extra funding out of this, so go find that saw, yeah?
Search those bags of coke, guys.
This is the one! Let's go!
This is the gallery. You're looking for the paintings marked by a red sold sticker. We need at least four to make this work. The place is closed and locked down. Find a way in. Go.
No dossing about, yeah? Get inside the mansion.
That's the plane we're looking for. Get the loot inside, then give it some fuel.
I'll be there in two...
OK, you're in position at the trainyard. Eyes open. Watch for suits. I can't see any active vehicles nearby but that doesn't mean much. Go to the train car and wait for contact.
Good night snipers! Good job, guys. Now, time to get that C4.
That's the head of security. He seems to be by the driveway.
Nicely done. Now get into that office, friends.
Yes! I got the - no, wait. Can't be. Damn. Almost had it.
It's a trap! Either you defuse these C4s or you get the hell outta there!
Keep freeing the Butcher's people.
You gotta wonder who comes up with a name like that.
Chopper will be over the wrecked plane any second.
Grab the artifact, make sure that the kerels don't get their hands on it.
And that's the second. Oh, I can smell the wealth! But greed is good, yeah. For sure. Find the third pallet.
Great! Now get them up to the station on the roof and connect them.
Look at this place. Makes me wish we could heist a whole building.
There are metal detectors all around the entrance, you'll need to get around them.
We're doing this nice and quiet. The computer we're looking for should be located on the second floor.
That's the address! We've got what we need. Get back to the van and we can get out of here.
Now, torch the money...
There's a security office close by. Just in case you want to get rid of any surveillance.
You've just etched your names into history, gang. Heisters will tell this story for generations.
Looks like there might be an underground vault somewhere.
Good, good. This'll make our lives easier when we hit the Democrat...
The cops are in control of the vault doors. They will open any second - be ready!
Get the bags to the window-washing platform.
Go to the computer, friends.
No time to waste. Get in there!
Need the Moretta's frequency, guys. Get searching terminals.
Check through windows. See if you can find the alarm box. Once you go in, it's gonna go off pretty quick, so be ready.
Nice work guys! Grab me a burger while you're at it. See ya back at the warehouse!
Chopper is there, throw the bags into the chopper.
Good find. That will certainly do.
Answer the phone!
The facility changes very often, so what little I saw when I was there can't be relied on.
Get the Moretta out of the dock. When it's berth, get aboard, get the explosives, get out. Got it?
OK, chopper is coming in to pick up that Fusion Engine.
Nine bags! You guys are legendary.
Stay vigilant in case the Murky domkops decide to fiddle with the computer!
I hope everyone heard that! Three minutes until the pick-up car arrives! Defend! Defend! Defend!
We need the square cleared, chop chop!
Security is still quiet. Now find the bomb.
That's it for the fans. Temperature is spiking fast. What the hell is in there?
Great work. Now, let's see if the big fish will bite...
Looks like we got the shitty end of the stick. The vault's empty! Get out of there, now!
All yours for the price of... say... 18 bucks.
You have to destroy that evidence!
Like an arm stretching out from the heavens, I'm picking that limo up.
Hey boss, the guys in Mexico sent you some tequila. You want it?
You need to find those routers!

Gensec's overland armored convoys employ a lot of ex-military types, providing firepower and muscle, and they move everything from little Jimmy's favorite baseball card to the Crown Jewels. We got a line on a convoy moving into D.C. Let's see what we can get.
There, now it's time to blow a big hole in that antique floor, yeah?
Get the power back up!
I'm here, guys, but I can't come closer as long as the roof is filled with cops.
Hit the button, yeah?
An active ECM jammer will probably make it hard to open the server room security door. Keep that in mind.
I'm sure he will reason after that, right? Ready to move in, team.
Got those sentry guns set up yet?
Cash time. Bag it!
We got twelve!
You almost got that winch ready?
OK, now you can take all of Vlad's special loot, but don't make too much noise.
You took care of both guards. Don't have to worry about the cameras anymore.
I need to talk to someone about my 401k.
You should be looking for recipes friends!
Gang, that's a heavy SWAT van that just rocked up. Be ready.
They're calling in snipers. Too many civilians casualties.
We gotta get past that gate. Look around and see if you can find something useful.
If we're gonna get into the boss' office, we need to open the rest of the house. Look for a switch or something.
The Elephant will be very excited. That's his campaign funding by big oil until 2050 right there. Very professional, folks.
OVERKILL - enough said. See you at the safe house.
I hear the cop radio, law enforcers are on the way, they arrive in 30 seconds.
That radar needs to be taken down somehow. See if you can use the anti-air gun to blow it up.
You're spotted! Fix this.
Got my file. Let's see what they have on me.
Good job, but we need some more on the fourth floor.
Get into the store, you know what to do! Let's get those jewels.
Crack open the back door with a saw and go through there, yeah?
30 seconds more and I'm out!
The heat's rising!
Just hold them off a little longer, gang. I'm finding you a way out.
Hurry down guys. We don't want the police to wreck our ticket for escape.
Our chopper will be over the train yard in a moment. Get ready!
Kakspul! It's doing an auto-update! Get to the mainframe and stop it!
It looks like Dallas still has what it takes to perform heists in the big leagues!
C'mon guys, you haven't got all night. Find that laptop.
Don't dally with the key now!
I hope this hunk o' metal has air bags!
You guys know who Tucker is? I hope you don't. Great work back there.
Keep looking for a saw!
Find the saw guys.
Great, now get out of there while you can.
Look for the cases, break them and bag the jewels.
We can't proceed until you have the keycard.
Time is ticking, gang. You have to move the loot to the container to secure it.
BFD's guzzled a whole coolant tank already. Fill her glass, gang. Bathroom's have water.
Find the counting room right above the vault and pour out the thermite.
Nicely done gang. A classic heist!
Hurry up friends, go out there and start the crane.
Look for clues connected to the Commissioner's wife.
You have everything to you need to open the vault. Keycard first, then enter the code.
Ok, I'll circle around for a bit. I'll be ready when I'm needed.
That's it. Now haul those parts out of there.
Shite! Small problem - server's heavily encrypted. The encryption keys are kept in the Security Office. You need to grab them and bring them back here!
Get to the chopper!
Ok, let's get some loot while we're here. Ernesto has a floor safe in his office. There are some winches near the driveway where you entered - grab them and hook them up.
What the... Another one? Guys, there's another switchbox, rewire that one too.
Ok, now for the server room... That laptop you found earlier should enable me to give you access. Go back there and hook me up.
They cut the power, get it back up!
Remember friends, get to the office.
You gotta restart the override.
Oh, if we could take that thing out and sell it... but we just got to open it. Those symbols are the key. Look around for some clues, yeah?
Now get inside that vault, yeah?
One minute. So close.
No time to sit around, you gotta go!
That's a JÃ¤ger Mark II. Solid things.
That's good enough. Coming in.
Damn thing keeps stopping. I gotta override the system. It'll be a while until it reaches you.
Now hurry into the office! Watch for kerels!!
Did you find the armory yet?
I'll get you out of there. Just keep the loot safe!
The convoy's stopped, move toward the bus.
The surveillance operator is down. Those cameras shouldn't bother you anymore!
We're gonna fucking crash!
Get looking through the records. Find those testimonies.
Not exactly textbook perfection, but who cares when it all works out!
Where's that laptop? Found it yet?
Time to get what we came here for, yeah?
Let's see... we'll need fertilizer, diesel, wires and some kind of timer. See what you can find.
Great work! A classic takedown of a classic heist. It was a pleasure to watch!
Halfway mark. Hurry up!
Hey, I'm not gonna be able to break out of here without some help.
Just took a fucking .50 cal. Fuck! I'm going down.
I knew we could trust that sniper! He delivers. Don't waste time - get to work on that transport!
Gang, we're going nowhere until that drill is working.
Rat! Time locks have kicked in. Alright. Forget keycards. We're going to force this.
Snipers! Too many civilians dead, can't stay there!
Okay gang...patching Locke through to you.
I'm hit. But it just grazed me, I'm fine.
That's a Royal Flush, gang. Every God damn truck is ready for the picking. Get to work!
Damn it! That's the alarm!
All connected? Good. Only need to get that pick-up working.
Get that door breaker in position!
Jesus, that's nasty. Well, you got what we need. Place it on the scanner, I guess?
That's it! Get the code to the panic room!
I contact you with instructions when I am back on ship.
Get a drill up, yeah?
Roof, Roof! Blackhawk on the roof!
Use the crane to get the artifact, friends.
The mainframe, gang. Get to it.
Kerels have stopped the computer, you gotta restart the hack!
We got Gensec trucks moving through the suburbs. Go hit 'em.
I'm still looking. Damn, LA is smoked. Hold them off.
This is it. Pull over.
Ship is being attacked. Defend and remove gangways!
The middle one, guys!
Now collect those bags, and get to assembling the Beast!
We need that vault open. Quiet with keycards, or bust it open with a drill.
Look right outside the Glitter Room for one of the PCs.
They cut the power! Get it back up or we can't continue the download.
Close down on that truck. Get that gold!
This is it, gang. They're throwing everything they have in to this. Get out of there!
The lever. Find it and pull.
Get the power back on!
Grab it and there'll be a nice bonus.
Use ziplines if you want to speed it up.
Pick up some precious stones for me!
Great guys! Look at that! Grab all that you can before you escape.
Chopper's waiting for you. Hurry!
Let's do this faster, guys!
Our man is in position, and the target just turned on to McCarty. Almost there. Almost there...
We got roadblocks on the perimeter, and cops closing the net. No way out by the road. Time for a new plan.
Now, hack into a workstation terminal.
Hey, I'm having trouble with my account on the computer. Do I internet?
What do you want?
Get into the chopper!
That's the second. One more.
Help! HELP!
Go to the panic room, it's on the third floor.
Damn, they've upgraded to the Mark 7 detectors. Going to be a bit more difficult.
Use that blowtorch you got a while back, yeah?
Find the control box!
This is the first control room for the gate. Other one is over the way there, see?
Check the backrooms.
And who do we have here? I don't know you. I don't know who sent you. Is this really how you wanna play?
Switch that terminal back on, gang. Let's get this ship moved.
Get him the right car key!

Two.

Four!
