Just what we needed! Plug that hard drive in and I'll take care of it. That vault should be opened in no time.
Hurry and open the gate!
Looks like we're out of luck. This one's no good. Go get me another. I'm sending the chopper back to pick it up.
I will go back to boat and contact you with instructions.
Uh, this is, Francoise. I am calling from the Customer Satisfaction desk.
The bomb is now just sitting there. Restart it!
According to Rust, the OVERKILL MC have the tech in one of the cars in the front. Get over there as fast as you can and don't stop. We don't have much time.
Alright, he should be safe now. Place a flare on the table outside the yard. Set it off to bring in the chopper.
Put the thermal lance to good use and get the panic room open.
Those gates are rigged to stay locked if someone's on them. So get off!
Change of plan! You have to use ziplines instead to secure the bags!
Real professional gentlemen! They don't even know what hit them!
Have you found the office yet?
Make sure you get the right key now!
Roberts Bank is happy to help you, sir.
There should be a circuit box nearby.
Yeah, there's a charge on my credit card the wife can't see. I was in Mexico and...
Sure the Captain heard that, so we can rule out him cooperating. No time to turn the screw on him either, so we bypass him. Hack the ship control terminal. Keep it running.
I wanted to remind you that our All You Can Eat buffet is now open.
Okay, the scientists working here are using some next level shit. You're gonna need the lead scientist for handprint authorization. See where he's hiding.
Come on, come on... Piece of Russian crap...
Nearly got it. Come on, come on.
A luta continua!
Of course you can customize masks like you can customize weapons.
Okay gamblers. Let's get gambling.
Open sesame! Now find our wayward friend!
You need to find that saw, friends.
OK, throw me the paintings, and you'll get your money!
Don't get the heat on you too early or your escape is going to be rough. Check your assets. Let's go.
This is the room! Now put that drill to work!
Ok guys. I'm opening container 57 remotely. Get ready to run.
Feeling good? If your piss glows in the dark, consult a doctor.
...I'm 93% sure.
Hydrogen chloride has to be right.
We gotta open this dock gate to get the Moretta to Dock 3B.
Don't forget to check the interrogation rooms.
I'm there in three minutes...
I'm pretty sure it's in another part of the building.
Get the C4 in there, and get ready!
Okay gang. Time to put on a show.
Sorry.
Why isn't that gate open yet? Check all the rooms!
How much for parking? That's a robbery!
Wait for it...
Damn, BFD is bust. You need tools to fix her up.
Look for bookshelves, see if you can move them and find something.
Now the police have to enter from the front door!
We lost a little coke on this job but it could've been worse. Hector will still be pleased with us saving what we could.
Nice. With the camera out of the way, you can safely lock pick that door.
Great. Here comes the guest list now.
Haha, the Commissar outsmarts you again, assholes.
Alright. The cage is put together. But it's empty. Get it filled!
Blast blew wagons everywhere. Might be loot in some of 'em. And check 'em for any C4. You'll need it soon.
Left a bit.. there we go... ACH, bekakin' civvie! Whoa, almost got that one too. A little faster.
My access got cut off. Check it out.
That's it. We got the turret. Now all we need is some ammo.
This will be a lesson to all: Don't fuck with The Butcher. Thank you for your help, my friends.
That's it, yeah? Can't see what's so special, but it's why we're here. Same writing that Lindenhurst found.
Damn cops are at the door. Get ready for them!
Looks like it's working. Will take some time before it's full.
Get into the house.
We stole this from a lab not a million miles from here. Two hundred thirty eight thousand six hundred and six miles, to be precise.
Great. Sure we can find a use for a little C4 later.
Great, now we can open the crates laying around much faster. I bet you they contain some good stuff.
That scanner will need an authority, like a FBI boss. Watch for him and for God's sake don't kill him.
Ah, the door opens! Now, let us proceed into the inner complex with speed and violence.
Good job, friends!
Come on friends... GO!
Hey, there he is. Looks like he's around the stairs.
Alright! The helicopter should be coming in soon!
Look for a door.
We're serving... uh... soup. Made with... uh... vegetables.
Fuck yeah. We ain't done yet.
Guys, move! Charon will meet you in the other building.
Hold the ground. Bile will have that winch to you any second.
Stop anyone from getting to the cannon.
Focus on the next part. Get him out, get the server in the trunk and get to the transfer room on room on floor three.
Good spot. Now we wait.
Heard a story about this guy once... hid something in a light fixture, then electrocuted himself to death by not being careful when he went to get it.
Don't waste any time, just keep him moving.
They are coming up on the balcony!
Blerrie! The drill is no longer turning. Start it up!
Slap some C4 on that wall, crew!
They're breaching in!
Where the hell is that pilot?
You need to restart the power, friends.
The door, friends! Get it open!
There's a zipline you can use to secure the bags of loot.
It's a beautiful painting. Last seen on the walls of a well known South American dictator. See how the artist captured the light and all that shit? Beautiful.
The pump stopped again.
Have you found a way to get the gate open?
Ok, search for Tin Boy toys in the toy store.
That's him. Locke.
Hey, someone needs help. Get over there.
The Sosa Cartel has attacked one of my shipments in the Caribbean. They must pay, and you will collect this payment.
The panic room is somewhere inside the mansion; keep looking. It should be a reinforced door.
Gang. Shut down the power to the metal detectors. Crack open the circuit boxes.
Thought that tunnel would never end! No time to waste, friends. Everyone knows you're there.
Guess this will be a bit of fun, yeah? Messing about with the Commissioner...
Get the power back up friends.
What are you waiting for? Go to the computer.
The testimonies are somewhere in the Archives. Search through their records and see if you can't find them.
Up! Up! Up, up, up!
We're here. Get ready to scare 'em, crew.
Can't be much longer for the tanks to run out of liquid, so Bile will be there shortly with a delivery.
They've mined the place! Watch your step!
The saw is through, so get in there and check the patient.
Hose looks secure. Start the pump.
You know what to do when you're ready. Send that balloon up!
You're looking for four bags of jewels minimum from this place. Easy.
...I'm 84% sure.
The detonator has been stopped!
The server room. Get me hooked up, guys.
...Find the wall-boxes that control the blast doors, yeah?
It stopped on the question marks again.
Guys... Can you see any hints on what the correct one should look like?
Good work, team. With micro cameras installed in the paintings, we just need to trade them to the senator's people. I'll set up the meet right now.
Get over there and help the crew.
The detonator needs to be rigged.
You can probably hack through one of the doors on this floor with a saw, yeah?
The snipers have me pinned down. I can't move until you clear them out!
Nice work! The third wave was beaten back!
I'm grabbing the pyro schedule. I'll guide you guys through, and time it with the C4.
You guys are seriously in the wrong place if you're looking for extra loot. Get out of there.
Now go get the keycard.
Fuckin' nice one.
Damn, they stopped it. Get it going again!
Hmm, hope the weather doesn't bother our equipment. Wouldn't be good it you guys got cut off in there, yeah?
Why aren't you in the wine cellar? And when you get there, best not drink any.
Fuck me sideways!
I swear I was being followed for a while, and not by cops either.
Whoa, that's a nice little coke stash they got there. It's up for grabs if you ask me.
KÃªrels are just outside! Be ready for anything, yeah?
That's what we're looking for! Gotta admit I'm a bit underwhelmed by how they look, but grab them, yeah?
Codes. Bring them.
A three digit code will open the armory. Find it.
You need to get the drill going.
I'm coming in, in three minutes...
The end is upon us. And it is a good ending! Please, into the helicopter!
Remember to strike a flare to summon the evac.
Still gotta find the whiteboard.
He's getting away!
There's still gas in the vault.
Looks like they expect a fight. I know you will give em one. Find the safe and the address... get as much intel from these scumbags as you can. Let's roll.
That's the right choice, guys. Keep scanning away. We didn't come all the way to Russia for a small payout, now did we?
Diesel is now filling in ship.
Chopper's is in-bound for the crash site. Stand by, gang!
Don't know how to say this really, but there's been a change of plan. Gotta leave you now!
OK this is your standard job only it's gold-plated, if you take my meaning.
Keep searching. The control room has to be here.
Fuck me, man... I don't wanna die over this shit... I'll keep my promise and assemble the bike for ya, but I'm staying right here. Find the parts and bring them back here.
Fuck me back and forth: We are done! Take this bike and get the hell outta here. I'm not staying a moment longer!
Have you found the power yet?
Drills done! Vault's opening! Go for the cash!
Blueprints to a vault. Interesting.
Our guy likes Red Dragon scotch. Find it, spike it and serve it.
It's a dirty job, but easy money.
C'mon, get in the vault.
Get that gold up to the roof, put it in the bag on the zip line, we are bringing it home!
Guys, three bags, that's what we need.
They're not letting us go!
That looks useful.
One of the civilians is trying to escape, keep em' in check guys!
Get going to the weapons lab.
Got it. You can open the door.
If they're going by the book they'll have snipers set up ahead. These cocks always go by the book.
Even if we blow up the radar, they can still control this from the laptop. We need to hack it.
Our guy is waiting to shut down the gig. Just answer that intercom when you're ready. Make sure all the loot you wanna take is secured.
Job is over guys. Time to go.
And bring me back some chimichangas or something!
Hey Asswipe! The Intercom!
Are you lost? Jump out of window. Way out is straight down.
I'm in place!
The roof is not an option, We're going to have to "improvise"... slightly.
Hook up the chain from the truck to the gate!

One of Buluc's old girlfriends "volunteered" information after we threw some cash her way, that you can find the way to open this door in a part of the house that Buluc calls the "inner sanctum". Go find the entrance to it, chop chop.
Police chatter has confirmed the presence of snipers. Keep your eyes on those rooftops!
Now look for a vent, and get the gas pumping. Send the security to Neverland.
Fantastic! Now don't scratch it!
These guys aren't kidding around. Don't act dumb and go in the room.
That's the first keycard. Second one's gotta be here somewhere.
Now, please, bring the loot bags to the helicopter.
Twitch is waiting for you on the other side of that door! Hurry!
You need to deal with those fires. Use the sprinklers.
Turn the power on, then restart the terminal override.
Protect the X-ray device! Don't let the mercenaries get to it!
Use the ladder guys, climb the hell out!
Now climb down and get the bags to the van. Watch your step.
What? You want me to dress up like a cop??
There goes the wall. A garbage truck is your drop-off. Get hauling.
Alright, they just need to call you back. Faster the better.
Good job, now get the hell away from there before it goes off.
Wait.. what... they've got additional security blocks. You gotta disable them. Find a security switchboard and rewire the system.
Rust really wants a chrome skull for his bike, and we have no time to argue. Use the blowtorch the mechanic gave you when you reach the clubhouse.
It's OK if things go loud, so long as you did the job right. I'm searching the data now. Half a database is a bit of a lottery - let's hope we get lucky.
We're taking some of these nice weapons with us. But how, that's the question...
Guys, get the truck down! Shoot away those wires.
That's the head of security. Hmm... he's by the driveway I think.
The ammo bag can be found in the storage room.
Waiting on that network access gang.
Wow, hey! How am I supposed to do my thing like this? Take care of 'em!
What the holy fuck! You dare! I'll fucking kill you! Kill you!
They took Eddie out! You're still on foot, guys!
If you get the chance, maybe grab some loot that might be useful to sell. It's not every day you got free reign in the the FBI's evidence lockup!
One down. One to go.
Just follow our friendly kerel. And don't let the real ones see you.
This is the Security Center.
I'm jealous you're going to get to drive this beast.
That's the last fan. Man, look at that temperature climb. I got a bad feeling about this.
Get the stuff from the safe!
Grab the C4, gang!
Well, there goes plan A. Glad the crowd didn't hear any of that.
You need to add the hydrogen chloride to keep the process going!
With all the ruckus going on, I reckon the White House aids will have gotten sloppy. Maybe have a look in their computers to see if you can find something.
That's the helicopter. Get on it, crew!
I can't open the door while they are firing at me!
Wait here. I'll be right back.
Great, That's the pit boss' number.
He's back again? Alright, let's try one more thing. Feds can't resist food. See if anyone is having a late snack and put some by his office.
Kerels are trying to take back the hostage.

Well, lads, thanks for breakin' me out. But I shouldn't have been there to begin with. Someone set me up. I'm sure of it. The Feds had too much on me. Way more than those mingebag wankers could dig up. Someone ratted. Someone fucked me. And I'm gonna find out who.$NL;$NL;Now, it ain't gonna be easy. No fannying about around the edges, right? No shadowy deals or contacts, or that bollocks. We're going to the source. The biggest FBI nest. Gonna find out who screwed me.
There's a half-eaten candy bar here. Mmmmm nutty. Oh....wasn't a candy bar.
Hang tight, I'm looking for another escape point.
Smack that asshole so he wakes up!
Vault's cracked, let's see what we got!
Touch down! Now load the plane with loot!
We need a change of plan, the code has been shut down!
That's all I have room for.
Sorry about this friends, but I've got to pull you out via the sewers. Get to them outside... and you'll need some thermite to burn through the grating.
Use the blowtorch to create a way through that car.
Stop throwing the coke into the fucking water!
That's the second stash. Two to go!
It's go-time!
Get the money and get out! Let them know Vlad started the party!
You need to find a flammable liquid!
Bile is in-bound. Be ready for him!
Vault's not here. OK, keep searching.
Guys, the thermal drill. Go get it.
I'm almost afraid to ask...
Looks like his drink is getting low. Lets serve him another, with a little something added. Find the same bottle at one of the bars.
Make your way out through the garage!
30 thousand guys, keep it up!
Don't loose that keycard, you're gonna need it later.
You'll need to restart the drill!
That's the pump done. Great work!.
Locke, if you promise to not fucking crash this helicopter, I'll get you a new set of golf clubs, right?
Find the Commissioner's office, guys.
OK, gang. We're here.
That's what you get for trusting the internet, I guess.
Politics is as you know global - I need you for a global effort.
There, that's it.
Bloody dwankies found you already! Mr. Blonde, take that Porky in the back and the gang will take care of the other kÃªrels.
Great - that's the last of 'em!
Blerrie chop Murky soldiers... hope they don't follow.
You gotta get into that tunnel, friends.
Nice work! The sixth wave was beaten back!
Well, we didn't get the gold, but we'll still be compensated for the successful frame job we pulled. Well done, people.
Don't forget to turn the power back on. Blind here.
Look for a code that starts with two.
Cops are on the way. Time is important, so hustle!
No luck! No DNA match found on the evidence. Keep looking and scanning!
Thirty seconds, gang.

I'm not gonna lie; we are taking a huge risk by double-crossing Akan, but I believe this is the right choice. First thing is getting the EMP bomb that is being transported by Murkywater. They will be making a scheduled stop. That will be our chance. Get in quietly, find the EMP, then get out of there. You need to do this by stealth, so dress the part.
That's great. But if you want to grab some more, do so!
The van's got to bug out, but the driver dropped a thermal drill. That's the only way into the vault now.
Loot for the taking...
Right! And...left!
Get that sniper!
An engine. That's what we need. I think I saw some inside the clubhouse before they started beating the livin' shit out of me.
...Could maybe open them up with a computer, yeah?
Aha! Ship database, including comm frequencies. Great! That's what we need. Now get on the horn to the Captain.
That electric box controls the gate. Sure you could have it open in seconds.
Damn, that's the alarm. Get ready for action!
Good! Get the rest and we will get them out of here. I hope this fucking train is a smooth ride.
There's more gear outside if you need it, friends.
That zip-line is your way out - get there!
I'm already waiting for you at dock nine!
Plant C4 on the truck doors, gang.
I got to keep moving!
Ship database. Should have... Got it! Comm frequency for the Moretta. This is it! Now find a radio. Let's call the Captain.
That's the one, bring it back to the mechanic!
The testimonies Hox needs are down here somewhere. Search the records.
General admin office. A terminal here might hold the Moretta's comm frequency. Good chance of a keycard or radio too.
Right, they didn't leave the key in the car. Smart cops.
What the fuck did you guys steal!?
Gang, I can't stress how important electricity is to computers!
Saw through that roof and drag him out!
That's the head of security. Down by the water, at the dock.
Come on, Dentists' loot is right there.
Watch it! Don't let the cops take the balloon down!
Ready to go? Light a flare!
There's the hose! Connect it to the vault.
The boat driver needs to know when he should come in. Look around in the warehouse for the floodlight switch.
Bain is making short work of the Murkys. To get through here, you'll have to drill the door and get the dead guard's keychain.
An inside contact has rigged up spy cameras and surveillance drones. You can access them from the gadget on the roof.
Ok, have a breather and I'll do rest, yeah?
Great! That is all of them.
Don't forget. Look for the ladder, dear friends.
Whose idea was it to go in from here?
Not much more.
Excellent job! We know where he is. Now hustle back to the car. Grab any loot before the Fed's get it. You know... Those crates gave me an idea...
Blerrie! Didn't work. You must've mixed it wrong. Wait a bit and try again, yeah?
This is your chance to plan your course of action.
Mmmhmm, fine fine.
Good.
Focus on the next part. Get him out, get the server in the trunk and get to the transfer room on the ground floor.
Engage the cops! Make them forget about the truck!
The wheel stopped on flames, I don't think that is a good thing.
Guys! There's another closet door!
Ok guys, the ASIM is pass. Our tracks are now gone.
All right, got the show's schedule. We can do this.
Take the boxes from the conveyor, friends.
The boat's waiting for you at the lake. You can zip-line aboard.
Not good. There's a system lock in place. You'll have to get to the mainframe computer and hack it.
It's muriatic acid.
What are you waiting for? The vault is open.
Throw it into the truck, we'll deal with it later!
OK, lowering the winch.
Boat here. I see the signal, I'm coming in.
The wheel stopped on flames. Things are about to burn!
Ship's there. Get on it!
I'm sending the van, keep bagging the stuff!
Starting my approach. ETA four minutes. Over.
You're not going to just stroll out the front. Get upstairs, and blast through into the office next door. That's the way out.
Had a look at the barriers yet?
Get into the closet when you're ready.
Now keep the heat off it. Let it do its job.
Still searching for the USB? Check back in IT.
Oh shit!
Bile is waiting for the signal, friends.
Server room now! Hurry before we get all of the FBI on our asses!
A job well done! Now, get the hell out of there fast. That building won't keep standing for long.
Don't' forget the door, yeah?
Get to the archaeology room.
That's six!
You gotta find some clues. Keep looking.
Wait, you didn't get ALL of the goats. Is my asshole your plaything? I want ALL the goats.
A TV crew. Hmm... try to stay off their camera.
OK, I'm in position!
That truck needs to be safe. Draw fire away from it.
Find a way to get in.
Nice! Now, hurry over to the vault. Chop chop!
The wheel stopped on sniper!
You wanna play a game? A meth-cooking game?
Very good! The bird is out of the cage!
Keep the heat away from the circuit breakers.
OK, the gate is open, get to that subway entrance.
Now get down to the garage - it's the way out!
If none of you have picked up the extra can of thermite hidden inside the copy machine, you should go get and get it and pour it out. More thermite means faster melting process.
Hey hey hey guys, Guys! you better tell my brother-in-law to step on it!
How the fuck did they know we were gonna be here!?
Gimme a couple of minutes to confirm the barcode. Hold on.
The hack has been interrupted!
They're flushing that coke away. Gang, get up there before it's all gone!
Watch for cameras. Don't let them see you.
Remember we need both the Taxman and the server, people. Scare him and make him go into the limo once we've confirmed that he has the server on him.
Blerrie! It wants to run an automatic firmware update. Hurry and stop it!
Good work! Get back to the cooking. Use the time between waves to find more ingredients.
Also... that Italian stuff... uh... spaghetti! You can have as many tins as you want.
Draw fire from the truck, gang.

Eh, I'll say it for you: you didn't come here only to save me, now did ya? No, you're here for the custom built bike, am I right or am I right? I'll help you. I owe you that much, but you'll have to get me the parts I need.

This is Roberts bank. It's a small DC company, almost as old as the city itself. And while I have a lot of respect for the fine institutions of this nation, I have greater respect for what they hold in their vault. My intel says this branch has the lowest hit-rate in the country. Time to change that.
While I'm hacking the system, you should go ahead and find those code parts. Remember, one per laptop.
Your driver had to bail. He left behind a drill. Get it, and use it on the vault.
Disable the alarm! It's counting down and things are gonna get real messy once it reaches 0.
We gotta get the ship moving! Lemme think... Alright, just hack the ship control terminal and make sure it stays on.
You might wanna scout the wagons for some extra loot. And keep your eyes open for C4. You're gonna need it later. Should be in one of the crates.
Alright, I've got your pick-up driver on the line, patching him through now.
That's a lot of stones.
The pilot just fell down. Damn, is he sleeping? You need to wake him up!
Don't forget to take a look at the security checkpoint, yeah?
Cool, break through the gates. You need a crowbar!
Why would Murky have the artifact in a bio-lab? No matter, go and find it, yeah? And hope you don't need hazmat suits.
No need to sneak about any longer!
Damn it, they stopped the charge!
Alright, there's the door and there's the first lock. Get the codebreakers working.
OK, be careful! It will be worth sneaking all the way through, boys. No alarms and this framing will be perfect!
So that's Locke.
Look for the guys packing the coke. Make sure these "elves" know they're making toys for Santa fucking Christmas! Me! Okay?
Now drive!
Shouldn't be too much longer.
I'm ready!
More guns, more money. Great work. Hector is waiting for us.
Are the goats safe? Please, God, someone think of the goats!
I think they saw that from the ISS!
We have to blow that gate. Get the C4 on it.
That's probably blueprints of the building.
Use the thermite I sent to weaken that vault door, friends.
That could have gone a lot worse. Now untie him and let's get going.
There's sleeping gas too. Grab it. You'll need it later.

You gotta get through that door. I think the artifact is on the other side. What about cooking up a fun cocktail to burn through it? Maybe there's a recipe for something suitably volatile around there? Heh... what could go wrong, eh?
Keep your wits about you, Zeal Marksmen are on the way!
You'll need to break into the elevator shaft! See if you can find a crowbar!
OK, you shouldn't have to wait too much longer for Bile.
C'mon friends, no standing around.
You gotta get that dinges out of there.
Throw the bags over the side. You can fish them out of the water when you get out of there.
Don't go to the neighbours.
I'm there in one minute...
Somebody stop these fucking clowns! Don't let them come in!
Hack the computer and see if you can find the code.
I'm here! Bring the goats!
Good job, that drone won't be here to witness the robot revolution. But make sure you hide the pile of junk. We can't have one of the guards finding it.
You put in the wrong code, they're onto you!
Get to the escape point, clowns! Follow the blue containers!
(sings) "They're the gang that broke the bank at Monte Carlo". Outstanding!
Vlad is really something else! He wants to steal that huge Christmas tree! Bile is coming in with the chopper now, so be ready!
Drill is dropped. Get it working on the vault.
I hate blackmailers. Do as he says. We'll find that asshole soon enough.
Yeah, guys? I'm right here!
You tricked him. Excellent. Now kill him.
Kill the guards. Then you can kill Ernesto Sosa.
That's it. Well done! The vault is opening again!
Keep looking for the evidence room!
Guy, ya gotta do better. Timing means shit if you're firing off the wrong ammo, capische!
That shitty network will transfer the databases faster if you can keep the cops from pulling the plug on it.
Boat's coming in at dock 7.
Okay, good! Now, please to place the charges onto the four locks you see there.
That dinges is not going to crack without causing a racket.
Alright. Let's try this again.
Hurry, get the keychain.
Don't forget to pick up that saw.
It's the police! They're tailing us!
Come on, you can find a way in.
Comrads get over here, soldiers everywhere. Time to leave!
Now wire up those breaching charges. One for each of the four locks, if you please.
They've got the wagons circled out here. Ready up for a war!
Yeah yeah, just put on your mask now.
There are millions of crates in there. Yes, millions. you just gotta find the right one. Use a terminal in the IT lab.
The Murkywater trains will have a security panel on the side, so we'll have to hack them open.
I guess they cared more about their fix than information. Junkies aren't great with abstraction. Meanwhile the Mendozas are leaving for the airport in a rented bus, escorted by undercover FBI.
Alright. Now apply the drill to that safe and drag the garden hose down into the shelter.
Now you just need to start moving loot to Mr Blonde's car.
That's the stuff. Keep going!
Don't forget to find the elves. Shout at them to make them work.
Paydirt! That's what we came for, gang.
You gotta find a way in.
Crew this is hot off the wire. I have a gold deposit waiting for us.
The federales are using shape charges to open up another wall!
We got it!
Get to the ship control terminal and hack it!
18 more needed!
What the hell! That crazy chopper is back.
Hose needs to connect to ship.
What are you waiting for, friends?
You're not getting out of there unless you use a drill!
How convenient, he won't run away now. Cut off his hand and bring it to the scanner.
What about taking the manager's fingerprints off something with a piece of tape, so we can bypass the scanner quietly?
There in....
Look around the office, find who our IT guy is. Then hack his pc.
This will be over fast if you don't get out of there!
Hello? Yes Sir, no problems at all. We're just running some tests.
Second digit for the code. Now, just get the last number and we're set.
You gotta get that floor open, friends!
I'm pretty sure there's something suitable around there.
This game room is the heart of The Golden Grin.
I don't want to keep someone who calls herself the Butcher waiting. Get onto the ship!
For every bag of evidence you secure, I will provide compensation. Crime.net needs to be protected.
You're in. Now, the target is the voting machines. They're likely in shipping crates, so look around for those.
Student loan erased! But no codes. Try another.
...I'm 68% sure.
Bag it up!
Good. Now keep the cops off of it.
Vlad, you chop! You said the vault was going to be easy!
OK, that's it. When you've got the loot aboard, you need to juice it up as well.
These assholes chained me up! Get this shit off me!
All right, the thermite should be halfway done by now. Keep keepin' on, gentlemen.
I know that was a lot of money to send up in smoke and I apologize, I know it goes against your nature, but hopefully you find the compensation competitive.
If you guys wanna keep going, Vlad's giving us a bonus for everything over 50k!
The cops got to the Saw. Restart it ASAP.
Shit, the alarm! You need to find the security room. We can't do anything while this place is in lockdown!
Go find that armory!
You gotta restart the override on that box.
The guest list, guys. Get it from reception and we can see who's in our room.
You look like rats in a maze. No cheese at the end for you though. Only assfuck.
Gang, find gas and ignite the tires. Give that chopper a nice thick smokescreen to worry about!
So, next step is...
Into the docks, gang, c'mon.
I know an IT dwankie when I see one, even in Mexico. Take that man to the server room and make him open up the security bars.
Gang, find that vault. It'll be in a shipping container. Probably those Murkywater ones.
Just gotta give it some time to fill.
There are snipers on the surrounding buildings.
I think the cops are calling the house, they're probably on to us.
Ok, let's get him out with an 'urgent' email. You've got another compromised computer near you we can use.
Start the winch and it will move BFD into position. Don't let the cops stop it!
Gensec on approach. Let's get this jam started. OK, hit it.
Good afternoon. Roberts bank. How can I help you?
Port of Washington radio. This is Moretta. Standing by to receive GPS data. Over.
How are those drills coming?
Find the pink schnapps bottle and spike it.
I'm losing control!
Here we are! You'll have to drill it open.
Alright friends, just give me some time to connect.
There's the vault! Great! Now use the thermite on the top and burn your way through.
Mr Blonde can't escape unless you lead the cops away!
Grab the keychain friends.
Look at this, I'm rich!
Protect the routers.
I love opening Christmas presents!
Look out for ways to get in. Has to be some weak point in the security. Get a close look at that fence.
Alright, four!
The Golden Grin never closes. You want to waste time nickel-and-diming the slots...?
Thats one batch done.
Need to hurry gang.
Thanks, here's the cash!
That door is too tough for the drill. But I'm sure the armory will have something that can take it out.
You knocked him out? Really?
Right, you need to use some of the thermite I sent on those vault hinges, yeah?
Remember, you need those car keys!
If you don't find the Murkywater trains, we're not getting the EMP bomb.
Good, now plug it into one of the laptops.
Hurry friends, you need to get into that computer.
Now grab as much of Vlad's merchandise as you can, but stay quiet!
Keep that news feed alive and I'll start getting you a way out of there.
Preferably take them as the money will be great that way.
It's simplicity itself, friends. Just press the button of the vault you want to open. Just be sure it actually contains something.
Get Vlad's merchandise!
That's what we are after. Get it to the van.
GPS is online. Providing you tagged the right truck, this is great work. Time to go.
We're at the night club. Time to get your dance-on. Start by "casing" the place before the fun begins. Take a look around first and keep things casual.
Gas! Shit, get out of there! Now!
Nice work, folks. Now what you're looking for are paintings with red stickers. Those are the ones the democrat wants. Get at least four.
If we get outta this one I might just leave this fuckin' town.
Great, now you just need to find the second one.
Can't figure out why, but it looks like they've got one of the boxes in the bio-lab.$NL;You've got your vaccinations already, yeah?
Ahhh! That old asshole is on his way back. Good work. If you can find some of my packages... Vlad would be very grateful.
WHAT THE FUCK IS THAT...oh, the balloon. Right. Coming in two minutes!
You chops ready for a cookout? Used to throw a good braai in my Cape Town days, but this is a bit different!
Nice. That's it. Alright, one of you guys monkey up there.
Caustic soda - yep, thats it. Go for it.
Get upstairs, crew! That's where you'll be blasting through!
Bravo! Now, second step - find the local security station, cut through and approve the opening sequence.
Are you so dumb that the third pallet - a fucking inanimated object - can hide from you? Find that cunt.
Crew, you got the goats, now hit the gas!
About one minute until the customer arrives.
Find your way inside and locate the Murkywater trains. The EMP parts will most likely be in different wagons.
Get to that storage unit, yeah?

Ernesto Sosa has a special lock system for his office, with a spoken pass phrase. But I have planned for it - I had my people sell some special cocaine to him, with a microphone recorder hidden in the package. See if you can find it.
Good. Use the keycard to enter the server room on the second floor.
Gang, snatch the bag and dump it by the methlab.
Stop! You didn't put it in yet, did you?
That's our ship. The Moretta. But we can't get on it from here. You gotta move it to dock 3B.
Vault door's open. Get in and grab the loot!
I'm off in one minute.
The vault code reshuffles every 10 minutes for extra security. Put a blocker on the keypad to lock the code in place.
Garrett is back in his office. We need to keep him out of there!
This is reception. Remember where it is.
Who wants to do a little banking?
OK, now reactivate the computer.
The code is likely in the auctioneer's office, but you gotta get in there first. The auctioneer probably has a keycard to open the door.
I'm inside. Keep them fuckers off me while I work.
C'mon friends, the manual should show what wires you need to cut.
I felt the tremor of that starting from here.
You need to get the computer running again!

OK, the thermal drill you need for the vault is somewhere in the parking lot. Get it before you do your takedown. Then you can go hit that vault. Watch for cameras and bank employees. Do your homework before you go in and remember cash is king.
And another one bites the dust! Nice!
...grab some of that gold if you can friends, but remember that money is secondary, yeah?
Christ, LA's wrecked. Rubble everywhere.
Oh, fuck me...
The gas will clear away. Give it a moment.
Find more gas and pour it on the fire. Keep it burning! Fry him!
Those lights... gotta mean something.
To get there, you need to get past the security door.
SWAT's on the roofs, guys. Don't let them get dug in.
Maybe check the walls?
Found a saw yet?
We have to hurry! The cop's radio is buzzing like crazy. They're already on their way!
Going to refill the tank. Back soon.
Get to the pillar!
OK, no time to lose, get all that intel.
Looks like they burned the intelligence, we'll have to leave empty-handed!
Remember what you're looking for. Big pile of cash. Shit big pile.
We need the Moretta's comm frequency. It'll be on one of those terminals. Get checking.
Restore the power, friends!
Watch out for that chopper, it's close enough for the cops to do him some good damage.
...See if you can open the doors via electrical boxes. Should be a couple nearby on the walls.
Blerrie! The auctioneer has run off so you gotta use a drill instead. Get one on the door right away.
Great! We don't want to alert the crowd so we're gonna detonate the C4 in time with Alesso's pyrotechnics. Head up to the tech booth and hack in.
I need to get into the garage and you need to protect me. Let's go, come on.
Cop is trying to move a goat out of the AO.
Ok, I'm here and ready to get the hell out.
Don't wait too long friends, enter that code ASAP.
Guys, head back to the security door and use the blowtorch.
Wait, don't shoot! Make him give up instead by intimidating him. He can be useful to us.
The daily code for the time lock on the vault. Should I send someone over?
It's just like you said. Cameras and microphones in every room. Buluc is one sick fucker.
The alarm timer will start as soon as you open a door or window. That'll give you a few seconds to disable the alarm.
No, that's the wrong blend... now you gotta wait until the reaction dies down and start again, yeah?
That's enough coke, not all, but enough! Hectors people are at the harbor. You need to meet them and get the stuff onto their boat. Then call it a day - OK, a payday!
Great job, Alex, I knew you'd do it.
Goddamnit! Can you guys move that?
I got you a garbage truck, now you just gotta fill it with loot!
That's all we need. Up to you if you want to go for more.
Damn! They lowered the Diamond into the floor! No time for anything fancy, so only one thing for it - get a drill on there!
I'm leaving in half a minute!
Mortgage foreclosures revoked! No codes though.
Woops. That one's on me I assume.
Hector wants to send a message in, quote en quote, blood and fire to the Mendoza cartel as they roll into their private airport. Might be tricky... But I think we can.
I know it is an imposition, but do you think you could connect the fuel hose to the helicopter?
Alesso has promised a legendary gig. I'm promising we'll deliver a legendary heist.
If he doesn't follow orders. Hit him!
Good, now do your little magic on that baby. Get the pick-up running!
Just little fuel to go.
A jewelry store downtown could use a visit. Something for you guys?
This door has a two-stage security protocol. First stage is using the keycard. So...if you please.
Hurry!
If you plug me into the lobby computer, I can hack the door.
Get going or you're gonna be be left for dead!
The keys, friends.
Here we are, get in there and get me required amount. We go in quiet and go out with a boom!
Careful guys, time's running out! 10 seconds!
Great, that one's hacked. Get that crate closed, then find another.
Five
Get the code from the screen and open the vault, yeah?
Good work! Chopper's gonna drop him off then come back for the rest of you. While you're waiting, look around the forest for any more packages.
OK! you've got enough... Or you can stay for more.
The workstation, friends.
That's one socket, but that big beautiful girl needs another.
You need to reconnect the juice!
Those crafty fuckers are dropping grenades into the sewers.
He did it, gang. You can grab more loot if you want or you get on those bikes and escape!
Cops are going for the balloon! Stop them!
Guys, we need to get that safe open.
Guys, be careful. The guards inside will probably carry pagers.
That's the last one. Now you can get far away, or return to the warehouse for more loot.
Here's Johnny!
Alright, that's our blackmailer dealt with. Let's hustle those other bags, before he gets greedy.
I promised my wife I would make you pay. Don't you forget.
You must have triggered a failsafe. Use a drill to get out again!
There will be a computer in one of the staff rooms that we can hack. Find it.
Ooh, friends. Looks like rain is coming. Don't want to ruin those nice Murky uniforms, so get inside.
You need to get through that door, friends.
Looks like they've upped the security. Gotta find a way to get the shutters open without making a mess of the oval office.
Get in there, and just mess the place up. Trash the rooms, light up the cars - whatever you can do. Go crazy. The Commissar is bound to give us a call.
I've stowed some plastic explosive in the DeLorean. You can use it to make that gas station go up like the Tsar Bomba!
Open sesame! I got some of the house's shutters to open.
Gang, cops have set up a three block perimeter. The hard way through is the only way, so you're boots on the ground. Stay with the truck, and the truck will stay with you.
They're stamping the fire out!
Find something to take that cell block door down!
You'll probably find the tunnel if you look around outside.
Right, time to get the master code. The CFO will have it.

Ach, watch it, friends! Of course. They have lasers in the bank that's supposed to only have older, primitive security. Let me check something... yes... you should be able to shut them off from the roof!
Keep looking for that safe, yeah?
One of BFD's coolant tanks is empty. She needs that water, guys. Grab a refill from the bathrooms!
Why you sacks of wretched Yankee dick. You die today!
I have to leave in two minutes!
No surprise security's going to be real tight, so we'll airdrop in instead of driving. Quiet and deadly. Find the engine, and i'll have it flown out. Good luck.
Two
You need to help the Captain, cut the door open!
Three
The alarm. But no matter. We got enough cash.
Eight!
Come on, what the fuck are you waiting for? Get in the truck!
Outstanding work. Tonight, you clowns made yourself a friend in high places. You'll never pay another parking ticket in this town.
Damn it, we've been double-crossed. You've got incoming, get ready to fight.
Wait, wait. Listen to this...
They're making a last effort. Make sure to stay away from that helicopter!
Outstanding work! These sweet motors will be in the hands of Arabian sheikhs within the week. Good job!
Yeah, tell him his ass is on the line if he isn't available for the regular time-lock check in.
Plan B guys. Go find the teddy bear, rip it open and use the saw inside to cut open the ICU doors.
We're locked down... if you want me to open it up you need to get the surveilance room open fast.
Hello gentlemen. Our client is very pleased that you agreed to do this with us. But know this - the only way this is going through is if we do it our way.
30 seconds, get to the entrance!
Look, up in the scaffold! Another goat. But, hold up! It looks like that ladder is electrocuted. Disable power!
Chopper's here, guys. Start hauling the loot.
Now stow those bags in the container on the floor. I'm sure I can find someone to collect it.
It's ugly business, but it's gotta be done.
FBI in disarray. A lot of people about to get called into their bosses' office. Mendoza crippled and we're about to get paid. Nice burn, folks.
Yeah.. I ... I don't know .. It could have been a big gun.
I got it. Hoisting it your way.
Now, you ready to call it? Find our Insider. She's going to show you a way to slip out.
Charon gave us a password for a laptop that contains data on where the money is. Find it!
Something wrong with pump.
You've defeated the eighth wave of cops!
Vault's open. Grab whatever's inside, gang!
Hooked into the terminal yet?
There goes the connection. Power was cut. Please restore it, yeah?
Let's keep this one under the radar.
You gotta hack into the gate controls.
Kerels are sending in Medic Dozers with this round.
Ach, I should've known they would have it locked. Maybe have a look in the clubhouse and see if you can find any clues to the code in the briefing room.
Blerrie that's an OLD vault! Almost a shame to blow it open, yeah?
The safe is probably opened by a button or switch somewhere. You need to find it.
Come on let's get a move on.
C'mon now, get in there.
Four bags. Hustle! Hustle!
Look around. There should be clues that will point you to the right truck. Perhaps matching their color to the containers.
Hurry, friends! Get into that plane.
Trying to find some good recipies here... some of Bain's files are a blerrie mess, so I hope I get it sorted!
Two down, two to go!
Ok guys... the buildings here make it hard to get close. You need to move to a higher position so I can pick you up.
Just bring thoses bags to the chopper, dear friends.
You need to shut down those guns for Bile to get you out. Find the control boxes and shut them down.
You've got to find the cell block.
Alright the van is there. Move!
We are done, gang. Time to go.
Hacking now. Need a minute or two.
Come on, get to that garage.
This is Roberts Bank. How may I help you today?
That reads correct. Thanks for your assistance.
Go! Get to the ladder before this place comes crashing down!
Blerrie! You gotta get that vehicle out of the way!
Right, that's the files. Get them back to Hoxton!
Look for a code that starts with three.
The Moretta - That's our girl. But we can't get on board here. You have to see her moved to dock 3B.
Ok, it's like I thought... blerrie amateurs. See if you can find that USB stick.
OK, time to take your masks off and make your way casually out the door.
You gotta restart the hack!
Alright, bring it to the van, it's right across the street.
Terrific. Because of you we know where all the Mendoza cash is stashed. It's one of the Trustee branch banks. I guess you know what comes next, huh?
Looks like one of the goats is up in that apartment. Get up there!
So, as you surely know, this isn't everything this safe house has to offer, let me show you what I'm working on.
Got to get that cannon pointing right.
They got to the power line. Reset the breaker switch!
Go find the evidence storage. It's on the second floor.
Your first priority is finding your ride out of there. Maybe check the hangars, yeah?
You screwed that pooch good, asshole.
Hey, assholes. I'm enjoying a Martini in here! How you like that?
IT are nearby. Get over there, find the server and haul it back.
There's goes the alarm. And our stealth plan. Don't sweat it. The ship is moving.
You're too close to finishing to fuck up now. Just slap the paste onto the grate and burn through!
You got the briefcase? Excellent! Time to go then!
Check the shoe store's stock in the computer.
We could have done with you guys in Rhodesia.
It's muriatic acid.
OK, you chops. Time to bring in the Beast!
Damn it! They saw you!
There are Heavy FBI units all over the place, be careful.
Vlad wants to talk to you...
Only two of you at a time up the zipline, please. And it's a one way trip. But what a trip, yeah?
Commissar's hiding at Downtown. Look for a clue for that. He's Downtown.
Alright, you found him! Now get him to the top of that tower!
To cover our escape, you gotta set a fire trap in container 12. Use gas.
That should get the process going.
Great. Poppa Bain will take care of these. Now, back to the keys.
OK, now you need to get your hands on the keycard.
The mechanic's done. If you want more loot you get it now, otherwise you ride out of there.
The van will be there in 30 seconds - get ready!
I can't move until you deal with the snipers!
Guys, don't forget: douse those cars with gasoline. Light 'em up.
The window cleaning platform is a no-go. Use ziplines to get the bags out instead.
Ok, now find Wilson's code lock.
All right, I'm close now, but there's snipers spread around the drop zone. I'll need you to take care of those before I can drop the C4.
... Great. I'll go get the server.
Be careful! They have snipers incoming!
What, are you afraid of those spiders in the corner? Search more thoroughly for that code, friends!
This piece of junk is from the 70's. Hurry up...
This guy is doing well. Let's loot the place. We're gonna go for his floor safe. You've got some winches stashed near the entrance to the property. Get them and hook 'em up.
You can either look for more loot or get out of there now.
Fuck this, why are we talking about donuts? Feds eat pie.
Next step is to code the tag. Get it to the computer!
Something in the cafeteria and it isn't Jeff Vader. It looks like a glowing LCD display.
Found that safe, yet friends?
On my way, Sensei. Does this thing have afterburners?
Left and middle!
Have a closer look at that shrine.
I'll set up the trade with the senator's people and get us rolling.
Take down the alarm, friends.
Keep firing and I can get the gate open!
I'm close, guys, but the cops brought in a lot of snipers on the roofs of the nearby buildings. Gonna need you to take care of them before I can make the drop.
On the scene! Bring me the goats!
I've got someone waiting for you ouside in the sewers. You'll need some thermite to get through.
You should be able to access the vault somewhere around there.
The van can't get through unless you clear the area.
Not sure they're the same as the others.
Turn those valves off.
Gang, there's got to be something in the motelrooms that can pinpoint the Commissar's location. Keep looking.
Oh, blerrie...
Boat's moving, he'll be at dock 8 by the warehouse.
Great job, gang. The mobsters are dead or running. That's how we do it!
They're throwing everything into this. Hold them off, my friends. They'll kill you, but they'll fuck me proper. For sure.
Don't break his jaw!
It might've been misplaced- check everywhere!
Thank you! Thank you!
Open sesame, friends!
Time to slip out of there! No reason to go loud now.
Yes, Duke lent me a book. But exactly why are these things so important, aside from their considerable monetary value?
I need to open this door. Give me a minute!
Disco inferno. Nicely done. Let's get paid.
Good job, we are gone.
Defend the drill. Should be through in a couple of minutes.
Admire the decor later. Get inside the Oval Office and find that keycard.
OK, good. Now take care of the other router.
Get that server anyway you can!
Any room in the sanctum might have what we need. Look around!
Thermite has burned through, yeah? Time to get that winch set up.
Okay. That's him barbecuing.
Okay. Here we go again. This is for the money, baby!
Yeah, ready!
Looks like we're in the right place, friends!
Bekakin' kerels messed it up for you! You're going to have to start over.
He's by the barbecue. Get over to him.
That was close. Good work disposing of those guns. Hector will move in his army now and we will have a very fine payday indeed.
You're gonna need the thermite to pop the wagon open. Get back and grab it.
Great job! You beat them back!
First, you gotta break into the warehouse. It'd be great if you can keep the noise down.
Look inside the containers. Find what cargo they're carrying. Maybe that could help you figure out which is the right truck.
Ag man, that was the wrong code!
The wheel stopped on the dozer again. Watch out guys!
Ah, come on! We're missing a server. According to the log, it was taken to IT. Get over there, and grab it.
SWATS from the west!
Come on, gang. Out of that hidey-hole!
If you cut power to the nearby electric box, those detectors should go down.
OK, find the CFO. He's got the master code!
Yeah my gut feeling told me that wasn't the right ingredient...
A night at the museum, gang. It's just you, a crew of security guards and a priceless diamond.
Find the scotch and spike it. Red bottle.
The C4 is in play, gang. Grab it.
The Murky resources we're after will be in the form of drugs. They could be anywhere around there, so you're just going to have to start looking.
Those lights. Some kind of indicator. Look around and see if you can match them with anything.
Now cut him loose.
You're inside? Good job, now there is only one more door between us and the server.
Damn! This was the wrong pc! Cops are on their way. You don't have much time now.
The comm frequency ain't here. Check the computer's in the control room across the dockyard.
The bus blew up! Be careful and stay out of that fire!
Drill that gate, guys.
Hurry now, take all the pardons so we can leave!
You can use that keycard in the control room. Just swipe it, open the dock.
Groot, that's all we need. Murkywater and the Dentist will be in big trouble once this hits home.
Time to go! Get on board before Murky attack craft reach us!
Did you forget about the alarm I mentioned earlier?! You needed to disable it!
The walls are thick concrete, but I can still hear that concert. Nothing stops the music, huh.
Thirty seconds, gang! You're pushing it!
Remember, you need a gas can to set the paintings on fire. Shoot the gas can.
These fuckers went to driving school - I'll tell you that much!
Hold that door!
Gold, gold, gold. Let's go dig in the vault, shall we?
Damn! Someone saw the body! Take him out before he calls it in!
Hey, we're missing some of the goats. This makes Vlad sad. Trust me, you want a happy Vlad.
Ach no, that's not it!
There have to be clues around the wharf that'll help you figure out which truck is carrying the machines to Washington. Keep your eyes peeled.
Add muriatic acid, to continue the process!
That diner has a service ladder leading up to the roof, but you'll need a keycard to get to it. Look around for one.
The plane should be on its way.
I admire your attitude. Your dedication will pay off.
Look at you motherfuckers just walking in here with your stupid ass-masks. I can't fucking believe Rust wants to be one of you freaks. Regardless, two things are gonna go down now.
Soda. Caustic soda.
Now you can take that code and enter it into the keypad on the safe.
That goat climbed up there. Got stuck. We need him down. Saw the streetlight!
Hoxton's rottin' in a cell, and you're scratching your ass in there. Out of the crate!
There's gotta be something special about that thing if they keep it locked up in here. Maybe take it with you, yeah?
Well, you got a decent amount. Just about covers the gas money. Maybe next time we can push it further.
Locke sold the Butcher out too. The ship by the dock is one of hers. Go help 'em out and maybe we can hitch a boat-ride.
Now you gotta blow a hole into the floor, yeah? What we're after is in the foundation of the building.
You're going to New York on a rescue mission for the Continental.
Give Santa a good thrashing! Wake him up!
Good work, gang - but the NYPD won't give up so easily.
Hey, where's the Diamond? They've lowered it into the floor! Wasn't expecting that. Calls for brutal method - break through with a drill!
You could take a look in the bookshelves.
You need to find Buluc's office.
This spot is getting deadly!
You're going to need to get into the vault using a thermal drill, get whatever's in there bagged up and moved back to the escape car. Use your judgment and don't be greedy... Good luck, folks.
Your escape helicopter is here,I suggest you get the hell out of there!
OK, I'm going to need a little bit of time.
You should always trust Locke, except when you shouldn't.
Keep your eyes on the hostage!
Have you found the key yet?
You guys ready? This is where you get out.
The pilot will need a signal where to drop the Beast. Drop some smoke!
OK, we're moving. Now keep the truck out of danger 'til you're clear.
We go to their little private airport, find the weapons and take them all or destroy them... But it's more profitable if we take them.
So Ernesto Sosa is hiding behind his guards. You can handle it, I'm sure.
Well, what does a goat sound like?
Ok, find Santa and free him!
It's the police! They're tailing us!

Things got messy, but you got through in the end. The hacks worked. It looks like the good lady Mayor's people was behind this. The press are already sharpening the knives for Schwartz. Needless to say, The Elephant is ecstatic. You have served your city well tonight, my friends.
You guys did a great job up there. You wanna join the road crew?
You gotta fight your way past the cops and meet up with Eddie. Move!
Okay. Well, you know where it is, but I don't fucking know. Light a flare, yeah?
Lost it! Get the power back, quick!
Chopper is there, throw the bags into the chopper.
The cocaine is in the manager's office, but keep your eyes open for hired muscle.
Those federales are going to want to stop the Beast. Don't let them!
Ok, let's drop the next one right into the lobby. Circling back.
Beautiful work, friends. You made less noise than my cat on that one. Now let's see what we can do with that artifact, yeah? Duke will get to looking at it as soon as you get back to the safehouse.
Shit!
Are you afraid of the receptionists or something? Get in there.
You've only got a small bit of time before the kerels find you.
Let me give your memories a jog, yeah? Open the cargo bay door. Please.
Go ahead and grab what you can, then leave when you are ready!
There'll likely be workers here. Don't let them blow this.
Can we get back to work yet? I'm down to 5% on my cell.
Almost there. You should be able to hear it.
Guys, if the Commissar gets away, Hoxton will rot. So move it!
Time for a nice, old fashioned cookout, for sure!

Nicely done, dear friends. We're still in a lot of trouble but old Locke is going to take care of you, yeah? I know I made some promises, and I'm still working on getting answers. Calling in all my favors for this one. Gotta pay off the Butcher too- don't want her nipping at our heels after Alaska. Have a short breather, lay low for a bit, while Mr Lindenhurst tries to figure out what's so special about this medallion dinges. I got a feeling that we haven't even cut through the frosting on this cake, yeah?
Okay, there it is. Kick the door down!
The keycard grants us access. Use it to open the door.
Starting to feel like a nagging nanny here... so find that laptop.
OK, the cameras are installed in the paintings. We're ready. The senator's men are jumpy but ready to deal with us. So let's deal. Money for art.
