Fuck! Thought I had it. Didn't have it. Coming about again.
Nitrogen must almost be gone by now. Stand by, Bile is on the way with a little present.
Crap! Just plant the C4 at the other spot. It's a sure thing now.
Come on! Open the gate already and get the stuff we came for.
Dammit! If you want everything open again, you're going to need to get into the surveillance room.
Friends! Beautiful friends! How is the flight? We are getting close to the drop location. So, please, open the hatch and...
Drill the door open and get my cocaine shoe box!
You poes need to find a fucking ladder. Fuck me. Come on!
Great you got the keycard.

OK, the airport is just down the hill. Cut through the fence and find the hangar where the truck holding the cases is. The Mendozas will probably be there. Go get those weapons or make sure they don't.
Good, now to get it powered up. The thing runs on batteries, so have a rummage round and see what you can find.
The bird is inbound with the skyhook pieces. Pick-up target is the street.
...I'm 91% sure.
So guys, where's that laptop?
You're done, and it's time to split. Come on, move!
Hook up the laptop to the anti-aircraft gun!
Take that ladder, my friends. Take it, and profit!
Things are getting too hot, I have to pull the chopper out until it calms down.
Bombs away! Oh man, that hit hard! Yeah!
The van had to leave. He'll be back, keep your eyes out for the new location.
Here we go. We should be through in a couple of minutes.
Check the camera and see what's in the vault.
Have a look in the cellar yet?
It would be best if these radars were destroyed. Yes?
Found a schematic yet?
It's open! Deal with the deposit boxes, and grab the loot. Four bags is our minimum.
That was like Baghdad all over again. You need to roll. Hector's got a line on the Mendozas on their way to the airport. We're gonna hit their convoy like a ten ton hammer.
Keep looking for the wagon. Remember, we're looking for the one with the vault.
The manager's probably crapping his black threads somewhere. Find him. Get his keycard.
Move that car so we can get the hell out of here.
No need to hang around there. Let's get you home.
Bile, you ready to come pick up the cargo?
Step it up! The escape vehicle is leaving in four minutes.
We've got an armored transport making an unscheduled stop downtown.
No need to keep quiet now. Go fast and hard.
And there's the last closet. Deal with the lock.
Gas has disappeared, get into that vault!
Bring the keycard back to the door.
Sealed up, donnerse! OK, there's a scaffolding outside, use it to get up to the second floor. Find a door to crack open with a saw, to get into the vault room.
They're using C4 to blast those doors. Guess they don't know about all the live ammo that train is carrying.
What the hell! A little help!?
And... Got it! Well, looks like our Russian friend is somewhere in, hold on...
I've got a line on a jewelry store that's just begging to be hit. Call me back.
Alright, the files are all uploaded, it should do the trick.
Ok, now you gotta search those bags of coke.
Okay, you're in! My intel says they keep the evidence on the second floor. Go find it!
Security door activated.
There's a light shining outside the Glitter Room, looks like a monitor.
Remember, we need six bags!
We're not going in by the main entrance. You see that fence? That's our way in.
...tighten those bolts down friends.
What? Vlad? You filthy Russian! How is your brother-in-law? You know... what's his name... Hootiejudy.. Houdini?
Nice, homey place isn't it?
You did it loud, and you did me proud. Now, let's see if all that bang-bang was worth it. Half a database is better than none, so let's see if we have anything.
If those lasers are giving you a hard time you can deactivate them with keycards.
Time for the main act, getting our friend out. Look for the cell block, it should be nearby.
Move the target to the tower!
You need to walk through those doors. Chop-chop.
Blerrie! Looks like the Feds are here too. Commissioner Garrett must be really, really pissed, yeah?
And now the vault keypanel! Hustle!
Heh, I wonder if this boat is worth more than what's hidden on it.
Maybe if you dog-whistle, Ralph will come out.
You guys havin' a circle jerk up there? 'cos you're sure pulling on my shit down here! Get it tight!
I'll get blasted if I go alone, so you need to take me to the garage. I don't know about y'all, but I want to get this shit done and over with.
Phew, the alarm is disabled. No need to worry about opening doors or windows now!
Refueling is done, so take that hose off.
Watch out, Sniper!
Meeting Rooms are a good bet for finding one of those laptops.
Power's back. Now let's try this once more.
Those charges must be hooked up to the four locks. I am sure you don't need walking through the procedure.
Watch out, guys! The cops are surrounding you!
No need for tip-toeing now. I'm sending the chopper with the drill.
Keep looking and you'll find the armory.
This upload isn't going fast enough, dammit!
Looks like they're setting up snipers on nearby rooftops. Keep your eyes open!
There it goes. The plane is on its way now.
Go go, find the prison transports.
Keep the cops away from the terminal guys.
Good! Ah, not so complicated after all. You should be able to get through by accessing the wire boxes around there and cutting the right cables.
What the fu... hey! Are you here to rescue me?!
The courier had to throw out the parts, so you will have to go round and find them, yeah?
The pilot is refueling the chopper - he will be back soon I promise.
Good, now go get those stones, guys!
Woah, some of the loot got caught in that explosion. Lucky for us, there is more in there.
Alright, you find me. Great fun, my friends. Now, how about losing me again?
Hold the cops off until the time lock runs down.
I'm sorry guys, the pilot says he needs to refuel... And it's gonna take a while. Just hang in there for a while, OK?
You can use the codes you found to close the window shutters.
Gang, the pilot can't see you. You need to light that flare.
Good. Secondly, there is a security room close by. Cut through to it, and approve the airlock sequence.
Quick, type in SYGON.
It's going to blow any second! Duck and cover, friends!
Nice! I'll detonate these when the time comes. Get back to that storage room. I got it open!
Follow Bain through the canteen!
Have you found the gate yet, friends?
There goes your driver. He's left a drill behind. Get it, and keep working!
That's no police chopper.
Be quick, gang. The guards will notice an open vault door.
Ok guys, if all goes to plan, we should be able to leave unnoticed. Just slip away with the crowd.
Remember to look for the laptop!
The cops messed up the time lock! Get it going again!
Search the other wagons for C4! It should be inside one of the crates.
Portable computers... three of them.
That should do it. Now, let's find the server room.
Ach! No, that wasn't right...
Ship security knows nothing. Track down the explosives.
Not just ANY things...
There you go friends, now hurry back in!
Found the library yet?
Ah, there he goes. Hahaha, Good.
What are you waiting for? Take all of them!
Check your options boys. Going full frontal might sting badly.
I wanted to ask if you were thinking of trying our All You Can Eat buffet today?
You got to find those shoes!
I'm glad you showed up! As you can see, I need some help here.
Kiff! Now, get into that vault room!
Next step is authentication. It will take a while so keep an eye on the timer.
First World Bank, how can I help you today?
You need caustic soda, yeah?
Sewers. Why did it have to be sewers.
Got it. Room...
It's open! Let's see what we got!
Don't forget the safe.
Fantastic! We got the code for opening the vault. Now, just gotta get inside the security center unnoticed.
Find the cell block!
That thermite will open the gate for you in no time. Get the briefcase!
You're wasting time friends.
Too much going on here. The road looks best for the guys to assemble the cage.
You should be able to hold your ground inside the park.
Just walk straight into the bank.
Come on, clowns. Get those bags up to the balcony and into the container. The chopper's waiting.
OK, I'm in his system. Lab will open shortly.
It's a nice piece of kit, yeah?
OK, lets blow this place. C4's in the limo. Take it!
Pensacola PD is coming, and it looks like they've drafted in every southern ass-kicker too.
Come on, show me you can be hackers!
Oh, shit!
You know your roles. Walk inside.
Don't wait too long friends, just get that mix onto the door, yeah?
Caustic chloride. Says it is some solid form... Wait a... Should be that hydrogen, right?
I'm guessing any decent IT department will have a spare USB.

Remember, we're here to make it look like a bank robbery. If some election equipment gets destroyed in the process, that's too bad. And it would be a real shame if the voting results became unusable somehow...
Make sure he's still breathing!
The reception area. Remember the location. Might come in handy.
No bags!? The trade will not be good to us. Hope you guys has some tricks up your sleeve for the trade.
Pretty soon we're going to be swamped with news choppers. Our escape chopper? Blend right in.
Do them one by one, and keep the cops away.
My friends! We are approaching the location I have selected for the drop point. So, without further ado...
Bain is heading for the canteen, follow him!
Job done, guys. Now sneak back to the van and we can consider this one closed.
So, guys. You might be wonderin' what happened to our loot. Well, I had to ditch the car but I managed to hide some of it in a storage unit nearby.
Both ink and paper roll are in. Now start it up!
Yes... it's acid, muriatic acid.
Can't shoot that cannon without more juice, replace the batteries.
You need to load both boxes onto the heli before boarding, yeah?
Alright, here's an idea. We're going to make a little call. Get to the telephone outside the house.
Got a footman checking out the bank. Make sure he's... Welcomed.
A drunk Santa - it's a fucking abomination! And my coke!
Al right, that's the tiara we're looking for!
That's the first pallet. All right, good. Now, onto the second.
I need covering fire to get the door open!
Excellent! Now, let it run for a few seconds.
Alright, dock's opened. Now we gotta call the Moretta. Get her moving. Comm frequencies should be on one of the computers in the offices. Find it. I'll patch in and do the talking.
Man, I swear I can smell that skel bait from here. We're at the meth lab. Go in and snag three sacks of the product before the FBI gets here. What Hector wants, Hector gets. For now, anyway.
Right friends, that's who we came for. Do him.
That's the one, right there! Now let him out.
Time to start looking for that stash of Murkywater contraband. It's weapons we're after.
Remember, the ladder will let you get up onto the wagons.
Got to move!
Helicopter will have to bug out for a little while. If you're ready to go now, be on it.
Locke to Payday Gang, come in. Okay, so, the plane is nearing the drop point! Let's not dilly-dally here in the dark, let us rise!
Don't keep the chopper waiting, yeah?
Now use the other keycard in the other control room. Let's open the gate and get the Moretta out!
Use his computer again, be careful, they only go down for a small amount of time.
I'm putting you down here. Get ready to clear!
Get to the boat!
Lucky for us, someone in the Mendoza cartel gave up info that they're being investigated by the FBI. So all we need to do is hit the local FBI office handling the cartel to get the data.
Get back to armory and see what you can find!
You'll need to figure out which key is the right one.
Credit to the Commissar. He hasn't been cheap with the hatch. The pick-up is pulling strong.
Their customer is just around the corner - get ready.
OK, our contact will be able to open the subway entrance in a minute. Be ready...
Damn, get the saw going again.
The Mendozas are going to be busy loading their guns in the warehouse. Go in and hit 'em fast before they go all Lord of War on you. Get those weapons or destroy 'em.
State-of-the-art systems in here friends. Take a closer look at the vault!
The chopper's there, guys. Stow the loot and bug out!
Great, now unless you wanna stay for more loot, get to the car.
Now would be a good time to break out that torch you found before, friends!
The door to Garrett's office is locked, but see if you can bypass it through nearby security boxes.
There you are, you little fucker!
These code breakers can fall over sometimes. Stay with 'em till they do their thing.
Get that door open.
We know that Russian rat is somewhere Downtown. Search for a clue - remember, Downtown.
...I'm blerrie sure. Probably.
Bravo! Now, why don't we get a detonator on there too.
The one in the white shirt, that's him, our Taxman.
Now let the drill do it's thing. Keep the cops off it.
Search well and eyes peeled for guards.
I think I saw a documentary about that on National Geographic.
Like a bull in a china shop!
We need to get six bags with us for this one.
So close to nailing his location. Keep going. Just get him back for a little longer.
That was easy. Okay, deploy your drill and get that safe open.
Okay. Banking for another drop. 30 seconds!
Great. Now keep the cops away from it.
OK, friends. Time to put some fuel in that plane.
Move the van out of the way if you need more room.
Good. Now we can open the trucks up and see what that crazy Ivan was shipping.
Go by the fitness center, you should find a computer there.
Middle and right.
The EMP will not only give us a way in, but also knock out the test subjects. Trust me you don't want to deal with these guys.
We're going to water crack this vault, guys. Fill it with water, and detonate it. It'll blow the door right off without damaging the contents.
Come on already, come on!
Moretta is moored at Dock 2B. Can't access it there.
Follow Bile and don't forget the prisoner!
Get that body out of sight.
That man there... looks like an IT guy if ever I saw one. Take him to the server room and make him bypass the lock on the security bars.
The archives will hold the blueprints. Check the staff areas.
Find the security room and grab that footage. Haul ass, guys.
Great! Now head to the terrace and place the fireworks.
It should be hydrogen chloride instead.
How is it going with the car keys?

I know what's going on over there, and I want a slice of the pie. Load a bag with money, and toss it over the yellow wall near Jimbos, the auto-repair shop. Ya hear me? And I see one bag crossing the street, I'll call the cops.
Bile, you're up! How long before you're here?
Put the C4 in the main hall, right above the vault. Two possible spots, so it's a bit of a lottery. If need be, we'll blow them both!
OK, Hector wants us to record this so first set up the camera.
Bain, we don't have all day here. If the snake hides in its hole, we must goad it into sticking its head out. Maybe you should try to destroy some of his precious things.
Look for a code that starts with zero.
There you go, now find the other one.
C'mon guys, lets change the change!
Nice find. This'll come in handy later.
There you go. Exciting, yeah?
It's on the way, any second now!
So that's where that Russian rat is holed up. Get yourselves and any loot back to the car. Hmm, those crates got me thinking...
OK, friends. Get to the choppa!
Things got a little wild, but you got the job done!
You need to lure him out. Maybe if you cut the power in the circuit box?
Find the guest. Remember, he's a slot machine addict.
Crew, you need to bail. The blue containers will mark the path to the escape.
Burn that trap before you leave! Hurry!
Dropzone is directly below! Jump now!
Holy! Was not expecting that. See if she had something for the gate.
He was my chomma. Shit happens though, right?
We'll move at your pace. Just keep the road clear of cops.

Dear friends. Commissioner Garrett has arrested the Elephant on trumped-up charges in order to get an item he has, that the owners of Murkywater- these Kataru people, want. He's making a deal to give it to them in exchange for what we can only guess is the body of Bain, now that they're done with him. The item obviously very important for them to risk exposing themselves and I wouldn't bet against the whole thing being about Bain's Grail-Dinges. We don't know yet what the Elephant's doing in all of this, if he's still solid with us, and we couldn't help him right now even if we wanted to, but Garrett will be in his FBI headquarters tonight preparing for the exchange, so we're going to ruin his plans.
We were in this enemy compound in Cambodia and my handler got eaten by a tiger. Dwankie kak he was. My handler, not the tiger.
You need to charge the cannon.
Friends, you need to restart the saw.
Make sure your gang are safely gathered in the airlock. The outer door cannot close until this is so.
We are done, my good friends! Everyone into the helicopter!
It's done. The Moretta is on the move! Might take a while, so bunker down. Try not to die.
You gotta blow the floor, friends!
Hmm, OK... you're going to have to find the IT guy so he can open them up for you.
Four left now!
They're mining the goddamn parking lot, guys! Be careful out there.
You see the control room up there?
The blimp could be all the way across Nevada and would see those.
Nice work. The C4 will alert the crowd unless we time it with Alesso's pyrotechnics. Head upstairs and patch me into the tech booth.
Get inside the White House!
I can't open the gate while they are firing at me!
Oh shiiiiiit!
Locke sounds a bit...mad. We'd better do what he says.
Smash it all up. TV's. Lamps. Anything that'll break!
Get BFD fixed up, gang. Come on, stop wasting time.
The thermite's done. Now jump in and get that cash.
OK, friends, it's time for you to leave. Take some extra loot with you if you can.
OK. So listen - our client is a little jumpy. He doesn't do things involving, you know, lawbreaking otherwise. So we need to have all of you in the train.
The White House IT dwankies aren't as dumb as I thought. There is a firewall blocking me. TouchÃ©.
Move up through the garage, a van is ready to get you out of there!
Don't leave the boxes on the conveyor.
Good, now hurry up and turn the lights back on or people will go bossies and sound the alarm.
You should now be able to see the code. Get it, and go open the vault.
Not the right one it seems, you got to keep looking.
Okay friends, time to crack this nut. Find a way in.

The artifact is probably behind the door, but we didn't bring anything big enough to get through. Maybe if you mix some chemicals together... see if you can find any good formulas there. What could happen?
Head back to the vault door and plug in the hard drive. I'll take care of the rest.
There's one more lock on the door, so you'll need to re-aim the weapon and shoot it again.
You will have to protect the device until it blows.
OK, nearly there now, just grab the server and hustle it to the van. Put your backs into it.
Nice, you took that sucker out. But hide the mess. The guards will react if they find out you destroyed one of their drones.
Blerrie, you've got to restart the hack.

I've traced the truck to a warehouse out by Goose Island. It's a distribution depot, contracted to ship the voting machines to their final destination. With a little technical wizardry, we're going to make those machines a bit more sympathetic to The Elephant's mayoral candidate - that slimy ballbag McKendrick. Get in there, get them hacked, get out - simple. Once again, The Elephant is extending his stealth bonus if you can keep it quiet.
Gold bullion. Probably taken from the enemies of freedom.
Alright, that's his office. Now we move to the next stage.
There he is! Wake him up and take him to a safe place. There's a lumber yard nearby.
Open the gate so you have a clear path to take off.
We've seen those symbols before
Ten seconds and I'm gone!
Little old grandmothers walk right by their blood money every day. Hidden in plain sight, Hector says. At least $100 million in black cash.
The armory, friends. Try following the smell of gun oil?
Don't say a word. I'm well aware you're not only here to save my ass. Rust still wants his bike back, right? Well, to do that I'm gonna need all the parts, and they're spread all over the place.
You've got to light a flare for Bile to land.
Alright, do you see the house? Get inside. Look out for guards and cameras.
Make sure the guards don't spot us now.
C'mon friends, get to the West Wing.
Disable those AA guns, friends!
Clock's tickin', asshole.
Aw, man... I thought I was toast for sure... Can't say I expected a group of clowns to suddenly save my ass.
You want to get out alive? Then move it!

There's the alarm and... Damn! Everything shut down. OK, forget the keycards. We're blowing the gate. I told you I had a plan B. Bile will drop the C4 charges for you, just light a flare to signal him where you want the C4 bag to be dropped.
The van should arrive on a street near the park.
Let's go!
You got what he asked for, now you need to bring it to him.
Stay alert.
A laser gate! That was unexpected. Touching that will set off their alarm. Watch the cycle, wait for it to blink off, and then run through.
Don't stand there waiting, follow him!
OK, I'm receiving the second half of the database. With a complete download, we stand a solid chance of locating the truck carrying the machines.
We gotta do this the loud way!
Come on, guys. Get the plans scanned and faxed. Do it in IT.
We have enough diesel now.
Oh no, that's the alarm! Lets go to plan B.
Check the roof - find your route inside. Get creative, we don't have time.
OK, we need reach international waters with ship, but must have more diesel fuel.
Outside the Velvet Room, I see a lit display screen. Go have a look.
...Find the computer lab, hack into a terminal and search for the box's location.
Ah crap! More lasers. Must be an independent system. Watch the pattern. Don't want to trigger any alarms now.
The kerels stamped the fire out!
The inner sanctum is probably accessed by a reinforced door or something. See what you can find.
Get to hacking that laptop, yeah?
We're looking for the agreed amount of jewels from the store... If you want more, go back and get 'em.
Vlad wants to speak with you...
Ride through the gate and you'll be safe!
Like a glooove!
I got the manager's file here. Looks like the guy was born to wear this black suit.
The safe's open. Let's see what's in it!
Red Squares!
Damn it! They locked you in. Main entrance is the only option now!
Get ready friends, we're almost at the target site.
Let the Inside Man know when you're ready to de-mask. He'll move the loot, so be sure you secured what you want inside the vent.
Move it, guys. Find the locker room, and we find the armory.
Keep the Murkys away from the drill, yeah?
Find that shelf yet, friends? Get to the computer lab.
...bring all the winch parts into the vault room.
What the hell! Cops just breached another way in.
You need to get the bags to the platform where you came in.
Halfway there.
Hey, Ralph is still there. Be ready to grab him.
The power has been cut! You have to get the juice flowing again, then restart the crane.
...Kerels right around the corner, friends.
Ok, I got the doors. But they won't open until the ECM jammer stops.
Can't cut that gate without a proper welding torch, friends. That's 'blowtorch' for you Yanks.
You should know this by now. Drills don't start themselves.
Alright you chops, go and find his office!
Ach, that door's going to take a bit to crack. Maybe that cannon-dinges will do it. See if you can get it aimed.
The saw isn't working, you need to get it going again.
That's how much we need. You guys can stay and get more if you feel like you are on a roll!
You need to get that bypass going again.
Two more, keep on searching.
You need to get to the secure area. Open up one of those gates.
You gotta get some more gas in that donnerse pump.
The fuck took so long, man?
Do the words "rig the detonator to the charges" ring a bell?
The code should have a two at the beginning.
The plane, friends, the plane!
Guys, the safe! Get the drill on it - pronto!
Time for a short breather. Wouldn't do us good if I collapsed with Bain.
Escort whoever is carrying that server. It's gonna be heavy, and I think the cops will try to liberate it from you.
... just hang on!
...hydrogen chloride?
I hope this hunk o' metal has air bags!
Well, so much for stealth. But the job's half done. Just get that money out of there.
Hey! Protect me!
You need to get it armed.
The manager might have forgotten to put his cup in the dishwasher and left it out...
Ach, the dinges is trying to update the operating system. Stop it at the mainframe!
That turret is major trouble. You'll have to find a way to take it out.
Well done, now get in there and see if you can use the security cameras to find Bain.

One time, I was in the jungle with a kak piece of laptop, trying to hack into this ancient security system being run by a bunch of dwankie terrorists. In a very unfortunate event, a snake bites my leg, and I mistakenly activate the alarm, alerting everyone, and making them blow up the entire place. Lots of terrorists died, and no one got paid that day. Blerrie snake...
Great! You can use this ladder to get up on the wagons.
You need to shoot the weapon again, this time aimed at the second lock.
Have a look around and and see if you can find a utility closet. Maybe there will be some useful tools.
The code you have has been disabled, but I think the system has a master code. Let me do some digging.
Ok. I can override the main panel now.
Stay alive till I get back for more.
This has to be the most persistent fucking cops I've ever seen!
The Dentist's intel says they have C4. There's an armory near the guards' locker room. Get there.
Ah! The first bag! You will find a vertical conveyance near the vaults that will relay the loot up to me. It will be perfectly safe!
Alright, the cops are on the way. This caper is less Pink Panther, and more Reservoir Dogs. Get to the security room.
Give me a moment to catch my breath.
"Brown" is the desk name you should be looking for.
Now, let's mount the drill on the gates.
This is where you boosted the samurai armor. Remember?
Gang, into the dealership. Take cover. I'm blasting the road.
No time to waste, get through those bars asap.
Hey, hold your horses. Take this blowtorch. You're gonna need it to get inside.
Damn, looks like the EMP isn't in this train car. There could still be some valuable loot here, so either grab it now or come back for it later. Your choice.
The Elephant gave us the locations of the biker gang hunting for the scientist's little device. I think they're close to finding him - we need their intel so we can get to him first.
Secure the boxes on the helicopter.
They built it on the bottom floor.
A vault! The Commissar is pulling every string to keep his ass alive. I'm sending over a thermal drill.
Blerrie, if I read this correctly... eh...
Get him to the tower!
The police are on our back like a fucking pony tail!
These guys can drive!
You need to find out who has that keycard, friends. It's probably written somewhere.
Come on friends, you really must get that door open.
...Hack into a mainframe computer terminal and try to find some clue where to begin searching, yeah?
Remember, you in civvie mode. That means no guns or masks. You're invisibles. Micho, our Inside Man here, left a guitar case with your gear somewhere.
Look at the formula, then prepare the next component.
This is the reception desk.
And... we go!
If I were them, I'd keep the keycard in a safe.
Sorry guys, he says this ain't the one. The chopper will be back in a few so you can get another one over here, hopefully the right one.
You gotta get some fuel in that dinges. Get to work.
...I think so, at least.
Now if that won't get people talking, I don't know what will. That was amazing, gang, and we're getting a juicy payday out of it.
Now you gotta blow a nice little hole to get into the vault room, yeah?
That was intense! All right, head back to the vault and let's finish the job.
Recon the bank. My guy dropped a thermal drill somewhere on the premises, around the back of the bank, find it. Then get in there and do your thing to the vault. Gold awaits.
Get at the vault, you'll need to get past security.
See if there's a hidden switch or something. My old gaffer used to hide things in his bookshelves...
That should be all the clues. You should be able to figure out how to open it up now.
Maybe get rid of that tarp, yeah?
I advise caution - this bank has a lot of traffic. Empty all those safe deposit boxes and make us all happy.
Hey! Don't leave me!
Nine
Don't think anyone knows you're there. Now get the comm frequency.
What the hell! Don't run away from me!
You're not going anywhere until you restart that saw.
Wouldn't surprise me if Garrett, trying to be clever, put it somewhere stupidly obvious.
See if you can find the keycards to get in there, otherwise we have to drill the doors.
You're ride's here.
The party seems to have stopped. People are leaving!
Hang on guys. Coming in. ETA 3 minutes
They're on to us like a fucking sticker!
Chopper will be at the antenna. Wait for it!
Let the drill do it's job. You do yours.
Close, but no cigar, assholes!
Don't insult my wheels, man!
Reboot the charge cycle.
Why, you snivelling shopa! For this, I will scoop out your eyes and feed your bones to my dogs.
Get the power back up before the civvies get paranoid and the alarm goes off.
Fucking cops!
And... Jackpot! Moretta specs including comm frequencies. Great work! Now look for the nearest radio, and let's talk to the Captain.
The chopper is on standby. Call it when you want but be warned - soon as it appears things are gonna go loud. Choose your moment.
Make sure you look around everywhere.
See if you can find a cup with prints.
That's not a bad idea! Would be extra humiliating to the cartel, for sure!
Let's rock!
You still gotta cut the power.
Gage has arranged for one of the dumpsters to be used to stash some loot.
Make a little bonfire here on the floor!
It's caustic soda.
I really need you to hack me into those security boxes ASAP.
Still have one more box to go. Go back to the mainframe and look for it, yeah?
Okay, you need to clear the joint from the remaining thugs. Find them.
Still looks stable, friends. Time to add the last ingredient.
Not going up this way. Look around. Has to be another path.
You have to get the garage doors open.
Connecting. We can only do them one at a time, so fingers crossed this is the right one.
This is our last chance to help The Elephant get his man to office. So get to work, gang.
You can probably find fuel in one of the warehouses.
OK. Second act in our little drama - get the vault open.
Grab the thermite. No time to drill so we're burning through the wagon itself.
Find the manager. Look for the creepy guy in a suit. 40's. Going bald. That'll be him.
The right key has got to be there!
Chop chop friends. Find that door.
Find The Dentist's loot, guys!
The Vault is fully locked down.
The hacking was stopped! Go restart it!
That's it, router boxes taken care of.
Fuck it, you're here ain't you?
Friends, it's time to get out of there!
You're going to have to crack open this crate too.
If you can patch me into the mainframe, maybe I can get us in.
Try another key!
I think that rug was quickly thrown down, probably hiding a hatch. We'll check it out later.
Get going to the bio-lab.
What are you doing? Secure the artifact!
They got to the control box and stopped the shutdown. You need to get it going again, friends.
Cut through there with that nice blowtorch you found!
Get to the control room - the black heart of the facility. From there, you can open the vaults and grab all that, as you say, 'good shit'.
Security chief's code. His ass is in trouble for leaving this around.
Hold on for dear life!
The Murkywater trains will be locked by some kind of security panel. We'll most likely have to hack them to get the doors open.
Nothing left to do but make like tree...
Hi, this is Special Agent, uh, Smith. Can you tell me the panic room code? Our terminals are down. Can't get today's code.
... stay frosty!
Keep your heads down! They've got snipers in the area!
Now, get in there and see what you can find.
Hey! I'm not leaving without MY car!
Alright, that'll keep Gage sweet. You guys can cash this out now, or stay for more.
I just wanted to make sure that you know that our All You Can Eat buffet is now available.

The Elephant's PR will claim he came to power through depth, leadership and integrity, but that's bullshit. That oily bastard's going to cheat his way to the Senate, and this is where you come in. There are trucks at Pier 39. One of them has voting machines. Find the truck and attach a GPS-tracker to it. We'll deal with it down the line. Naturally, The Elephant wants this done with as little chance of bad press coming back to him as possible. So he's ear-marked some of his considerable campaign funds for a special black-ops bonus. You guys do this quietly, and the good politician will see you well rewarded.
There was mention of a shrine being of importance.
There we go. It's ringing.
Everyone OK? Then move out! You gotta find the crash site and that drunken pilot - unless he's wrapped his neck around a tree. We'll sort out an evac once you get him someplace safe.
Seeing a lot of SWAT vans rolling in. Those kaks can bring this chopper down. I can't pick you up here. But I have a plan...
Now we need remove mooring ropes from dock!
If you use ziplines, you can speed it up a bit, yeah?
Now, what will we find?
You see that marked door? That's one of our closets.
Ach! If the kerels are here too, Garrett must be stepping up his game in helping Murky, to go all the way out here. Or he's just very pissed with us.
Time to go to plan B!
Not a lot of time here friends, get that unit open!
Time to charge it. There should be a control panel around there, yeah?
The power is down! Blerrie kerels! Turn it back on!
You know, the thing you're looking for might be in a bookshelf.
Hurry now, reconnect me to the grid.
Arriving in three minutes...
Server room, yeah? Maybe if you find the person in charge of it, you can get him to bypass the lock.
They're trying to flank you at the parking lot.
... by the looks of it, these bars are pretty thick. We're going to need something to help get through.
Hey, there he is. Looks like he's in the garden area.
I know there's C4 in one of the wagons. Check 'em out!
That was our chaplain. You guys are stone cold.
I would've thought you had gotten to the wine cellar by now.
Get out of the crates. Hit 'em with surprise.
Ain't never seen a job this screwed.
Stop loitering and get over to the vault!
It's tacky, but it's fun, and knows it. Welcome to Vegas, gang.
OK, time locks are history. Now, get down there and get that final door open!
They're on us like fucking flies on a turd!
Restart the bypass on those security boxes.
Use the kitchen blender to make an evidence cocktail.
You're all down, yes? No broken ankles? Good. Now find the first money pallet. They're there somewhere. Find em, and light a flare.
I guess they know we're not selling Girl Scout cookies. Grab the C4 and blast your way in.
You looking to rent an office? What's the delay?
It's a beautiful building, but we're bringing ugly business. We'll need codes to get deeper in, so look for their servers.
You gotta remove that saw, yeah?
Maybe there's something historical to the code?
Looks just like the one you did a while back in California, yeah?
I need you to deliver a message to the Sosa Cartel. A message written in blood.
Get back to the security gate and use the thermite.
Look out, friends! The laser system has gone off. You'll need to shut it down somehow.
Well, you have to get the oil temperature just right.
That's it, buddy. Drink up.
And another...
There you go, friends. Metal detectors are down.
Great, we got it!
There's a laptop with info on where the cash is stashed. Charon provided the password. See if you can find it!
I think I see a PC in one of the meeting rooms through the secruty camera.
I have more guns than the Army. You wait and see.
You've got to find a way past the gates.
Get the drill going again.
That's it, gang. That should take care of the gas in the scanning room.
Fires are out. Nicely handled.
Hey, thanks for the rescue guys. Best of luck to ya.
Ok, now you gotta get inside the office and get the code. Move over there fast, yeah?
Get the prisoner to the tower!
Alright, two!
Well, fuck me, that was a waste of time. The vault is empty. Find the good ones, you hear?!
I got the first half of the database. It may be enough, maybe not, so it's your call - get out of there now, or stay and get the second half.
Open up that last door and get to the server.
Look at all this timber. There's got to be a saw somewhere - keep looking.
The escape vehicle is leaving in two minutes, with or without you.
Nicely done, friends. Now follow Bain up to the roof!
Pilot just landed the passenger. You can go home!
The door needs approval, remember. Hurry. Stop playing with your dicks.
He's lying through his teeth. Get him to the chopper, I'll get the code out of him.
Downloading the pyro schedule. You hit the button I say, got it?
Ach, you got the code wrong, you chops! It's gonna take some time before it resets.
The Inside Man has marked a ceiling vent for you to secure the loot at.
Kaboom, good work! Keep it up!
All projects run here are temporary, so a lot has changed.
Secure the loot.
Now. Overlooking this area you will find the control room. From there the vaults in this part of the facility are controlled. That would be useful, yes?
Ok, let's see... hmm... we need a plan for this...
...You gotta get that hook onto the vault.
Hurry up you chops! Find the IT guy.
Good - the seal is history. Now keep watching that drill. If it jams, you need to restart it.
The aim was a little off, but not too bad.
Don't screw around in there - get it done!
And yes I know. Out of the frying pan, into the fire...
Keep those dwankies away!
Blerrie! Those guns will make short work of Bile if he tries to land now. You need to take them out by hacking he control boxes.
We're going to use the bank roof as the pick-up for the cage. Over.
Time to get our friend out. Find the door to the custody cell block, it should be near.
Assemble the winch in the main hall, gang.
Get ready. Bile's almost back. Connect the hose!
Three bags!
OK, let's try this. Find something connected to the dock's network. I should be able to pull up their shipping manifests. Might have some clue about where they're headed.
Halfway there. Find the other card, and swipe it.
Whatever it is, we got it! Get it to the limo.
Ach, the keypad doesn't work. You gotta blow the door.
Those Murkys will be rather angry when you return, but we'll deal with that later.
This area's employees only. All the offices are accessible from here.
Nicely done, now cut the other one.
Are you in the garage yet?
Don't let 'em come this fucking close to me!
Ahhh, he was my friend. Well, what can you do?
Take it and find the evidence lockup. Maybe we can get in there.
There we go! Vault is open. Get to work on bagging that cash!
They've seen you! The trucks are moving out. Alright, we need a Plan B. Lemme think.
Try another one. See if you get it right this time.
OK, time for a jewelry hit. We need at least six bags. That could prove a challenge - but you guys can do it!
Still need the keycard off the manager, gang. Find him, deal with him!
At least 15 more!
Jackpot... Look at all the cash... Get it out now!
All mooring ropes must be taken off.
You can secure the loot bags in the boat you came in on.
Are you in the West Wing yet?

We managed to bribe Buluc's old girlfriend for some info, and she mentioned this door. You will find how to open it deeper in the mansion, inside something Buluc calls his "inner sanctum". Find that place.
The Glitter Room might be worth checking for a laptop.
Hmm, explosives won't work, it's too dangerous... let me see...
Mrs Shevchenko would roll in her grave to see her little boy now.
What are you waiting for?
... closing in!
My recommendation is you hustle those bags to the van.
That vault needs to be cracked open for us to get the artifact. Stick a drill on it, friends.
Unwise move, very unwise!
Bliksem! Don't disturb those lasers! Can't find anything in the blueprints about them. Probably added later. That kind of system can usually be disabled via the roof.
Guys, we still need a keycard.
... super close!
Alright, bring it to the van, it's right across the street.
They're gonna try to kill the power! Don't let them!
... don't let me wait now!
We're still running low on spending money, so if you find anything else worth taking...
That's all the numbers needed for the armory. Go enter that code.
Roberts Bank values every chance to communicate with our customers.
Have you got the ark open, yet?
The frequency ain't here. The control room is across the dock - maybe check there.
Damn chops have killed the bypass, get it going again.
We could've used that guy on the retinal scanner. Nevermind. It's Plan B time.
Yes ma'am, we offer international wire transfers at a reasonable rate.
What the hell! The whole room is filled with gas. Quickly! Find out where it's coming from and find a way to shut it off!
Rather beautiful, yeah? Old writing and all, just like the stuff that sent us here. Whatever it is.
Blerrie, are you still standing around?
That's it ladies and gentlemen. IT. IS. DONE. Now, I need to get the fuck outta here!
Hurry friends, get out of there.
I fuckin' hate hospitals, man. I ever turn into a vegetable, you guys end my ass.
You still gotta have a look at the security gate.

Teuer autos is our objective here. We're going to hit their dealership late in the evening. Should be quiet, not many civilians. They're a high-end joint. Deal in importing high-performance supercars from Europe and Japan. Those cars are a work of engineering beauty. And they're expensive - we're talking the price of a house in Georgetown here.
Get onboard friends. Bile has to leave.
Jesus, that bastard wasn't playing around, was she? Take the keycard she dropped.
...Kerels will be there any second.
Good, now get back in there.
Make sure all you fine people are inside, the outer door must close before the inner door can open.
Have a look around for anything useful while I see what we can do about this.
Okay, the convoy is close. Get in position.
Head to the archaeology wing. There should be an artifact somewhere in there.
Ach, now we gotta wait for the dinges to finish!
Just one more.
Why does that not fill my head with confidence? If you're going to stay, then sit back and be quiet.
See if you can find the evidence. It should be here somewhere!
It's by the warehouse across the street. Gonna need a saw to open it though 'cause I lost the key in the commotion. There's one in the back.
Right you chops. Lets get you-
Not much time. F35s deployed to patrol D.C. airspace. We're gonners for sure if you don't hurry!
One of 'em contains the vault. Find it.
Ach, it looks like they are raising the security a bit. Be ready to encounter more Murkys, for sure.
Four
Cops screwed the hack. Reboot it!
Open sesame! Now go find that prisoner!
Van's here, folks.
OK, let's get Bain into that helicopter so we can leave this place!
You need to patch me in so I can open those doors.
It's like a never-ending number of screws, yeah? But you got to get them all off.
Look for a coffee cup. All managers drink coffee. So I've heard.
The kerels stopped the saw. Get it going again!
No gold... No cash... Crack the deposit boxes. Hope you brought a saw.
Make them earn their tom tonight, yeah? For sure.
Good job, gang. Get up the ladder and get out of there.
Zero
Who's flying that chopper. Not the cops.
Its vent connects with the Security Center.
Run! Run!
Nice night for a barbacao. Shame the Cartel dwankies know we're crashing it!
Soviet era machinery. Slow. So slow.
Don't stop too long, friends. This is bat country!
Alright, got the package. Heading home.
We're here. Nice night for a murder.
I've been able to find out that the routine for opening the door to Buluc's office is kept in his secret meeting room. See if you can access it.
That shrine is concealing a door. We're going to use explosive on it.

Good. Ah, fresh air! Now, the pallets are secured to the deck by mechanical fasteners. These fasteners are controlled by the logistics officer, and his controls are... ah, up there. And the access to the upper deck is at the front of the plane.
OK, chopper's here. Secure any loot you found. You can bail when you feel like it, but I'm sure there's always more loot out there. Your call.
At the back you can throw any bodies over the railing into the sea.
Still don't know you're there. Look for the keycard.
Do it like you did it at the warehouse. Yeah, I saw that. For sure.
Repeat, the code is...
You should make an effort to move the van.
The symbols in that codex! They will open the Mayan dinges. There must be more clues. Find them!
You can throw bodies into the sea over the railing at the back of the boat.
You need to disable the metal detectors. Cutting their power will do the job. Look for electricity boxes.
We got a lot of heat for a small take, but worth it to get Vlad happy. It'll probably pay off long term.
One less prize for Murky to keep. Pick it up and move on, friends.
Ready for the shot? OK listen: you are looking for the paintings marked with red stickers. They've got unusually tight security here. A lot of cameras, even a security room, so do your homework.
Keep a watch on that sprinkler system!
Yeah, tell him his ass is on the line if he isn't available for the regular time-lock check in.
The data is being stored on the server in the other room. You can get it and get the hell outta here, or you can stay and scan more bodies. I'm positive Jimmy will make it worth your while.
Great. All the safes are in. Now let's see the truck back at the yard, gang - hustle!
You have to restart the drill!
Old Locke is glad he's not creeping around that place with you.
SWAT van on the way.
Domkop government PCs...
Don't forget the bags.
We got through the first level. Start up the second.
You got to drill a big hole in that vault.
While you're waiting on that vault door, might as well have a go at those safe deposit boxes. They're Titans, so you will not be able to just cut through.
Kerels have pulled the emergency power cutoff lever. Find and reset it, friends!
That looks right, now lift the print!
You'll find it on the bottom floor.
The lobby's too hot! Get upstairs!
Head to the armory and load up on C4.

Hector!? What the hell!? I always though the Firestarter job felt a bit weird. The Mendoza's, maybe they weren't the bad guys after all. I mean, sure, they were rotten apples, but this fucking rat was far worse.
Now would be a good time to break out that torch you found before, friends.
Fuck man, I got Brown's brains all over me!
Who's that ugly kakspul?... What the blerrie... is that...!? Ach! No time to deal with that now! Get out of there! Hurry!
Looks like there might be an underground vault somewhere.
Okay, the briefcases. First is held by casino manager, the second one by the pit boss and the third by their head of security.
Alright, now hook that hose to the vault.
Ok, got the switchboards fixed. You can start the computer again.
These are some determined fucking law enforcers!
They've cut the power on you, friends. Find the circuit box and get it running again!
Have a look around and and see if you can find a utility closet. Maybe there will be some useful tools.
We still need more explosives on the fourth and fifth floor. Let's go.
Drill through that vault, friends.
Have you not been able shut down the sytem yet?
Go for cash registers, display cases, the occasional safe. Get enough money to satisfy Vlad and clear out. Don't hang around. It's an easy gig.
Another successful acquisition! Well done, my friends!
Get the USB stick from the head of security.
We cannot use the main entrance. Too much heat.
If you patch me into the security boxes to the storage room, I can unlock the doors to it.
Okay, I got what I came for! Get me back to the truck so I can put the shit together.
...muriatic acid?
Keep it cool. Keep it under control, gang.
Chopper is here. Stow any bags. You can ride out now, or you can stay and find more coke. Your decision.
That was a great show, gang! Watching those accounts rise, and their shares topple.
Left gate activated. Now find another keycard, and let's get the other gate open.
Get that fire going again!
You gotta start the drill.
First digit for the vault code. Keep searching. We need all three.
Hi. I just saw a show, and the bank got robbed, and I want to move my money to a bank that doesn't get robbed.
... the head honcho loves detail-oriented motherfuckers!
Crack open that door with a saw, friends.
You need to eliminate those thugs.
Stay low! Snipers took out your driver! They must be deployed near by.
Nice, nice. Now spark a flare close by. Show me where I'm flying.
Time to pick up the C4 and then plant it on the floors above the panic room.
Ahhh, if any sound is sweeter than that of an opening vault it is that of bagging loot. You are producing a symphony for my ears!
Ah! Get inside that vault, friends! Almost done here!
Wow. This would make a great tv movie. For someone who isn't you. Anyway now we know where the Mendoza bank is located.
You still got a long way to go!
Getting pretty unpleasant out there. You guys sure you wanna stick around?
If you did it right, it will now cook!
Looks like a last desperate attempt to clip our wings, hey? Stand firm, brave warriors.
My new friends! Welcome to Black Ridge. Like a storehouse for loot - an armored storehouse, with very valuable loot.
Vlad, stop kicking my blerrie chair. You're not helping.
Give me a few moments and I'll tap into the feeds.
That alarm needs to go quiet. Find the switch for it around there, yeah?
Look around for entry ways that seem to stand out.

Right, let's try and get this security shut down. You need to find the circuit boxes that power the system. Get hooked in to them. I can hack them to power down the system without tripping their wires.
That's it. I have to send a team over and notify the police.
Can't unlock the doors until you patch in properly.
That was harder than expected but we're go! You can enter the house now.
I'd feel bad about hitting another bank if they felt bad about hitting us. So I don't. Let's cash out.
Green and sweet! Bag that cash!
Have you found the computer yet?
One of the pallets is on the roof of the diner. What would those burger-flippers do to have that kind of cash, eh?
They put the fire out with their feet!
Found any power cells?
Now get inside the Oval Office and find the keycard.
I've rigged the bus to... Well, just give the signal. And stand back.
It's always lovely watching thermite work! Now get inside.
You can only melt through that wagon with the thermite, so you better head back and fetch it.
Get back to the mainframe.
Is it inappropriate of me to think this might be kind of fun?
Time to find Garrett's office, friends. Have a little fun with the guy.
There's an offer on the table. Not enough in Locke's humble opinion. Let's hold out for more, yeah?
You have to keep tabs on Garrett in case he comes back.
Eight bags. Out-fucking-standing.
Thanks, it's good to have some firepower behind me.
Now the hard part.
Now hurry up friends, get in there and find the thing we came here for. Garrett probably has it in a safe or something.
Three more, at least!
You can go for the cash after you find the primary target.
Just burn it right here on the floor! No fuss!
Domkop courier didn't stash the winch! He's gonna get it later. Ok friends, I'll have one coming shortly by train.
Get that power running again, yeah?
Account reports. But no codes. Try the next one.
I'm sending the boat, keep bagging the stuff!
Dentist said they ship meth outta here. So there must be manufacturing. And meth means money.
Take care to enter the correct code.
Why are you still outside?
I've managed to organise some necessary tools for this job. Find them in the crates. They got a little strobe on them.
Okay, guys. Bile dropped the EMP just outside the lumber mill.Go get it!
OK, that's it. When you've got the loot inside, you need to juice it up as well.
Ach! Those guys are getting very close!
Now keep those dwankie Federales away from the bomb until it goes off.
I'm going to meet you just outside town. Best way for you to shake these kerel is the sewers. Get down there. I've arranged a little something.
Time lock has started. Should be about four minutes.
There's a boat waiting to pick you up.
Tap into the security boxes.
Restart the hack.
That's one of the machines. Get the hack started, and make sure the cops don't interefere with our little political sabotage.
Stand by, gang. Organizing an exit. Hold the line!
C4 that wall, gang! We're making our own escape route.
All right, good find. Now get that gas all over the tires.
Right, that looks like what you need.
Gotta go into that vault.
Close. So close.
Have you forgotten where the mainframe is or something?
Seven!
Go by the construction site. They must have a laptop there.
Marked a computer. Log me in and I'll deal with this.
One door left then we get the server. FBIs gonna shit themselves.
It's a big bank, but still a bank. You know the drill. Check the place out, and decide whether to keep things quiet or bring the noise.
It's time to breach the bank! The explosion will take care of the voting machines.
Now go open the door. No time to waste.
Hope this is the right one.
You know what happens when you fuck with Russia? Read your history book, asshole!
Gonna keep it slow so you guys with the guns can stay with me.
Ach! The federales are breaching walls!
You like bread. We got bread. Uh... yeah. Assloads of bread... Sir.
What the hell happened? Wrong code? You're going to need the master code now.
You get into that computer yet?
Are you looking for something to use?
Power's down. Get BFD reconnected, gang!
I need 17 more!
You let the federales stop the countdown. Go back and restart it.
So, Vlad. Did I ever tell you about my run-in with an Australian tiger-snake?
Empty! Move on.
Get to the generator on the roof and shut it down.
That the safe's open. See what we got!
Wait for the blimp to get here with the drill.
Almost there.
Three minutes...downtown traffic!
Those sprinklers put the fire out!
Come on! I'm at dock seven!
You might find him in one of the interrogation rooms.
You're not supposed to get captured, you chops! We gotta give this one up.
We're going to need an X-ray device to get the data the Elephant needs.
When all that media shows up in their choppers, no one's gonna look sideways at our escape bird.
Chloe's computer should be nearby.
OK, great. Remember both the number and color.
The cannon still isn't charged.
Look for the evidence storage!
Or maybe don't do that, yeah?
Whoa, there goes the system. You need to restart the power so I can resume.
Snip snip. Put that bolt cutter to the chains.
There, chopper dropped the bag. Go pick up the C4, guys.
There you go. That's gonna get you through.
What are you doing, get inside!
Politics can be a bastard but the beauty of it is you always get a second chance. Get in there and do your thing.
OK, we're inspecting it... So far so good... He's running tests now...
Bad news, guys!
The computer is not going to reboot itself!
Get that weapon charged, friends.
Hope they respond as poorly as they usually do...
You got one of the keycards, now find the other one.
Get those batteries changed.
Good! Now steal one of the police cars and get out of there.
The lance is on the ground. Fetch it, and set it up. Let's see who's in that panic room.
Best of luck with your boss and all guys.
People always forget computers in Meeting Rooms. Go see if you can get lucky there.
Did you press the right floor? Press the right floor!
Make sure the artifacts are stowed aboard the helicopter, friends.
The mechanic said he needs his tools from the workshop. Get over there.
Time to start looking for that stash of Murky loot. We're looking for cash, and lots of it.
Cut open that door with the saw.
Jesus fucking Mugabe. Look at this. Fucking pallet broke! You're going to have to bag all the spilled loot, get it back to the pallet.
A fully functional methlab! Get cooking, if you see a formula, or scorch the place. I'm sure you've burned a few methlabs in your time.
OK, let's have a look...
Locke's escape plan depends on blasting the radars, gang. See to it.
Hope you guys are holding up in there. Three trucks have pulled over. When the doors open, get at them!
Ok, now use that thing to get past the security gate.
You got the coordinates - go.
Time to escape, guys!
Couldn't hurt to pick up some more things we can sell.
Great. Now, please, keep the cops away from the time lock.
Blerrie! There goes the alarm!
There you go, friends! Now have a look inside that vault!
Find the chief's computer so you can get the evidence files.
The train's ready for the cargo. Check the wagons. Probably loaded. Might find something worthwhile.
Come on, take it. It's not going to open a portal to Hell. Probably.
Go ahead. Make some noise, friends.
Keep burning those cars, gang. The Commissar will be pissed.
Come on, crew. Locke needs us to find those crates. Show him how we do it.
Wait for BFD to crack through the vault. Even this monster will take time. Keep the cops away.
Are you still having problems with the Beast?
Can't you find the code?
For a murdering low-life cartel gangster, this guy knows his wine. Shame you don't have time to take some back.
You've seen enough TV to know where the West Wing is, so go there!
I like what I'm seeing in there.
Did you find the garage yet?
Almost... Done. Just a moment now, guys.
I should just have gotten a shitty office job instead...
It's time to head back to the entrance so that I can get you out of there.
Keep looking. He's around there somewhere.
Bag the diamonds and bring them to the garden for zipline extraction.
Any luck with that key tag?
Fuck!
Gang. Gensec need the time lock codes. I'll stall them as long as I can. Can you see them?
We need to get into Buluc's office. The way in can be found in his secret meeting room. See if you can find it.
...Might be able to hack them with bank computers, yeah?
The drill has stopped. Get it running again.
Okay, now we got all we need to steal the EMP parts. Head back to the trains.
A friendly chap I was able to "persuade" told me the solution to open this door can be found in what Buluc calls his "inner sanctum".
But that keycard could be useful.
There you go, that's the vault.
You let someone stop the pump. Get over there and start it up!
The evidence storage is somewhere on the second floor!
Haul that gas back to the cars. Light 'em up!
Keep quiet while you bug out of there, and this is a perfect piece of shadow work.
So long my little smiling friends!
OK, chopper is back. Get pumping again!
Right friends, get ready. And don't forget- Murky has their top men in this place, so don't dally.
It's the keycard, for all the good it will do you now. Might have helped us avoid the alarm, but stay focused!
That's ten!
You gotta get the lights back on quickly.
You got the wrong laptop, friends. find the right one.
Vlad, we don't have time for this.

Come on guys! Remember to get that winch up and running again!

Blerrie! It... worked? Ha! Ok, now use it to get past the gates.
Mr. Sosa will not disrupt my operations again. Nor will his friends, I think.
Hurry up and burn through that gate!
That terminal isn't linking. Murky always had crap IT people, except for me of course. Find another one.
We got enough now...
Hot damn! Three trucks are pulled over. Their crews are on the street. Hit them hard!
That keycard is one less thing we need to find.
I was able to glean that the sequence to this door can be found in Buluc's "inner sanctum", somewhere in the house. Get to it, chop chop.

OK, I've got an idea. I can change the hack so it looks like we were here doing this for McCendrick's rival, Mayor Schwartz. The blame can be passed on to her. If there's gonna be a scandal, let's make it a scandal we can use!
Guys, the alarm countdown is ticking. You NEED to take care of it!
See if Garrett is chop enough to have the code in plain sight.
Get him the tiara and take everything else in the place if you have time... Lot of incidental income you don't want to waste. Just once you decide to make your move, make it fast.
Yeah. For sure.
Aha! That's it! Cold Fusion, right here. You've got the keys to his airplane, remember? Get the hell out of there!
Box hacked. Seeing fluctuations in their grid. Keep going.
You can tell them yourself, domkop.$NL;
Great, you fixed it. Now guard them.
I'm coming in two...
Right you are old chum, but we do donuts too.
Pull over here. There's the warehouse up ahead. Let's do this.
That's it, guys. This will take some time. Just make sure the power stays on.
We don't have the time to wait around - can't you find a way in? What about the roof?

Searching the cases is pointless. You got the bomb, remember?

Excellent. Now, let's just get a detonator on there too.
Hmm... there seems to be another switchbox. Find it and rewire it, same as the other one.
Throw the bags into the sea. You can pick them up when you leave.
Hector is gonna kill you!

Remember the plan. Get the keycards, keep the civilians in check and set off no alarms.

Boom! That's the first.

Well friends, at least something good can come of this. Go find that saw.
Find those batteries, friends.

Out by the parking lot. Won't crack open without a saw though, but there's one of those around here somewhere.
The key to his heart was in the cars. Now go put a bullet through it.
Got a zip-line set up there. You can attach any loot bag to it, and get it out nice and quiet. Make the most of it.
Oh, dear... that's not going to be like cracking an egg, yeah?

Bingo! Now secure the bomb-parts.

Good friends, now get to the cell block so we can find and release Bain.
Do you know if Mr Pink was captured?

Jump down into the vault and get the dough!

Right, now the vault itself is behind a security gate and you'll need to get past it.

The BCI tech is supposed to be in a car in the front of the train, so that's your destination.

Good! There should be lots of nice things in here!

Work your way up to street level, I have a van ready to get you guys out of there!
You'll have to overheat the system to cause a soft reboot and gain access to the controls. Then we should be able to get that server.

Blerrie! There's a lockdown engaged. You'll have to find the server room and override it.

If you can find some fuel, wire, a timer and maybe some mulch- I mean fertilizer, then we can get it done, for sure!
Protect the timer, the swats will interrupt it if you don't!
Bah, that offer is for chops. We can make them do better fo' sho'. Stay frosty, friends.
Attach the car so you can fly out of here!

Ok, now use the thermite you found on those shutters.

Check the owners office for his briefcase. Pit boss will be around the main hall. The locker room is where the security chief's briefcase likely is.
Activate the charge cycle on that gun.

Can you please loose ship from dock!

Well done, friends. Well done! We got our man back. Bain... is home. But the Murkys have done something to him. I've got some professionals looking at him right now and they say it's some kind of virus, maybe manufactured. If he dies... oh, blerrie Locke is going to be mad and make those Kataru pay...

Look out above, friends! The beast cometh from on high!

Woah-woah-woah-woah!
Let's meet in the building next door. You can probably enter from the roof.

Right, friends. Nice and quiet, yeah? First thing you gotta do is get past security. Go to the gate and have a look at the barriers.
We're gonna need to burn or cut through those bars. See if you can find something around there to do it with.
Oh, dear. You're not going to break that open without making a lotta noise.

Hurry now, secure the artifact on the chopper!
We gotta get the USB stick. The head of security should have it.

Now get back to the armory and see if you can find something to use on the cell block door.

The code is likely in the auctioneer's office, but you gotta get in there first. The auctioneer has a keycard to the door. Make him give it to you!

Whoever they are, it seems they chose poorly in ambushing me.

You gotta get up to the roof!

If you run short of equipment, go take another look at the drop site.

You have to redo the bypass on those security boxes.

I had a guy bribe one of Buluc's old girlfriends. You can apparently find the way to open this door in something he calls his "inner sanctum". So, maybe find the entrance to that place first, yeah?

Hurry up and find Buluc's office.
Looks like what we need... right over there.
If you want more room to maneuver, move the van out of the way.
Get the door open!
There is a keycard, an arc cutter and a small number of breaching charges, that you must collect. Blasting in is crude, but it will help deflect suspicion from me.
Remember, drop the charges near the door.
Let me check my records. Yes, I mentioned that the charges must be dropped near the door.
Any... second...
Bakgat! Now, onwards, my friends. The airlock awaits you!
This cache of C4 should deal with the radars, yes?
He knew he was going to die tonight. Just knew it.

Hey, what happened? Ah, shit - cops interrupted the vault. Get it going again. And kill the fucking cops.
You do all the killing, yeah? I'm cyberwarfare, not a fucking commando. My uniform should keep me out of the fray.
I need you guys to distribute the violence, yeah? My uniform should let me blend in with them, keep out of the fight.
Protocol means they'll have snipers ready to ambush up ahead. You fellas watch yourselves, yeah?
Out of that compartment!
And out the door you go!
I don't care if you gotta shinny up a wall like fucking Spiderman. Look everywhere for that third pallet.
I'm flying in. Don't shoot if you see a big fucking helicopter flying at you, right?
I will meet you on the edge of town, but I don't want you bringing the whole fucking cop army. Get in the sewers. I've organised transport.
Grab that paste and burn through the gate. Fucking hell.

Yet another successful collaboration! You have my thanks, my admiration and, most importantly, your share of the money.

Fast work, friends.
Groot job with the code.

You gotta get some fuel in that dinges. Get to work.

Use your key to get into the evidence storage. It should be on the second floor.

You should be able to get past the code lock by disabling a few security boxes around there.
Get to those security boxes.
Now go and short out the pad by Garrett's door.
Quickly friends, get inside the office and get what we're here for. Garrett's bound to have it in a safe.
Garrett likes history, so maybe something... historical?
Maybe something historical, yeah?
Garrett is married, so maybe his wife's birthday or anniversary?
Could be that the code is related to Garrett's crusade against us, yeah?
Keep looking for something too obvious.
How did you get that so quick? Maybe I can just go have a coffee and let you sort things alone, yeah?
C'mon friends, put some food by Garrett's door.
Maybe it will unlock the evidence room. Take it and go find it.
With a bit of luck, that will get us into the evidence room. Quickly, take it and go.
The last intel I got put it on the other side of the building, yeah?
It's on the other side of the building.
Nothing left to do but make like a bush, yeah?
Remember that movie where one person in the lift goes bossies and just eviscerates everyone?
Right, Twitch... you're up. Might want to cover your ears, friends.
There is still loot to be secured.
The code should have a five at the beginning.
There we go!
Yeah, it's go time.
Keep your eyes on the Murkys and don't get too close. Even with those uniforms, you might get spotted.
Huh. That wasn't too hard. Suppose it's true- any old dwankie can get in there!
Interesting. OK, those lights have some kind of connectors around there. See if you can find them.
That takes care of the safe. Now you can open it up!
Ok, I've got intel that mentions a hidden entrance to the PEOC near the library. Get over there ASAP.
There we go, just like in the movies.
Now hurry up and get inside the airlock!
You gotta get me into that computer system!
Almost... done...
Bunch of kakspul! I lost power. You gotta get me back up again!
Stupid machine taking forever to update...
Nicely done!
OK, good!
There's a blocker on the system. Get to another terminal and help me break it.
You gotta help me get through! Get to a terminal.
That's what we came for. Take them and let's go!
Time to leave the PEOC, hurry!
You gotta get the keycard from the Oval Office.
Most likely, the keycard will be inside a safe or something. Look around for one.
Look behind things. Should be fairly obvious, yeah?
Look through the laptops, chop chop!
Have you gone through all the laptops yet?
You can use pretty much any laptop to access the USB stick.
Right, now my intel doesn't say exactly where the entrance is, so you'll have to rummage around a bit.
That has to be the way into the PEOC. Get into the airlock.
Ach, it's one of those. Liquid nitrogen would take care of it, but unless you brought some without telling me we'll have to make other arrangements.
Alright, I'm in. Give me a little time.
I can't do anything unless you restore the power.
Incoming call to the PEOC. Put me through and hope we haven't been discovered.
There, now let's move on to the next one.
Bad news friends. I just picked up some chatter and they're closing off the air space. You need to leave. Now!
Friends, I'm waiting for you!
OK, take a look around and see if you can find something to get us past that gate.
Don't let the enemies interrupt the hack.
You gotta make sure those Murkys don't interfere!
Get to the West Wing! There's no time to dally.
Enter the Oval Office so you can get the keycard!
The Oval Office is right there, so get inside.
My intel indicates that they have piled up some dangerous compounds there somewhere. See what you can find to use on that barrier, yeah?
Keep looking for something strong- you need to get through that barrier!
You'll need to get it some juice from a wall socket.
Sorry friends, I would have liked to do this another way, but I was made an offer I couldn't say no to!
Have a beautiful day friends, until we never meet again!
O'boy, here they come!
I should just have ran when I had the chance...
Holy shit, it's like a god damn warzone out here! I'm gonna stay here while you go around and do whatever you do. Find the parts and bring them back here.
My special tools. Yes, I definitely need my special tools, and you'll find those in the workshop. Look out for toolboxes.
Oh, yeah. Wait. You're gonna need this blowtorch to get inside.
Not only bikes needs juice to get going, if you get what I'm sayin'? No? Dammit, just get me a coke from the vending machine, will ya?
Okay, that should do! What's next?
Hey! What the fuck! Get these fucking cops off my ass!
What the hell! Keep 'em off of me!
Too fucking close... Too fucking close...
So, here's some good news and bad news. Bad news is my car died. Good news is that I had time to grab some diamonds from the trunk. They're in a storage unit nearby.
Wow, you guys are kinda entertaining. I saw parts flyin' all the way out here.
That was, you know, kind of a big explosion.
Yeah, about that. It's out here. In my car.
Hey, can anyone hear me? What the goddamn fuck is going on? I'm comin' in hot... took a cap in the side.
Hey, I'm here... outside... not far from the street! Piece of shit car!
Shit, man I'm dyin' out here. What'd ya do, stop for a hot dog?
Diamond jobs always turn into fuckin' bloodbaths. Heard they had to scrape a guy off the floor once with a shovel 'cause of all the dried blood.
Wish I were at a burger joint with my girl right now.
OH, FUCK! they got Brown!
Who fuckin' booked this job?
Good day sir.
Right!
Right!
Yeah-yeah-yeah... Run the plan!
Right!
I was gonna light up. You ain't gonna arrest me are you?
Why does it feel like I shouldn't be here right now?
Right. Yeah. OK, here it is. 8394. Don't share it, alright?
Copy that. Let me pull it up...it's 8394. Don't let it get out.
This is Captain Rogers of the MPDC. We got a call from Gensec. Seems they got some concerns about what's happening there. I'm dispatching some uniformed officers to make sure everything's OK.
Captain Rogers here. We got a call from your private security firm. They have some concerns. So for everybody's safety, I'm routing some officers to your location.
Loud or quiet - your call. But if we can stealth this, we'll be able to blend in and escape with the crowd. Nice and easy.
Perfect! Now, to mask the explosions, we need to time the concerts pyros. Get up to the booth and patch me in.
Bile's on his way with the chopper!
I'm sending Bile your way!
Ok, nice and easy. Just get those masks off, blend in with the crowd and we won't have any issues. The van will be waiting for you.
Alright, that's it for the concert. Time to de-mask and blend in with the crowd. If all goes to plan, you'll be able to stroll right out the front door. Good luck.
Sit tight, gang. The helicopter will be back to pick you guys up.
Police signal's going nuts. They must've been deployed near the arena already.
Cops' switchboard lit up. Guess they had their people in the area.
Head in the game, guys. Look for the closets marked with the X.
C4 is what we're after, remember. You'll find it in the closets marked with the X.
That's one of the doors. Lockpick away if you like it sneaky.
All right. There's one of the marked closets.
Our last closet door, gang!
Feel that bass.
All right. More C4. Almost got all we need now. Keep looking.
Don't forget - the garage is where you need to plant the C4.
The left and the middle console. Hit them!
Okay, hit the middle and right console. Go!
The C4 did its job. Get that vault floor cut open. Impenetrable my ass!
Come on, guys. You have to get the cutters onto the vault floor.
Cutter is done. Watch your heads - here comes the money!
I saw a conveyor chute over there. Throw the loot in, and it'll shift it to the lobby.
Miso Prawny!
The chopper can't wait forever, crew. Get the loot up there!
Almost done, guys. Just answer that intercom when you're ready to get your masks off and get out of there. Secure what you want to take first!
No other way out. Get into that container, gang. And hope the cable holds.
That was superbly done. Quiet and effective. Excellent work.
More C4. Not quite enough. Keep searching.
Alesso is in town tonight. Going to use his concert as cover to hit Gensec at their arena.
Ah! Been some good gigs here. And Alesso's is the biggest one yet.
Great job! I'll start moving this stuff through our fences right away. Enjoy your payday, gang!
Well, at least it isn't nukes this time.
Get the safes out, gang. Yeah, I know it's over a hundred degrees, but get to it.
Gonna have to get through there. I'm sending you C4.
All right. Safes are in. We're getting out through the yard. Make sure the truck is there!
Get inside the truck! The chopper is going to airlift the whole damn thing out!
And....lift off! Outstanding work, crew!
Flying like angels over...that ruin of a city. Great job!
Damn, place is wrecked. Still looking. Hang in there.
Got it! Construction yard, with a truck. Looks like the best way out of here, but you'll need C4 to bust that wall. Sending it now. Mind the safes!

I'm sure you guys have tangled with Gensec before. They're the East Coast's premier provider of security solutions, if you believe their brochure. But, PR aside, these guys are serious. Today, we hit them.
That's a lot of cash! Nice job!
I've already got interested parties lined up to take the bullion. I'll also dig up what I can regarding this blueprint.
Check the stores if you want some extra money.
Get some cross fire going!
Watch out! Bulldozer in the transport!
Alright! The boat should be coming in soon!
It's open! Let's see what we got!
Alright he's here! Get the loot over there!
This is interesting. Military blueprints in a Gensec transport. I'll look into it.
This is going to be bumpy, so brace yourselves! Only one truck to deal with. As soon as the doors open, hit it hard!
Gensec in sight. Get those rigs moving. Go! Go! Go!
Firewalls are tripped. We're going to need a local port - one of the staff terminals. Check them out.
Connecting...
Wrong terminal. Try another.
One of the staff terminals is holding a code. Find it, and start hacking.
Bunker down, gang. Hold the line until the time lock finishes.
There's an access ladder over the garage. Should be able to get to the roof there.
That should do it. Now start the time lock again. I hope that it worked.
The cops messed up the time lock! Get it going again!
Come on! Get the time lock going again!
Get to the controls and turn the crane. You're going to like this.
Keep moving the crane. Can't drop it there.
Uhrm... maybe we should have hired Alex after all.
Ouch! Careful with that crane, guys. This is a gem of a building.
Start hauling those bags to the vault, gang. Time to crack this place.
There were spare drill bits in the piggy bank.
Here we go. Doors open! Let's see how rich we are.
When it comes to sourcing things like thumbs I operate a "don't ask, don't tell" policy. Now get to the security consoles.
Got it! Now get back to the vault and enter the code.
Now get to the vault and assemble that rig.
Guys, the elevators are moving. Expect heat from there.
Alright, get to the house and find the address, be careful.
They're coming from the east, by the forest.
They're coming from the west, by the construction site.
Yeah, they're ready for us judging by the number of lookouts... Looks like they have cameras too. Make sure you get close before you hit 'em.
You can use the keycard you found.
Good, now set up the connection.
I'm in, this might take a few...
I lost connection, I need you to get the power back.
Great, set off the flare so we can land!
Hand me the reactor, quickly now!
This one seems to be malfunctioning, I'll be back to pick up another one.
Ten point landing. Nice drop. You're a click away from his villa. Sneak across the airfield, get into the house. Find the engine, and bring it back here. I will do the rest.
Bull's-eye. Point Break-down: get inside the house, find the lab, get the engine, get back to this airfield, escape. Good luck.
OK guys, search the place. They have a safe somewhere, it's probably in there.
Have you found the safe yet? The address is probably in there.
Check the safe - find it. Fast!
You found it. Now get it open and get that address.
That might be useful.
They're coming from the west, by the construction site.
They're coming from the east, by the forest.
They're coming from the south by the factory.
Nice! Get it to the van.
I'm in, might take a few to get the lab door open.
Get the power to the server back on!
They pulled the power, get it back on!
Keep it steady. I'm connected.
OK, the lab door is unlocked - open it.
Mark the landing - use the flare and the chopper will come in.
Helicopters landing. Load up the engine and hope it is the one.
Alright! He'll bring it over here so we can inspect it.
OK, he flies it to us. We will verify it.
We've got the engine, I'll have my guy here inspect it.
Nice work guys! This seems to be the right one! You guys better head out of there ASAP. Use the plane keys you found.
