OK, he is filling up that chopper now. Hold on guys!
Yes! He's fueled up and heading back!
Payday is this week which means the currency's here now. Which means we are too.
Shame about all these banks we're hitting, but we all have expenses. Wolf's lifestyle isn't cheap. Go time.

OK folks, my guy stashed the thermal drill for the bank vault in the parking lot, so get that first. Watch for guards, keep an eye out for cameras - where there's cameras there's usually a security room... Money time.
Take as much as we need, but get more if you feel lucky. Then bag it, and get to the escape van. Let's do this!
OK people, my contact thoughtfully stashed the thermal drill you're going to need to crack the bank vault somewhere in the parking lot. Get it, then hit the bank vault.
Branch bank job with a twist, and the twist is golden. Bars, that is. Let's do our thing.

OK, You're gonna need a thermal drill for this gig. My guy stashed it around the back of the bank. Get it and get to work on the vault. Keep in mind there's security cameras and lots of civilians. Go win the gold, folks.
Everyone, you know how it's done. My guy dropped the thermal drill in the parking lot, so grab that before you make your move inside. Some surveillance would be smart.
Drill the vault when you are ready. I don't know what's here but I like our chances.
Pretty sweet line on a bank - after a while they all start to look the same I bet. Let's do it.
Time for a bank job guys. I got a perfect one for you.
Everyone get ready to make a little withdrawal now.
It's open! Bag the money!
You might wanna look through some of the deposit boxes, could be something valuable.
Alright, bring it to the van, it's right around the corner.
Come on now, 1 more.
Well this looks like a gold mine now,doesn' it.
OK the vault's open!
Vault's open! Bag the cash!
They're coming into the bank!
Street's clear for now!
Guys let's keep things moving along here.
They're in the bank!
Promising... Very promising...
Now it's just a matter of time.
...And yeah, there goes the alarm.
Dammit. Now we go the painful way.
That was too damn close. Now, we don't have time to stand around, gang. Get him off that chair so we can get this over with.
The mechanic said he wants you to bring him some kind of special tools from the workshop. Hurry up.
The workshop is where you'll find the tools. That's what the mechanic said.
Just get the chrome skull the mechanic is asking for. Go inside the clubhouse and use the blowtorch he gave you.
The mechanic told you to go to the bunker and get the seat for him.
Just keep driving straight!
That's it! Keep going!
There's the escape! Ride through the gate and you'll be safe!
That gate is your escape!
Umm... Okay then.
I guess the man really wanted a soda...
Don't forget the C4 in the limo. Man, cops are close. Hurry!
We can now redeem the Dentists' contract. You can bounce, or treat Vegas to a Payday Gang party and loot the place.
Come on, gang. Get to the locker room armory.
Find those numbers, gang! We need all three to get into the armory.
You bet on the right spot! There's the vault!
Blast a hole in the floor of the Gambling Hall. That'll give us access to the vault.
You need to get the C4 down in the Gambling Hall. Hurry!
BFD works hard, but drinks a lot of water. Make sure she has coolant. You can find water in the bathroom.
Now get onto BFD and let the blimp carry you up, up and away. Or stay and grab more loot.
Two!
Eight
Strike! Gonna need to rob more banks if this is your luck.
Ouch! I hope that's not a sign of the luck you'll enjoy tonight.
Ka-ching, gang! Maybe we can stop robbing banks and earn our payday on the slots.
Whoa! Look at this place! Imagine all the loot we can boost from here!
These machines are for nickel-and-dime suckers. Don't waste your time.
These machines are small fry. We're here for a bigger prize.
Exterior lounge. Nice for a cool drink..
Get the blueprints in the archives. They're somewhere in the employee only areas..
Its vent goes right to the Security Center.
OK, first things first, look for the gear case.
What the hell...
If you want your beef rare, we'll just wipe its ass and lead it to your table.
We got ice cream too. You like ice cream?
We got rice. We got fries. We got mashed potato. We got grits.
BFD needs more juice! Hook her up to the other socket. Keep it running.
Screw the winch down!
You need to hook BFD up with the winch.
Got it! I'll do a background check on this guy. Hang on.
Fill his glass. Once he downs that, well... he's going to lose interest in the slots. Follow him, and get his keycard.
That's his keycard. Grab it.
First number. Get the other two.
Put the winch together where I marked, crew.
Screw down the winch so that it'll be stable. Trust me, for what's coming, you need it secure.
Nice! Next, we're going to signal the blimp, and for something like that we need a big signal. A fireworks display! Find them!
Nice. Now light the fusepaper and...
All right. Now this is why we brought the winch. Hook it to BFD, and it'll get the position right.
Okay. It's thing is moving BFD, your thing is keeping it safe.
All right. now throw that switch. Let's see what BFD can do!
Just grab that loot and let's get it out of here.
Maybe your gear is at the pool. See if Micho left the gear there. Look for a guitar case.
Reception will have the guest list, guys. Just head there, download it.
Don't forget to send me the list. Head to IT. Plug it in.
That's him. Got his name, SSN, last time he took a dump... Check the screen in IT. Find him. Says here he loves the slots, so maybe that will be where he is.
Get him down! Tie him up!
The owner likely keeps his in his office. The pit boss will be near the main hall. Security head probably keeps his somewhere near the locker room.
Good job, that's the second number found. Just one more.
Their big vault takes a three digit code. This is one digit. Write it down. We'll need it later.
Good work. We'll need these three digits for the vault once we're through the Security Center.
Arriving in style!
Guys, we can't risk leaving those thugs around. Deal with them.
Vlad needs you to secure those bags in the chimney.
Keep it quiet til you get the cars. We can't afford to have cops shooting them up. I'll tell you when to plant the C4.
Our buyers only want cars in great condition. That means you can't alert the cops. They won't care what they shoot up. So keep this a quiet one.
The market for these cars demands they are in perfect condition. Keep it quiet, and you'll keep the cops away. Which means no bullet holes.
Find that storage room, gang. The keys will be there.
And... it's locked. Damn! OK. Stay quiet. The manager must be around there somewhere. Take him hostage. He should be able to get us in.
I've accessed the manager's file. He'll be wearing a suit.
I can also see that he's balding. You copy that? Look for the old, balding guy.
Looks like the manager is losing a bit on top. Look for the balding guy.
Find the manager. He's wearing a black suit, going bald. Tie him up and see if he can help.
He dropped a keycard. Probably for his office. Maybe something there will help.
Use the manager's keycard to open his office.
Use that keycard on the manager's office.
They got a new IT guy on the books. If you can find his name and hack his pc, I should be able to open that door for you.
Scope out the manager's office. You should be able to find who the IT guy is. Then you can hack his pc.
Now jump into the car. Oh, and keep your head down - it's time to *blow* the joint.
All of you need to be inside the dealership so I can blow up the C4!
Damn it! Cops are on their way. Not much time now.
Almost there guys!
Stand by, gang.
This better be the right one! Don't have much time now.
Ah hell. Wrong pc. Alarms are tripped. Cops are en-route. Not much time now.
Drive out of there!
Alright, just park the car in that container, and walk away!
A rare job. Hit the Teuer dealership. Boost the new models.
Pull over here. Alright gang. Let's do this.
Pull over. This is it. Teuer Automotives.
Okay, gang. Elephant gave you the briefing, so you know what we're after. We need to find the BCI headset and the computer software. You manage this, we'll make a lot of money.
Keep pushing forward, gang!
The front of the train, gang!
There it is! Get through the gate and secure both the BCI headset and the software.
One minute, gang! One minute.
Use the blowtorch to get through the gate!
There's the pilot. Christ, that old soak can barely stand, let alone fly a plane. Escort him somewhere safe. I'll get the chopper on the way.
His blood must be 80% proof. Stay with him, help him.
OK, that's the chopper you can hear. Get our guy out there.
OK, chopper's pulling out. Hope you stowed some loot. It'll be back though. Try and find more of Vlad's coke.
Did I just hear a present falling from a tree? Seems to be more of them stuck in there. Find 'em, crack 'em open.
The night's not so silent. Think I heard another present hit the ground. Find it!
The helicopter is in bound for the lumber yard, gang.
Chopper's headed for the crash site. Get ready!
Great, the pilot's safe! Place a flare on the table outside the yard. Ignite it to signal the helicopter.
OK, he should be out of harm's way. Place a flare on the table outside the yard. Set it off to signal the evac.
Flare is lit. Alright, he sees it. Chopper is in-bound.
Left panel's activated. Now get another keycard, and let's get the second panel done.
An off-shore methlab? Clever. A methlab in a metal box? Not so clever...
This is the Left Control Room for the Dock Gate. Use the Keycard here.
This gate will open automatically once the ship moves to Dock 3B.
Guys, you gotta get into the dockyard.
This is one of the ship Control Rooms. Computers can be used for entering GPS targets, or you might find Moretta's comm frequency. There could also be a keycard or radio here.
Ship's in position! Going to hit it like Blackbeard! Zip-line could be a shortcut.
Feeding the fish, eh?
No one'll see that there.
Cops are at the powerboxes. Don't let them cut the juice.
You guys have the bomb. No need to keep opening the containers!
No frequency here. Damn! Then the best bet is the office across the dock - check it out.
We need the ship's comm frequency. Likely on one of these terminals. Search them!
She stopped! Get on deck and and search the containers!
You already found the comm frequencies for the Moretta. No need to keep checking the computers.
Great job keeping it quiet. They don't suspect you, so the containers are unlocked. Have at it!
OK, place the C4 on the gate.
Get that C4 on the dock gate.
One in place.
That's a start.
Third placed. One more.
That's the C4 done. Clear the gate!
Boom!
Well, we're not getting the Captain's cooperation now, but we still need that ship moved. Just hack the ship control terminal and make sure it stays on.
Good. I can get on with the work now.
Moretta is powering up. Let it move to its berth. Weapons free.
And here's the second control room for the gate.
These wagons might have something valuable in them. Maybe check them out?
Now use those keycards to open the gate. Doesn't matter which does which.
Good. Now use the keycard on the panel in the other control room.
That's it. Dock gate's opened. Now let's get the ship moving. We have the comm frequency. Just find the radio and patch me in.
That's it for the gate. Now we just got to get the ship moving. That frequency you found earlier will do it. Find a radio and let me talk to the Moretta
Guys, patch into the radio. Let me speak to the Moretta.
Wonder what's in the case. Could be The Butcher's explosives. Have a look.
They have no clue you are there. Now keep looking for those keycard.
They've got no clue you're there. Keep looking for those keycards.
Everything's quiet. Nice. Track down the comm frequency.
You're keeping it quiet. Great. Now, the radio.
Get the power back on.
Don't let them get close to the power boxes.
Is it too much to ask that you keep the cops away from the power?
Lucky that you found the manifest. Now we know which containers to drill!
Get your drills on those containers, clowns.
Chopper can't hang around forever, gang. Get there, get out!
You need to get back to the chopper. Hurry!
Great! Extra loot... Love it!
Nope, no vault. Move on, keep looking!
Pick up that thermite, trust me, you're going to need it.
Damn, that vault is big. Need more water. Let the chopper refill. Hold tight!
That's the wagon! Now plant the thermite on the top. We'll open that sucker up!
Let the thermite burn through. Won't take long to eat through.
The wagons are all over the place. Could be loot in 'em. Might also be C4. If there is, grab it. You're gonna need it.
Best way in to this vault is water-cracking. We fill it with water, detonate it and, boom! Pressure busts the door open. Only way to insure we don't ignite those explosives.
Chopper's on the scene! Bile, get that hose down to the gang.
Keep an eye on that hose. Let it fill the vault.
Cops pulled the hose. Get it back on!
There's gotta be explosives in one of the wagons. Search for them!
Get that C4 into the vault. And stand back!
They set up a roadblock. And heavy reinforcements are on the way too.
Sending a small plane to pick you up. Pilot can't land with those trees though. You gotta find a saw, clear a few and then mark the strip for him.
Plane's nearly there. Pop the flares and mark the strip.
Chopper's right on top of you. Can you see it?
We're almost there, gang. It's filling up nicely! Just keep things going a little more. Once it's full, we rig it and enjoy the show!
It's filling up fast, crew. Just keep it going. When it's full, plant the charge and enjoy the show.
What's the hold-up?! Get that hose re-attached already!
The hose won't fix itself. One of you clowns get it done!
Pump's finished. That wagon is bloated and ready! Nicely done.
Wagon's not gonna crack itself open. Dip that C4 in!
All that wagon is waiting for is a nice bit of C4. Get to it!
Green lights. Now let the time lock run down, and it'll open like a summer flower, and you bees can get busy with the honey.
Great. Now just wait for that time lock to run down. So far this is textbook stuff. Be ready to bag the cash when it opens.
Beautiful stacks of unmarked Benjamins. Just reward for an honest heister.
Well, easy money for him. Put it out of your mind. Keep going, gang.
Hold them off while I find the best way out for you guys.
They've really opened the valve. The van can't wait forever. You need to book it, now!
There must be keycards around the place. They can help you get in quiet.
Control the crowd, guys. Keep the people down.
This place will have cameras. Be careful.
You need to get that cage set up.
Vault keycard. It gets half the job done. Swipe it in the reader, and then track down the second card.
Job's half done. Find the second keycard and you can walk into the vault.
Protect the cage. These cops have no respect for your honest work and can take the bags.
There's a thermal drill at the gas station. Fetch it.
Grab those bags, guys.
Thank you for your call. We look forward to hearing from you again.
Good afternoon. Roberts Bank. This is Randolph speaking.
Damn. Alright. Expect company, gang.
Get those bags with the cage pieces, and get them on the roof of the bank.
The roof is the target for the plane, so the cage needs to be built there.
Carry the bags to the parking lot. Get the cage put together there.
That's the balloon up. Great job.
He missed! That asshole missed the cable. Hold the cops off, he's coming about to try again.
Our pilot has ditched his plane. That asshole! Time to adapt, gang!
Plane is en route. Just hold on, gang.
No more stealthing it, crew. But finish the job. Get that cash out of the vault.
The alarm sounded but it's too late for the vault. Get it empty, as fast as you can.
Broadsword calling Danny Boy. Our boys are ready. Drop the skyhook cage. Over.
Broadsword calling Danny Boy. Deploy the skyhook, our boys are waiting. Over.
This isn't a request. Get your ass into position for a roof pick-up, or I'll see whole squadrons of F-16's scrambled in your direction!
The pick-up is on its way. Not much margin for error here. Get to the roof.
It's a piss poor location, but the pilot will collect the cage from the street. Be ready.
This is Mortimer. At the bank. Your money is safe. Now, how can I help you?
Can any of you see the time lock codes. I can't stall them for long.
Look around. The codes must be written somewhere. I can't stall them forever!
It's got to be among these papers. Let's see. This is a B7040, that's not it. A FU5000. No, let me keep looking...
Remember to keep an eye on any bags in the cage. Cops can still snatch them.
Multiple hostiles entering by the street.
It's the Feds! What the hell! They were waiting for us!
The Gensec truck's a bonus. A keycard in it would be a sweeter bonus.
That's the heaviest truck the cops have got, so expect their best shot.
SWAT's have deployed to the adjacent roofs, so watch the crossfire.
The cage is assembled. Great! Now start filling it with bags of Benjamins.
Don't stand around. Start working on those deposit boxes.
It's about to get hot down there, gang. They're dropping grenades.
Six bags. I'm getting buttery thinking of all that extra loot.
Keep an eye on all entry points, especially the ladders.
There's an access hatch to the sewers over by the gas station. Go there, and get down.

We got a bank here. Not a big branch but I've learned the vault is temporarily holding stacks of cash in transit. Foreign exchange notes. Anyway, you know how to do it - your way. Sneak in silent, or unleash hell. Either way, I got a little idea for how to lift the money out of there. You'll see what I mean. I think you'll like it.
You're cats hiding from dogs. Stupid, rich ones.
Hey, you're supposed to be hacking those routers, remember?
There's a router box right near you.
That's one security box taken care of.
Halfway there guys, keep going!
Chopper is back and waiting for more bags!
One more bag, then you get leave.
.. or stay and bag a little more. Up to you!
What're you waiting for?
Chop-chop. To the chopper.
All right, system has been hacked.
Keep it quite. Don't get spotted.
Hey, great. You found the keycard ahead of schedule.
You got the code wrong guys! System is locked for 30 seconds.
You're locked out. The system is gonna take 30 seconds to reset.
Found a laptop for you guys.
There's the second one.
That's all of them.
Last one is there.
Check the cafeteria for a computer. Bring me a cappuccino while you're at it.
I think there's something in the Jade Room.
You'll probably find a computer in Administration.
Have a look in the Admin Office, there's bound to be a PC there.
Public Relations would be a good place to search for computers.
There's something glowing in the Velvet Room but it's not the ghost of Elvis. More likely a laptop.
Hey guys, you should run by the Tiffany Room, I just saw a PC in the security feed.
Might want to check the contruction site for a computer.
The Amber room looks like it has a laptop.
Perfect, that's all of them.
Ralph Garnet has the last piece of the puzzle. Find him and take his keycard. He's around there somewhere.
Keep looking for Ralph.
Don't loose that keycard, you're gonna need it later.
Don't get the code wrong or the alarm will go off.
That vault is just waiting to be emptied guys. Use the keycard, then enter the code.
The vault isn't going anywhere. It's waiting for tha keycard and code.
Watch the glass. Cut through it instead of smashing or the alarm will go.
Another vault. Didn't expect that.
Try to get that second vault open if you can.
How are you coming along?
Keep working guys.
Keep going. Good job so far.
Time to make a hasty retreat guys.
Back to the platform where you came in.
It's time to leave guys.
That was the wrong sequence, now the system is locked unless you find the master code!
Cop choppers are inbound!
Blues are on the way in choppers so keep your eyes open!
Keep looking for those router boxes, I'm working on a plan B.
Just one more to go.
Drop any cop that gets close!
No too long now.
There we go!
Ralph's got to be hiding somewhere. Find him and get that card!
You need to find the CFO. He's got the master code. You *need* the master code.
You still need to find the master code!
Chopper is inbound. Stand by!
I'll crack this guy like an egg and have that code for you shortly.
Swipe Ralph's card before entering the code.
You get that? The code is...
Forget the code? It's...
Another vault?
A second vault?
More than one vault? Didnt' see that one coming.
Well now, it's probably worth a hell of a lot.
It's gotta be worth a lot.
It was loud, but it was succesful. Outstanding people.
What? We didn't lay a damn thing. How is that possible?
Bang on target, gang!
Ok guys, Get after that gold!
The truck is in the slaughterhouse. There's C4 stashed in those bins. Grab it and bust in.
C4 is in the bins, crew. Blast the door with it.
Crew, bring it down. Perhaps a little force will do it.
C4 those truck doors, gang. Hurry!
Crack that safe, guys. Get that gold out of the firezone.
Nice. Out in the yard, I have a container ready to stash the gold. Number 61. Get it there!
Get the gold out to container 61, crew.
Remember: set fire to the tires. Get gas all over them!
Now the helicopter won't see where we load the containers.
Container 12. Lay a nice trap to cover our escape.
Dump some gas in container 12. It'll cover our escape.
Gang, we need that firetrap by our escape. Use the crane controls.
Put the container with the gold on that truck. Use the crane!
Gotta get the container with the gold loaded on the truck. The crane can do it.
Gang, stop standing around, and get to the escape point. Follow the blue containers!
Gang, ignite the trap!
We'll have this melted down and on the market before the Murkies pay out their early retirements on this job.
Swats are spreading all over the roof. Look up guys.
Police chopper is over you. We can't let them see which container we use.
OK, remember the plan. Extract the gold, move the gold, set the smoke screen, set the trap, escape. Lets go!
Now, lay a fire trap in container 12. Dump some gas in there.
Guys, out of the container! It's not going anywhere with you inside.
Great. All right, now put that gas down in the container. We'll light it later.
...and also on the 45 going south, there's been a major accident that's clogging the entire freeway. It's like a war zone out there this morning so you better take a scenic route.
Guys, find the Murkywater trains.
Look for the EMP parts. That's top priority.
Gang, are you looking for the EMP parts?
What the hell? Elephant's sources didn't mention an additional security door...
... looks like we're going to need a keycard to get past this...
Gang, without a keycard we're not getting past that door. Look for it.
You really need to find a keycard to get that door open. Come on.
We still need to find a blowtorch, gang.
Great, you actually found a blowtorch. Head back to the train and get through that door.
Get back to the security door and get it open using the blowtorch.
You found thermite? Excellent! Head back to the steel gate and melt those bars.
Great, you found some thermite. Now we can melt our way through that steel gate.
Murkywater like their technology, so they should have some kind of mobile command center nearby. See what you can find.
Maybe that equipment will come in handy later, so hold on to it.
Sure, why not? We might find use for it later.
Gang, we still need to get the EMP.
Great job! Head over to the escape area and drop off the EMP bomb.
Secure the EMP over by the escape area. Better to be safe than sorry.
Excellent, we got the EMP secured. I won't blame you if you want to get some extra loot before you escape. Up to you.
With the EMP secured, there is some time to kill before the escape vehicle arrives.
Listen up, gang. Twitch is coming in with the van. He will come from the upper bridge side.
Hey, these vents should be perfect if you need hide a body or transfer loot through.
If you happen to drop one of the guards, you should be able to hide the body under the train so it doesn't get detected.
Damn, are those drones? We're really living in the future, aren't we? They seem to have a camera so stay out of sight.
Drones with cameras, really? Murkywater are stepping up their game. Be careful that you don't get spotted.
Gang, I want a sweep of the whole area. That means checking all corners of the train yard. Don't leave any stone unturned.
There's four of you, guys. Spread out if needed and check all corners of the train yard.

Alright. You're in. Now hunt around. There's gotta be a clue about which truck is carrying the voting machines to Washington. Search containers, check computers - anything you can to figure out the right truck.
OK, now look around. We need to tag the truck headed for Washington. Look around for clues. Containers, terminals, any records. Find the right one, and tag it.
Tracker placed. Signal coming through. Now haul ass, and let's hope we're chasing Elephant's machines.
Getting a nice clear signal. Time to leave, guys. I hope you tagged the right truck.
Crap! You were seen, and the convoy is rolling out. We need another way to find our truck.
The trucks are on the move. Someone saw you! OK, time for another plan.
The first database is downloaded. If we get the second, it'll increase our chances of tracking the right truck. But it's your call.
Try and keep the cops from hitting those circuit breakers.
Receiving the data now. It should be enough for me to find where the right truck is headed. Just keep it coming.
Those containers have cargo. That might help you eliminate the wrong trucks.
One of these trucks is the one we want. When you've finished searching for clues, get the tag on the truck you think is our target. You get one chance, so make sure you're certain.
Well, if you had to go loud, best to do it properly, and that was some outstanding action. You got the whole database. Sifting through the info now...
Pier 39. Find the truck that has the voting machines. It will be bound for Washington. Figure out which one it is, slap on the tracker and get the hell out. Keep it quiet.
The trucks are right over the other side of the wharf. Find the right one, get the tracker on and get out.
It's open, take our stuff back.
Alright, now that you're in, let's go after the machines. Chances are they are sealed in crates, so keep an eye open for them.
You should be looking for the shipping crates. Chances are they hold the machines.
Great! You found a machine. Alright, get the hack started, and let it finish.
There's the alarm. Cops are en route. Keep hacking those machines. I'll think of a new plan.
Hack those machines, guys. Each corrupt machine will pile more pressure on Schwartz.
You need to find where the camera footage is kept. Move it, guys.
There's your bonus. Get it to the van. You guys deserve it.

Great work! The hacked machines have made it look like the Mayor's people were behind this. Even if an enquiry exonerates her, the papers are hurling so many buckets of shit at the Mayor that she's finished. And The Elephant? Well, his man is picking out new furniture for City Hall. Great work, gang!
Case the place before lighting things up. Maybe there's a better way.
That looks like the server we're after. Get that scrambler going.
Looks like the scrambler software just crashed. Some shitty code. Start it back up!
OK, the data is scrambled! It'll seem like just a normal data failure.
Now, blast that wall open! The explosion will trash the voting machines.
Boom! The wall is history. Should have taken a few machines down with it too.
Come on, guys - time to grab the cash.
That'll keep nosy bastards from spying on our business. Good.
So far, so good, clowns.
Still good. Still good.
C'mon guys, lets change the change!
They should teach this little bit of political engineering for years to come. Outstanding, gang. Outstanding!
Secure as much loot as you can. The escape vehicle is leaving in three minutes.
Four minutes left, guys.
The escape will be there in nine minutes.
The chopper touches ground in 30 seconds. Get ready to move!
30 seconds left. Get in the van or you'll be left behind.
You won't have much time to escape, so be ready to move towards the subway station.
The cops are deploying snipers in the area, don't walk into their sights.
SWATs are assuming positions on a nearby rooftop, watch out!
Remember guys, we need at least two bags to escape.
Remember guys, we need three bags to escape.
Remember guys, we need six bags to escape.
Remember guys, we need eight bags to escape.
One of you should keep an eye out for those snipers at all times!
More snipers are coming in!
Snipers are inbound!
A sniper team is moving in!
The cops are realizing those snipers wont be enough to take you down. They're prepairing to send in SWATs. Get ready!
Heads up, SWATs are moving in to try to finish this.
You'll have to move fast when the chopper arrives. It can't stay long with this amount of heat.
I get why the Elephant wants this. It is tons of gold in this deal!
Oh, my! Seems like the good senator did the deal and partied at the same time - looks like a arms-gold-coke deal.
What a flat! These arms deals sure are a nice addition to his senator pay.
Yes, that is the epicenter - right there. I wonder what kind of treasure that house can hold. OK, on with our heist here.
Ah, that is the vault guys. That door, we can't get through it this time. But the gold... The gold on the other side! Well, we got to leave it.
OK we're good to go. I'll get you guys cleared to the safe house. Their arsenal is gone. Their soldiers toothless.
You dont let me down. Hector will be proud of this work. We are in business for real.
Should be a higher security type of door, look for a Gensec logo.
Awesome job gang! Last step - you need to dismantle the server and bring it to the car.
Alright, you got it. Let's get out of here!
Good work, crew. Now if Hector knew we just hit the FBI for the info he might worry a bit. But what Hector doesn't know won't hurt him. Let's go banking, shall we?
OK folks. Going straight to the source. Inside that place is the info we need - and way more law than we want to be close to. Find their server room and get the info on the bank. I'll do the rest.
The surveillance guard triggered the alarm.
Hector got the footage. I'm told he laughed long and hard. And now the FBI looks impossibly incompetent, which takes a lot of heat off of us. Great work.
Mendoza's not going to like that outcome. But we should. Well done. Go get paid.
Go quiet and keep your eyes open.
Careful now. I hope you didn't bring your squeaky shoes.
There should be a laptop with information about where the cash is hidden. We got the password from Charon so all you gotta do is find the thing.
Find that laptop, guys!
You find that laptop yet?
Guys, the laptop. Did you find it yet?
The laptop must be there somewhere. Find it!
Enter the password and access the files.
Looks like a list of where the money is hidden. It's all over the yacht.
Big ones and Benjamins. Beautiful!
You got the second stash. Keep looking, two more!
That's all of the cash!
If you throw the loot bags into the sea, you can pick them up when it's time to leave.
Either secure the bags in the motorboat, or chuck them in the sea. We can pick them up as we leave.
Ok, connect me to the laptop, this should only take a moment.
If you overheat the system it'll do a soft reboot, giving you access to the controls. Then you can get the server.
You'll need to induce a soft reboot by overheating the system. That'll get you access to the controls so you can grab the server.
Great, now I should be able to override the main panel.
Check two overrides, two more to go.
One more should do it.
Ok, we got it. Can't wait to extract those passwords!
You cleaned it out. Time to leave.
Great job, gang - you really screwed McKendrick over this time. He won't be happy when he finds out all that money's gone.
Okay, pirates - board the ship and get the loot. And keep it quiet.
Be careful now, don't let the guards see you. And find that cash.
Break the glass and bag those jewels. Remember all the extra stuff around the store.
Alright guys, get the bags to the van!
The van is back. Get the bags to it!
Remember, we need three bags!
We need to get three bags with us for this one.
Guys, six bags, that's what we need.
Remember, we need eight bags!
Guys, eight bags, that's what we need.
Theres a jewelry store downtown, fairly simple target. But be ready for the heat if the alarm goes off.
The new jewelry store down town is loaded with jewels. Those could be ours. You want to pay them a visit?
Another jewelry store that needs a visit. You guys up for it?
This is it, gang. Chavez' place.
Don't just stand around, get in there.
The bouncer will get suspicious if you don't walk in.
Guys, don't keep them waiting. Get in there.
Get in there and get the deal started.
Don't raise suspicion. Do what they tell you.
Stop walking around and go inside the room.
Keep your eyes peeled. Something's up.
I've got a bad feeling about this.
Okay, time for our move. Get the masks on and let's go!
Hey now, that's a big toothbrush... Can I have it?
That was intense, but you did what was needed. Pick up the key and head back to the panic room.
We still need the key from Chavez to get through that door. Find him.
Okay, we'll need to use the saws to cut the room free from the floor.
Make sure those saws keep running. If one of them jams, get it fixed immediately. We can't stick around forever.
You guys keeping an eye on the saws? They're all running?
Remember to keep the saws running. They tend to jam.
Are the saws still running?
The saws have done their part, excellent.
Okay, gang, cops are here - as expected. It's easier to take them out on street level before they actually storm the building.
The police are here. They'll storm the building if they get the chance, so maybe stop them before they can.
Okay, time for the next step in our plan - the C4 from Bile. Wait, let me patch him in. "Bile, you there? We need the C4. How long?"
That's it, guys, we're doing it. Give me a sec. "Hey, Bile, it's time for the C4. How fast can you be here?"
Good job, gang. With the snipers gone, Bile will be able to make the drop.
Great. Now we need some more on the fifth floor and then some on the roof.
Excellent. The fifth floor is all that's left.
Good. Fifth floor is done.
That's it, gang. Fourth floor complete.
Fourth floor is done. Good.
Stand clear from the blast radius, gang.
That's one hell of a hole! It's perfect!
Keep fighting, guys! Bile is coming back any minute!
Bile! Time to return and pick up the cargo. How soon can you be back?
Okay, gang, here they come! Find a good position to defend yourselves! We're almost done!
OK, the winch is secured. Let's pull this package out of here!
The magnet is in place. Time to pull it out of here.
Run! Just run!
Faster guys!
Who the hell can do what we just did? No one! This will go down in history, just like I said.
OK, we're coming up on Vlad's old stomping grounds. Go in there and get Vlad his money. Send a message to these people that no one is safe from crazy Vlad. Roll out before the cops shut you down.
OK, you're inside. Find the paintings with the red stickers on them, we want at least four.
OK we can't screw around anymore. Just get me access to the computer in the surveillance room, I'll deal with it remotely.
Have you checked any of the vertical options? There's got to be access to the interior up there.
Great, we need at least 3 more, get it to the van. It's in the parking lot next to the gallery.
That's half, we need 2 more.
SWAT units are moving into the building, get ready!
You need to take the marked paintings to the senator's apartment. They'll have cameras installed in them. Eyes on the inside will make your job easier, trust me.
OK people, get the phone. Let's get this trade out of the way.
Someone pick up the phone...
OK, now let's just hope they call you fast.
There it is, get the phone.
OK, that's them calling.
OK folks, everyone into the train.
OK now remember, one bag of cash for every painting.
OK good, now there is a van waiting for you on the other side of that building. Go through, load up the car, and we're done for the day.
We're done here, there's a van waiting on the other side of the building. Go on through, load the car up, and we're done.
Dammit! SWAT ambush. I didn't see it!
Good move.. that's bound to lead to the warehouse.
The senator's man just told me they got the paintings. They're thrilled with the trade. Now they're right where we want 'em, thanks to your good work. Hopefully you got some of that money too.
I'll keep this for the payday - that plus the gold from the senator's apartment should load your safe house vault nicely. Great work.
Thats all of them.
Connect the devices to the station on the roof.
OK! We're gold. I think I got everything we need. You should be able to access his desktop computer now.
It's located in his office.
There's just a little problem... I don't actually know where the vault is, physically.
If you want to go for more, use his desktop PC, it should open the vault up for you.
We have to shut them off.
It'll take some time, lots of data to up and a small pipe.
Look for a circuit breaker to get the power back up.
Keep them the hell away from the circuit breaker, you hear me?
OK, to make things a little more interesting I'm sending this feed live to all the big media outlets while we upload. Lots of coverage.
You can tap the feed from the roof of the building, sorry we couldn't do better. Get into his hidden vault, take the gold, and leave a little coke there to finish the frame job.
Drugs planted, senator framed. Bad guys 1, Politicians 0. Well done, very smooth operation in there. The Elephant will love this outcome.
Let's find the head of security. He should have what you need to get in - USB stick with security codes. He'll be wearing a green jacket.
We need the USB stick from the head of security.
The head of security will have that USB stick.
What... guys, protect the computer!
They interrupted the computer. You gotta protect it, guys!
The computer got interrupted. You have to defend it better!
Ok, that should do it. Now start the computer again.
There must be a switch or something that opens up the rest of the house. Try to find it.
Ok guys, that did it! The house is open!
Wait... we can't get into the lobby or Sosa's office. It must run on a separate system.
I'm thinking here. I don't know how we're gonna get in...
Hmm... she's right, gang. Let's destroy some of his stuff and see if we can provoke him.
Let's burn his paintings. Gather them in a pile first.
That's a spot as good as any. Pile 'em up.
Hey Bile, you there? We got some cars that need picking up and dropping off!
Bile? I need you to fly in and move some cars for me.
Bile? I got an airlift job for you. A grab and drop, you could say.
Not just guards, but turrets too! This guy takes security seriously!
Ok gang, now we're gonna loot Ernesto's floor safe. I bet it's full of wonderful things. There are some winches stashed near the place where you entered the property - go get them and hook them up.
Come on, get those winches hooked up!
Hook the winches up to the floor!
The winch seems to have jammed. Get it up and running again!
Don't forget to get that winch running again!
Ok, protect them now.
That's all of it, every single dime! Now it's time to go home!
There he is. Looks like he's at the back.
Hey, there he is. Looks like he's by the pools.
That's the head of security. He seems to be at the stairs.
That's the head of security. He's by the stairs.
The beard is green but not long.
Montezuma wants three oranges for breakfast.
Boss, there's something strange with this coke. You gotta see it.
Well done, nice and quiet. Secure everything if you can, but we need at least a few bags to make this worthwhile.
Good. Get as much loot as you can, but at least a few bags.
You could get a zipline up to move the bags.
If you want to move the bags faster, you can set up a zipline.
Don't forget to get the bags out!
Hey guys, more Sosa thugs are on their way to the mansion! They'll be here any minute, I hope you don't have bodies lying around in the open.
Listen, the guards inside the house are likely to have pagers. Be careful.
You could say Ernesto Sosa is lucky to have this beautiful house in Miami Beach. But his luck is about to change...
We ain't got all night boys, hurry up.
This is the correct hangar, bag those guns and get ready bring them back up to van.
Judging by the amount of bodies, this is the gear we are after.
Keep and eye on that control tower guys, I thought I saw some movement up there.
Movement in the control tower, keep watching those windows.
Almost there now, just a few more bags and we should have enough.
Good thinking! Use that fire to destroy the weapons.
This is an FBI auxiliary office. The hornet's nest. For the love of God stay quiet. First thing, get inside.
OK, good. Let's find that server room.
Alarm on that door guys. We need to take care of that first.
Smooth - thats the door and the alarm is off. Get in there.
Door - check. Alarm off - check. Get in there boys.
I need access to their systems. I've marked out a computer for you.
Hurry ! Hurry! Get the next door!
OK, another door! FBI is on us - hurry!
Just get the server clear of its housing and take it to the van.
FBI sure knows security. Get that barrier open.
It's open, get the server!
FBI is still sleeping. Keep this up boys. Carry that loot out of there...
Shit - what kinda move is that! Go in! Go guns blazing, we gotta get inside!
There goes the alarm. Let's go straight for the server room door.
Alarm guys. Hit the server room door right away.
Shit, Feds will be here shortly. Hit the server room door now.
FBI spotted us, guys. Hit that door hard!
Damn it! We were so close!
Close, close, close. OK, go full force guys!
Damn it! We almost did it! Just get it to the van.
Ha! Taking it back. This is our old loot, isn't it?
Holy shit! Looks like they've electrified the vault! Get to the generator on the roof and shut it off.
Goddamn cartel! They electrified the goddamn vault. Get to the generator on the roof and shut it off.
Hector wants this recorded. Don't ask - I didn't.
While it's burning I'd start getting some of those deposit boxes open. You didn't think we were just gonna leave empty handed, right?
OK, enough money making, take the recording and make a run for it, unless you wanna hang around for more loot.
OK. Find the bank manager.
The manager will likely be around the back. His type don't spend much time with the plebs. Black suit, balding.
The manager is our target. Middle-aged creep with a bald spot. Get his keycard.
Keep an eye open for the manager. Black suited creep, losing a bit up top, mid 40's. Get his keycard.
Great. Now use the card to get inside the server room. Second floor.
We need to deal with the metal detectors. Best way: simply kill the power. There are electricity boxes around.
That's the metal detectors dealt with. Great.
All right, let's see what we got.
Okay, searching...
Come on, let me see what you got...
Credit score, eight-fifty! But no codes. Keep looking.
Aaand here we go: The code is... 1138.
Enter the code.
The two keycards will be around here somewhere.
Search the offices, desks - those keycards are around there somewhere.
Those keycards can't have vanished. They're there somewhere.
Use one of those cards on the security terminal. Then, use the second keycard on the keypanel by the vault door. There's a short window, so don't shilly-shally.
Too slow, try again.
And...open sesame!
There it is. Neatly stacked. Well, you're robbers, ain't you? Get robbing!
Gang, the money's there, just waiting for you. Get at it!
Once you've got your fill, throw the bags through that vent by the elevators. Don't worry. You'll see 'em again soon.
You need to drop those bags in the vent.
Meet up with the Insider. She'll get you out of there.
Stay low and quiet. Offices are never empty.
Probably people working here. Keep an eye out.
All right, there's the truck and there's our bags. Stash the loot into the truck, quick!
That's the alarm - time for plan B. Do the countdown.
The copy machine in the server room has the Plan B equipment. Grab it!
Go pick up the drill and thermite. It's hidden inside the copy machine.
There's one more can of thermite in the copy machine but someone else needs to carry that one.
All right. Get that drill set up on the gate.
Access the computer I have marked out for you. Use it to drop the magnetic seal.
Ahhhh, look at all that cash. Okay, fill your bags, gang!
Come on, we're almost done. Get the money!
Cops are about to open the door. Give them a Payday welcome!
OK, escape plan: Go up to the server room, blow up the wall and escape through the basement of the neighboring building.
Right, here's our way out. Get back upstairs, and C4 the wall into the adjoining building.
Head upstairs to the office corridors!
Blow a hole in the wall and run!
We're blasting out the back door. Get C4 on that wall!
Now, get through there! That's the way out!
We're almost done. Get down to the garage, secure that loot!
Use the keycard to enter the server room on the second floor.
You've disabled all cameras in the vault area. They're blind back there now.
And... The bank is dark to us. Good work, crew.
Alright, get in there and find the target.
Keep moving along the bridge until you reach the prison transports.
Go find those transports.
Get to the prison transports.
Get to the trucks.
Whoa, another explosion! Look out!
You gotta saw the trucks open to find out which one he's in.
Saw those trucks open!
Ok, first transport is open - check it!
That's the first one opened - have a look inside!
One truck opened! Check inside!
That's the second one opened - have a look inside!
Second truck opened! Check it!
Third transport is open - check inside!
Check the third transport, it's opened now!
Come on! Get him to the tower!
The tower! Come on, get him up there!
Get the prisoner up that tower!
Come on guys, get the prisoner to the tower!
Keep him moving!
Come on, don't leave the prisoner behind!
Ok, you're at the top? Help him buckle up and release the balloon. The plane will be there any minute.
Release the balloon!
Oh crap, is that an attack helicopter?
Plane is on its way in to pick the goods up.
You heard that? The pickup will take place in a couple of minutes. Until then - hold the fort!
Two minutes to pickup. Hold on guys.
Another attack helicopter! Careful guys!
Oh no, another attack helicopter!
That's another attack helicopter guys! Stay sharp!
Where's that plane? Report status!
30 seconds to pickup, guys!
Time to get out of here. Leave the tower and move further along the bridge.
Ok, you're gonna have to raise the balloon again, guys!
When you're ready, give the driver the signal.
Keep looking for the control room. Must be here somewhere.
Control room has to be here somewhere!
They interrupted the hack! Get it going again.
Just put the ticket back in the gate and we're home free!
Who had that ticket? Get it to the gate.
Seven bucks!? We were hardly here!
Feel the need for speed, gang. Strip the armor off the truck.
Any second...
Shoot the guards!
Get that car out of the way.
Now let the driver know it's clear!
Guys, the city is locked down! Cops are defending in depth, and you need to drive through. Loud is the only way. Driver's taking it easy, so stay with the truck!
Get Hoxton up to the street. Get him to the safe house!

The Dentist got Hoxton a re-trial. Uh, not you, Hox - I mean Old... Look, we'll sort out names later. The trial will be quick. With his record, he ain't gonna walk, but that's not the point. The point is he's moving, and we can hit him in transit. We're going to grab him right after the hearing. A nice little 'screw you' to the US justice system.$NL;$NL;The plan is as loud as it gets: we blast a wall in the courthouse, grab Hox and get him the hell out.$NL;$NL;Area's locked down for blocks around. They'll be expecting trouble. Have your guns ready and pack a lot of ammo.
It's payday fellas!
OK, the server is in one of the offices in the IT Department. Figure out where it is and grab it!
Get inside the evidence room and find evidence related to Hoxton's case.
You are looking for evidence related to the Hoxton's case. Take a look around. It will be stored throughout the room. Could be marked out.
Christ, don't they organise this stuff. Search through it. Find that evidence. You're looking for evidence that's related to Hoxton.
Now take the evidence to the lab. If we can find some DNA that belongs to the traitor, we might be able to pinpoint who he is.
OK, the traitor's identity is classified. Not a complete waste though - we got a sample of his DNA! Good work. Now, get back to Hoxton.
Damn. No match. Keep looking!
Ah crap... Came up blank. Keep searching and keep scanning.
This place is locked down tight, but you can use keycards to gain access to different areas. Choose wisely - you probably won't find a lot of 'em.
Spend a keycard to access the Infirmary, if you feel like you need a pick-me-up.
They're deploying gas! Get out of the room and wait for it clear.
Guys, they're throwing everything they have at you. Better make it out, fast!
Cops are getting desperate, they're launching a final assault! Don't let them stop you.
That's the FBI safe house. Let's see how safe it really is.
The safe house. Let's put that to the test.
First things first; get past the outer fence.
Check the fence. Always got to be a way over, through or under.
You're in. Next step is to get inside the mansion. But watch out - all the doors and windows are tied to an alarm.
Open a door or window and the alarm timer will kick in. You'll only have a few seconds to disable it, before it goes to hell.
Look inside before going in. Find the alarm box. When you open a door or window, it'll start, so you need to disable it fast.
The countdown started. Disable the alarm before the timer runs out!
Our target will be in the panic room. Look for it. Once you've found it, we can work on winkling that traitor bastard out.
You're looking for the panic room. Should be easy to find. Search for a reinforced door.
The door can only be opened with a code and a retinal scanner.
OK. The panic room door is controlled with two keycards and a retinal scanner. No problem.
Looks like an entry code and a key are needed for external access. Go look for them.
My guess is the code is in someone's email. Find an FBI terminal and gain access.
Good, it's searching the computer now. Make sure no one spots the computer when it's active.
It's searching now. Christ, wish they spent as much on their servers as they do on their doors. Don't let anyone see.
That's the pole. Shinny up there.
Yes, hi, this is Agent Dave from the safe house. I need to talk with the informant urgently, requesting today's code. Sorry, didn't get my coffee this morning.
Alright, The retinal scanner needs an eye. Unfortunately, one with a pulse. So find the FBI boss there and take him hostage.
You need to get that guy to the scanner. Force him to look into it.
OK, now we need two keycards. Use both of them on the panic room door.
Now. We need keycards - two of em. Use em on the door.
Gotta get two keycards working on that door.
OK, you'll need the FBI boss alive. Keep an eye out and don't kill him.
Bile is en-route with the lance. Hold the line!
There's the lance. Grab it, and let's burn that rat out of his panic room.
Get the thermal lance onto the panic room door.
Open the door. Let's unmask this dirty traitor.
The rat! Kill him!
Guys, wait... is that... Hector!? What the... fuck? Why the hell... I don't get this. Wait... the Watchdogs job, so that's why the cops were waiting for us. It was an ambush. That son of a bitch.
Hector was the one working with the feds!? That son of a bitch thought he could play us for fools. In the end, he's the one who was crushed, that dirty Colombian rat.
Hector's the rat! That's why the FBI knew all about Mendoza's secret bank, because this damn hardliner was feeding them information!
Hector was the traitor! He tried to set us up as a part of the Rats job. No wonder the cops found the meth lab so fast. All along, he was the fucking rat.
That boss would have been useful alive. Always a back-up though. A *loud* back up.
Van driver has bailed. Never mind him. OK, I'm getting you a chopper. Stay alive.
Shit, there's FBI Ready Teams in the houses nearby. They are on their way.
Guys, you better stay inside the house if you can. FBI Snipers are setting up some really nasty sightlines.
Damn, snipers are setting up around the perimeter. Watch out and only go outside if you need to!
Hmm, must be the FBI boss over by the evidence board. Keep him alive, he might be useful.
I will personally offer you a reward for all the evidence you bring out. This is about the safety of crime.net.
I have an inside man who's set up surveillance drones and spy cameras. The camera access is on the roof.
What?! The timelock has paused. Hmm, could be your ECM jammer that's messing with it. Better leave those jammers alone for a second.
Guys! You didn't take care of the alarmbox.
OK, that's probably enough stolen evidence to cover our asses but you can always get more!
Their case against us probably won't recover from the amount of evidence we've stolen, but you're free to steal more.
First job is getting inside. The front door is right there. But there's maybe other ways in.

OK. If we're going to do this quietly, we need to disable some of these alarm systems. Look around. Search the museum. Find the circuit boxes that power security. If we can hack them, we can shut the place down without setting off the alarms.

Next step... Two time locks. You need keycards to get past each. Guards won't have 'em - but the civvie researchers probably will. Find and, y'know, persuade them. They'll give up their keycards soon enough.
Ah crap! There's the time lock. Forget the keycards. Force through those panels.
Now, see those lights? That's your path across. Stay on the path! Step on the wrong tile, and this gets messy fast.
You made it! It's right there! Grab the diamond!
You're through. Look at it. It's beautiful. Now grab it.
I can't believe we actually got the Diamond.
OK, the gas is gone. Get back in there!
Gas is cleared. Get back in there.
That's survellance dealt with. You don't need to stress over the cameras anymore.
Surveillance is blind. Cameras are out of action. Should make things easier.
The path will reset after a predefined time window. You can always create a new one. Just make sure you're not standing there when it resets,
Will you look at that. Hold up! Those floor tiles. They're pressure sensitive, so stay off 'em. Hack the circuit box by the door - that'll make a safe path across.
Will you look at this place. Not your usual vault, huh?
Man, I loved coming here as a kid. Made me feel like an adventurer, y'know.
Time locks can be taken down with keycards. Civilians have the keycards. You see where this is leading?
Always thought being a night-guard at a museum would be a great job. But, you know, the whole stealing thing...
We came, we saw... We robbed a whole bunch of old Roman shit.
Crazy to think this stuff came from the time of the Caesar's.
Genghis Khan. Carved an Empire from Korea to Bulgaria. Great warrior. Would have loved him on the crew.
This place gives me the heebie-jeebies.
This place looks like it hasn't been decorated since the 60's.
Looks like the curator's basement office.
OK, Bile is racing your way now!
The chopper is fully loaded. Wait for it to come back.
That was the wrong tile!
It's hacked. Good. Find another.
Here it is. McKendrick museum. Home of a priceless diamond. Let's do this.
There it is. The McKendrick museum. Somewhere in there is a priceless diamond. Let's get it.
I... don't know where we are...
Let's find a way into the prison.
Sniper? It... landed on sniper.
Flames?
Flames, that means the flamethrower again!
Smoke incoming guys!
It stopped on drills. Move away!
Question marks? What could that be?
Don't let the cops stop the timer!
They interrupted the timer! Restart it!
Restart the timer! They stopped it.
When the reboot has ticked down it should restart.
Timer has finished. Get the keycard.
The keycard you got should get us access to the prison, use it on the card reader by the door.
Great, let's keep going.
You guys got a keycard, right?
Pull the switch and see what happens
What's taking so long? Just activate that switch
Go by the panel and pull that goddamn switch
I'm sure I don't have to explain what you need to do.
You know your way around this prison, you know what to do.
See that timer over there? Hurry up if you wanna secure the loot!
Get together in a group, guys!
You're done - get together everyone!
Stick together team.
There's a zipline leading to a train up on the bridge. Zip through the sky!
Use the zipline up to the bridge! The train is the only way out!
What's that, extra loot? You sure you wanna do that?
You sure you wanna be greedy now?
Busting up this motel is our first step to getting Hoxton free. Head in there.
That's about half of 'em.
Those motel rooms look like good candidates for a little wrecking. Get in there and get your rockstar on. Smash the TV's, lamps - anything you can find.
A meth factory! Burn that place up. Or, if you can find a formula, get cooking. Can always move a little extra product.
Hey, I think that gas station is on our friend's books. There's C4 in the DeLorean. Fetch it. Time to go big.
Now plant that C4 on the gas pumps. We'll light a fire they'll see in Moscow...
Yeah! Treat it like it's Keith Moon's birthday.
Keep breaking things, gang.
Some men just want to watch the wheels burn.
Commissar's men don't look like the kind of guys to have fire insurance.
Shame to see such fine wheels go up in smoke. But if it gets the Commissar's attention...
You need to cause damage to get the Commissar to call us. Smash rooms, burn cars, kill his thugs - that should get his attention.
You got his attention. But I need longer to establish the trace. Somewhere in DC. Narrowing it down. Keep working.
Gotcha! Our guy is somewhere in, hang on...
He's in West End!
Got it. Georgetown!
Look for something connected to that place.
That's a second hatch, guys. The Commissar must have something sweet.
You remember that metal hatch you discovered? Secrets worth knowing are often well protected. I've been thinking about how we can get through. Bile is en-route. He'll drop something for you.
I've an idea to pop that hatch you saw earlier. Bile's on his way with a little something for you. Hopefully something down there will lead us to the Commissar.
Happy birthday, clowns. Here's your present.
You sure remember how to hotwire an engine. Start it up!
Is it working? Nice. But damn, that hatch is strong.
Three minutes to go!
Almost open!
About halfway open now!
Make sure the cops don't do that again. Keep it running!
Georgetown. Search through the files, the maps on the wall - anything that can pinpoint his exact location. Remember: it's Georgetown.
We know he is in West End somewhere. Look around for anything related to it. Files, maps. Remember: West End.
The call came from Foggy Bottom. Find something that will pinpoint the Commissar. Remember - Foggy Bottom.
Shaw! That's where he is. But we need to narrow it down to a precise address. Look for maps or files related to Shaw.
I'm sure a lot of nefarious shit goes down at that motel. Take a look around. See what you can find.
The Russians stash their loot here? Nice bonus! Toss it in the DeLorean.
Drill's done its work. Get in that basement!
Running the barcode now. Shouldn't take long to get an address.
Checking the barcode now. Keep the cops off it.
SWAT raining down from street level. Watch your heads!
Police breaching their way down. Heads up!
That pilot's had enough. Yeah, back to base, asshole.
Gunship's firing! Move! Move!
Let me remind you - you need to be wiping out the mobsters. Search the motel.
More mobsters on the way! Watch out for the vans.
The Commissar sent his little chickens. Give 'em a warm welcome.
Hearing police signals. Someone must've called 'em. Stay alert.
Cop switchboard just lit up. Expect company, gang.
There's a good amount of tasty loot down here. Hustle out as much as you can.
Some C4 on that gas station should send a message. Get to it.
Don't forget to send that gas station to hell, gang. C4, pumps... You know.
The gas station is a nice little earner in this economy. So blast it. C4 on the pumps.
Damn! I felt that all the way over here.
Now just connect it to the hatch.
Now head to the hatch and hook up the cable.
With all of these crates, there has to be a crowbar around here somewhere.
We need to put the Commissar in a wooden box. Not stay in one ourselves. Move!
The Commissar! Get him!
Thats him! Dont let him escape!
He's taken the elevator! Get up there after him. Do not let him escape.
He's headed up in the elevator! Chase him! He escapes, the Dentist will be pissed.
Almost there, guys. Keep going.
Where is he?!
That crafty bastard! He's using his vault as a panic room. Let me drop you a thermal drill.
He's locked himself in his vault, the crazy Ivan! Break it open. I'm sending you a thermal drill.
The drill is in the area. Pilot said "through a skylight". Find it!
A little hot in there, but you did good.
That's the fires dealt with.
Fires' are under control. Now, back to the job.
The vault is open. Get in there. Finish him. The Dentist is watching.
Caught 'em! Now, Commissar is around here somewhere.
Our inside man provided you a handful explosives. Grab it and knock on that door.

The good news: Commissar has a HUGE stash of coke up in his penthouse. The bad news: he's flushing it as fast as he can. That's a lot of money swirling down the crapper - the faster you get there, the bigger the bonus!
Guys, remember! The sooner you get up there, the more cocaine we can grab.
They flushed more coke. Guys, you got to hurry if you want to make a big score.
I can't believe that Russian asshole is destroying that product. Get at it before it's all gone!
Damn, more coke flushed. Thousands of dollars swirling away with the turds. Hurry!
Powder's flying like it's a goddamn bakery in there - if you want in, you'd better book it!
Keep pushing forward! This is a time limited offer if there ever was one!
Aw, this is gonna give me an ulcer, seeing all this coke being flushed and you guys straggling!
Do I need to remind you? Cocaine, worth a fortune, is being destroyed as we speak!
Get up there and stop them, for crying out loud! This is a tragedy!
I don't know what's taking you guys so long, but that coke is NOT waiting around for you.
You know that coke is worth a lot, right? Right!? Hurry hurry hurry!
OK, whatever... There's still another way to win: Find and kill the Commissar! I bet you're motivated now!
You guys waiting for a pizza? Come on, get a move on.
Hot damn! Commissar, you dirty old Bertie.
Dunno what that guy did to piss off the Commissar, but it must have been bad.
Mount a drill on that gate and get it open!
That should be a quick fix! Get a drill on that gate, gang.
This door's locked with some kinda magnatic mechanism. Find a way to open it!
Check out all of Commissar's blood money. Ah well, someone has to enjoy it. Get it to the chopper, if you can.
Alright people, this is a pretty sweet opportunity, All sorts of mid-ranged diamonds and the like in the display cases. Do your worst, make your bones, get on out. A classic knockover.
Nice job snatching all those gems guys. I'll called ahead to my diplomatic contacts - they are hungry for this. Let's feed 'em.
OK, time for a jewelry hit. We need at least three bags. That should be fairly easy.
Give 'em the authorization, gang.
Show 'em, gang
Locke wants us to blow that door. Better drop the charges off there.
There should be a security room close by. Use the arc welder to cut through and green llight the airlock.
Find the shaft and zipline those bags up to Locke ASAP.
Locke wants us to sabotage the radars. Better get to it.
Great job, crew. Locke's already wired our cut. Still not sure about this guy, but maybe we can trust him.
You heard Locke, crew - into the cargo hold!
Hustle it, guys. You need to get on the ground near the money.
Gang, don't forget - you need to light a flare before Locke will come in.
Crew, remember - Locke needs you to light that flare.
Make sure those straps are nicely fastened. Don't want Locke dropping the loot too early now.
Get into the boat, gang! We're almost done here!
Hope you're okay up there, crew. Here's Locke.
OK, time for a smash and grab.
Hit the display cases.
Get those bags to the car.
Halfway mark, people. Hurry it up!
There's ten seconds to get to the van so get to the van now.
Ten seconds.
Someone got away.
Wheelman is moving. ETA: One minute.
Now things get interesting...
OK, that's it. Get it to the escape van... Vlad will be pleased.
Jackpot! Let's get it out. But if you wanna be greedy and stick around, I won't judge you.
We're on the clock, people!
Your escape van just left...
We weren't fast enough here, the getaway just left.
Sorry fellas, too slow - the getaway just left along with your freedom, look me up when you get out.
Guys find that tiara and find it quick.
All right. Safeties off. Get down there!
Guess the vault is gonna be in a Murky shipping container. Get opening them.
Vlad wants a word...
You need to find crowbars. They are most likely in the warehouse. Jam them into the vault fans. The heat builds inside, and... voila!
All right. That's the first. Heat is building. Disabling more fans will speed this up.
Okay, great. The temperature is climbing. Wait it out, but jamming more fans will speed it up.
Nice. It's getting hotter. What the hell is in there?
Last fan disabled. Temperature is off the hook. The contents must be scorching!
I... uh... okay. So we're boosting nuclear warheads. Guys, be very, very gentle with those things.
Vlad, are you crazy! Nukes!?
Those forklifts will be useful for moving the warheads.
That train is some distance away. I don't want you handling those nukes for long. See if you can find a car.
We got the armor from here when we did it quiet, you recall?
We're done. Now bail! Leave Vlad with his nukes.
Lot of activity. Stay frosty.
That's the depot. You know what you need to do, but keep it quiet. If the alarm goes, I'll have to pull you out.
A nice stash of used dinars. Good find.
I hope they weren't giving this marching powder to our boys.
This coke won't be funding any more terrorism. Just good old American crime.
Columbian. Bolivian. Mexican. Wherever it's from, it's ours now.
Rifles, pistols and bullets. This will make Gage happy.
The vault needs two cards, entered almost simultaneously. You can bet there's something particularly tasty in there.
Those Murkywater containers are brought direct from the world's hotspots. Crack them open. They'll be your best bet for loot.
The driver's gonna bail! Make sure you're with him.
Uh, hold on...no flight plans submitted. Who are these guys?
A good start.
Almost there. One more bag.
You're nearly done. Only one bag to go.
That's the armor of Oda Nabunaga. Bag the pieces. If that's genuine...
I can't believe we scored Oda's armor. Outstanding work!
That's all four pieces of the Shogun's armor. This is an outstanding night's work.
Gage's guy is in a nearby parking lot. Throw the loot over the wall to him.
Expertly done, gang. You guys are like shadows.
That was text-book whisper mode, guys. Great work.
Not pretty. Not a great achievement. But any day you walk away from is a payday.
You did the job, but with none of the finesse I hoped for. Roll home, gang.
As long as those anti-air defenses are functional, Fedor won't be able to drop the EMP. Find a way to disable them, gang.
Set up the laptop to the anti-aircraft gun. Maybe I can work my magic.
The AA gun has been disabled! Now, grab the laptop and head over to the next one!
Man, these mercenaries have set up for war. There should be some explosives laying around that we could use.
You know what to do. Set the C4 up and let it take care of the rest.
Place the C4.
Stand back, gang!
They are about to blow, stand back!
Damn, the EMP crashed right through the roof of the lumber mill.
God dammit, Bile... The EMP fell through the roof and is now inside the lumber mill instead of outside.
Nice drop, Bile! Gang, the EMP is in the yard outside the lumber mill.
Okay, gang. We need to charge this baby up before it can be used. Gonna take a little while.
Okay, we need to charge the EMP before can we use it.Patience is a virtue.
The mercenaries are gonna come at you hard! Protect the EMP, gang!
Guys, listen! When the EMP goes off I most likely won't be able to communicate with you for a while. You need to get down to the hidden laboratory via the hatch.
The EMP should have released the magnetic lock. Once you're down there, find the scanner and the test-subjects.
The EMP is almost done, so listen up! This baby is powerful so don't be surprised if it breaks our communication among other things.
But just stick to the plan and we should be good. Get inside the laboratory through the hatch and find the scanner and the test-subjects.
The EMP took care of the magnetic lock, so you have free passage to the laboratory.Let's go!
Guys, can you hear me? Hello? Enter the laboratory via the hatch. It should be open.
You need to find a way to shut off the gas.
Guys, look for a way to shut off the gas!
There must be some way to shut off the gas!
Gang, you need to find the lead scientist.
It seems to have worked. You should be able to start the scanning-process now.
Looks like the power is coming back.
Alright, gang. You need to look for the test-subjects and get them to the scanner. They are supposed to look pretty much the same.
That must be one of the test subjects that Jimmy talked about. Get the body to the scanner so we can get the information we need.
Body is in place so start scanning, gang.
That's it. Now we can start the scanning.
Don't let the mercenaries stop the scanning process!
They stopped the scan! Start it again!
Damn, they interrupted the scan! Restart it!
Guys, the bastards stopped the scan! Get it working again!
Okay, good. You got the power back. Return to the scanning process.
The data from the scanning is being collected on that server in the other room. You can stay and get more data, or you can leave. But I'm sure Jimmy would pay us for the trouble.
Excellent decision, guys. If you scan all the bodies Jimmy will pay us good for it. Money doesn't seem to a an issue for him.
That's all of them! No more bodies to scan. Now we need to get the server or we did it all for nothin'.
Excellent, gang. That's all the bodies scanned. Now we need to get our hands on that server storing the data.
Excellent, the server is secured. Now, let's get out of here.
Damn! I forgot about the briefcase. Gang, listen up. There is a briefcase somewhere in the laboratory.
I need you to find and it and bring it with you. I wouldn't ask if it wasn't important.
You got it? The briefcase? Good! Now let's get out of there.
How did you know I wanted that briefcase? It doesn't matter, good job!
We got everything we came for. Now, head for the lake. Fedor is waiting for you.
Great, the server has been secured. Now Jimmy can shut up about it. We did our part.
What are you waiting for? Let's leave.
Alright, that's the radar controlling the anti-air gun. Blow it to hell.
That radar is controlling the anti-air gun. Need to blow it up.
Seems that radar is controlling the anti-air gun. You need to blow it up.
Guys, search the spot where you landed. Bile has dropped some explosives for you.
Good, you found the explosives. Head over to the radar and blow it up.
Gang, you still need to blow up that radar.
The radar needs to be taken down ASAP. Maybe you could redirect the anti-air gun and blow it up?
Bring those missiles over to the radar!
Those missiles will do the work. Get them over to the radar!
Hell yeah. Those missiles are perfect. Take them to the radar.
Get the missiles close to the radar and activate them. Things are about to go BOOM.
Great job, gang. Bile is on his way with the EMP now and will drop it close to the lumber mill.
Excellent, gang. With the anti-air defenses gone, Bile can now drop the EMP close to the lumber mill.
The EMP will do two things: It will get us a way in to the hidden lab. But more importantly: It will knock out whoever they are doing tests on, from what I heard fighting them is not an option.
We can not leave without that briefcase!
What the hell happened to this guy?! Whatever, we need this guys hand.

Of all the times to grow a conscience, you decide now is the time? I can't say I like it, but I can't say you are making a mistake either. Based on what this Jimmy character is telling us, Akan really needs to be stopped. Your destination is a lumber mill in the middle of nowhere, that is secretly a laboratory run by a strange Russian organization. Jimmy tells me they are conducting some experiments that involve things out of this reality. Break into the lab and get the data Akan is after. Good luck, gang.
Damn! They have anti-air defenses set up around the whole factory. Turn the plane around, Bile! Gang, you need to use the parachutes and get out! Right now!
Anti-air defenses?! Are you shitting me?! Turn the plane around, Bile! Do it now! Guys, take the parachutes and jump out!
That's it guys. Vlad's going to get his message through. Let's cash in.
OK done. Let's see what the crazy Russian got in store for us next.
OK that was severe OVERKILL. Vlad will eat this up. This will really work for him.
OK, the mall's up ahead. Get in, hit it with everything you got, and get out. Try to keep people to a minimum. This is strictly material, not personnel damage. This means you, Wolf.
Look for storage closets, they might have stuff in them.
10 grand.
10 grand dollars worth.
You're at 20 thousand! Keep on going!
Two-Five-Zero-Zero-Zero, half way! Keep going!
35k guys.
That's it! Now they know not to mess with Vlad.
You can stay and trash if you want, but the escape's coming soon!
The van got trashed by the cops!
Wait guys, I've got a chopper inbound.
He'll be there soon!
The limo has arrived. Taxman is here.
Okay guys, at the right moment, disrupt the deal. Then Alex lifts the limo outta there. Ready now!
Gang, we need to do this right; both the Taxman and the server is needed, otherwise it all goes to shit. Make sure he has the server on him.
There he is; the one in the white shirt is the Taxman.
Attention gang, the corporation representative is close.
The customer is just blocks away now, two minutes!
Standby gang, the customer should be there in two minutes.
Two of them, there's two guys.
I'm eavesdropping now, letting you know what they say.
That's four guys.
I see four guys.
Okay, keep an eye on what's happening. We want to actually see the server.
He's approaching the trunk and...
He's getting something from the trunk.
He put something inside his shirt.
Alright, he has the server on him. 25 million dollars can be ours. 25 million! And that server he just picked up is the key!
Yes, that's the server! 25 million dollars gang! Now we need to get our hands on that server and get the codes.
Don't shoot the Taxman now, shoot close and get him to jump into the limo.
Remember! Don't actually shoot the Taxman, just force him to take cover in the limo. Suppressive fire.
Give the Taxman a scare so he jumps into the limo, but don't actually hit him!
WHAT! Guys get your heads down.
God dammit! Down, guys!
What the hell! Get down!
I see nine of them.
We are made. Action, guys!
We're compromised! Action guys!
Damn, they have seen us! Action guys!
Alex, get a grip!
Come on, Alex, get a grip!
Alex, ready for the lift.
Alright take him out. Alex get the crane in there.
Guys! That's too early, what if the server isn't there?
Alright, get him into the chair.
SWAT's are in the building, coming from the right staircase.
SWATS are all over the building - they're everywhere.
SWATS have stormed the building - watch yourselves.
SWATS are incoming from the left staircase, ground floor.
They're climbing up on the balcony straight from the front.
Watch the balcony from the front - they're climbing up.
They are are climbing up the balcony from the front.
Check the vents!
Check the vents, guys!
OK, to the roof now!
Up to the roof now!
What is taking so long? Move closer guys!
Hurry up gang! Get to the limo!
Damn, it's stuck. Try shooting at the wires.
No time to waste, shoot the wires and let it drop.
I don't like that sound guys. Work fast!
Guys it fell short. It's on the balcony. Let's go!
It landed on the balcony, go, go, go!
I should not have hired you, Alex....
It's on fire! get him outta there!
The limo is on fire! Get him out!
Get Taxman and the server out of the front seat, then get to the transfer room on floor three.
Get Taxman and the server out of the front seat, then get to the transfer room on the ground floor.
You could argue we are the good guys in this scenario, right?
Look at us interupting a dirty deal between the IRS and some big corporation: we are like Robin Hood!
Great it's open! Get Taxman outta there.
We need the server, don't forget it!
The server's not on him.
He doesn't have the server on him.
It's on the roof!
OK, hook up the server and let's go.
Guys you got a transfer locally, and it needs to happen now.
We need three administrator passwords.
Okay, take it back a little, we don't want to kill him.
Watch the neck!
Is he dead... guys?
We're after his codes and the server. Make sure we go gentle on him. We can't loose him!
Nope, that's not enough. Get him talking again!
That's the password, Starbreezer
Good work, i'm right on it.
The cops cut the power. We need to get it back on.
Damn cops cut the power! Find a way to get it back on!
Power is out again, get it back up.
Get the power plugged in. Keep that running.
Nice! Now set the computer back on.
Alright, restart the computer and we'll be back online again.
Good work. Resuming.
We are back on.
God job, I'm back in.
Great! We got contact again.
Alright, we're past the ASIM. They won't know what hit em.
OK guys, the authentication is almost complete. Keep an eye on that timer.
Guys, I got a callback from the accounting name, When that timer hits zero - we are clear for the transaction.
Yes! Money, money, money, money - money!
That's it! Time to cash in, baby!
Fantastic! I confirmed the transaction of 25 million.
Excellent! I just got a confirmation on a 25 million dollar transaction.
Here we go. Tax money put to good use.
That's it, time to get the hell outta here.
We're done, let's move and get out!
Get up on the roof and run over to the connecting rooftop.
Hit the roof and run over to the connecting rooftop.
Keep going guys!
Let's go, let's go!
You gotta make the jump, guys!
Yeah, you gotta be a Persian prince to make this jump!

The Taxman thought he was clever making a deal with a big corporation, but the information leaked, and now bigger sharks want in - all in. We have a complete, run-down building to ourselves, overlooking the deal. We've got a set-up installed. Alex will help with the crane. Scare the Taxman into his limo, shake him up, and he'll be sure to give us the server and the codes. When it's about $25,000,000, anything goes.
