Okay gang, pack your things and head for Washington D.C. We're going after a gentleman by the name of Sturr. Mr Sturr is a sneaky IRS employee looking to make a lot of money by striking a deal with some dirty big-ass corporation, but I say we could put that money to better use. Let's do it.
We're gonna break up a dirty deal between a Taxman and some big corporation and make a lot of cash doing it.
That's them! They were here just like Wick said. Tie them up and leave them by the van. Wick will take care of the scum when we get back.
That's them all right. Just seeing them makes my blood boil. Tie them up and leave them by the van. They're coming with us when we leave. Wick was very specific about this.
You killed one of them? Damn, I can't say the prick didn't deserve it, but Wick wanted the pleasure himself.
You couldn't stop yourself, could you? Well, the world's a better place without that bastard, but Wick will be disappointed he wasn't part of it, so you better leave the other one for him.
No! Dammit, gang... Wick wanted to take care of them himself. He really had it in for these bastards. I guess he will have to be content with the idea of them dead.

Dammit! Why did you do that? You were supposed to bring them to Wick, not kill them yourselves... I'm not sure how he'll react to this. This is the only thing he's been talking about since he saw that disgusting video...
They're getting away from the van. Wick will be pissed if you don't bring them back to the safe house!
You've got to free Vlad's brother-in-law first!
You need to wake Santa up. Hit him!
Whack Santa so he wakes up!
It's in the Jewelry store.
Ok gang, you need to hack the console.
Hack the console to open the display cabinet.
You need to get to the toy store and find the Tin Boy toy box with the coke.
Someone bought the last Tin Boy. Go search all toy store bags you can find in the mall!
Go find who bought the Tin Boy! There should be a bag from the toy store.
Someone just bought the toy and walked off with Vlad's stuff. You need to get it back!
Ok, steal the Tin Boy!
You've got to steal that toy!
Search in the piles and find Tin Boy!
Search around for the Tin Boy toy!
Check the store inventory and find those shoes!
Check the computer. Got to find the shoes!
Drill the door to the storage room.
Get that storage room door open.
We need to get into the storage room.
Get those shoes!
You've got to open the storage cage!
Open the storage cage to get the shoes!
The shoes should be in the storage cage. Open it!
Go to the tech store and find the VR headset. There coke should be there.
Open the safe and check inside!
Empty the safe!
You have to find that wine in the wine store!
Make sure you find the right wine!
Find the right wine now!
Helicopter will be here in one minute.
Alright you got it, now put it in the tree.
Nice job! Now hide the package in the christmas tree.
Vlad wants the Christmas tree. Bile is on his way now!
Get away from there! The C4's gonna blow!
Take cover guys! It's gonna blow!
Get that wire attached to the Christmas tree!
Attach the wire!
Attach the frame to the tree!
Get that frame attached to the Christmas tree!
Attach the frame!
If you got any more loot, secure it in the tree now! Or it'll be left behind!
You've got to save Santa by getting him into the tree before it's flown out!
Wait for Santa to get into the tree!
Just hold on until Santa gets into the tree!
Uh, okay....
Okay. This is unexpected, but we still have a job to do.
We need to add ephedrine tablets to start the cooking process. Find some and add it into the mixer.
Come on, my little Igors - get the tablets in the mixer.
Ingredients are almost with you, crew.
Okay, there's the ingredients. Going to need a little extra in there, though. More than one bag.
Ingredients have arrived. Going to take more than one load though. Keep throwing them in.
All right, there's the ingredients. But this is going to take more than a single load. Keep throwing it in.
Yes. It's working. Just need more in there. Keep loading.
The meth's set, but we can't get it out like that. Break it down. Smash it, shoot it, blast it - just break it down!
The meth needs breaking up into little pieces. Get angry on it, gang!
Add more tablets to continue the cooking. Or signal the helicopter to escape - your call.
All right. Now you can keep cooking, or signal the chopper and end this caper.
That's it. Now wait for the pilot to signal in.
Well, in the annals of criminal cock-ups, that ranks high. I can hear the cops laughing from here. Better luck next time.
Bubble, bubble, toil and trouble. Mostly toil and trouble. Especially trouble.
You didn't get anything out?
I want to hear a cry of fear from those cops!
One, two, cops are coming for you...
It's alive! Alive!
It's cooking. What music it makes!
Halloween treat, guys. Headed back to the cabin in the woods.
Here to cook a little meth. Just like we did last summer.
Alright guys, Vlad gave us a tip. We're gonna rob a nightclub.
Vlad says the club profits are all in a safe somewhere in the office.
Enter the club and scout around for the office.
Alright guys, there's the office, overlooking the club.
Try to find a way up there.
Keep them in check. No escapes!
Yes, that's the stuff! There we go.
The van will be in an alley nearby.
The man with the van is coming soon.
Escape is here in a minute!
The van is gonna be here soon!
Go go go! Run!
The medic bag is in the bathroom.
That was a hell of a bar brawl. And now Vlad's probably on top, cagey old Russian. Let's go get you that payday.
Not a cop in the world saw this one coming. Russians will be furious and Vlad will OD on vodka. Let's get paid.
I'm sure Vlad wanted some more blood but this was clean and mean. The Russians will know they got hit by pros. See you back at the safe house.
Cool, now that entrance's blocked off for a while.
OK, it's an early night. The bouncer looks unusually bright for a bouncer - see if you can get past him or if he needs convincing.
I don't want you hanging around that club for too long. I don't trust this to be as easy as Vlad says. Hit the managers safe and get the hell out. If you get any phone numbers, I don't want to know.
Security door. Huh... Someone must have a key.
As soon as you get the cash, I'm signalling the pick-up guy to come drive by.
Keep a look out for six cameras.
You got nine cameras to take care of.
You're falling fast!
Guys, they're still shooting. Be...
Hang in there guys, you're almost there!
Use a crowbar on that hatch to get to the roof.
Bring the cooler!
The elevator is burning. Stay away from the doors!
There's a hatch on the floor.
Guys, I can't read you. If you're still in there, GET OUT!
Great, now down the ramp and get outside.
Sorry guys, Bile had to leave you for dead...
Whoa. Close one guys. How you feeling?
Wow. That was a helluva thing. You all right? No missing limbs?
Seven.
Ok, that takes care of the cameras.
Great, all cameras are dead.
Don't let any of the hostages run off and trigger the alarm, got it?
Don't let any hostage run off and trigger the alarm!
There goes the alarm. Guess we gotta do this the hard way.
Crap, someone got to the alarm. Alright, time for plan B.
No killing hostages, guys! You'll attract too much attention.
How about next time we do it the quiet way?
Pick up the phone and put me through.
Guys, answer the phone!
Pick up the phone, quickly!
Uhm, hello?
Hello, B-uhm... nurse Bain speaking. What do you need?
Really? Ok, we'll be here.
They sounded convinced. We're in the clear for now.
Gotta speed it up guys.
Don't know if I can bluff them again, so let's get this done.
Close one guys, better not take too long.
Guys, you got guards coming. Take them out before they find anything.
There's someone in the elevator, keep a lookout.
There's a repair man coming to check the cameras.
You gotta find the patient file, guys.
It's around there somewhere, check them all if you have to.
Hurry up guys! Get this done fast.
You're taking forever guys...
Keep looking, keep looking...
Find the file for a "Mr A. Petersson".
He's got some serious condition... and we need his blood.
I know you don't like it guys, but it's a huge payday, and that extra bonus item I need to get my hands on. It's worth not asking too many questions.
Whoa, that didn't take long!
Ah, great. Now let's have a look.
It's always in the last place you look, right guys?
OK, gotta find a way to make sure none of the hostages does anything stupid. Set up the fake sentry guns.
There you go, nice work. Time for a change of threads. You're gonna need scrubs.
Don't forget- stay in character.
Good, that's a security door stopped. See if our patient is inside.
Door to the ICU is open, get in there and find that patient.
If that's the wrong room, we'll have to cut the other doors with a saw. We gotta get that blood sample...
Crack them open one at a time, and watch out for cops.
You'll know if it's the right guy, 'cause he has a tattoo on his neck.
Great, that's the guy. Start getting blood samples. We gotta validate them before you leave.
Ok, now get a blood sample from the target.
There you go, that's him. Start drawing some blood.
Wrong guy, keep looking!
That's not our guy.
That sample didn't cut it. You'll have to get another one, guys.
Still not enough, you need to take another sample.
Vials break when they hit the floor, you know...
Stay on your feet guys. Getting downed will probably break the vials!
You need two samples. Go get 'em.
You afraid of needles or something? Stick him!
Get that blood, guys.
Call the elevator.
Maybe... two minutes. IF I don't get interrupted.
Crap guys, the backwater radio chatter is heating up like a mother. Someone is VERY interested in what we're doing. Be ready for major trouble.
They must have cut the main power, you need to get it back up ASAP!
Bastards cut the power. You gotta get it back.
Elevator aint' going nowhere until you get the power back on.
C'mon guys, get that juice flowing again.
Great, nicely done. Now keep moving.
They cut the power again, get it back!
There you go. Wait... now I'm getting something about air support? What the hell...
You gotta get more blood into that cooler, guys.
We're contracted for two samples, so get another one in there!
We can leave one you've got two samples in the cooler.
This is crazy, the hospital is surrounded. Looks like private military... mercenaries. You gotta go... NOW.
Get to the roof and I'll send the chopper to pick you up!
You guys forget how an elevator works? Push the button!
Activate the elevator!
Come on guys, express elevator... going up as soon as you push the button.
That's strange... merc units are pulling out.
Guys, we're after the counterfeit money plates. Supposed to be stashed in the basement. Get friendly with Mitchell and get them.
Get in there. Meet up with Mitchell.
Ok, find Mitchell. He's our guy.
All right. Try and keep out of sight. It's all about control.
Someone must've seen something 'cause the police are sending a couple of officers to check out the address.
Someone must've got suspicious. Cops are on their way to check things out.
That's the door, and there's the code lock. See if you can override the system.
Hook the code breakers up, gang. Two locks - get 'em both.
OK, no time to lose. Start the codebreaker!
Now do the same to the second code lock.
Good work, but these guys are clever. The doors are linked so no one can enter the shelter unless the other one is in on it. You need to override Wilson's system too.
All right. Good. But the door's got two locks - one for Mitchell, one for Wilson. You'll need a codebreaker on the second lock.
Ok, make sure the codebreaker doesn't stall, they got a pretty secure system here. Guess you just can't be too careful these days
The code breakers are pretty old. Prone to crashing. Don't go too far from them.
Ok, the cops are here to investigate. If you let them inside the house and take 'em out quietly, we'll remain under the radar.
Okay, here comes the cops to investigate. They're just checking things out, so if you can deal with 'em quietly...
Keep going guys - no one's seen you yet.
The cops seem to think you're still in the house, we got a small time window now!
Well done, still calm and no alarms.
That's gotta be the cops calling, checking things out.
All right. Damn. Look, just pick up the phone. Let's wing this.
They have called in another car. Take care of it.
They're inside, take them out quietly
Who fired? You guys are made now. Go to plan B!
Their neighborhood surely heard that gunshot!
The neighbourhood watch surely heard that!
Stay on the lot, guys. We want to keep this quiet.
Don't let them run off!
One of the civilians is making a run for it!
I've got a few 911's here. People've seen you, prepare for action!
Okay, cop switchboard lit up. Think someone must've caught sight of you. Get ready!
Alright, you got far without getting detected, but it's over now. The cops are reported missing and they're sending in a SWAT team. The party just got started.
You guys are made now, go to plan B!
Damn! That's it for stealth - time for action. Get ready for company!
Wow, the police are calling for heavy reinforcement. They'll be here any moment!
Gang, get to the shelter - hustle!
Ok guys, get the gates open. Find a crowbar or something.
Don't forget the crowbar, team!
You need a crowbar for this, guys.
Crowbar would be great for this.
Ok, behind that door is the loot.
Through this door we should get to the money plates.

Apparently that's a Franz Jaeger Safe. That lock cannot be drilled, and the entire safe is heavily reinforced. I ran into one of those back in the days. We filled the safe with water and detonated a bit of C4 inside. The water pressure just threw the door open without damaging any of the content inside the safe.
Alright, here's what you do. Get a drill onto the safe. Make a hole in it. Then, we need to fill it with water. Drag the garden hose down.
Get drilling the safe, crew.
Let me remind you - drill the safe!
Almost there guys, just wait for the drill to finish!
Drill is almost done.
Great! Start dragging that garden hose!
Find the water hose. Bring it to the safe!
Go lay down the water hose, move it!
You need to drag the water hose down into the shelter.
Get the water hose laid out all the way down to the safe.
Go lay down the water hose, move it!
Come on, get that hose down to the safe, clowns!
Fill her up good, guys!
Alright, the hose is laid out.
The hose is laid out, good job.
Get the water hose and connect it to the safe!
Now just get that last piece connected to the safe.
Get the water running!
Time to put the water hose to use, turn it on!
Turn the water on!
Now let the water flow!
The cops closed the valve, get it open!
The cops turned of the water. Get the main valve turned on, it's in the street!
Get that valve open!
That's the valve. Open it!
Turn the water back on!
SWAT moving in from Keel Street, to the north!
SWATS are driving in over the hills, from the south east.
SWATS are coming in from the south, by the beach!
SWATS riding up by the beach!
SWATS are driving in from the west, on Pacific Drive.
We got cops moving in from the west. Watch em!
They've rigged the place with C4!
It's gonna blow! Get out!
It's a trap! Out!
Jesus...christ.....
You guys there?!
Are you alive?!
Too late!
Heads down!
That was not a bomb shelter either, just concrete and plaster walls, C4 I must say was a bit.. overkill.
That's a great bonus you got there!
Check out those money stacks, must be a good print. Worth a fortune on the streets.
At least we got the cash before it blew!
Our money's still burning. That's sad sad sad...
We blew the money.
I can see the plume from here, what is that? Is it snow?!
Ok, drop the dynamite in the safe and blow it, the water will do the trick!
Plant the charge on the safe.
Now that's hydropool euphoria. Get the loot!
You got it. Now get it out - safely!
That's it! Now get it out and we can close this caper!
You see that sweet money printer under the pool? I'm sure we can use it to gain an extra mountain of cash! Get it working.
Hey, you know...there's a printer there. Why don't we make a little extra spending cash while we're here.
Guys, check out the printing press. Whaddya say we make a little extra cash while we're here...literally make it!
Okay, so we need paper and ink. Get them going in the press.
Guys, the printer is out of paper! Fill her up!
Dammit, the ink seems to have run out! Replace it!
Alright, good. That should do it for a while. Try starting her up again.
The cops shut you down. You gotta find the electricity box.
Cops cut the power, you gotta find the electricity box and turn it back on.
Ah, no - the cops cut the power. Find a circuit box inside the buildings and turn it back on.
Turn on the power again!
Ok, power's back - restart the printer!
Ok, the powers back on!
Awesome, it's printing away nice and steady again.
That's paper, that's ink - now just power it up and we're in the dollars.
Now grab that freshly minted cash. And if you feel like printing more, hey, I'm not going to stop you.
Glad you asked how we get the counterfeit money out of there. I'm dispatching our pilot.
All right, we're done here. The manhole leads down to the sewers. It's your way out!
Now let's finish this. Into the manhole, guys! Time for a sewer escape.
Just follow it all the way along. The poop pipe deposits into the Gulf.
Get to the ocean!
Top side is full of cops, make the escape now!
Just get beyond the gate. Get it open!
The Church of Scientology, how I can help you?
Steve's pet shop, how may I be of assistance?
Papa John's long stocking boutique, how can I help you?
Dragon's buffet, how can I help you?
This is the McKendrick Museum, how can I help you?
In this messed up world, fake money is still worth a lot. Great job!
They got cocky and they paid for it. Fake money is still money in the right hands.

Pack your bags, gang. This one is south of the Mason-Dixie. We're going after Mitchell and Wilson - couple of counterfeiters down in Pensacola. Running a printing operation out of his basement. It's a discreet operation, and this guy's work is solid, so he's making serious bank. Let's grab a piece!
Well, as Vlad said...the coke is in the goats, and the goats are...well, all over downtown. Track 'em down.
Vlad, you crazy...okay, guys. That's the deal. Sometimes it's nukes, sometimes it's goats. Get looking.
What noise does a goat make?
That should be all of them! Time to ride out. Get in the wheels and get out of there.
Gang, it's time to bug. Get in the car!
Haul the goats in the car. Just don't let 'em crap on the upholstery.
Gang, don't forget one of those goats is up in the apartment.
There's still a goat in the apartment building there.
The apartment has a sprinkler system, so there's got to be a valve somewhere.
These places are required to have sprinkler systems. Find the valve!
Great, those sprinklers will put out the fire.
Outstanding! Fire's dying down.
That's the fire dealt with. You guys are civil heroes!
How did the goat get up there? Whatever...look for the circuit box to stop the fan.
Sure there's gotta be a good reason that goat is up in the fan. Just find the circuit box. Stop the fan.
Hacking the circuit box will stop the fan.
That goat is carrying a live charge. Disable the power.
Goats are great conductors of electricity. Turn off the power.
Beware the goat! Guys, you need to disable the power first!
The goat is electrictrified! Turn off the power!
Nope, wrong one. Try another.
That didn't do it. Try a different one.
All right, nice. Now fetch the goat!
How did it even...?
I still can't figure out how.
There's another one! Caught in the scaffolding! Watch out! Looks like it's electrocuted! Disable the power!
There's still a goat in the scaffold.
Remember - there's a goat stuck in the scaffolds.
Looks like the goat managed to nibble through the power. Ladder's electrocuted. Disable the power!
The goat managed to electrify the ladder. Look for the power box to turn it off.
Don't touch the ladder! Disable the powerboxes!
Ladder's electrified. Disable it at the power box!
Check inside that store. Likely one of our goats wandered in. Drill it open!
I'm guessing a goat managed to get into the store. Drill the door!
Goats love shopping! Drill your way into the store.
Open for business! The business of finding goats!
Store is open! Find that goat!
We're in. Now get after that goat!
Guys, there's a goat stuck in the streetlight! Saw it down.
The cops are taking our goats! Get them back!
Take them out!
That gunfire will bring the cops. We can't let them get the goats.
That'll surely bring the feds. Gotta think of a way to get the goats out of here.
Let's hope he stays in the air this time. Hold the cops off.
Here's the cops. Get ready, crew!
There's gotta be boards around that barn. Use 'em to block the windows.
I'm sure you'll find something in that barn to close off the windows.
That barn must have something lying around you can nail across the windows.
You know what to do guys. Go out there, grab the cage parts and assemble it.
There's way too much heat here. I'll have my guys assemble the cage at the silo.
Cops have this locked down. We're going to assemble at the silo.
It's too damned heavy here. The guys will set up at the bridge.
When you're ready, raise the balloon and the pilot will swing by and collect.
We're ready. You seeing the balloon?
You heard him, gang. Just keep the heat off the goats.
Crew, you copy that? Pilot is inbound. Protect the goats.
Fantastic! Time to leave. Grab the car, crew!
Come on, crew. Don't fuck up now. Get the car, and hit the road!
Stay in the car, dammit!
The crafty cops have closed off the bridge. Go to the control room to turn it back.
Damn, the cops turned the bridge! Get into the control room there, and turn it back. You need to be on the other side!
Right. Okay. Bridge is turning back now. But it'll take a few minutes. Stay alive, gang!
Godammit! Cops halted the bridge. One of you - get in there, restart it!
Use the button in the control room to reset the bridge.
The control room manages the bridge. Use the buttons in there!
See that control room? That is where you can reset the bridge.
Bridge is back! Finally. Now, everyone - back in the car and bail!
You'll see the truck any second. Just drive up into it, and we're done!
Get into the house and see if you can find Hector's cooks.
What!? The Mendoza cartel is still there! Take care of them!
Here they come guys. Choppers and SWAT vans all over the place around you. Stay on your toes!
SWATs incoming from the lumber mill. Keep them away!
They are coming in from the lumber mill, watch out!
They are coming from the railway bridge! Watch out!
SWATs are incoming from the forest next to the road, be careful!
You kept them away. Good stuff! They aren't backing though, so get ready for more of them.
You need to add an ingredient, make sure you don't use the wrong thing. One wrong step and the lab will torch up like a christmas tree.
Remember to be careful! We can not use the wrong ingredient. You need to be careful!
You need to add the muriatic acid to keep the process going!
You need to add the hydrogen chloride to keep the process going!
Wow! Guys? Are you OK? I told you to be careful!
We can't use the lab anymore, it's gone. Take what you have and let's leave.
The process is done! Bag it up, and let's do another round.
Get the bags to the van to secure them. Don't let the cops run away with your hard earned meth!
Awesome! With all those bags, the trade should be smooth.
Good thinking! Use those boards to barricade more windows.
The gangsters should be waiting up ahead. Keep your fingers off the triggers unless you want this to get messy. Keep your eyes open for anything suspicious.
OK, time to give them the meth.
OK, grab the intel and move.
There's no time to waste. Get to the van!
Looks like we'll be doing this the hard way. Stay low and search those apartments for the info! Look for safes!
We can't go through with the trade without the meth. You'll have to scout the nearby apartments and take the information yourselves.
Watch out though. If you get caught, they'll likely try to destroy the intel.
Hurry, they might destroy the intelligence before you have time to reach it!
Feds or no feds, we need that intel! You'll have to search the apartments! Look for safes!
The convoy's stopped, move toward the bus.
Remember, we are after the rat, Head for the bus, keep your heads low and move from cover to cover.
That's the bus, take them all out.
Good job, the rat is dead, escape helicopter is waiting, unless you want to try to go for the money in that bus, get to the chopper and we'll get you the hell out of there.
Remember we will need at least four bags of meth.
Looks like Hector's cooks are dead. We have to make the meth ourselves!
We have to hurry! The cop's radio is buzzing like crazy. They're already on their way!
Here they come guys. Choppers and SWAT vans all over the place around you. Stay on your toes!
SWAT incoming from the lumber mill. Keep them away!
Incoming! From the lumber mill! Stay on your toes!
They are coming in from the lumber mill, watch out!
SWATs are incoming from the forest next to the road, be careful!
They are coming in from the forest next to the road! Keep them away!
You kept them away. Good stuff! They aren't backing though, so get ready for more of them.
You need to add an ingredient, make sure you don't use the wrong thing. One wrong step and the lab will torch up like a christmas tree.
Remember to be careful! We can not use the wrong ingredient. You need to be careful!
You need to add the muriatic acid to keep the process going!
You need to add the caustic soda to keep the process going!
Add caustic soda, to continue the process!
Ah, what!? Guys, you have to be careful with that stuff, I told you!
We can't use the lab any more, it's gone, take what you have and lets leave.
Good job. Four bags is good enough to go and do the trade.
No bags!? The trade will not be good to us. Hope you guys has some tricks up your sleeve for the trade.
Good thinking! Use those boards to barricade more windows.
That house is going up in flames. Let's get the product to Hector and get paid. I wonder how much he pays for the blue.
We came up a little short. Let's just play along and try to solve the Rat problem for Hector another way. We're inventive...
Straight ahead and to the right, you'll see an old two story house. Surprise, surprise, this is cook central.
The lab, if you can call an rundown dump like this a lab, is straight ahead. Get in and watch for Mendoza's soldiers.
Oh yeah, get the meth out before the FBI arrives - they've been tipped off, as if you weren't feeling lucky already.
Mendoza's people are on the scene doing the cook - get them clear and reclaim Hector's meth. You can leave right here when you have the stuff. Go for it.
Yeah. So we have our work cut out for us...
Now you need to go in blind and just take out the Mendozas on the way to the airport, OK? I'd say please but I don't say please.
The Mendozas are about to leave on a jet plane. We need to trade this product for info on them. These guys are scum, but you don't wanna mess with them.
Just try to keep it in your pants this once and do the trade quiet. OK? OK.
Let's just get it over with and hopefully without bloodshed. We have enough of that ahead of us.
Remember, we are after the rat, Head for the bus, keep your heads low and move from cover to cover.
There are Heavy FBI units all over the place, be careful.
The money is yours to take. If you have the codes you will be able to defuse the planted C4s.
I'm sending a chopper in for you guys to unload the loot. It's close by, shouldn't take too long. Stay tight.
Oh no! It exploded, watch out! Stay out of that fire!
Cops and SWATs have arrived, be careful!
Money and Mendozas up in flames. You made a statement and Hector's going to like it. Payday coming up.
The Mendoza BBQ was a roaring success. Time to see Hector.
That's a relief, you aced this one. Whatever bad rep we had with Hector is all good now. I feel relaxed enough to smoke a victory cigar, in fact.
Great score, folks. Let's see if Hector's going to throw us a party, shall we?
Crew, this is us ending Mendoza ops in DC right here and right now. Hit that bus hard and take their money. Hector just wants these clowns ended so the money is ours. Set down in 3, 2, 1, go!
There are only a few ingredients left. You want more, just use a flare to signal the helicopter. He's got what you need for cooking more. Or you can bug out now. Up to you.
OK, now wait for the pilot.
There're the ingredients. Grab 'em! Secure them in the house.
Alright. Don't burn the place down, guys.
Great. Let's cook a little more product. Just don't set anything on fire.
You know the deal: signal the helicopter to catch more ingredients. Or leave the place, up to you.
Out of ingredients again? No problem, signal the chopper for more. Or get out of there. Your call.
There's supplies waiting for you, gentlemen. Secure 'em by the lab.
We can't use the lab anymore, it's gone

This is a simple job, but that doesn't mean it will be easy. We're going to head out to the forest. You remember the place. We did some work for Hector out there. Anyway, I scoped the place out and it is still intact. So, we're headed there to cook up as much meth as we can. You can stay as long as you want. If you run out of supplies, I'll get more flown in. Should be easy money.
You guys remember that sketchy old house out in the forest? Where Hector's guys were cooking up meth? Well, we're headed back there.
Hot damn! You guys did great! Enjoy your payday - you deserve it.
This is the place. It's hardly changed.
They turned the power off! The lights are down.
They cut the power to the house! Lights are down.
Cops killed the lights - get it back on.
Get that power back or this turns ugly in a flash.
We gotta turn those lights back. Get on it!
Get into the house.
Remember we will need at least 3 bags of meth.
Goddammit! Someone got here first... Careful...
Watch out! Their guys haven't left yet, waste 'em!
Make sure noone else is there.
Check that place for the competition.
So... If the cooks are dead... Then we... Need to do the cooking ourselves.
Hectors cooks are dead. We need to do the cooking ourselves... OK...
Good,OK, the reaction seems fine, keep going.
OK, OK good.
Alright on this webpage. What did you just add? Alright. OK, OK.
OK, let's try that.
OK, solid.
Legit... I'm sure. Cooking fine.
They're breaching the house!
Cops climbing the outside. Get to the windows!
Shit, you got crawlers outside. Watch those windows!
Ah, OK... Muria, muriatic acid. Add more.
Mu... Muriatic acid - we need some more in there.
Says we need club soda to get this temperature up... Sounds odd. What can you get?
Caustic basic reaction is now added. OK you got any soda around? Add it.
Hydrogen... Is that a gas... Can't be a solid... Says add it. You guys got a gas tank?
This site says something else... Chloride soda hydrogen mix. I don't know, go for it - something.
It needs hydrogen chloride, for sure... No, no wait... Yeah, OK.
Fuck me, we needed those cooks. I'm going with hydrogen.
Woah. What are the odds? Yeah maybe they weren't that good...
Woah, that's a whammy.
Did you hear that loud bang? Guys?
Turns out, we're really good at making bombs...
Wait guys, I think I'm confusing these CAS registry numbers. ...guys?
Alright, let's see...
Hold on...
So, next step iiis...
Now we need...
Alright, next ingredient...
Uh, if I read this correctly... uh...
Muriatic acid.
Acid. Muriatic acid.
Oh I'm going with muriatic acid.
We'll go with muriatic acid.
We'll go with caustic soda.
Oh I'm going with caustic soda.
Hydrogen chloride.
...hydrogen chloride?
I'm going with hydrogen chloride.
We'll go with hydrogen chloride.
You got some of that somewhere?
That should get things cooking.
Add it.
Add some.
Pour it in.
Hold up!
No, wait!
Wait a minute!
Wait!
Hold it! You didn't put it in yet, right?
We need muriatic acid!
Yeah it's acid, muriatic acid.
I messed up. It should'a been acid.
By method of elimination it has to be muriatic acid.
It should be caustic soda!
That should'a been caustic soda!
By method of elimination it has to be caustic soda.
It's supposed to be hydrogen chloride!
It should be hydrogen chloride!
That should'a been hydrogen chloride!
My bad. It's hydrogen chloride.
I messed up. It should'a been hydrogen chloride.
By method of elimination it has to be hydrogen chloride.
...for sure. Or, most likely.
...that's my best guess.
...it has to be.
...this website better be accurate.
...yeah... yeah.
...and kiss your lucky charms.
...it's a toss-up, really.
...I'm 86% sure.
...I'm 84% sure.
...I'm 68% sure.
...I'm 57% sure.
Watch that C4 - they rigged the whole bus.
Get to that chopper people. We want to get off this bridge too.
Code will defuse that C4!
Another C4 - defuse it!
Hurry!
It's going to blow! Run!
Get the fuck out!
Kill all the rats on that bus. Hector wants no one to step off at the next station.
That bus. Get up there and hose it with bullets. The Mendozas are all there!
That's a clean sweep. All the Mendozas are history. Get to the chopper or go for the money they got on that bus.
Go get him!
Don't let him get away!
Shoot him! He's getting away!
Shoot him!
I hear cops' sirens everywhere. You're gonna get a lot of heat, guys!
You gotta get moving!
Come on, get Matt!
Go! Go! You gotta meet up with the driver!
Chasing Matt like this again, what are the odds?
You can't let that bastard get away!
Keep moving, they're locking you down!
Come on, move, they're locking you down!
Matt seems to have crashed his car! Go on forward!
There it is! Right after the underpass!
Ow, that must have hurt! Is he even alive?
You gotta get Matt out of the van.
See if you can get him out of the van.
Try to get him out of the van.
Look around, see if you can find some gasoline.
We'll try to smoke him out - find some gasoline.
Find some gasoline so you can set the vehicle on fire.
Look for some fuel!
Bring some gas cans!
Alright, fry that bastard, see how long he lasts.
Let's barbecue him. Make sure he's well done!
He's sweating bullets by now.
It's starting to smell like fried pig now.
The fire is dying. You need more gas!
More fuel to the fire, guys. Find it!
Hmm, Bile is right. You should get to the top of the overpass so he can pick you up.
Keep going!
You heard him guys. Clear the pickup zone!
Ok, clear the pickup zone!
You gotta clear the area of cops or Bile won't be able to get close!
Clear the pick up zone!
Clear the area of cops!
You need to shoot the gas can to set it on fire!
What... it's Matt Roscoe! Of course that weasel had to be involved! Maybe you should just kill him here and now!
It's Matt Roscoe! Don't let him get away! Maybe you should just kill him!
What... it's Matt Roscoe! Of course that weasel had to be involved! Maybe you should just kill him here and now!
It's Matt Roscoe! Don't let him get away! Maybe you should just kill him!
Huh... everyone must be at the beach.
Get in character gang, time to meet Cabot's boys.
No time to take in the sights.
C'mon guys, let's be professional, not late.
We only have a short window of opportunity guys.
Let's get this thing going, guys.
Guys, you need to get moving.
No time to stop for coffee.
I guess I should be surprised to see Gensec out there, but those guys seem to be spreading.
Why would Gensec have a truck out there?
Easy gang, let's not start the party early.
Whoa guys, don't blow it open too soon.
Cop chatter on the radio just went off the charts gang!
Radio's going crazy. Cops all around!
Comm systems just went haywire. Cops incoming.
Mr Blonde, did you bring a few cans of the cold stuff like I asked?
Great. OK guys, first you need to access the vault. Blueprint says it's in the back office.
You've got a security door blocking you though.
Hack me into the lobby computer and I'll unlock the door.
Get me into the network via the lobby computer and I'll take care of the lock.
How's that network connection coming?
Hook me up guys, c'mon.
Connection lost. What's going on?
Strange blockers on the network. Almost done though.
Door is unlocked.
Now get to that vault.
Get some eyes on that vault.
Hurry up guys, check that vault.
No time here gang, get to the vault.
We need to take a look at that vault guys.
You really need to take a look at that vault.
Stop screwing around and get to the vault.
That's what I was afraid of. No way our usual stuff will take this out. You'll have to get medieval on it.
Damn, that's what I suspected. Explosives alone are not gonna get you inside that, but I've got a plan.
First thing to do is mount a couple drills on that door.
First, we need holes. Get two drills on that door.
Guys, we're running out of time. Get to the drills.
Got those holes drilled yet?
Cops don't do this kind of crap. Something new is brewing.
This isn't right. Not even the Feds do this kind of crap.
Building schematics show a high-voltage box on the upper floor. If you can shut it down, the vault will be safe.
Good, now go ahead with the drills.
That did it. Get to drilling that door.
Look out guys!
Prolonged exposure can kill, so you gotta decide if you want to risk going in now or wait it out.
Looks safe now, go ahead.
Should be OK to enter the vault now.
How long were those guys in there?!
WHAT!? How long must they have been waiting?!
Some loose stones over there if you wanna grab them on the way.
Someone isn't too worried about thieves...
I guess I should be surprised to see a GenSec truck out there... But those guys seem to be spreading.
First drill done.
Okay, first drill is through.
Great, the drills are through.
OK, the special ingredient for the vault we're going to use is liquid nitrogen, courtesy of Mr Blonde.
Then I guess my guys will have to do the real work. Get the tanks from the car, guys.
And you couldn't be bothered to bring them in while my guys were protecting your neck? Alright gang, go get those nitro tanks from Mr Blonde.
You still need to get the nitrogen tanks.
Ok, now mount the tanks onto the vault.
Great, you now need to empty the nitro into the vault door.
Trust me guys, this science stuff is gonna work.
I did the research, this is gonna work great.
Both tanks need to go on the door.
You need to mount both tanks.
Hurry up guys, mount those tanks.
Great, now just let it pour in there.
Tanks should almost be done. I've got Bile coming with a package for you.
Nitro tanks are empty by now. Doors should be supercooled.
OK, don't think the doors can get much colder.
Bile's package of C4 just came through the roof. Go up and get it, then stick it on the vault.
That crash in the roof you just heard was your C4. Get it and blow that vault!
Explosives on the door, ASAP!
Get that C4 on the door.
Let's crack that frozen vault!
Vault should crack like and egg!
Told you it would work, didn't I?
I knew that would work.
Right guys, if you make your way out by the Big John's Burger Joint, the cops will hopefully follow you so that Blonde can get the car out of there.
Ok gang, let's give Mr Blonde some help with a distraction. Lure away the cops by getting out through the shopping street.
Ok gang, let's give Mr Blonde some help with a distraction. Lure away the cops by getting out through the shopping bazaar.
Let's give Mr Blonde a diversion. Make a break for it over by the Jack Rabbit Slim's so the cops will follow you and not Mr. Blonde and the loot.
Guys, shoot up that burger joint and get out of there.
Mr Blonde is waiting on us to get the cops off him!
You need to distract the cops. Get out of there.
Mr Blonde is waiting on us to get the cops off him! Make your way out!
Eyes on the rooftops! I've got a feeling this is going to get worse.
Watch the rooftops guys! Something's coming, I can smell it.
Get through that door! Twitch is standing by with the van!
Get out of there guys.
Twitch is waiting and getting antsy!
Hurry up guys, my grid is lighting up like crazy.
Ok gang, no time for backslapping. Get out of there AS --- something ---.

Guys, we need to talk about what happened up in Alaska, but I've got another job first, while you're still out west. So, the son of an old friend of mine in L.A., member of the Cabot crime family needs help hitting a jewelry store for a haul of diamonds. I owe him big from years ago, when his dad got me out of a jam, so I promised him a little extra muscle as payback. These guys are pro's, real characters. They even use code names! You guys up for it?
Time for some leisurely shopping in Angel City.
A nice quiet day in the sun. Bring back some autographs.
Ok, here comes the first wave!
Defend against the cops! Don't let them grab any money bags!
Get ready for the second wave!
You've defeated the third wave of cops!
Ok, here comes the third wave!
Ok, here comes the fourth wave!
You've defeated the fifth wave of cops!
Ok, here comes the fifth wave!
Get ready for the fifth wave!
You've defeated the sixth wave of cops!
Ok, here comes the sixth wave!
Get ready for the sixth wave!
You've defeated the seventh wave of cops!
Get ready for the seventh wave!
Nice work! The eighth wave was beaten back!
Nice work! The ninth wave was beaten back!
Get ready for the ninth wave!
Get ready for the tenth wave!

I don't know who tipped the cops off, but I have good information confirming that they don't know who's on the premises. They'll be expecting a routine raid on a possible drugs operation. Give them a warm welcome, teach them to get their intel right.

Listen up! Someone has tipped off the cops about suspicious activity at the Safe House. Units are on their way as we speak to do a search and seizure. They don't know it's you, though - boy are they in for a surprise.
Hey! They took one!
Cops are taking your money, guys!
Don't let them take the bags!
Ok gang. My mole in the police will take care of this. He'll send his guys to clean up and then report that the area was searched and they found nothing. No one will know you're here, you can relax.
Here comes another wave of cops!
Another wave of attack incoming!
Here they come! A wave of cops incoming!
Police attack wave incoming - they're swarming in guys!
Great defense, gang! None shall pass!
Looks like you beat that wave! Keep it up!
You took that wave out! Great work!
This is your home, guys. Don't let the cops invade it. You've got to fight them off and stop them from taking your hard-earned money.
You've got to keep at least 10 bags!
You've got to keep at least 3 bags!
You've got to keep at least 5 bags!
That fence over there is your way in. Cut it open.
Keep moving and get inside.This might be a game to you, but there are guards all around.
Nice to see you still have a keen observation. Take him out and do it quick.
Yeah, I agree. You'll have to take him out.
Hurry! Answer his pager before they raise the alarm. Try and improvise or something.
You need to answer that pager fast, otherwise they'll sound the alarm. Just say something reassuring.
Okay, good. Now, bag that body and get it out of sight before someone comes looking.
Next step is to bag that body before some idiot finds it.
How about that dumpster?
That dumpster should do the trick.
Okay, good. Now, keep going.
Eh, screw it. It doesn't look like you'll be able to pass him undetected. Take him out.
Damn, it looks like you won't be able to get him that easily. Take him out.
Yeah, you're not getting past that guy without too much risk. Take him out.
Don't forget to hide the body.
Remember to hide that body.
I got your back this time, but in the future you'll have to pay for these kinds of "special" favors. My contacts are good people and they expect good money in return.
One of the guards must have discovered the body! Hurry and take him out before he ruins everything!
Behind those crates should do. Now, get the other guy. Remember to grab another body bag.
Hiding them behind those crates should be good enough. Don't forget a body bag for the other guy.
Those crates should work as a hiding place. Drop both bodies there. Get a body bag for the other guy.
Damn, another guard... and he's watching the server room. We don't have time for this. Just take him out.
It's not our lucky day it seems... that guard is watching the server room. Get rid of him.
The Control-Guy seems to be a real dumbwit but we can't fool him forever. I'm betting he's sounding the alarm next time.
That Control-Guy doesn't seem to be the brightest tool in the shed, but next time even he will understand something's wrong.
We're lucky that Control-Guy is stupid as hell, but he's getting suspicious. Next time he'll most likely sound the alarm.
Throw him down there. It should be safe enough.
Throw him down there where no one should find him.
Do you see the flash drive? It should be in a laptop or something.
Excellent. Now, remember to steal something. We need to make it look like a clean-cut robbery and nothing else.
Remember. Don't kill this guy. If you answer the pager the Control-Guy won't fall for it again.
Easy now, Speedy Gonzales. Hang back and let him pass first.
Dallas, my man. You still got it. Now, throw the loot in the back of the van and let's get the hell out of here.
Dallas still got what it takes. Impressive. Now, get the gold to the van and let's get out of here.
Not our smoothest ride together, but we got what we came for. And with the gold you took, it should fetch us a good payout. More than enough to get back on your feet.
All right, this is the place. Remember, we're here for the access codes.
Here we are. Time to get back in business. Feels good, doesn't it?
The database should be on the second floor of the building.
The main entrance would be suicide. We're sneaking in from the side instead. Put on your mask and cut open that fence.
Deploy ECM Jammer and then lockpick the door.
Use the ECM Jammer to disable the camera, that way you can lockpick the door undetected.
Damn it, Dallas! I told you to use the ECM Jammer. Destroying it will draw unnecessary attention.
This is what happens when you're away from the life of crime for too long.
Now get back inside and look for the computer.
Dallas, sneak past it and look for the security room. Life will be easier if we disable all cameras in the building.
Sneak by it and look for the security room. If we do that, we can disable all cameras at once.
Go and see if you can find one somewhere.
Stay under the cameras and they wont be able to spot you.
Answer the pager and we should be fine. The cameras won't present any more trouble.
That console panel should control all the cameras. Give it a go and see if you can find the computer we're after.
You don't want to get detected when we've come this far. Try and sneak past him.
Grab the USB flash drive and get outta there. And, Dallas, don't get sloppy here.
Bring the flash drive with you and get out of there.
Job well done, Dallas. The van's waiting for you.
I stashed some more body bags if you need some. Always plan ahead, Dallas. Always plan ahead.

All right, Dallas. It's time to use those access codes we stole last night. Find a way inside the building - access the Police database and delete all the intel they have on Crime.Net. This won't be a walk in the park, so show me you still got what it takes.
Don't put on your mask and case the area first.
These civilians don't give a crap about you as long as you act normal.
These civvies have their own lives to think about as long as you don't scare them.
These civilians don't get paid enough to care about your business. Don't scare them.
The manager's office is where the coke is, but watch out for mobsters.
Take him out, or try and get by him unnoticed.
That's one of the mobsters. Sneak or kill: Your choice.
Okay, yeah. You're not getting past that guy without taking him down. It's show time.
That guy won't move on his own, so that means it's time to force him.
Good shooting! Okay then. The coke should be in that safe so get drillin'.
And down they go. Okay, I'm betting the cocaine is in that safe so it's time to drill.
Let's see if there's anything else of value while waiting for the drill.
Heads up, Dallas! The cops are here! Take 'em out!
Damn, the cops arrived faster than I expected! Take 'em down!
Holy...! They setup a sniper in the building across the street! Keep your head down and take him out!
The bastards brought in a sniper! He's in the building across the street. Find some cover then take him out!
The cops brought in a Sniper! He's in the building across the street. Take your aim and take him out!
Nice job, Dallas. Now, get the cocaine and head back to the van. Our work here is done.
Impressive work, Dallas! Okay, take the cocaine and run back to the van.
Okay, first things first. We begin by "casing" the surroundings like any professional heister.
Ready to party like the old days, Dallas?
A helicopter is coming to pick you up, but it's going to take a while.
I'm getting a helicopter to pick you up, but it's gonna take some time.
Holy . . .! SWAT-team incoming! Take 'em out!
Heads up, the SWAT-team is here!
Don't just stand around! Help your teammate up!
Your buddy needs your help! Go!
Don't forget the coke in the van, or all of this would be for nothing!
Get the cocaine from the van!
Head for the store and grab a hostage so we can negotiate our friend back from the cops.
Just sit back and let me negotiate a deal with the cops.
You take it easy for now, while I make a deal with the cops.
I'll negotiate a deal with the cops, so we can get our friend back. You just sit tight.
OK, it's done. Release the hostage now to trade back our friend.
The deal went through. You can make the trade now.
Good. Now, don't forget to pick up the coke again.
Okay, you should be fit for fight again. Grab the cocaine.
Okay, get out of there. You don't have time to pick the lock, so just shoot the door handle.
OK, time to leave. Don't lock-pick that door, just blow off the door handle.
Wait! Don't shoot that cop, he's alone! Intimidate him to work for us instead!
Get to the roof now, and wait for the helicopter!
Watch out! SWATS on the roof!
Heads up! SWAT!
They brought in a Sniper!
That's it! Time to go! You still got it, Dallas!
There is a room behind the kitchen, go there, I've prepared the starting kit for you.
I got the pre-order kit in the back for you. Go get it!
There we go, now put your mask on.
Look up.
Pick it up. It's your money that I laundered. Some extra in there for your generous contribution to OVERKILL.
OK that should be 5k to start with.
Some cash, look at it as a welcome gift to get you started. I expect you will pull in much more.
OK, to your left is your Crime.net station. This is where you get your contracts. To your right are your security cameras. Look around and I'll tell you more.
Welcome to Crime.net. This is your crime community. I will hook you up with crime contacts all over DC looking for guys like you. This net is built on mutual trust and money.
We've been growing this for over two years. There should be plenty of new contacts for you to make on your own as well.
Let's see, what else. You can test any of the objects out in here - just pick up the equipment and find something it fits on.
So the safes can be drilled, even picked - if you have the skill.
Good luck - those things are tricky.
In the field, if you trip an alarm, the cops come buzzing. DC's got a lot of them.
Ammo bags, ECM jammers, medic bags, trip mines, sentry guns.
Oh yeah. Pagers.
I set up a little test case for you to see how these work.
Generally the rule of thumb is, they'll only believe you for a little while once the pager goes off.
If you get enough... Maybe we can upgrade this place, huh?
For now, just enjoy the view. We'll put more in here, I promise.
Otherwise, any questions? I'm sure you can figure out the rest. Feel free to come here whenever you want.
It might be worth coming by consistently.
Here you can hang all your modified weapons. It will be quite a rack.
The laundry is a good front. And good for washing things, like clothes, armor and money.
Keep a low profile though. Never know who is looking.
Hit the Crime.net station to get out of here.
The Crime.net station is your ticket to action. Go when you are ready.
Someone should take out that trash.
Alright, time to get to it.
If you want the information again, just play the pre-recorded message using the button.
Get out to the alley.
Looks like Charon freed himself! Now help him get out of here alive!
Looks like he broke free and took a gun! You gotta help him!
Watch those windows, there might be snipers.
Stay sharp, guys, this whole place smells of sniper.
Find the sniper and take him out before he takes the shot!
Find that sniper and take him out!
Quickly guys, find him and take him out!
Get the sniper guys!
Take the sniper out!
You gotta take the sniper out!
Take the sniper out, guys!
Guys! The sniper! Get him!
Help Charon! Take 'em out!
Clear the street so Charon can move!
Clear the street for Charon!
Watch out, they're deploying more snipers!
More snipers incoming!
They're deploying another group of snipers!
They got more snipers incoming!
Oh no - more snipers!
It's the cops! Gang, deal with them! Protect Charon!
You really showed the NYPD how to dance. And I have a feeling they'll send more dancers.
A rough day for the NYPD. And it'll get rougher - I'm sure they'll send more reinforcements.
More cops are arriving!
Damn, there are more cops incoming!
You heard him guys, get going!
Move into the other building. You gotta rendezvous with Charon!
Charon is waiting for you, guys! Get moving!
More snipers! Protect Charon!
That gate looks tough. See if you can find some thermite or something. You have to get that briefcase.
That gate will melt like butter when you apply the thermite. Go get the briefcase!
Get the briefcase! You'll need to drill the gate.
Drill that gate! Get the briefcase!
Great! Not gew the briefcase!
Ok! Get the briefcase!
Great job! Now get that briefcase!
Get down that elevator shaft so you can meet up with Charon!
Go down the elevator shaft and meet up with Charon!
Charon is waiting down there! Get down the elevator shaft!
Let's see... if you cross the street you should be able to get out of here.
You should be able to find an escape route if you get out and cross the street.
Twitch will be there with the van in about a minute. Hold on.
The van should be there in a minute.
What's wrong, Charon? You ok?
You'd better find some cover and make sure it's nothing bad.
Move up to the windows so you get a view of the street!
Move up to the windows, see what's going on!
Move up to those windows so you get a good view of things!
Guys! Don't forget Charon!
Make sure you get Charon out of here alive!
Help Charon get to the escape van!
There are more of them down in the street! Take 'em out!
You'll need to break through those doors! Maybe there's a crowbar around here somewhere?
Don't forget to get the briefcase!
Get that briefcase, guys!
You need to get that briefcase, remember!

You're going to New York tonight. The Continental called - one of their key staff has been ambushed and is being held by unknown assailants at an address in Brooklyn. We have the location from a call he made just as they took him. The target's name is Charon. We need to get there fast, take out whoever's got him and send him back to the Continental safe and sound.
The Continental in New York need you to rescue one of their own. They pay well.
Ok, let's find this guy. He should be around here somewhere.
Make sure you find the target quickly. You don't know what they'll do to him.
Ok, guys. Find the target and get him out of there.
Damn! Alright, I'm sending the drill.
Great! That's what we came for. Once the driver drops 'em off, he'll return for the ammo.
Ammo secured, I'm sending your pick-up ASAP. Be ready!
Plug that hard-drive into one of the train vault security systems, I should be able to hack it open.
We can hack open a train vault if you plug that hard-drive into its security panel.
Nice, I'm in. Wow, pretty nifty security. Who are these guys, section 9?
One of their security buffers just kicked in. Disconnect it!
I'm reconnected. Thanks.
Alright, I'm back in.
The blueprint you found was for a new Type of Turret. It looks like the government is transporting it soon. If we act fast, we can catch them off guard and steal it without anyone noticing.
The government owes us lunch money. Looks like we'll be taking their turret and a few bags of ammo as compensation.
We got the train moving the prototype turret stopped at signals outside the city. Get there, get that turret.
Those railcars are locked down. That card should help with that.
An access card. Great! That will help you get silent access to a railcar.
We can sell those shells, if you can carry them out. But focus on the turret.
Paydirt! That's what we came for, gang. The drill is on its way.
Great. Get it moving!
Almost through the vault door. Get ready.
The drill is almost done. Stand by, gang.
That's live high explosive, so be gentle.
Gently does it. Very gently.
That's the alarm, guys. Expect a fast response!
Damn, that's the alarm. Get ready for action!
That's it. We got the turret. Im sending your pick-up ASAP.
There it is. Break that down and get each piece out.
We're past the first lock. Now let's see what's inside.
OK, we're into the railcar. Use the camera to see what's inside.
Those shells have an angry temper. And a dollar value. Be careful with them.
Be very careful with those bags, gang. They don't take the rough stuff well.
OK, the chopper is almost there. Stand by.
The chopper is in the area. Watch the skies.
OK, the drill is on the ground. Get it and get those vaults open.
Nice. That's the keycard for the railcars.
Keep your eyes open for a keycard.
Shake those workers down. Maybe one of them has a keycard.
You need to dismantle that turret.
That's the pilot with the lance. Get it.
The pilot just signaled that he's deploying the lance. He's done his job, now you do yours.
OK, the pilot is on the way with another lance. You guys are greedy. I respect that.
That's it! That's what we're looking for.
One high-tech, high-value piece of military badass right there.
We can't get the ammo out until all those turret pieces are in the vehicle. Stash the ammo for later. Focus on securing the turret.

That blueprint you found was for a new type of infantry turret - codenamed RC1. Real next-gen shit. Digging a little deeper, I got word of a specially chartered train, headed in to the Pentagon. I've hacked the rail network, and they think they've stopped due to a glitch in the switches. Three railcars. One has the hardware. The other two have its ammo. It all sells, but your priority is the turret. They won't be expecting you.
It was messy but you got the job done. Nice work!
You need to get close and locate the right railcar. Once you've ID'd it, look around - you might be able to find an access card for the railcars.
Move it, guys!
Here we go!
Guys, we're in the middle of the city - try to do this stealthy.
There's the call - cops are on their way!
Stay frosty! Here they come!
It's rock-the-clock!
Heat is coming in. I'm moving the escape car.
We're moving the escape car. Hang on.
We're moving the escape car. Don't blow the horn yet - this place is crawling with cops.
Escape car is there. You need to be finished soon fellas. Hurry!
Escape is here, so whenever you're ready!
The cops are all ready on the scene. They've must have been close by.
Get some more loot if you can!
Has anyone found the tiara yet?
Guys, if you haven't found the tiara yet - you better find it soon. We're running out of time!
It might be in the front too. It doesn't have to be in the back!
Keep your crowd controlled!
Keep it clean! Keep the civs out of the line of fire!
You're still good. No one has heard you yet!
Five by five, you're still OK.
Someone saw the broken window!
They saw the broken window!
The alarm's been tripped!
Girl in the window, get out of sight!
That girl made you, here we go.
Aw, there's a metal detector, wasn't in the plan.
They must have just installed that metal detector.
Alright, keep going! It's got to be there!
How can it be empty!? Aah!
Cameras got us, time for plan B.
Great work! Metal detector down.
Metal detector seems to be down. Great work!
What did I say about civilians?
Snipers deployed, keep your heads down!
Awesome! That's extra cash for us, drinks are on me!
Serious haul. You guys did well!
No one even heard you. True pros!
I knew you were pros and no one even heard you. Amazing!
Cold and calculated, just like we want it!
Great! You guys can escape now, but choose to go for more of the extra loot.
Alright, the choice is: escape now - or - go for more loot, your call!
There's movement in the alleys. Stay alert!
Movement in the alleys. Stay sharp!
Vlad really doesn't like this Dmitri guy. One of these old-country feuds, maybe he shagged his sister or something.
Anyway let's help the man settle the score. We go for the tiara - back room from what I understand.
Nice work. Vlad got what we came for. A little bonus jewelry would have been nice, I'm not going to lie but there's always another day.
Time to collect on that tiara. Vlad will be happy. You guys just crashed a wedding.
Nice, jewels and tiara. Time to collect from Vlad. He's going to be happy.
Nice run team. The tiara is secured and Vlad can't contain himself with joy. Let's go see the crazy Ruskie.
What do they call that? Bling? Anyway time for a payday.
Now that's a knockover. Good job getting everything there, that was a lot of work. The tiara is a bonus in this case and Vlad is happy as hell.
Drinks on me for this one... Super fine hit, people.
OK, this is business as usual for Vlad. We get the tiara, we get the jewels if you want them. You can do this job any way you want as long as you get the tiara. Back to the van when you are done.
OK listen to me, when those doors open you better be ready to get out.
Hey, there's so many cops out there! Get yourself ready to deal with them when the doors open.
Hey, half the God damn police force is out there. Are you ready to defend yourselves!?
Hold them back, I'm looking for an escape driver as we speak!
Return fire! I'm getting you a driver, you need to keep them off the coke!
You return fire and keep them off your position! I'll get you a God damn driver! OK!?
You hear that everybody? You got three minutes until he gets here. Hold them back!
Hey The pick-up car is coming here in two minutes so you just have to fight a little more!
Hey, two minutes, we have two more minutes until the pick-up car! Not much longer!
30 secs, get ready to move that coke!
30 seconds till pick-up!
You have 30 seconds!
Watch for flanking!
Hold 'em back!
He'll be here soon!
Alright, the pick-up driver is here! He's on the street behind you!
OK everyone, the driver's here but he parked on the other side of the street! Cross over on that walkway.
OK! Now get the bags into the truck. We need at least four bags.
That's one in, great! We need at least three more.
One down! We need three more, at least three more.
Beautiful! We just need two more - at least two more bags.
Great! Now you need two more - at least two more bags to make Hector happy.
OK, now you just need two more bags for Hector.
OK folks, we just need one more bag for Hector and we're good to go.
OK, gentlemen! Another bag and Hector's end is covered and we can get into the real moneymaking.
That bag should put us in the black.
Great, now we're making money here.
Escape driver's comin in now. The escape driver is coming in now!
Close God damn call! Now head for the docks!
Let me patch in the chopper pilot now!
Patching the chopper pilot in!
Chopper pilot's here! Move! Move! Move!

I knew you'd get out of that mess. You got all of it too. I let Hector's boat know. See you at the harbor!

The boat's on the way for the pick-up. You need to get those bags secured now.
Look, people! Get your shit together and get those bags secured before the cops do. The pick-up boat is on the way.
Alright, good! Now you need to signal the boat pick-up. Floodlights in the warehouse - look for a switch.
The boat is coming in at dock 7, by the crane.
Boat's in transit, he'll be at dock 8 by the warehouse.
He's coming in at dock 9, get ready!
Chopper's on the way people, just hang tight!
Chopper's here, get out! Get out!
Get those bags! We need em!
Have you found the floodlight switch yet?

OK, you go to the harbor like we planned. Offload the coke from the pick-up. You'll need to signal Hector's boat in the warehouse to get him to come in. Once he's there, get the coke on-board and the boat driver will do the rest.
The coke is shipped out. Well done sailors! Go get you payday!
I know you had things under control, not like the other time - you handled it in style! Hector's owes us big!
Well, you did lose some of the coke but you finished the job, so good on you! We'll get our payday yet, just put some ice in the back of your head in the meantime.
Damn it Locke, you better not be messing with my crew. We had a contract!
It's a setup! Damn brak sold us out. Swats incoming. You'll need to fight your way out.
Locke got away, but we'll have our payback later.
The ship by the docks belongs to the Butcher. Looks like she got sold out too. Help them out and maybe they'll give us a ride out.
You need to free all the hostages.
Your help is needed guys, get over there ASAP.
OK, great that saw will come in handy.
Great guys, you're going to need that saw.
That saw doesn't seem too realiable, keep an eye on it.
Don't get too far away from that saw in case it breaks down.
The saw stopped running.
OK, good. Keep it running this time.
OK, now open that door!
The saw is finished, get through that door!
Do whatever the Captain asks guys. I can't get you out any other way right now, so he's your only ticket back to warm weather.
Jesus, the devastation....with you in 3.
Three minutes out. You should see things from up here.
Oh man. City is fucked. On my way, three minutes.
Emergency services are trying to commandeer my chopper for evacs. I'll be there in 2.
Under pressure here to turn the chopper over to medical evac. But they pay shit. I'll be there in 2.
The wreckage is incredible. I'm a minute away from you.
It'll take years to rebuild this. Just one minute, be ready.
All right, there's the flare. Beginning descent.
Hey, guys, I'm coming in for a short period of time, so bring me any loot you want to secure.
Coming in at the back, my masked friends. I'll only stay a short while so bring me anything you want to secure, and do it fast.
I'm here. Bring me the loot pronto, because I can't stay too long.
Hey, I'm here in the back now. Hurry up and get me any loot you want secured.
Hey, I'm here in the back now. Hurry up and get me any loot you want secured.
All right Cowboys, I'm dropping you off here, and I'll circle around until you call me back to pick up the goods.
Yihaaaa! Here we are! I'll circle around until you get whatever you came for. Just give me the signal and I'll be back to pick the loot up. Good luck!
Hey! Where's my backup? I'm a sitting duck up here!
Guys, defend me! Those snipers are making it impossible for me to get close enough. You need to take them out!
Oh, well that's a miss... Guys, the C4 landed on the balcony. I apologize.
Yihaa! The C4 has been dropped on the roof as we agreed.
All right, done! The C4 has been dropped on the roof.
Okay, I'm back, but I can't do shit with that many cops everywhere. You'll need to clear the roof.
Seems the coast is clear. Good job. Coming in now.
I'm lowering the winch.
Lowering the winch now.
Okay, the winch is in place. Now I need you to attach the magnet on top of the panic room.
I've lowered the winch, but I need you to attach the magnet.
The winch is where it needs to be, but I need your help attaching the magnet.
That's it! I'm off!
Comrads! I managed to throw out some explosives for you, better to be prepared.
There is a present down there for you comrads. A nice bag of C4.
Flying in with the EMP right now.
HA HA. Right in the lumber mill, that was beautiful.
Dropped it right on spot.
It landed right out in the open. Zalupa!
All done huh? I will land by the lake, prepare to extract.
Take your time comrads. The plane is waiting for you.
Damn! They have anti-air defenses set up around the whole factory. I need to turn the plane around! Comrads, you need to use the parachutes and get out! Right now!
Shit! These bastards have anti-air defenses set up! I will turn the plane around! Comrads, use the parachutes and get out! We'll figure something out!
Whisky Tango Foxtrot One on the scene. Be there in...
Just two minutes.
About 60 seconds. AKA a minute.
Just thirty more seconds.
Just half a minute.
All right, I see you. Dropping the cage by the silo.
That bridge looks perfect. Dropping the package there.
The road is a perfect drop-zone. Putting your cage there.
The skyhook cage is on the ground!
It's down! Skyhook cage is delivered.
Okay sensei. Just let me know when you're ready.
I hear ya, brother. Let me know when it's ready.
Copy that, In holding pattern til you give clearance.
The white thing floating in the sky? Got it! Two minutes, tops!
Is it that white floaty round thing? I'm after it. Gimme two minutes!
Target in sight. Oooh, that's a lot of cops. Attempting...to........
Lining up on the target. Fuck me, it's hotter than Khe Sanh!
I missed! Crapola! All right, I can do this. Just need Dutch courage.
Right. Lining up. Flaps looking good. You can do this!
Here we go. Hands steady. Just keep it straight. Almost there....
I caught it. Like a fucking boss!
Uh, control, I shat the bed again. Repeat: shat the bed. Trying again.
Uh...aborting due to...geese. Coming around again.
All right, swinging around again! Gimme just 30 seconds.
Copy that. Returning for another drop. I need half a minute!
Dropping this one at the silo!
I'm going to drop it on the road. Stand by.
Okay, coming back around. There in 60 seconds.
On my way back. Give me 60 seconds.
I see the cage. Attempting the pick-up.
Okay, got eyes on the cage. Here I come!
I see the target. On approach!
Ah yeah! Grabbed that motherfucker!
I need to move to a higher point for pickup. Too narrow down there.
It's very hairy here. I'll move to a safer spot, guys. Follow me.
Too much flak. I'll move to a safer spot, follow me.
Alright, get on board so we can get the hell out of here.
Alright I'm here. Get in quick so we can get out of here.
You need to clear the pickup zone guys! Or I won't be able to get you out.
Ok, coast is clear. Coming in.
I'll have to fall back. Too much heat.
Ok, deploying to this zone instead. It's much safer.
Deploying over here. This spot is calmer.
Hey, I'm down here.
Come on, get into the chopper guys.
Come on, let's get going. Get in.
Heads up. Dropping your order.
OK. I'm here and ready to drop your delivery.
Package on the ground. Good luck out there!
Package dropped. Stay alive.
You clowns ready? Hose is coming down.
Like the priest said to the nun, I'm droppin' you a hose.
My job's done here! I'm out.
I'm dry, and I'm outta here.
Roger that. I'm on my way. Over.
Copy that, Broadsword. En route now. Over.
Request declined, Broadsword. Over and out.
Roger that, Broadsword. If I don't make, tell my wife she's-
Roger that, Broadsword. Approaching for a roof pick-up. Over and out.
Very well, Broadsword. Over and out.
Two minutes. Over.
Another 30 seconds. Over.
Just took a .50 cal. Fuck! I'm going down.
Ground team, this is Danny Boy. The skyhook was a success. Over and out.
I don't even wanna know what you guys are up to this time. Just give me the coordinates.
I'm on my way guys, give me a few minutes.
I'm pretty close. Just give me a few minutes.
There she blows!
Ok, I'm coming back again for the next one. We could just drop it right on the house.
The roof? No. Fucking. Way.
Roof. Got it, Sensei. Five by five.
Understood, Sensei. I can do this. I can do this!
Three more minutes, guys.
Just buzzed a Time-Out. Two minutes.
30 seconds, almost there!
Target in sight. I'm going in.
Sorry, Sensei. I've let you down!
Looks like this bird is going down. Sorry boss!
Took a hit. Going down! Tora tora tora!
I got it! Ya hear me, I scooped up ya package!
Got it! That was some outstanding flying, if I say so myself.
This is our final show, y'hear? Make sure it goes with a bang.
Hey! Asswipe! Stop scratching ya crack and get on the Intercom!
Don't make me whip you like a government mule. Get on the Intercom.
Yeah! Yeah! All right, hey, up in the booth, get on the Intercom.
All right, booth team. When I give you the nod, you hit it - you got that?
Booth team. You better be on goddamn point. I'll give the word, you'll hit the button. Comprende amigo?
That was outstanding! Whooooooo! Outstanding.
Hey, can I get a hell yeah for the booth team.
Holy motherfuckin' shit! That shit fuckin' rocked! Whoooooooooooo!
You motherfuckin' shitbirds. Secure your shit up there.
Man, that was beautiful. Just beautiful. Like my dear old momma. (sniffs)
Brother, goddamn that was outstanding! You guys are on fuckin' point - whoooooooo!
Ahhh shit, partner. These kids are going fuckin' ape shit. Whooooooo!
Yeah! That shit was tight. Fuckin' tight!
I got one word for you: whooooooooooooooooooooo!
And... now!
Fire it off!
Hit it!
Hit it!
Focus this time. Press it!
Eye on the ball. Fire it!
Hands off dicks, hands on button. Now!
Chance for redemption. Do it!
No fucking it this time. Drop it!
You fucked it, son.
Booth crew. More like fuck up crew.
How can you fuck up pressin' a goddamn button?!
Man, you guys are a train wreck. What a fuckin' mess.
All right. (to someone off phone) Dwayne, send some guys up there to kick a little ass.
I've had enough. (to someone off phone) Send security up there. I want fingers pulled.
I expected nothing less than another fucking fuck up. Fuuuuuuuuck.
Welcome to the greatest night of my fucking life. Great job everyone!
And that is how you put on a great show. Great work!
Best goddamn crew in the history of music! Can I get a hell yeah.
Well, that was just about the worst goddamn pyro show I've seen.
Did something just come loose? Check it, and fix it!
What the hell! We just lost a feed. Fix it you guys!
Looks like a hardware malfunction up at the booth. Pyro team, deal with it!
Something's fucked up there. Pyro guys, you gotta deal with it.
Ummm, just...yeah, something fucked up. Fix it, you guys.
We can't have this place on fire - it's the pyro booth. Put it out!
That gear's expensive. Like, ten years of your salary expensive. Deal with the fire!
(coming close to the phone)...so then Sid wiped it all over Keith's sandwich, and said it was just mayonnaise! (laughs)
Man, this music is fucking beautiful. It should be played in church.
I wish we had this music when I was a kid. They're fucking loving it.
Did I ever tell you guys about the weekend me and Jimi smuggled a bale of grass and a goat out of Tijuana?
Take it from an old man, guys. Don't do drugs. Drinkin' and smokin' is fucking great though.
We played here back when Harry's Wine Box stood here. That was '73.
See this tattoo? Got this off the king himself. Fucking A, man.
I was there when The Cockroaches split. Greatest fucking band ever.
Hey hey hey, shithead! Answer the fucking Intercom!
Got that right Hox.
Pretty fucking fitting for a Murkywater hideout.
Feel familiar Hox?
Wrong movie, Hox.
Keep an eye out for things that glow green.
Did anyone remember to pack rain coats in case we need to make a raft?
Rats in the walls...
It'd be rather boring if it was right behind the front door, wouldn't it?
Maybe we'll bring home a couple as pets for you, Locke.
If the guests smell of fish, I suggest getting the hell out of here.
Right, wankers. We do this one for the boss.
All of this has happened before. Fuck me.
Raiders of the fuckin' wankers.
Aw, fuck me. The air in this place...
Operations is our first stop. From there, we should be able to find what we need.
OK, I'm inside. I'll get to work on these servers. Keep me covered!
Cover me while I work!
Got a little problem, lads. Server is all bolloxed up with encryption. Take ages to crack, so we need encryption keys. Security office should have some.
Ah shite. These interview files are locked. Can only be unlocked with approval from the Director himself. Fuck me, this goes to the top. Any of you guys fancy being king for a day?
Ah, bloody hell. Some interview files are locked. Need approval from... Fuck me, the Director himself. Whoever this rat is, he's connected. Get to the Director's office!
You're in. Ha! His password was: iheartrainbows44. The requests are on the way. Approve them!
Just keep yer lid on. Let me find all the files you need to sign off on.
Keep yer knickers on, lads. Need to find all the files for ya to sign off.
OK, another request you need to approve!
Alright, just approve that request. Fuck me, he's got an easy job.
Another request for you to sign off on.
Great, I've got access to all the restricted files I needed! Get back here and keep this show going!
Unrestricted access. Fuckin' get in! Now, get back here. Let's keep this going.
We got a bollocks-load of clearance now. Get back here. Still work to do.
Shite. Need a few files not on the servers. Witness testimonies, kept in the Archives. Get down there.
A little hickup; there's a server missing in here. Log says it was taken to the IT Department for maintenance. We need that server, so you'll have to retrieve it.
Interesting. Files on this server are pointin' to some evidence being held by forensics. Let's check it out.
Well, bugger me - files here are linking to some physical evidence down in the labs. Get down there, check it out!
OK, I've copied all the information I found to this server. Grab the server and let's get out of here.
Right. Fuck it. I gathered all the intel we need to one of the servers. Someone grab it and let's leg it.
Come on, you wankers. Get that power up again.
For fucks' sake! Lads! The power!
Gang, I can't do what I need to do without power. Fuckin' fix it!
Power's back on, but I gotta reboot things here. Hold your horses.
Alright, we're working again. Just hold on.
Back to work. Keep 'em off it from now on.
OK, I found my case file, I'm digging through it.
I'm into my file. Let's see what these twats have got.
What's this? There's mention of a "classified informant" here, fucking knew it!
Let's see. There! "Classified informant"! I knew I smelled a rat.
This isn't an average case. Lots of information restricted. I'm not this important, am I?
They've got everything. Every heist, every job. References to you guys too. But no names - guess the traitor is holding onto those.
What the fuck. This file is huge. They know everything about me. And there are references to you too! No names - maybe the informant is holding out for a better price, the fuck.
Gonna keep a low profile in here.
I'll be quiet as a church mouse til you're back.
There's the entrance. Don't pussyfoot around, knock that front door down!

... Nice. I'll get the server.

Especially that beret...
Olympus is about to go and fuck off.
You know, I think I just realized the gravity of what we're doing.
